171.description: 171 is an open world action adventure game with a Brazilian inspired ambience.

486.description: YOU ARE A SQUARE. That can fight, drink, dance, lift, become an athlete, play darts, fight robots, rob, steal, and smoke weed. All to get the global high score.

海岛守卫.description: "Island Guard" is a fun growth tower defense game, guard the island magical flowers, prevent monsters from approaching, your task is to recruit warriors, train and strengthen them, combine different skills, defend the enemy wave after wave of attack

Our Adventurer Guild.description: Become the new Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild and lead your adventurers in explorations and turnbased tactical battles. Will the Guild strive under your leadership? Or will it finally disband under it?

Tank Commander.description: Get ready to blow up the tanks, shoot for the enemy tanks and claim victory. Accept your commander missions, firing to kill enemy tanks . You need be a tanks hero to win WW2 Battles.

Tales of Fire Demo.description: Tales of Fire is a short story-driven game, embark on an adventure to bring fire to your ant village or else they all die to the cold winter breeze. Platform your way through mushrooms, escape from evil spiders and make friends along the way. Can you save them?

Telos Pragmaton.description: Trapped in a small house with a deadly monster, use your wits and a mysterious device to survive in this fixed perspective survival horror. Keep the junctions charged so that you don't suffocate, but tread carefully as the monster will lurk in the shadows to hunt you, becoming ever more aggressive.

Fire Story.description: FireStory - Top Down game about a firefighter, the player must fight off a flying fire extinguisher and direct the blow in such a way as to put out burning people and other sources of fire.

L-Racers.description: L-Racers is a minimalistic, retro, 1980s arcade-style old school game where you go head-to-head against another player (CPU or human) and be the last racer alive.

Robot-X Demo.description: A fast-paced platform shooter inspired by 90s classics. Follow Robot-X on a journey to protect the city from a new danger, fight bosses and jump over pits in this retro experience.

Antro Demo.description: ANTRO. The underground revolution.An introspective journey to an underground world where music will be your ally.

G-ZILLA: Return of the Aliens Demo.description: Play as an OVERPOWERED boss monster who has decided to go on a rampage.

镇邪 Zhenxie Demo.description: 《镇邪》是一款单机国风恐怖游戏，根据大量的民间故事改编。玩家将扮演道门弟子前往神秘村庄调查身世之谜，不想却无意中卷入一场巨大的阴谋。摸金寻宝，驱邪镇灵，开坛做法，画符炼尸...空前绝后的人鬼较量，灵异邪祟的无尽纠缠。二十载宿命，难抵一生夙愿。

We Took That Trip Demo.description: A chill lofi roadtrip with your best friends through procedural roads. You'll drive your old van, so remember: it's old and can break a lot.

Trust No Bunny.description: Everybunny has a secret. Who do you trust to keep the town safe? Trust No Bunny is a 5 to 8 player social deduction mission game for fans of Avalon, Town of Salem, Among Us, or Werewolf. It’s a game for thinkers, schemers, & downright liars, where guessing the traitor is only half the battle.

Railgun X Tripod.description: Shoot down invaders from another dimension and save the world! Railgun X Tripod is a missile defense simulator in which the player becomes a human tripod and operates a heavy but powerful railgun with various upgrades to eliminate hordes of enemies from the sky before they reach our city!

The Shadow Government Simulator: Prologu.description: Shadow Government Simulator: Prologue is just part of the amazing adventure that awaits you in the full version of the game. A turn-based strategy game where you lead a secret society towards world domination. Investigate the influential and convert them to your faction via bribery, seduction & more

Android Simulator: Prologue.description: Android Simulator: Prologue is just part of the amazing adventure that awaits you in the full version of the game. Take charge of a spaceship colony, flight route and manage the right water balance for plants, oxygen level, and spacecraft parameters to securely deliver the colonizers.

そろそろ寿司を食べないと死ぬぜ！ Playtest.description: If you don't keep eating sushi, you'll die! A 3D action game in which such a hero makes a big adventure! Fight the evil that attempts to erase sushi from the world!

Sigh of the Abyss.description: Embrace the monster within to change the fate of a nation in this dark fantasy visual novel.

Catastrophe Demo.description: Catastrophe is survival horror dungeon crawler. Try not to get lost in the labyrinth as you choose to slay the dungeon's inhabitants or sneak past as many as you can.

24 Killers Demo.description: Out in the Indian Ocean somewhere is a tiny desert island where a multiverse spanning drama is unfolding. You play as Home, a cursed super intelligence bound to a soldier's corpse by an alien named Moon.

Being a Penguin Demo.description: A short exploration open world game about a penguin who doesn't want to be a penguin. Bump and slide your way through a little frozen world with penguin physics.

The Creature: Escape Room.description: You are a detective sent to investigate the mistreatment of a mysterious creature. In this escape room there are not only puzzles, but also characters and history.

3 Club Golf Demo.description: VR Golf with a robot. The perfect blend of actual golf skill and arcade challenge. Play alone or online at any of 12+ original and stylized golf courses. Customize everything! (including your robot caddie) Unlock challenges, find secrets, and collect prizes. It's like real golf, only more fun!

Epic Party Quest.description: A retro-themed party game for up to 4 players, in which each player takes the role of various now-retired fantasy heroes and relive the story of their epic adventures in a series of highly competitive, fast-paced mini-games.

Push The Blocks.description: Move the main block to the "X" of the stage. To do this, push some blocks, blow up others, and solve thought-provoking puzzles. Let's relax and burn some neurons?

The Lobster Game.description: "The Lobster Game" is a roguelike pixel-art styled action shooter. Break through as many levels as you can, killing bandits to avenge brother death.

Subcube Demo.description: Subcube is a puzzle game designed to make your brain nervous system a Gordian knot. The goal is to construct cubes by rotating blocks on a board. Use your imagination and creativity and push your spatial awareness to its limits in order to solve the puzzles.

Trippy Tavern.description: You are the bartender at Trippy Tavern, serving up colorful drinks to thirsty customers. Use your earnings to learn new recipes and rise the ranks, all while dealing with random mods every round -- some good, some bad, and everything in between! Oh, and don't forget to pay the rent...

The Curse Of Grimsey Island Demo.description: The year is 2075 and the race is on to recover an ancient Viking artifact. Mistakes are made. People go missing. A death. Could it be greed or folly or is there some truth to the curse of Grimsey Island?

FUFUFU.description: Have you ever raced with sheeps, poked noses, or battled against pirate cats? Welcome to FUFUFU, an adorable roguelite adventure for all ages, full of wacky situations. Get ready for some Fu-lish action!

The Block Demo.description: A minimalist city building toy. Place randomly generated buildings on a square and watch your tiny city block come to life!

怪物狩猎：序章 Demo.description: Monster Stalker: Prologue is a free independent version of Monster Stalker, tells the early stage story of Monster Stalker. It combines card battle and RPG. Aliens invade earth and monsters are coming. You will build deck, fight various monsters and get teammates. Go fight and save earth!

Stream Toys by Zokya Demo.description: A collection of chat-interactive games and toys that you can use to engage with your audience. Includes "Plinker" a multi-player skill game that turns messages in your chat to tokens that 'plink' and bounce down a peg board. Land a plinky in the bucket to score a point!

Toy Tactics Demo.description: A physics-based RTS game with a unique control system. Lead legendary warriors from distant ages in their quest for glory! Command your troops by just drawing your formations on the battlefield. Surround, ambush, deceive.. faster than ever! Your imagination is the limit.

Incoherence.description: Incoherence is a fragmented first-person point and click mystery game. Enter the mind of Jason Bethlam as you awake to a brightly lit room. Piece together fragments of your life and escape.

We Stay Behind Demo.description: We Stay Behind is a single-player third-person mystery between dreams and reality. A comet is on course to destroy a small town but its inhabitants refuse to leave. Interview the people of Laburnum Creek, explore a beautiful national park and unravel the secrets of this picturesque town.

The Blight.description: The Blight aims to evolve the open world survival with unprecedented levels of horror, strategy, and prediction, where knowledge and skills become the ultimate weapons for long-term survival.

My Naughty Summer Vacation ~Days in Coun.description: An 3D simulation RPG in which the main character returns to the countryside and enjoys his summer vacation. Let's spend a special summer in the countryside with heroines, by talking, go to various places with countryside, playing, and others, while making memories of the summer.

Home Sick.description: This is a horror puzzle game. To be a successful player, use objects in the mystery house wisely, and find the meaning of this metaphoric story.

Chester’s Revenge Demo.description: Rad Ralph took the Sacred Carrot and wiped out Chester's herd. Now Chester must get revenge. Takedown Rad Ralph's lieutenants one by one and crush them. Reclaim the Sacred Carrot and help the world's most badass guinea pig avenge this vile act of depravity.

Chasing Halo:Iron Storm.description: It is a team tactical competitive shooting game,which has forged vehicles, novel playing methods,exquisite pictures and shocking scenes. In the tripartite battle of virtual history, we will break through the siege,use exquisite strategies to sweep away thousands of troops and be the winner.

Sometimes They Come Back Demo.description: Clear up the mysteries and horrors of the ominous Freedom Towers and try to salvage your life. Investigate, talk with the other residents to reveal their secrets, solve puzzles, cry, suffer... and try to play through the game — before the game plays through you.

浮世渡り.description: 「浮世渡り」は、広大なマップを駆け、消えた家族を探しに行くアクションRPGだ。 プレイヤーは、迫りくる敵に、強力で破壊的なコマンド技や、アイテムを駆使し、進み続けます。

Dungeon Redemption Demo.description: Dungeon Redemption is an Indie turn-based tactical roguelike where you command adventurers on journeys into the deep of dungeons. Master survival puzzles, and dive into ever-changing maps to guard the holy contracts! The gameplay is challenging enough to satisfy the strategy lovers.

Get Out Of My Space Demo.description: These damned people have been reigning in our part of space for too long. They kidnap our people and conduct experiments on them. We cannot afford to be treated like this.

Monster Showdown Prologue.description: Monster Showdown: Prologue is the first 3 maps of an action packed VR shooter. Increase your chances of survival against an ever growing horde of monster by exploring your environment and strengthening yourself by picking up Perks, Ranged Weapons and Melee Weapons.

Cryweard Demo.description: "Cryweard" is an action RPG developed by a student, with the focus on the fun of bargaining and tense moments in battles. A nameless warrior explores the world to unravel the mystery of "Cry" and confronts a powerful enemy called "Weard" while making full use of his magical powers.

Dream Catcher VR Demo.description: Dream Catcher VR is a relaxing puzzle adventure in the soulful world of Nappia – the land of dreams. Meet characters from varied backgrounds and shape their dreams – search for hidden parts, mend fractured memories, clear your path, and bring colors to the surroundings.

The Last Case of Benedict Fox.description: Take on the last case of Benedict Fox and dive into a twisted world of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded murders. Explore the memories of deceased victims as you search for clues and fight demons in this fantastical Lovecraftian Metroidvania.

Hermea.description: A Third Person Speed runner where you can use a myriad of different abilities to deliver mail to some very angry Greek Gods in a variety of colorful worlds!

Jettatura.description: Jettatura is a challenging first-person dungeon-crawler (DRPG) with round-based combat. Form a band of up to six mercenaries to scout the subterrene world to reclaim a stolen ancient artifact from the surreptitious death-cult that pilfered it!

Do Not Feed The Monkeys 2099 Demo.description: Spy on strangers through security cameras, invade their privacy and discover their intimate secrets in this digital voyeur simulator. Welcome to the future of The Primate Observation Club. Even in 2099 the golden rule about messing with your unlucky subjects still remains: DO NOT feed the monkeys!

Hermea Playtest.description: A Third Person Speed runner where you can use a myriad of different abilities to deliver mail to some very angry Greek Gods in a variety of colorful worlds!

Color Story: Pixa's Quest.description: Help Pixa run and jump through a fast-paced, cute but challenging platformer featuring a dozen unlockable magic abilities and colorful hand drawn graphics. Find collectables, buy upgrades, and work your way towards defeating the sinister Earl Grey. Retro style gameplay with modern QoL improvements.

Niravasi.description: Escape and explore the ruins of a once-great city, while being hunted by the machine that watches over it. Remember, there is always protection in perfection.

REMEDIUM Demo.description: The fast-paced twin-stick shooter game in the grim post-apocalyptic Renaissance setting. It had been more than a hundred years since the terrible plague devoured the whole continent and turned almost everyone there in the maddened mutants.

NITRO KID Demo.description: Nitro Kid is a roguelike deckbuilder set in the neon ‘80s. Build your deck of cyber kung-fu moves, use card combos and fight through the floors of INFINITY tower. Featuring 30+ Synthwave tracks composed exclusively for the game. Check out the DEMO now!

Mages Defense Demo.description: In a fantastic and unique land, dark creatures seek to destroy the peace of the world and rule the earth. Help the Mages to defend the world against them building traps in their path and using magic in a colorful and happy environment

Panique à Temple A-Steak Demo.description: Two secret agents must learn to work together on the most dangerous mission of their careers: recovering a magical Aztec artifact hidden in a theme park owned by a multi-billionaire who has the world in a tizzy because of his terrifying reputation.

Dancin Divas Demo.description: A robbery has taken place! Four Diva's from around the world are showcasing their treasures at the local lounge but things have gone south. It's time to fight back!

The Backroom - Lost and Found Playtest.description: The Backroom - Lost and Found tells the story of a room in the backrooms. Can you keep your sanity, bring the lost together, and find your way out?

RoadRace.description: Choose your little car and race!

TrackRace.description: Choose your little car and race!

Accursed Demo.description: Accursed is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a mysterious ever-changing house in a slow-paced, atmospheric world and survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

Free Multiplayer session - June 8 - 7pm.description: STRIDE is a high-octane parkour adventure in virtual reality. Fight for your life as you hurtle through the rooftops of a futuristic metropolis. Step into the shoes of a master freerunner as you vault, swing, and shoot your way through this action-packed adventure. Multiplayer now available!

Recollection Demo.description: All the same, all the time. Day in, day out. But maybe there is more, if you just look close enough, and remember. A short and atmospheric walking’n’watching simulator about cherishing the familiar.

Ara: History Untold.description: Build a nation and lead your people throughout history to the pinnacles of human achievement as you explore new lands, develop arts and culture, conduct diplomacy, and go head-to-head with your rivals to prove you are the greatest ruler ever known. It's Your World Now.

Raid Off Demo.description: Level up your guild in this MMO simulator. Then boss rush with your raiders in this real time strategy with pauses. As a guild leader, did you manage not to get overwhelmed in this fast-paced RTS ?

Blade Of Ten.description: Blade Of Ten is a Fighting Adventure game set in a Fantasy World filled with Mystery. You will encounter a variety of Creatures and Characters, explore Vast Areas and maneuver around the highest of ledges with your Helicopter Jump. Vanquish the forces of evil, or Race against them in Go Kart mode!

PieceWars Demo.description: "Piece Wars" is a chess-based board game. Use the unique skills of each piece to win!

C&T Playtest.description: C&T is a Goofy Team-Strategy Multiplayer game where you play either as a cop or a thief in teams through a small town. Lets see who can rule between the crime and the law!

Echoes of the Stars Demo.description: Echoes of the Stars is a modern action-JRPG standing on the shoulders of the classics. Follow Rin and Eldric in a tale of two souls, bound together by fate in an epic tale of time, space, love, laughter, and the human condition as they challenge those who seek to destroy existence as we know it.

Evil Dreams Demo.description: Evil Dreams is a dark adventure about nightmares, telling the story of a boy living in the late 19th century and forced to face ancient evil. Delve into the world of dreams to find out the truth.

Bat to Bed.description: A punishing vertical climb to the top of a serene forest, with simple but nuanced one-button movement.

Plane Accident Demo.description: Become an inspector examining causes of plane crashes. Visit the crash site, gather evidence and interrogate witnesses. Explain whether the accident was caused by independent factors or human errors.

14 Minesweeper Variants Demo.description: Minesweeper but the rules are changing.

Kaichu - A Kaiju Dating Sim Demo.description: Kaichu is a dating sim about kaiju! You play the role of Gigachu, a gigantic romantic looking for love. Meet 6 other eligible kaiju and visit 24 famous landmarks where Gigachu will answer challenging compatibility questions to decide the fate of your relationship.

Run Build Pew! Demo.description: You’re being Bounty-Hunted! Run, Build your ship piece-by-piece and make it work with the parts you find, Destroy outposts and waves of fleets, and Pick your battles carefully to overcome your hunters in this Fast-Paced Top-Down Action Roguelite Shooter.

subROV Demo.description: Pilot a remotely operated submarine and explore the oceans! Take on contracts to chart unknown regions, sample hydrothermal vents and study new species – all while defying the darkness and crushing pressure of the deeps.

Defenders of Asteria.description: The time has come to defend your lands from the hordes invading forces. Build up your defenses and summon mighty heroes to aid you as you become one of the Defenders of Asteria!

Game Over.description: An adventure RPG with rhythm based combat encounters, zany characters, moral conundrums and platforming elements? Oh sorry I didn't know this was a question. Yes.

Polychromia Demo.description: Polychromia is a fresh take on logic puzzles where one tries to blend colors together on a grid and make flowers bloom. 100+ simple yet challenging puzzles, along with calm music and serene visuals, make for the perfect relaxing experience!

Spikair Volleyball Playtest.description: Control the 4 players of your volleyball team. Recruit players, train them and win tournaments to become the best volleyball club.

Road Defense: Outsiders Demo.description: Protect the cars on the road! Equip your towers and improve your skills to defend the lawless roads. The hordes of criminals trying to kill you and destroy the cars get bigger and bigger as the level progresses.

Gunsmith Simulator Demo.description: Become a gunsmith and work in your own workshop! Craft parts and make popular weapons with them. Repair and upgrade weapons in a state of damage.

Filthy Animals | Heist Simulator Demo.description: Filthy Animals is a chaotic multiplayer heist game for 1-4 players. Take the role of mutant animals following orders from Tony, the criminal mastermind of the operation. Bumble through heists, use mutant powers and what’s around you as you try to avoid guards and security… It's never easy!

Cat Lovescapes.description: Sneak Black cat through the house and help him reach his forbidden love!

STALCRAFT Demo.description: STALCRAFT is a dynamic survival horror MMOFPS set in the open world of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone.

GoVenture Entrepreneur Demo.description: The most realistic small business startup and operations simulation ever!

Flooded Demo.description: Flooded is a reversed city-builder, in which you need to optimize your production on an island that shrinks over time. Gather enough resources to flee to safety, while the surrounding world is getting flooded.

Board.description: Board is a minimalist puzzle game that offers a relaxing short experience.

Cryptonaut Demo.description: Cryptonaut: A retro-inspired crypto-themed first-person shoot 'em up! Blast and evade. Collect and score. The easiest way to make millions in crypto!

The Grim Nightmare of Nibras.description: The Grim Nightmare of Nibras is a story with the search for objects in gloomy locations.

Pimania.description: In what is possibly the most baffling text adventure ever devised, navigate a surreal landscape with the aid of the Pi-Man in an attempt to discover the (real world) location of a golden sundial. Originally published in 1982.

Twisted Draw Demo.description: Twisted Draw is a card based strategy game set in a medieval realm where the Necromancer threatens to wipe out life as we know it. Collect and command powerful units and spells to keep the hordes of undead at bay.

FOUNTAINS Demo.description: Master high-skilled combat to uncover the secrets of an ancient, interconnected world.

Astrocat: Skylar´s Memories.description: Discover all the moments Skylar lived until she became an astrocat and broke through space in this beautiful relaxing puzzle.

Daisy Flies to the Moon Demo.description: A sci-fi RPG that takes you to the Moon and beyond!

Rage Rabbit.description: Rage Rabbit is a fast paced platform game set on an island haunted by mysterious shadows. Shoot down your enemies, explore an interconnected world, defeat powerful bosses and obtain new power ups.

Rally Demo.description: Gather together troops and weapons to fight through increasingly difficult armies in this rogue-like deck-building game. Establish synergies between your cards and treasures to create the strongest army!

Astro Ike.description: Astro Ike is a 3rd Person Zombie Wave shooter. You spawn in as Astro Ike and will have to defeat waves of zombies. There are 3 levels to select from to add a variety of game play.

Our Dying World Demo.description: A fully voice-acted RPG where your choices will determine the ending. Discover why magic is slowly fading from Elorant and see how many of your friends you can save by the end.

Bring It On!.description: Bring It On! is a single-player auto-attacking 'monster'-hell shoot-em-up survival game. Take on MASSIVE hordes of monsters across several locations, earning experience points to level up and acquire new weapons and items.

Charlie and Friends.description: Welcome to the world of Charlie and Friends! Currently looking for a new caretaker for our beloved characters: Charlie the Cat, Hilda the Hyena, Sammy the Snake, and Rosy the Rabbit.

Renown Demo.description: Renown is a fast paced multiplayer survival experience set in a vast and ever changing medieval world. Players begin with nothing, gather resources, build a kingdom and fight to survive in the hopes of becoming renowned across the land.

Dragon Fury.description: 1v1 Fighting. Ninjas, Pirates, Robots, Aliens and more. Cross-platform play: PC, Phone, Console.

黑潮 Demo.description: You will lead a three person team to take risks in dense forests, snow, caves, deserts and other places to protect outposts in those places. Eliminate the enemies you meet, understand the local strange animals and plants, and acquire powerful weapons and equipment.

地城争霸 Demo.description: Dungeon Liberator is a game mode where eight or two players face off in 1v1 rounds, with the goal to be the last player standing. Players need to compete with opponents for Minions and attack orders. Reaction speed will become as important as tactical ability.

Astronite Demo.description: Astronite is a 1bit metroidvania that combines action, exploration, puzzles and platforms. Recover the planet where you and yours lived before it was invaded by strange creatures.

KreatureKind Demo.description: A wholesome and approachable Card Battler/Deck Builder, where you are being kind to the monsters instead of killing them! Help a range of different cryptids and mythical creatures, and figure out how you can improve the situation for all monsters in the world.

Where are my potatoes?.description: Hero nut character need potatoes. Solve puzzles in different level to reach level end and collect missing potatoes

End of Lines Demo.description: Travel across landscapes devastated by a catastrophic climate meltdown, following a small family in search of somewhere habitable. With limited supplies and facing potential death at every turn, your choices will decide their fate. Will they manage to settle down?

Tin Hearts Demo.description: Behind every brilliant invention, hides a magical story. Guide a troop of tin soldiers through a magical toy-filled world, in this immersive puzzle adventure game from members of the team that brought you Fable.

Cooking Championships Demo.description: Take part in the Cooking Championship! Create a unique character. Admire beautiful scenery. Prepare original dishes. Compete with other participants. Please the jury. And win the tournament!

Whispers in the West Demo.description: Whispers in the West is an online co-op murder mystery game set in the far reaches of the Wild West. Choose a story, team up with your friends and solve the mystery…

Frogun Demo.description: Join Renata as she adventures across a world of mystical ruins with the titular FROGUN! Frogun is an old-school platformer with the soul of the PS1/N64 era, in which your frog-shaped grappling hook is a your best friend!

Puppet Master Playtest.description: A chaotic ragdoll physics fighting game where you take on the puppet masters of this world. Yes, it's Controversial! Choose your country to fight in and climb the pyramid to the top, if you can make it there! Don't lose your limbs! Make all the money you can and become the master of this world.

Mist Guard.description: Mist Guard is an Action RPG where you have to escape a dark, mysterious prison. Explore, fight enemies and upgrade your character to escape.

One Last Breath Demo.description: The Earth is sick and we are the disease. All hope rests on Gaia, a powerful being born from mother nature’s last breath. Use her abilities to alter the environment, escape from dangerous creatures, solve thoughtful puzzles and survive in this dying world.

The Space Eater (Working Title).description: The Space Eater is a mystery adventure game inspired by classic horror RPG Maker games. Investigate your surroundings for clues, solve puzzles and move forward.

The Space Eater (Working Title) Demo.description: The Space Eater is a mystery adventure game inspired by classic horror RPG Maker games. Investigate your surroundings for clues, solve puzzles and move forward.

Anyaroth: The Queen's Tyranny Demo.description: A pixel-art, platformer adventure game with lots of action and a memorable story.Dive into the depths of planet Anyaroth and free its people from the tyranny of the Queen. Join the Rebellion and fight against the Regime’s mind-control system. The anya civilization needs you!

Ye Olde Cribbage Club.description: Play cribbage against all your fave Later Daters NPCs. Learn more about their backstories along the way.

BioCrisis : Return 2 the Lab Demo.description: The alert has been given, the virus is on the loose, you've escaped the lab, the city will be nuked!

We who are about to Die Demo.description: Fight & strategize your way through spectacles and arenas from lowly slave to Grand Champion. Or... die trying. In this RPG Roguelite you will manage your career and face your enemies in gladiatorial combat, using a unique physics based combat system. Those who are about to die, I salute you!

Rogue Warlords Demo.description: Combine RTS combat with roguelike elements to create highly replayable and strategic action. Summon troops and purchase stacking upgrades to create a massive army of incredibly powerful troops. How massive of an army can you create?

SNIPERPUNK Demo.description: SNIPERPUNK is an epic arena shooter where every bullet ricochets. Duel players online or locally in high-octane casual or ranked 1v1 matches. Outplay opponents with 4 punk-themed characters, each with unique weapons and abilities. And it's free! Bring your friends and ricochet your way to victory!

Gunner, HEAT, PC! Demo.description: Gunner, HEAT, PC! (GHPC) is a simulation game about modern mounted combat, with special attention to authenticity and fun.

Saint Maker Demo.description: While attending a religious recollection, Holly Beltran experiences strange hauntings throughout the convent. At night, broken faced statues and whispered prayers haunt Holly’s dreams — before the recollection is over, Holly may have to face more than her own demons to come out alive.

Greek Tragedy Demo.description: Greek Tragedy is a retro-styled indie survival horror game with puzzle elements. Help Amy keep her life on the college campus overrun by cultists and maybe save her relationship in the process. Uncover conspiracies, sabotage occult rituals and run for your life! Nostalgic PS1 aesthetics included.

Burrowburrow Demo.description: Build a town in a magical but dangerous wilderness as you recruit different animal dudes and grow your community from a few weirdos around a campfire to a whole village!

of pawns & kings Demo.description: "of pawns & kings" is a slightly modernized, visually stunning, point&click adventure in the spirit of Monkey Island, Riven and Labyrinth. (the Jim Henson movie) Solve puzzles, combine items, talk to fascinating characters and advance in the rich story. Can you reveal all the secrets to make a stand

Pretty Girls Escape Demo.description: Erase blocks of the same color connected to each other, slide the entire block left and right, remove obstacles, and lead the character blocks to the exit! Conquer stages, collect Pretty Girls' costumes, and enjoy dressing them up!

Cyber City Clash.description: Cyber City Clash is a 2.5D fighting in a near future dystopian setting. Battle your way through the various environments of the Cyberpunk city in either single player vs AI, or against a friend in 2 player modes.

Restaurant Renovator Demo.description: Become a Restaurant Renovator who knows the recipe for the success and helps failing restaurant to rise from their knees!

Solo War Medieval.description: Solo War Medieval is a first-person shooter game like no other. You need to survive against infinite amount of knights alone, but modern weapons would help you a bit. Modern weapons vs. medieval knights - what would be outcome?

Gift from the Gods.description: In this challenging maze-like platformer from 1985, become the mythical Orestes, brother to Electra, as he searches labyrinthine catacombs for the fabled Euclidean Shapes and avenge the murder of his father, Agamemnon, by his mother, Clytaemnestra.

Halftime Heroes Demo.description: SURVIVE COUNTLESS HORDES, BE A ONE MAN ARMY, DIE AND RETURN STRONGER. Halftime Heroes is a Survival Rogue Action RPG game with short and intense matches where you learn spells, level up, acquire loot and fight bosses. Each time you die you may upgrade or unlock several features.

The Last Worker Demo.description: The Last Worker is a first person narrative adventure centered around our struggle in an increasingly automated world.

The Questing Demo.description: The Questing is an action-RPG game set in the fantasy world. You can grow by hunting enemies using various weapons and skills that you like. Also, feel free to explore the wide world, discover new towns and cities, and take quests from NPCs around the world to solve them.

The Backroom - Lost and Found.description: The Backroom - Lost and Found tells the story of a room in the backrooms. Can you keep your sanity, bring the lost together, and find your way out?

Atama.description: USE PSYCHIC POWERS in ATAMA to see through the eyes of your pursuers to avoid detection as you investigate a cursed rural Japanese village. You can't fight back; you must rely only on your powers and your wits to avoid your enemies. Inspired by Forbidden Siren and Junji Ito.

MegaBattle Demo.description: Build Robots and Enter the Arena to Battle. Fight for our freedom, for our planet, and most important: for fun! MegaBattle is a futuristic strategic roguelike that offers new and innovative mechanics.

Big Flying Asteroid.description: A fun little space shooter inspired by the 1979 classic Asteroids.

The Call of Krul'ar Demo.description: Survive the horrors of the unknown as you expand your lands to keep from being dragged into the darkness; and devoured by that which lurks inside. Every time you make an action, the world around moves forward too. So be strategic in your choices, and be sure they are worth it.

Astro Colony Demo.description: Explore endless Universe and create the most efficient constellation of colonies. Build conveyor systems to automate production. Take care of Astronauts and their needs! Establish new colonies as part of intergalactic simulation.

The Ghost - Task of the Ghost Hunters De.description: Always wanted to be a ghost hunter? Then you have come to the right place with The Ghost - Task of the Ghost Hunters. You will experience the job as a ghost hunter up close and have to solve exciting puzzles.

Wings Playtest.description: Spread your wings and fly in this open world, casual multiplayer VR experience. Powered by WRLD3D maps, the world is yours to explore!

Impaler Demo.description: Impaler is a minimalist arena shooter with spikes. Summon spikes to slay monsters, build barriers, and reach higher ground. Impaler's rogue-like elements ensure each run is a unique challenge.

Privateer Escape.description: Play as a Privateer, sailing the seas and hunting for treasure while being hunted by Pirates! Prove your worth as you avoid dangerous obstacles, face fearsome foes, take on the terrors of the seas, and show how long you can last!

The Horror of Oz.description: The Horror of Oz is a maze runner that has Dorothy returning to a frightening rendition of Oz, where she must peruse through dark and treacherous mazes in search of escape, while being chased by corrupted versions of her dearest friends.

LECTRO Demo.description: Can you help Lectro escape the scientists who have held him captive in ZYER Labs in this exciting FPS parkour-puzzle game? Assist Lectro traverse through exhilarating challenges by using a grappling gun, wall running, portals and much more to gain his freedom.

Repella Fella Demo.description: Set in a future, post-apocalyptic Australia, Repella Fella is an interactive, branching, cinematic adventure. Shoot, stab, lie or maim your way through each problem as it presents itself. Lend a hand or chop one off, the choice is yours.

Odd Realm Demo.description: Odd Realm is a colony sim set in a procedurally generated, fantasy world where you control a group of settlers to build a settlement that survives the passing seasons, roaming bandits, underground horrors, and gods from legend.

Shining Jump Jump.description: Yggdra Resonanc (old Shining Maiden)'s cute girl jumping game~!

The Cecil: The Journey Begins.description: “Cecil” is a survival horror-based game about the mysteries of the famous Cecil hotel, but with a twist. Explore the hotel and find out about the mysteries and untold stories that lie within the halls of horror.

Element Runner Demo.description: Across land, water and clouds! Element Runner is a fun, casual platformer where you can explore worlds filled with grass, water, fire, candy and electricity! Featuring over 8 worlds and 60 levels, this game is a relaxing, completionists dream. Your journey in Element Runner awaits!

Twin Edge Demo.description: Twin Edge is a refreshing circular take on the Rhythm Game genre. Divide your attention evenly between two rotating circles and try not to lose your rhythm!

金斧偶像金小萱 (全年齡向).description: One day an Ice Pillar appeared in the world, freezing everything up to the borders of small southern town, Forge Town. A blacksmith girl living there wants to create the strongest Golden Axe, so she can use it to cut down the Ice Pillar and save the world.

MiniRace.description: Choose your little car and race!

Weeping Falls Massacre.description: 80's horror inspired FPS, a nightmarish scene taking place at an abandoned orphanage.

The Ball Flow - Nature and Lights Demo.description: !Explore beautiful world! The ball use to carefully calculated physics. Change the ball's material for explore beautiful world smoothly. Enjoy and I deeply wish that you feel better after playing my game.

Garenburg Penitence: The Riflebird Demo.description: Garenburg Penitence is an action-puzzle arcade game about matching sphere colors and exploring the collapsing psyche that destroyed the world. With over 70 unique level maps, additional game modes, and a level editor, learn the story of a fragile girl and her regretful actions.

Sweet Dreams Alex Demo.description: Alex is still small, but her dreams are big. You are her Dream Architect, tasked with building labyrinths full of distractions, to keep Nightmares away until the morning comes. Sweet Dreams Alex is a wholesome puzzle and construction game, filled to the brim with atmosphere and charm.

Nanomon: Virtual Pet Demo.description: Nanomon is a tiny virtual pet that sits on your desktop. Only with your love and training can they evolve into the perfect companion! However, neglect your virtual monster, and your Nanomon may grow up to be weak or ugly. Will your Nanomon achieve it's life goal? What kind of tamer will you be?

Far Star Demo.description: Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

Desktop Hacker Demo.description: A narrative driven hacking game that takes you on a journey around murky hacking circles. You will be using the console and graphical tools to hack systems in order to profit and advance the storyline.

Neuropathic.description: Neuropathic is a dark comedy about emotions and other scary things like that.

Kamifuda Demo.description: Master the eldritch art of Kamifuda—channeling long dead powers within arcane cards—in this visual novel and deck builder game.

Mello Haunted House.description: Mello Haunted House is a 2D Survival horror game based on the story of an old haunted house located in Indiana which is said to be haunted by an angry old man's spirit.

Fire Truck Simulator.description: Welcome in the simultion game Fire Truck Simulator where you should keep the city quiet. As a firefighter, you need to get on time to put out all the fires in the city

SANYA Demo.description: 2D narrative adventure game about the warmth of fleeting childhood memories: about a little boy named Sanya, his dog, his friends and many exciting adventures that await them in a small post-soviet Russian town set in the achingly strange and nostalgic period of the 90s.

IKO 39 Demo.description: IKO 39 is an adventure sci-fi detective. Find out what happened at the station, which had lost contact with the Earth. Emie – the artificial intelligence of the station – will help you to solve the mystery.

Haunted Mansion.description: You are in search of a thrill. You are going to do some urbex, camera in hand, in a mansion with the reputation of being haunted. But the horror will fall on you. The terror of the place will have reason of your mental health

Space Rescue.description: Space Rescue is a special space adventure game.You will navigate a tiny spaceship to slip into the puzzle where the Energy Spinels hidden. They have to glide up and down, avoiding a series of obstrucles, and eventually carry the Spinels back to their mother planet.

PHOBOS Project Demo.description: Phobos Project is a first-person psychological horror adventure exploring the depths of psychological horror. In this experiment you have to find a way out and keep your sanity level up through different hostile environments. Face your dread and try to find the source of the nightmare !

Raubritter Demo.description: Ready for a medieval survival experience? You want to build but also fight? That is a game for you. You have been robbed from your title and lands. Survive in the dark forest, rob merchants, burn villages, build a camp, gather a fearsome band and reclaim what is rightfully yours!

LEEN.description: LEEN is a Turn-based Multiplayer game where you have to calculate your move to fight with your friend until only one player stands victorious.

Untamed Tactics Demo.description: Untamed Tactics is a Tactical RPG with strategic combat set in a procedural world filled with colorful animals. Relive the legend of Greycoat’s escape into the untamed Wilds in a tale of lost honor, as you fight, talk and think your way through this beautifully illustrated adventure!

River Raid 3D.description: You fly an airplane over a river and shoot down enemy ships, helicopters, balloons. Don't forget to refuel. If you shoot down all the gas stations, you may not reach the finish line. If you score enough points, you get an additional plane. Minimal interface and understandable for any language.

Nova: Cloudwalker's Tale Demo.description: A charming puzzle game about moving clouds, combining and walking on them to gather the lost star shards across the skies.

TOTO Quest.description: Toto quest is a 2D platform game where the brave Toto, prince of the desert, embarks on a dangerous adventure to discover all the secrets of an ancient pyramid.

Escape Room Academy Demo.description: It takes the joy of Escape Rooms in a casual and joyful experience. Resolving riddles, getting clues and cracked puzzles have never been so fun and cheerful. Each room has its own quest, and to solve it you are provided with two decks of cards(Clues and Locks) and a room view to inspect.

War Tanks.description: Control the tank and destroy all the enemies. Monitor the condition of the tank's armor and fuel. You can switch between three views: First-person camera, third-person and top view. Minimal interface and understandable for any language.

Neon Invaders.description: Neon Invaders will take you back to your gaming roots with its constant action and relentlessly brutal enemies. Absorb enemy shots of the same colour to trigger a flurry of fire to decimate the alien invaders. Dodge and Match your way to victory through 40 levels and 5 difficulty settings.

Blocky Dungeon Demo.description: A weird mix of block-placing puzzle and roguelike, where you build a dungeon and explore it at the same time! Defeat enemies, clear lines and collect loot. Explore the different dungeons, complete quests and try to survive as long as you can!

ShadowSENSE..description: Heighten your talent to save the world.

Burrow of the Fallen Bear: A Gay Furry V.description: A gay furry visual novel, full of fantasy and RPG elements. Experience Krile’s journey before he saves the Furry Heroes, Meet 3 unique hot adventurers, Fight with them, Buy items that impact your story, Unlock branches, Explore the Fallen Bear’s burrow. Everything through a classic choice system.

Tales of Elendar.description: Tales of Elendar is a 3rd person and top-down RPG focusing on gameplay, especially on combat mechanics, allowing wide control of special abilities usage, while offering a well prepared lore and story with few dialog reading and noticeable philosophical content.

Essentures.description: Essentures is inspired by the great games of the 90s and late 80s. You will experience a grand story driven adventure through 4 lore rich kingdoms wherein you can catch and collect mysterious creatures, using them as allies or weapons!

Energy Collector.description: An idler about collecting energy. Automate the the collection process, manage your resources by transferring them between fields and buy awesome upgrades. For what? To get more energy!

三毫子大冒險.description: "The Adventure of 30 Cents Novel" recreated dozens of 30 cents novels into a playable visual novel. The official released version contains many plot lines and over 10 endings. Only those completed all storylines can understand the entire story and characters’ relationship behind.

I See Red Demo.description: A frantic twin-stick shooter roguelite where you must rage through different spaceships filled with enemies. Steal their weapons, destroy every room, and use all you can find to attack. Are you strong enough to fulfill your revenge?

Roundguard Demo.description: Roundguard is a bouncy dungeon crawler with pinball physics, lots of loot, and a randomized castle full of oddballs. Press your luck against hordes of dangerously cute monsters and challenging roguelike elements in this all-round bouncy adventure!

Youmandriver Playtest.description: Do you know how to drive a fast car on open roads and a lot of traffic ? With realistic vehicle physics, traffic density and roads ? Realistic roads are designed for legal speed, not to let a gamer be 80% of the time full throttle driving a 500 HP car...

The Appraiser Demo.description: The Appraiser is a short, first person narrative game. As an art appraiser you will sell the art collection of a dying man. Each painting is by 4 famed artist. They have a story to tell you, but only if you choose to listen.

Alice is Dead: Hearts and Diamonds Demo.description: A complete remake of the classic Flash game trilogy, Alice is Dead. Hearts and Diamonds includes all new art, added puzzles, expanded lore, and plenty of secrets for old and new fans alike.

GIGABUSTER Demo.description: Fiery action platformer focused on fluid movement and combat. Jump, dash, shoot and swing to stop mergers with the GEC, a monopoly funding "Happiness."

Regular Strategy Game.description: Regular Strategy Game is strategy puzzle game built around the idea of combining aspects from a board game and a turn based combat videogame. Will you be able to figure out the right moves to beat each challenge?

Cowboy Girl.description: In the Wild West, very terrible and foreign monsters have been found up with which you, as the young Cowboy Girl, who recently bought her first revolver, has to fight with them!

Rough Justice: '84 Alpha Demo.description: Do what it takes to make your fledgling security agency thrive in this 80s noir crime bustin', dirty crossing, vengeance-seeking board game inspired strategy game with dice and cards.

3D Combat Zone.description: In this wireframe graphics FPS game, originally released for the ZX Spectrum in 1983, take on the role of a tank commander in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, struggling to survive against other tanks, deadly flying saucers, and the fearsome super tanks.

Prayer of the Faithless Demo.description: On the brink of the apocalypse, two friends struggle to find what is worth saving

Chessarama Demo.description: Chessarama is a collection of originally designed chess-like games. Choose a game, quickly learn its rules and play through the campaigns, community levels or build your own puzzles to challenge other players. Endless replayability and fun await you. Welcome to Chessarama!

Чернь.description: Embark on an exciting journey through the vast locations of a fantasy universe inspired by Slavic mythology. We got inspiration from genres such as metroidvania, soul-like and classic RPGs, while working on the design of the game.

人生畫廊 Demo.description: Life Gallery is a puzzle game with a unique, illustration-style art design that leads the players into a world of profound horror.

Forever Alone Demo.description: Travel through a handcrafted world as a young kitten looking for comfort after a tragedy occurs by looking into another reality, revealing various paths to get past obstacles!

Chess Pills.description: You have to guess the right move, but you're running out of time. Use the orange pill to get sharp and focus on the right piece. Or use the turquoise pill to chill and slow the time. But beware, the abuse of substances can cause side effects.

模拟驾考二.description: Simulated driving test 2 is an alternative simulated driving game. The picture is very unique and the game is also very unique. Players who like to hunt for novelty must not miss it. Come and experience it!

Vikindor.description: Vikindor - Side-Scroller Platformer, a game with random generation, where the player in each level gets into a randomly generated world of the underworld, with its enemies, unique locations, chests and other traps. Each race will be different from the next!

Heavenly Puzzle.description: Heavenly Puzzle - a puzzle game for manual dexterity and ingenuity. Assemble the whole picture from puzzle pieces. You can choose the difficulty, where time and number of lives are limited. You simply have to collect them all!

Two Identical.description: Two Identical - Find a pair game, each picture has its own copy, and you need to find it quickly. Difficulty levels will not let you get bored. Develop yourself and train your memory.

火辣极速.description: In a mysterious underground bar, gathered a group of beautiful face, hot figure of the female drivers. The player takes on the role of one of the drivers and conquers the other drivers with his powerful driving skills.

Al Andalus 711: Epic history battle game.description: In Al Andalus 711 you don't play as a warrior, but as a villager who tries to survive in a country that is being invaded and must face the risky roads, the lack of experience and the constant danger of enemy soldiers and hostile bandits.

The Backrooms World Demo.description: The Backrooms World is a plane of existence where unlucky souls find themselves to be stuck in by noclipping from reality. This unique game is FREE TO PLAY for Singleplayer or Multiplayer mode. Players can do exploration, survival, and unlock the mysterious levels in the backrooms. Goodluck!

堪舆剑冢 Demo.description: Sword Tomb-Kan Yu is a fast-paced 2D action-platformer packed with roguelike elements, Metroidvania elements and subspace exploration.

Aztlan Uncovered Demo.description: Explore an archeological site long lost to the ages. Use your time-reversing equipment to reveal the past and discover the secrets amidst the frozen wasteland.

Mindfulness Simulator - ASMR Meditation.description: Wander freely through the forest as your own Ego or as a Stone. Explore the procedurally-generated environment listening to Alan Watts' teachings about Mindfulness, Meditation, Peace and Happiness. Play with ASMR Grass when you roll over it with varying weather and time of day. Just be mindful.

Highway Driving.description: Highway Driving is 3D racing game for everyone. Players will be amazed with the overall gaming experience in this game. There are various different tracks and game modes in the game. Players can select many different types of vehicles.

Highway Driving Demo.description: Highway Driving is 3D racing game for everyone. Players will be amazed with the overall gaming experience in this game. There are various different tracks and game modes in the game. Players can select many different types of vehicles.

Medic Prologue.description: Become a Medic - a true war hero. Survive the horror of the Pacific Front where bombs fall from the sky and rifle bullets cut the air. You are the last hope of your wounded companions. Your decisions will change the course of the battle, but not all of them will be easy to make!

Obelixes Tower Defense.description: Welcome in this tower defense game, welcome in Obelixes Tower Defense. In this game, you have to stop waves of enemies with the help of ancient obelixes which attack hostile creatures.

Alkali Demo.description: Explore the world as an Alkali metal in this innovative precision platformer! Explosively react with water and other elements to traverse obstacles, while picking up chunks of metal before you deplete your alkali metal body.

Be A Rock.description: An experimental experience meant to give you a way to relax and escape the stress of everyday life. You are a sentient rock in a world where life never evolved. Enjoy the relaxing atmosphere for as long as you like or explore and find the hidden wisdom quotes meant to bring peace to your soul.

Another Crusade.description: Discover a 3d wooden puppet style world while exploring as a platformer, and taking battles in a turn-based combat as an old school RPG where timing and strategy is all!

Knights of the Kitchen Table.description: Giant food monsters are attacking! As a Knight of the Kitchen Table, it is your sworn duty to defeat them in this action-adventure, hack-and-slash, souls-like game!

Memory Hunters Demo.description: A classic RPG where you will experience unique places, solve puzzles, fight turn-based battles and live an exciting adventure.

2pupp Demo.description: This game features more than 30 levels that feature platforming challenges.

TowerOfCards Demo.description: Tower of Cards is a deck building tower defense game.

Arali.description: Fight your way through hordes of enemies, rescue the five forest spirits and bring them back to their tree, and lift the curse plaguing the Enchanted Forest!

一星的我与最强地下城 Demo.description: Level 1 Me & The Final Dungeon is a light-hearted, comedy rogue-like game that is easy to play but rich in depth. Take control of the protagonists and use your wits to explore and fight in the dungeon, go on a relaxing and thought-provoking journey, and gradually uncover the secrets of the world.

东方华心传 Demo.description: A classic pixel side-scrolling action game with Rogue-lite. Play as Hata no Kokoro on a journey of self-discovery and use combinations of different emotions to fight battles as beautiful as a dance!

SnailQuest.description: A Puzzle Game Based On 2048 Move Style

命运战歌.description: 《命运战歌》是一款魔幻Q萌风格的地牢式放置RPG游戏，融合了轻度策略战斗和趣味探索冒险。

东方妖精武踏会 Demo.description: You will role-play as playful fairies with unique personalities, and accomplish your own Gekokujō in Gensokyo where the strong gather! Make your own favorite fairy character the strongest with your own hands!

Pingo Adventure.description: Pingo Adventure is a cute 3D platformer with interesting physics simulation. Follow Pingo to explore the world, solve puzzles, play mini games and even customize your Pingo with the costumes unlocked from the adventures!

江湖百异图.description: 《江湖百异图》是一款高自由度的开放世界类武侠单机游戏。游戏初始，你需以记名弟子的身份拜入十六大门派之一修习武学。两年后，通过掌门出师考验，然后自建门派，经营门派。在这个世界里，你或许需要数个轮回才能称霸江湖。

Spy Robot: Gateways To Humanity Demo.description: Single player action FPS game with hacking, stealth and flight elements in a procedurally generated cyberpunk world with VR support. You are the Spy Robot flying on your trusty hover bike to rescue the remains of the human race scattered throughout the galaxy and solve an ancient mystery.

ANIMARAMA.description: ANIMARAMA - is a humorous interactive puzzle game in which you have to help the characters in the game solve their problems. To complete all the levels you will need the following skills: logic, physics, mathematics, humor and a little imagination. Will you be able to?

VergeWorld Demo.description: Fly, crash, and adapt in this post-apocalyptic high-speed combat racing roguelite. VergeWorld mixes procedurally generated intense action and airship customization with the retro PSX-era 3D visuals and synthwave music.

Summit Demo.description: Explore a giant mountain massif in this classical 2D Metroidvania. Climb daring mountain passes, explore forgotten ruins and gather equipment as you ascend your way to the ultimate destination - the Summit.

Ignited Steel: Prologue.description: Ignited Steel is a mech roguelike turn-based-tactics game. This Prologue features a free standalone campaign where you will discover the origins of the robotic insurrection, as well as the new features added to the main game on Patch v1.1: Uprising.

Heart Lake心湖 Demo.description: Heart Lake is a first-person pixel-style game. Different personalities have different and distinct personalities. Players experience different journeys in the process of getting along with different personalities, and finally help the protagonist grow up.

Nightmare Slash.description: "Nightmare Slash" is a 2D slasher with a side view. The player uses mouse to cut his enemies, to dodge and run from flying creatures, wait for the moment to kill dark enemies who gets in his way.

Madman Catcher.description: "Madman Catcher" is a classic 2D platform game. The main goal is to get pills of the right color from scattered first-aid kits. Just beware of the mentally ill patients, they are not very happy with your work (that`s why they ran away and do not want to return).

Overdrive.description: Drop into a large multiplayer experience with modes such as Battle Royale & Assault. Rise to the top using custom attachments from the weapon gunsmith and explore a war-torn island with many hidden secrets.

Dash Cup Kickers Demo.description: Super fast paced arcade action soccer with incredible power dashes, sweet mega tricks and unbelieveable powerful super shots! Master all tricks, skill up your team, develop the best technique and earn gold in all cups! Play online or locally with up to 4 players in varying stadiums

Parabellum Galaxia Playtest.description: Prepare for war in this VR Space Strategy Simulator. Design your ships, complete your missions, defeat your enemy.

Memory Hunters.description: A classic RPG where you will experience unique places, solve puzzles, fight turn-based battles and live an exciting adventure.

Restaurant Simulator Demo.description: This is a realistic virtual Restaurant where you can order food and chat. Interested in having the restaurant experience from your home? Eat, order, chat and have server wait on you and bring your food.

False Calamity.description: False Calamity is a dark, 2d, narrative-driven platformer combining challenging puzzles and intense action. Experience the ominous story and immerse yourself in the unsettling atmosphere set after the supposed calamity of the world.

Survivor Cells Demo.description: Take command of a cell fighting thousands of invading viruses. In this casual game with roguelite elements, surviving is the key!

Jigoku Unko: Toripuru.description: Our character has a tantrum after eating spicy Adana Kebab. Then he finds himself in hell for some unknown reason.

The Explorator.description: Explore mysterious counter-zones and brave dangers to discover priceless treasures buried beneath the ruins of Atlantis.

Flip of Light.description: A precision platformer where you can instantaneously flip from ceiling to floor. Run, jump, and flip your way through difficult and vibrant stages, each themed around a pair of complementary colors. Master a constant barrage of new level mechanics, each designed around your flip ability.

The Many Pieces of Mr. Coo Demo.description: The Many Pieces of Mr. Coo is a whimsical point’n’click adventure with a surrealist story, astounding hand-drawn animations and hilarious puzzles. Mr. Coo is trapped and broken into pieces. But most of all, he has no idea of what’s going on. Is that a giant chicken over there?

PHOBOS Project.description: Phobos Project is a first-person psychological horror adventure exploring the depths of psychological horror. In this experiment you have to find a way out and keep your sanity level up through different hostile environments. Face your dread and try to find the source of the nightmare !

The Crown of Wu Demo.description: Get ready to explore a new world inspired by Journey to the West, a traditional Chinese tale about the Monkey King, Sun Wukong.

Gilligan's Gold.description: Gold! In this classic arcade-style action game from 1984, grab bags of gold from under the nose of deadly bandits and transport them safely to your wheelbarrow on the surface. Useful items and fast minecarts can help you, but beware - many a player has fallen to greed in these treacherous mines.

Clash II Demo.description: Clash II is a turn-based strategy game, where player will get the chance to immerse himself as a commander of one of quareled fractions.

Little Rhapsody of Game Playtest.description: In a mysterious modern park, together with up to 8 friends and players, incarnate into characters with overhead history, carry out a hard core and hot-blooded battle carnival, defeat opponents through sufficient reaction and technology, and become the king of the park.

Dock King.description: You're an orphan, raised on the mean docks of a pirate shanty town. Become the greatest merchant known to pirate-kind, to get a chance at meeting the merchant king, rumored to be your father. Fish, haggle, or even steal to achieve your goals.

Game Cycle.description: Relive the bygone era of CD-ROM shareware! As a recently-contracted games analyst, you are tasked by the CEO of Best Value Games to make sure the games set to be included in their upcoming release are up to code. How much you get paid depends on how much ground you cover!

怪盗ミューのシークレットプリマ Demo.description: In an unexpected turn of events, Miu becomes a phantom thief. As a phantom thief, you have to carry out various mission along with her childhood friend, Chinatsu. To complete your mission,you have to sneak into the targetted location and dodge the obstacles in the way to proceed.

Sugarcreek.description: Sugarcreek is a 2D story-based adventure game following Eddie the high-school goat and his closest friends as they try to find his missing stepsister before the week is over!

오구와 비밀의 숲 Demo.description: Explore the wonderful world with baby Ogu! 'Ogu and the Secret Forest' is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and various types of puzzles. Befriend bouncy characters and defeat strange creatures to unravel the mystery of the charming world.

Sugarcreek Demo.description: Sugarcreek is a 2D story-based adventure game following Eddie the high-school goat and his closest friends as they try to find his missing stepsister before the week is over!

The Abandoned Planet.description: A throw-back, retro-inspired, point and click adventure with chunky and beautiful pixel art

Animals.description: "Animals" is a game based on the mechanics of "3 in a row". The goal of Match-3 puzzles is to make groups: lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

LunarLux Playtest.description: Experience a sci-fi action-adventure RPG on the Moon in the year 30XX! Join Bella in a story of science, truth, justice, and trust, as she travels the silver globe to find a way to save humanity from Comet Coda! It's time to unleash your Lux!

Worker Riot.description: A worker who has been left without a salary is a dangerous opponent. Armed with a hammer, he will not leave them alone. Help him defeat them all. Beat out of them everything they owe you for your work

Pedro Land DX.description: An intense, retro run-and-gun platformer western game!

SokoChess Demo.description: SokoChess is a minimalistic puzzle game about pushing chess pieces. Use your pieces to push the black figures to their destination, but be careful! The opposing pieces will capture yours if you give them the chance!

Tophat Quest.description: Tophat Quest! A Pixel Platformer where you play as a purple man with a Tophat going on a quest to save the world! (And meet some new friends along the way)

The D-T.E.A.M. Demo.description: Dwarves. Tanks. Energy. Ammo. MMMGold! In this 3D Tank Blaster Platformer, you will take down an enemy mining facility, all the while finding energy pickups and collecting sweet gold. Double jump, speed boost, and blast your way to earn performance stars and achieve a personal best in time!

GRANDMA Demo.description: Join the battle to save earth from aliens and robots. Choose to play on the side of humans or aliens in battle. 1. Play alongside up to 50 online players 2. Choose various levels 3. Play in various modes such a s capture the king, rush, team deathmatch, conquest.

The Galactic Junkers Demo.description: Become the space captain you always wanted to be. There are just a few problems, your ship needs work, there’s a price on your head, and your crew are idiots. Seek your fortune and the truth in The Galactic Junkers, a comedic space combat adventure game.

Bots Crusher Arena.description: Bot Crusher Arena is an open top-down shooter where the player takes on the role of a cyborg participating in an arena elimination with other cyborgs. The task is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies. Don't let the enemies hit you.

Escape From Mandrillia Demo.description: Local VR vs PC horror game: 1 VR player controls a lone robot trying to escape an underground lab; up to 2 PC players control giant alien monkeys. Customize your experience with gameplay modifiers, ranging from tense survival stealth to brutal nonstop action!

Villwars.description: Villars is a real-time strategy game. Control your troops and reach the very center of the enemy lands! Defend your lands, attack and think over the battle strategy depending on the terrain and position.

Townseek Early Demo.description: Townseek is a relaxing exploration-trading game where you fly around the world! Travel far and wide, discover exotic landmarks, trade with towns, fish, mine and farm, as you complete your journal and discover the lost legacy of Sir Reginald Sharkingston!

BUBBLE NIGHT.description: Let's run through the quiet night sky through the forest of buildings with the little girl.

Lakeburg Legacies Playtest.description: Lakeburg Legacies is a social-based village management sim focused on pairing up your townsfolk to make the best, most effective families in order for your kingdom to grow and thrive.

BTank.description: BTank is a game in which you need to destroy balls with different properties using projectiles. By scoring points for destroying the balls, you can get extra lives.

Via Mortis Demo.description: You are a soldier, drafted into the ADDI. Tasked with capturing and hunting demons from a mysterious new world. This new world is highly dangerous and hostile, the demon like creatures within are planning a massive attack on the Earth and the mission is clear: save humanity at all costs...

Dis Pontibus 2.description: A single-player game set in a archipelago full of puzzles.

Enemy of the State.description: Enemy of the State is a co-op and single-player shooter set in the world of 1920s crime lords. You’re an aspiring mobster trying to reach the top during the Prohibition era. Gather your friends and perform heists all over the world. Will you build the most powerful crime syndicate in the world?

The Galactic Junkers Playtest.description: Become the space captain you always wanted to be. There are just a few problems, your ship needs work, there’s a price on your head, and your crew are idiots. Seek your fortune and the truth in The Galactic Junkers, a comedic space combat adventure game.

Dogfight Demo.description: Arcade shoot-’em-up action is back! Team up with the entire family for explosive action, signature humor and thrilling adventure. Join the Sausage Bomber Corps for daring missions to defend the nations of Relishtonia and more against the world-conquering ambitions from the mysterious Vega Nation.

Watch Your Back.description: You are some small-time journalists, exploited by your boss. When an abandoned Cold War-era shelter is discovered, your boss sends you there to do the story of a lifetime. Only you two will know what awaits you in there...

WHAT THE BAT?.description: You have baseball bats for hands - now GO! In this surprising VR comedy, you play through a series of silly physical mini-games that make you laugh, cry and even pet nice animals.

Antioch : Scarlet Bay Demo.description: Antioch: Scarlet Bay is an online cooperative narrative adventure. Play as two detectives working together to solve a murder in the shadowy city of Antioch. Wander in a city filled with characters with their own agendas and attitudes, all your decisions change the story and lead to multi endings.

A Last Song Demo.description: A musical adventure game where you memorize and repeat the Meloplants songs. Explore the storm to find them and fight (or flee!) the deadly robots. Collect datas, upgrade your robot, and save the planet!

Foretales Demo.description: Decide the fate of the world in this ingenious story-driven card game. Foretales offers a unique take on the adventure genre, with a multitude of playstyles and story paths through which you can save the world… or bring about its end.

Goddess Of War Essa Ⅱ.description: "Goddess Of War Essa II" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The background of the story is World War II. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

MAZE RUNNER.description: You start the game as a cyborg, lost in the world of the Maze. He will need to find and collect all the orbs that will unlock the door to his freedom. He will have fifteen minutes to do so, before he gets lost forever. Completed mazes as third-person shooter. Eliminated over 40 different enemies.

死亡旅店Ⅱ亡者归来-Death Inn Ⅱ The Immortal Is Co.description: Death Inn Ⅱ- The Immortal Is Coming is a horror puzzle. The film crew is in a castle to finish, What is the mystery behind the mysterious death of a leading actress in a castle? Was it a homicide or was there more to it? It's a foggy castle, but none of the truth is buried forever.

Spiritus.description: Albert and Rose investigate a manor with miscreants and broken souls. Stay together and survive the horror.

MAZE RUNNER Demo.description: You start the game as a cyborg, lost in the world of the Maze. He will need to find and collect all the orbs that will unlock the door to his freedom. He will have fifteen minutes to do so, before he gets lost forever. Completed mazes as third-person shooter. Eliminated over 40 different enemies.

Car Quest Demo.description: Hit the road to epic adventure in Car Quest: drive, collect, explore, solve, discover.

King Pig.description: "King Pig" is an old-school top down arcade game. Your main goal is to save pigs from butchers. Be careful, butchers` saws must not hurt the pigs - dodge the saw with your heavy-duty cloak and kill all butchers!

Symbiotic Demo.description: Symbiotic is an RPG Visual Novel hybrid centered around a school of children training to fight a war against another world. These brave students are given man-made symbiotes to fight the evil alien symbiotes that attach themselves to living beings. The question is, will Earth Survive?

Space Major Miner.description: Space is dark and full of terror... and raw resources! Mine asteroids, upgrade your equipment and blast cosmic aliens.

DonutCrabs.description: Donut Crabs is a physics puzzle game. Control the platforms and guide the donut along the trajectory you set. Help the crab collect all the donuts on the island and solve the huge amount of relaxing and, sometimes, hard puzzles!

Puzzles with nature.description: In the exciting Puzzles with nature game, you will find a huge variety of relaxing puzzles designed to train your brain. Start dragging the puzzle pieces to the right place until you form a whole picture.

Spacebase Siege.description: Third person shooter with strategy elements.

Barkhan Demo.description: A harsh sand planet has become the stage for a brutal war between three Great Clans. For the power over rare minerals each wants to prove their superiority. In the heat of dynamic battles with the enemy's troops, be prepared to face and attack giant Sand Snakes.

Entropic Float: This World Will Decay An.description: A free drama-mystery visual novel with a modern fantasy setting. Reach out to the fourteen people trapped inside to find the truth through eighteen endings, influenced by but not exclusively bound to your own system time.

Hide And Seek Scramble!.description: Three players. Two teams. One kidnapped bunny! Play as three different characters in this fast-paced, competitive multiplayer game.

Splat Cat.description: Wielding only your paintbrush, traverse your way through this 2D platforming artistic landscape and fight your creative block!

Panic Porcupine Demo.description: Dr. Proventriculus is snatching up the Chickabirbs! Help Panic blast through over 50 stages of topsy-turvy, spike-laced, slime-drenched, buzzsaw-filled deathtraps to rescue them! And remember, there are no rings...

Retro Ride Demo.description: A musically interwoven driving arcade game. Fast paced Audio visualization YouTube integration Beat songs to compete on leaderboards and earn credit to buy new cars.

Our Dying World.description: A fully voice-acted RPG where your choices will determine the ending. Discover why magic is slowly fading from Elorant and see how many of your friends you can save by the end.

Martial Story.description: "Martial Story" - a 2D platformer runner with classic game mechanics: run on platforms, dodge enemies, throw swords, balance in free fall, test your reaction against hundreds of enemies, train your accuracy in jumping in caves.

SEARCH ALL - BITCOIN.description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bitcoins in a large location. Bitcoins will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

微光之镜 Playtest.description: Glimmer in Mirror is a 2D story-rich action shooting game. Play as Shiro in a collapsed world, to meet various unique NPCs and monsters, and gradually uncover the truth of the world through a gripping story.

Stack by stack.description: Stack by stack is a tower defense game where you have to stop evil cunning robots from stealing the core! Craft towers from enemy robot parts, Printing new metal parts for towers on 3D printers, Mining ore, Shooting. Almost all objects in the game can be carried in a stack on your hands

Impossible Slasher! Hack and Slash Demo.description: Defeat as many enemies as you can and Unlock different characters with different abilities in this arcade Hack and Slash.

Ragdoll Funhouse Demo.description: Play a fully physical, humanoid ragdoll and explore a indoor funhouse. Swing from ropes on the ceiling, make your way up climbing walls, or be bounced about by rollers. Test your mastery of our physical controls in the time trials around the map, or just enjoy your time challenging the obstacles.

Hallowlands Demo.description: Hallowlands is an open world procedurally generated RPG adventure. Explore a world full of monsters, harvest resources, and craft unique items. An adventure awaits!

Binary Run Demo.description: The Reformat is inevitable. The Virus Spreads. Keep Running. Binary Run is a fast paced retro shooter inspired by 80s synthwave and retro shooters. Kill, collect and run your way through a corrupted digitial world, Keep Running.

QUICKERFLAK_RUTHLESSMOD.description: QUICKERFLAK_RUTHLESSMOD is the standalone "pretty hard" expansion of the retro-hardcore minigame QUICKERFLAK.

Blast Off Far Away.description: Shoot to move, move to live, live to shoot! Blast Off Far Away (B.O.F.A.) is a space-themed, top-down arena shooter, with a focus on fast-paced arcade-esque gameplay, with the unique twist where movement is limited through the use of the player's gun.

Kogarashi.description: Kogarashi is a 3D Hack N' Slash game on which you control Abura Akago, a fire demon that fights against the evil spirit Yuki Onna and her army of ice demons.

Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor Demo.description: You are in a barbarian land. They are trying to kill you. The Queen demands you tame them. So what now? Escape into an exciting, open-ended story and cunning tactical combat. Epic, indie fantasy adventure. Freely explore a huge world, fight for fame and power, and shape the world as you choose.

Slime Jumper Adventure.description: Slime Jumper Adventure is a 2d platformer game that is level based. Where you are tasked with guiding the main character through multiple different levels of creative obstacles that increase in difficulty the further you get.

All Songs Are From The King Demo.description: A game where Silent Hills meets Kahlil Gibran’s ‘The Prophet’.

FOG.description: Your new indie rouge-lite addiction. Battle through the nine levels of hell in a psychedelic watercolor painted world. Unleash your creativity to create a character build that will take you all the way to the gates of heaven.

Uncharted Space - project 3062.description: In this game, you are a leader, leading a force of army to fight other forces in the deep spaces. You will plunder their resources, build your homelands, explore and expand, managing your army both strategically and tactically. This will be a saga written with blood and fire.

Starwalker - Into the Cylinder.description: Starwalker is an upcoming Survival-MMORPG taking place far into into the future in a space cylinder.

Endlanders : First Encounter.description: Build your deck, glitch through enemies, translate unknown languages and decipher the mysteries of this universe, in this grid-based real time combat indie game. This version features only one playable character and serves as the prologue for the game.

SHPR playtest.description: SHPR is an arcade shooter, arena survival roguelike in which you have to choose items, create builds and synergies that will help you to defeat enemies and bosses to be able to pass to the next levels.

Run4YourLight.description: Spirits of Run4YourLight need your help to accomplish their destiny. Join the fight and help your favourite spirit !

Music Man.description: Collect all music notes in 2 different big worlds to finish maps. Beware dangerous enemies and use platforms to move forward.

Desta: The Memories Between.description: Relive memories, rediscover friends and repair relationships in this unique turn-based strategy exploration through dreams and regrets from the creators of Monument Valley

The Lotus Holidays Demo.description: A stylish single player story-based game, where you win a free weekend at the "Lotus", a luxurious spa resort. But soon, things take a strange and sinister turn.

Moontrain.description: A Point n Click game set in a strange new world. All Aboard the new, exciting and strange adventure. Keep your hands, quills and tentacles inside for the whole ride.
