Kill King Demo.description: Participate in a one-on-one battle with other players or fight against AI and complete the first chapter of the campaign. Give orders to your army and watch them fight. Kill King is a fresh look at the world's most popular game - chess. Enjoy the turn-based strategy battle with RPG elements.

Repairny (リペアニー) Demo.description: "Repairny" is First-person perspective action game. Repairny and drones are constantly attacking to player with light sword or laser gun. Control player direction to guard with player's light sword. Then attack with your light sword. Destroy all of enemy in field to clear stage.

Meat & Greed.description: In the atmospheric puzzle-platformer Meat & Greed, you will experience the horrors of a slaughterhouse from the perspective of different animals. Solve riddles and collaborate with other animals to try and escape this ill-fated factory.

Eternal Pinball RPG.description: Level up and equip your hero in this unique Pinball-RPG mashup. Beat everybody on the online leaderboards and unlock the dungeon table to find rare artifacts to complete your collection.

Plop Saga.description: Plop Saga is a indie Pixel art game with beautiful music. In this game, you guide Plop to run and jump to finish the journey with courage and strength.

Roller Ball.description: Roller Ball Is A 3D Platforming Game, Inspired By Super Monkey Ball And Ball Race, Dodge Obstacles And Smash Through Walls To Get To The End Of Each Level And Find Multiple Ways To Complete Levels, Has Endless Mode And Infinite Levels

Tower Escape.description: Escape the tower by summoning minions and guiding them to the exit! Tower Escape is a "Reverse Tower Defense" game where you guide a snake through a maze, then your minions follow it as they pick up treasure and keys to the next level.

Bash The Party Demo.description: Bash The Party is a fast paced Wick-esque FPS game that sets in a futuristic Cyberpunk setting. Use different pistols, carbines and rifles to fight with your enemies. You have to be quick and precise to move through this Cinematic game.

Jaki's Wacky Adventure Demo.description: Jaki’s Wacky Adventure is an action-packed, cartoony 2.5d RPG shooter. Wield shuriken with deadly accuracy as you battle bugs, beasts & robots. Explore strange lands. Discover hidden locations & rare items that improve your skills. Craft powerful potions. Can you become the best ninja in the land?

Blade Bros IMPACT!.description: "Welcome to Blade Bros Impact!, a action rpg game with several essences from the classics rpg from 16 and 32 bits era!, enjoy dynamic battle, scary bosses, get more powerful by gain levels, get swords, rods, bows, axes and so forth!".

Deity Demo.description: A journey into the unknown, the meditative, the ethereal, the magical, the surreal... the enchanting, the entrancing, the mesmerizing...The Land of the Gods...

Everyone Moves With You.description: Take down powerful enemies in this hard 2d fantasy pixel game. If you like a challenge then you came to the right place. You'll travel through multiple different worlds, all sorts of different levels, enemies, weapons and so much more. With new levels being made often.

生死狙击2 Playtest.description: 《生死狙击2》传承IP经典特色模式，创新大地图团竞玩法，全面升级次世代美术与音效品质，匠心打造选择自由的射击游乐园，力求带给玩家公平流畅的战斗体验和顶尖的枪战快感！

Atlas Wept Demo.description: A Humanist retro-style RPG game about sincerity and empathy, featuring friendly robot dogs and evil smiley faces.

百将群英传.description: 《百将群英传》是一款以三国乱世为背景的攻城策略卡牌游戏。国漫的画风融合3D建模写实，加强人物特点的展示；同时创新的玩法设计带来新的游戏策略体验。

Zaxterion - Space Frenzy.description: Welcome to a high adrenaline arcade space game that offers very addictive and fast paced action! Zaxterion brings 80's old school goodness to modern times for the young and old alike!

What's Missing?.description: What's Missing? is a first-person, surreal puzzle game where you spot the differences between repeating identical rooms. Explore the limits of changes as it goes beyond just physical objects. Follow Gregory's journey to escape this magical loop and unveil the mystery of his dark past...

Hill Agency: PURITY&decay Demo.description: Murdered sisters, mind altering drugs and flying cities, to a case that goes way further than the banks of this one detective's little neighbourhood in this Indigenous cybernoir detective narrative adventure set in a post-post-apocalyptical future.

RalphGame.description: Will you save your friends or die trying? Travel the globe and uncover a secret that threatens the world as we know it. This casual yet gripping storyline is sure to have you giddy with delight. Teeheehee.

Paradise Marsh Demo.description: Wander through a perfect endless wetland! Catch bugs, enjoy peaceful sceneries and find lost poems while restoring fallen stars in the empty night sky.

Mailman.description: "Mailman" is a 2D old-school top down arcade game ported to PC. It puts you in the role of a postman who has to deliver all the letters to the mailboxes.

Knight And Mourning.description: Knight And Mourning is a fast-paced, rage-inducing 2D platformer where you are on a mission to find your lost sword. Run, jump, dodge spikes, and suffer.

The Dead Sea Scrolls Adventure.description: Play as Dr. Jerusalem Jones, an explorer set on finding out the history behind the 7 major Dead Sea Scrolls. Along the way, the player gets to meet a whole cast of characters and traverse across the deserts and caves near the Dead Sea and Bethlehem to learn about the history behind these relics.

The Last Citadel Playtest.description: The Last Citadel is a Roguelite, Role-Based, Third-Person shooter. Embark in an expedition to uncover artifacts inside a Citadel suspended above a black hole where many challenges and deadly encounters await. Explore the ever-changing citadel alone, or with a group of up to 4 players.

RalphGame Demo.description: Will you save your friends or die trying? Travel the globe and uncover a secret that threatens the world as we know it. This casual yet gripping storyline is sure to have you giddy with delight. Teeheehee.

REAL RAGE.description: Are you too calm? Do you want to be angry? If the answer is YES, you have to play this game! You have to use all of your skills to complete the stages, and defeat the boss. There are many traps, enemies, and other surprises on every level. The DEATHCOUNTER is waiting for you!

Myriad: A Rogue Adventure Demo.description: Myriad is an Action-Adventure game with Roguelite elements. Play as a new character each run, loot tons of weapons, and fight hordes of enemies in a randomly generated world.

Creatura Demo.description: Seed, Breed, Create. From single cell organisms to complex ecosystems. Evolve every part of your own unique aquarium / terrarium by applying scientifically accurate principles of natural and artificial selection, in Creatura - ultimate Virtual Evolution Vivarium Simulator.

THICC: The Himalayan Ice Climbing Challe.description: THICC: The Himalayan Ice Climbing Challenge is a 2-4 player online party game. Climb, Swing, Grab your way to claim victory over your friends in the THICC cup.

Odd One Out.description: Find the symbol that is different from the others, in progressively harder puzzles.

Tempusia.description: Based on rewinding time mechanics, Tempusia is the puzzle platformer requiring a big cold head :3

Ein's Sword.description: Simple field battles and training. Defeat enemies that appear in the field and obtain ability points every time you level up. Raise your preferred status and advance the battle to an advantage. Easy to use and comfortable to play.

Twilight's Final Judgement Demo.description: Twilight's Final Judgement is a noir turn-based RPG. Players will explore a 1940s New York where the secret elites of the world are the Greek Gods. You will level up and build upon 4 playable characters. Players will also talk with NPCs learn secret lore and form bonds.

ULTRA NINJA SHOOTER.description: Ultra Ninja Shooter is a physics-based shooting game where you strike ninja stars to destroy the targets. Throw out your shuriken and eliminate all the enemies!

Fantasy Fishing梦幻捕鱼.description: This is a free casual game to capture all kinds of fantastic sea fish and deep sea monsters to win the treasure of pirates . No complicated game skills , just click on the fish to shoot .

Reality Simulator Demo.description: This is a 3D simulation game walk through where we showcase how realistic next generation games can be and how far 3D realism has come 1. Walk through a house 2. Walk through a stage

Magic vs Zombies.description: Simple game of shooting magic projectiles to kill zombies and level up to get stronger and kill more zombies.

徹夜報告書.description: 徹夜報告書 | Midnight Report。それはレポート課題に追われる学生の悲劇体験。徹夜作業による幻覚をコンセプトとした和製3Dサバイバルホラーゲーム。

What's Missing? Demo.description: What's Missing? is a first-person, surreal puzzle game where you spot the differences between repeating identical rooms. Explore the limits of changes as it goes beyond just physical objects. Follow Gregory's journey to escape this magical loop and unveil the mystery of his dark past...

KONKORD.description: KONKORD is a planet overrun by mad creatures. Free the planet by destroying the creatures with various weapons you find along the way.

Elektrosoul.description: Awake the droid's consciousness taking control on the system against the timer!

MENOS: PRECURSOR Demo.description: MENOS returns for an all action, third person sequel. Harness the power of Telekinesis and gunplay in fast paced, physics based combat against overwhelming odds. Throw enemies, stop bullets, pickup guns from afar. Anything that isn't bolted to the ground can be used as a weapon.

El Minero.description: A laid back 2D Platformer game based on the unsung daily lives of miners.

Zombies Midnight.description: "Zombies Midnight" is a top-view 2D survival game. At night zombies come out of the forests and want to eat you and you need to stay alive, managing your shelter and resources.

Nice Disc : The Last Hot Blood.description: Hot-blooded action game where you steal, throw, and fling discs to take down your opponents and leave your mark in the vaulted halls of Nice Disc! Up to four players can join the fray in this local multiplayer sports brawler, with both controller and keyboard support.

Nice Disc : The Last Hot Blood Demo.description: Hot-blooded action game where you steal, throw, and fling discs to take down your opponents and leave your mark in the vaulted halls of Nice Disc! Up to four players can join the fray in this local multiplayer sports brawler, with both controller and keyboard support.

镇邪 Zhenxie Playtest.description: 《镇邪》是一款单机国风恐怖游戏，根据大量的民间故事改编。玩家将扮演道门弟子前往神秘村庄调查身世之谜，不想却无意中卷入一场巨大的阴谋。摸金寻宝，驱邪镇灵，开坛做法，画符炼尸...空前绝后的人鬼较量，灵异邪祟的无尽纠缠。二十载宿命，难抵一生夙愿。

Winshu Demo.description: Winshu is a 4 v 4 bright colorful multiplayer game that has Chinese mythological creatures based on (Chinese guardian lions, aka lion dogs aka foo dogs). These lions have elemental powers such as fire, water, wood, metal and earth.

Mad Chess Demo.description: Mad Chess is a fantasy Expansion Pack to classic chess that adds asymmetric factions to the game such as dragons, vampires & mermaids. Choose between 13 armies based on RPG classes to battle your friends online or in a single-player adventure!

Rusty Seas Demo.description: A game about furry girls fighting over junk on the beach.

Super Hamster Havoc Demo.description: Super Hamster Havoc is a twin-stick arena shooter about a war between hamsters and rats.

The Monster Under Your Skin.description: Play as a nameless man who suspects his wife of something, and get lost into his perception of that day when he was about to propose to her. Your choices can influence the the plot. Genre: thriller with some elements of romance.

Acorn City: Tropical! Playtest.description: Build and Explore your very own tropical island! Use block-based building mechanics to create an island unique to you! Collect resources to survive and create. Unlock new items to help expand your town!

Magic and Elements.description: Magic and elements is a 2D arena shooter, you are the greatest magician of all time, you pass another test, getting into the arena of the four elements

PUTRID SHOT ULTRA.description: A chaotic shoot-em-up roguelite with magic spell casting. Defeat enemies with your gun! Stack tons of passive spells that trigger when you shoot while weaving your unique active spell in between. Blast your enemies with gunfire and magic spells while you dodge through the rubble.

Handyman Corporation Demo.description: In Handyman Corporation you become the owner of a business where you handle a variety of jobs in cleaning, maintenance, design, and construction. Accept contracts, play minigames to perform every task required. Then expand your company – buy spare parts, tools, train skills, and manage employees.

Keepsake County Demo.description: Keepsake County is a randomly-generated immersive sim about burglarizing hideous midwestern farmhouses in the middle of nowhere, as fast as you can, and then getting the heck out of dodge. The catch? You have 4 minutes to scout and rob a house you've never been inside of before.

BLANK SPACE Playtest.description: In space, use your high-speed jetpack and unique items to play with your enemies. Unleash overwhelming firepower with a variety of customizable weapons. Control the floating debris with physics!

Aethyr Demo.description: Aethyr is an open-world 2D action adventure game inspired by the golden age of RPGs. Choose from a variety of skills, collect or craft unique weapons and armor, and prepare yourself to uncover the secrets of the Aethyr.

The Western Rooms.description: Will you beat the Rooms? None of them will be easy. Challenge your mind with 3 Escape Room Scenarios! Look for clues, and keep your eyes wide open! Explore an old Western Town Find the Bartender's Recipe Break in the Bank's Vault & Escape the Sheriff's Department

Horse Shelter 2022 - Prologue.description: Live the dream of owning and looking after realistic horses. Train your own stable of horses and participate in world competitions. Exciting show jumping events are waiting for you in free version of Horse Shelter 2022 Prologue

Ikonei Island: An Earthlock Adventure Pl.description: Explore a diverse island, from dense jungles to snowy peaks. Harvest resources and craft gear to keep monsters at bay. Sneak into pirate camps to free captured creatures, who will become powerful allies. Create a home, tend to your farm and make the island your own. Ikonei is fully in your hands!

Formula TOP Demo.description: Fun top-down 3D formula racing game with tense side-by-side battles against competitive AI or other people in online multiplayer. The perfect blend of tight arcade controls and immersive world of formula.

Unoffensible Demo.description: Towering over the battlefield you will physically interact with everything. You will have full freedom to slowly buildup a powerful army or quickly strike the enemy at a weak point. Unlock upgrades and discover new allies. RTS like this is impossible without VR.

Retchid Demo.description: The TEC Mining facility on Titan has been over run by beings from another universe. Grab your shotgun and stop this madness.

Travel The Words Demo.description: Immersive word puzzles, engaging, educational fun! - Includes fun facts, word shuffling and a mini-game when you find bonus words :)

CarterStory Demo.description: Carter's Story is a RogueLike game with random elements combined with action adventures, where you try to randomly pick up equipment and fight enemies, and eventually get the trial of growth.

The Lawyer - Episode 1: The White Bag De.description: The Lawyer - Episode 1: The White Bag is the first part of an episodic adventure game which combines gripping crime story with classic courtroom drama. Immerse yourself into a world set in early 90’s in which you gather (or fabricate!) evidence, deduct and run fierce courtroom battles.

Astrolander Demo.description: Astrolander is a fast-paced twist-filled local co-op game inspired by Lunar Lander! 2 players control 1 rocket: Use thrusters, rotation, & special abilities to solve puzzles, whiz around obstacles, & dodge enemies. Test your skills & your friendships!

Great Houses of Calderia Demo.description: Great Houses of Calderia is a modern generational Grand Strategy Game set in the fantastic land of Calderia inspired by the Renaissance. Build your family’s legacy of power and rise in the ranks of the Great Houses of Calderia!

Sword & Shield Simulator.description: When war overtakes your people, it leaves a cruel imprint in the form of hard sacrifice and the crushing of the village. And here you are on the battlefield, confused and distraught, looking for any way to help your people win the battle. But what can you do if you're a simple craftsman?

Project Romboid.description: Project Romboid is a hard, arcade shooter roguelite in which you will have to pick and combine items so that you can survive waves of enemies that will chase you and shoot at you. New items will appear every level. Combine them to create powerful builds that will help you survive.

Blacktop Hoops Demo.description: Blacktop Hoop is the world's first competitive VR streetball game. Chain together flashy dribble tricks, shots, and high-flying dunks to finish off opponents in epic games of 1-on-1 arcade basketball.

ICEwall Demo.description: A roguelite shoot'em up, in cyberspace

Alchemia: Creatio Ex Nihilo Demo.description: Alchemia is a turn-based strategy roguelike with a hint of puzzle. You'll collect alchemical reagents, building your own personalized combat satchel, and combine them into magical recipes, unique to each run, to battle against outlandish foes.

Red Hood Adventure.description: Red Hood Adventure is a side-scrolling platform slasher game. An alternative story of Little Red Riding Hood, times are difficult and the Hat is armed with weapons. Grandma needs pies again and they need to be delivered. Creatures living in the forests also want pies, and maybe not only.

A Building Full of Cats Demo.description: A Building Full of Cats is a hidden object game where you need to pet all the cats in the building. Don't leave any cat behind!

Seed of Agony Demo.description: Grow an army of demons aboard the living ship, the Seed of Agony, and use them to conquer an infinite, procedurally generated galaxy, in this new take on the 4x genre.

Aloft Demo.description: Survive on floating islands caught in an eternal hurricane in this atmospheric sandbox survival indie game. Build your base and sail the winds to discover new islands and fight back fungi corruption while upgrading your gear. Reach the highest altitudes and brave their challenges.

Mea的财布收集茶会.description: A minigame for Vtuber KaguraMea,enjoy the fight and puzzle.

Robo Legend Demo.description: As Robo, you will decide the destiny of Gear Town and its robot people. Make decisive choices, explore biomes, solve puzzles and mini-games, battle hordes of robotic enemies in this cute pixel-art Twin Stick Shooter RPG, and write the Robo legend.

Guardener.description: An arcade strategy game about defending your garden. Grow potatoes, onions and carrots to defend your lawn!

Don't Die, Mr. Robot! DX.description: Deep in the electro-abyss lives a little robot who loves to eat exploding fruit. He also likes staying alive. That’s where you come in… Get the fruit. Avoid the enemies. Try not to die. (Spoilers: you will die).

Dark Chess Demo.description: Dark Chess is a game of chess with fog of war. Fast paced PvP battler based on classic rules. Whether you are a die-hard chess-lover or an amateur board game admirer, Dark Chess will appeal to anyone who likes the thrill of battle.

发糖模拟器.description: 《Fhtagn!》 is a minimal deck build game that player collects spirits to break the seal of old gods. Try combos of unique relics and cards to collect more spirits!

Crimson Standard.description: Crimson Standard is a story-rich adventure RPG game, featuring turn-based combat and flexible character building. Follow the path of Wang Zi who accidentally traveled to an alternative China with magic, exploring the mysteries around the world, and eventually facing the hidden enemy of mankind!

BATTLE OF BILLIONAIRES DEMO.description: Fight against other players online in this boxing game. 1. Choose a character to fight with 2. Punch, kick, box, your opponent 3. 1 vs 1 matches

Narin: The Orange Room.description: Narin: The Orange Room is a third-person survival horror game. Play as Narin, a young girl with sixth-sense whose sister mysteriously disappeared. Narin accidentally got involved in the mystical dimension during the twilight time. Find her sister, solve the mystery, and uncover the truth.

Second Front Playtest.description: Second Front is an accessible WWII turn-based tactical game with more than 40 infantry units and 200 tanks, vehicles and guns. It has all the depth of a paper wargame and the ease of a computer simulation. Campaign, scenarios and a complete editor make it an infinite tactical sandbox experience.

Shadelight.description: Shadelight is a horror game set in Louisiana. Hide and sneak to avoid mutant family. Find nesesary items to leave their mansion.

死守危城 Demo.description: Construct your symbol combination to generate more defense value until it completely resists the attack of zombies.

Cyberstorm Demo.description: Twin-stick arcade style shooter which doesn't take itself too seriously. Challenge your friends in an online deathmatch arena to see who will stand victorious! Cyberstorm has a constantly growing selection of arenas to play, along with an epic selection of weapons to destroy your opposition with!

Rusty Seas.description: A game about furry girls fighting over junk on the beach.

Pathogen Demo.description: Pathogen is a real-time strategy game, where you take control of a plague that is causing a pandemic. Your goal is to defeat humanity by improving your abilities and earning points from infections.

CBS: Eftm 3D.description: Escape the mall, don't let the cargo stop you!

THROWDOWN BOXING 2.description: Thirteen of the most gifted and powerful boxers on earth square-off in the world famous Throwdown Boxing Association competition! Choose your Kid Titan, prove you are the best of the best and help save the world from the villainous Ned "Cry Baby" Nerdman!

3D PUZZLE - Japan.description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

Starting Life In Another World Naked.description: You will venture into a world much like ours before you are "taken" to another world, a fantasy world. You are the hero of this new world, but sadly you start off with nothing. You must survive and build your way to defeating the Demon King; that's why you were summoned in the first place.

THE MADMAN.description: THE MADMAN - action roguelike, use the space capsule and go on an adventure! Destroy crowds of enemies! You can choose from a variety of weapons that will help in this difficult battle!

Crash Forts 2.description: Crash Forts 2 is a continuation of an exciting puzzle about physics and destruction.

TOTEMS 2.description: TOTEMS 2 - Continuation of the first part in which you have to destroy various blocks and magical totems!

The Redress of Mira Demo.description: With a variety of gameplay mechanics, venture through Mira's fantasy world filled with atmosphere and adventure, and pursue her inner peace.

Spikair Volleyball Demo.description: Control the 4 players of your volleyball team. Recruit players, train them and win tournaments to become the best volleyball club.

Halley's Dream Demo.description: Halley's Dream is a beautiful third-person adventure game about a husky dog that woke up in a beautiful fantasy world where almost every other animal is turned into stone. The protagonist will need to find out who did it and how to revert the curse. Game created by a solo developer.

Homemade TCG Demo.description: Yugi-inspired card game -roguelike with an extra deck. Enemies use the same cards / rules as you. Reduce opponent's life from 20 to 0; by playing cards and attacking. Pick cards of 3-choices after each win. Currently 120 unique cards, 5 floors, and the final boss. DEVELOPMENT STOPPED

Kokoro Clover Season1 Demo.description: Plop down on the couch in your comfiest pajamas, grab a big bowl of cereal, and prepare to enter "Kokoro Clover", a 2D platformer inspired by Sunday morning Japanese anime shows of the past! Transformations, cards, dancing, and robots! Let's find out what this wonderful world has in store!

Genfanad Demo.description: Heroes, we need you! Our world has too many jobs that need doing and not enough willing suckers to do them. Chop wood! Craft slightly better weapons! Go fishing! (When we remember to add fish.) Oh and if you REALLY must fight scary demons, we've got some dungeons that need clearing out…

Chamrosh.description: Chamrosh, The Guardian Of Persia, turned himself to stone with magic for being immortal to protect persian lands forever, and only kaveh the blacksmith's blood can turn him alive again,after thousand years,after the latest generation of kaveh, you are the only one who can turn him alive.

The Haunted Library.description: Psychological horror game in VHS style. In which your goal is to record evidence of paranormal activity in your house. Find items, solve puzzles and record as mutch as you can.

Stunts Contest Police Car.description: Going on the most dangerous curves, you will really show who is a master in extreme races. With 5 police supercars, decently equipped, you have all the chances to become No. 1 in the stunt contests.

龙魂：魔都异闻 Demo.description: 《龙魂：魔都异闻》是一款融合收集／养成要素的文字冒险式RPG游戏。主人公作为游戏开发者，竟然在真实世界遇到了巨龙？而这些巨龙竟然就是她所开发游戏里的“龙魂”。随着更多龙魂的出现，虚构逐渐污染了现实。为了防止自己生活的日常被破坏，主人公必须与龙魂伙伴并肩战斗，解决龙魂引发的诸多事件，阻止黑幕的图谋，揭秘魔都背后的阴谋！

Color Story: Pixa's Quest Demo.description: Help Pixa run and jump through a fast-paced, cute but challenging platformer featuring a dozen unlockable magic abilities and colorful hand drawn graphics. Find collectables, buy upgrades, and work your way towards defeating the sinister Earl Grey. Retro style gameplay with modern QoL improvements.

Wanderer.description: Wanderer is a top down action roguelike where you play as a cat.

Ball Torture.description: Ball Torture is a 2d puzzle game where you control a bowling ball, and once again you get into the recycling compartment and try to get out.

Neuropathic Demo.description: Neuropathic is a dark comedy about emotions and other scary things like that.

Zero-G Gunfight Demo.description: A 2D arena shooter set in outer space where you use your guns to move and kill each other! Prepare yourself for the fast paced arenas of Zer0-G Gunfight where only the best will survive and bring their nations one set closer to intergalactic supremacy!

Zombies Attack.description: Zombies Attack - the mechanics are based on tower defense, 2D graphics with a top view, a memorable and atmospheric soundtrack, colorful and beautiful graphics and unforgettable experiences.

Lost Paws.description: Play as a stray dog in an open world survival game! Run, jump, dig, and bonk your way through a vast city and its surrounding areas. Make new friends and learn new abilities as you build a home for yourself. How you play determines how the world will play with you. What kind of stray will you be?

Super Asqr Demo.description: Super Asqr is a collection of different game types and modes, both single and multiplayer, offered under one package with simple but elegant visual/audio feature set. Being a live game and guided by community, all these game modes are shaped by player feedback!

三毫子大冒險 Demo.description: "The Adventure of 30 Cents Novel" recreated dozens of 30 cents novels into a playable visual novel. The official released version contains many plot lines and over 10 endings. Only those completed all storylines can understand the entire story and characters’ relationship behind.

Asteroid Arena Demo.description: A player vs player, last man standing, space ship arena battle.

Arafinn Kontor Demo.description: The Arafinn Kontor is the central hub of the Arafinn Universe. Arafinn is a dark high-fantasy world full of epic tales and legends. Dwarves, elves, humans, giants, the orcish Uturi, and many other beings inhabiting a world in constant change, full of war, conflicts, and unexpected alliances.

Boulder Island.description: The game is a first-person survival battle game, which requires players to defeat the enemy in the game through operation and collection.

Microbrewery Tycoon Playtest.description: Economic strategy about microbrewery management. Your craft beer should become famous all over the world!

黄老饼梦游惊奇 Playtest.description: Bing in Wonderland is a single player bow shooting platformer game with unique art style. It tells the story of various encounters in the dream world after Bing was hit by Eye's ultimate Dōjutsu.

Maria Blanchard Virtual Gallery.description: This Virtual Gallery is dedicated to the painter Maria Blanchard. 65 works as never seen before, it has several rooms marked by key dates in her history accompanied by a virtual character who, from some monitors, explains his biography in an entertaining and didactic way.

Alpha One Demo.description: Alpha One is a top-down action, 4X-lite strategy game. Each action level is a turn in a strategic conflict as you race to collect resources, acquire upgrades, expand territory and build defenses. All to find a way home!

Wrestling Cardboard Championship Demo.description: In the WCC, cardboard boxes with unique skills and moves, fight in large arenas based on Madison Square Garden, Arena Mexico and the Tokyo Dome.

Become a pig.description: Online cooperative puzzle solving game using voice recognition

Unichrome: a 1-Bit Unicorn Adventure.description: Run-and-gun platforming single-player arcade action mixed with off-kilter comedy. Horn-dash, Triple-Barrel-Shotgun-Blast, Molotov-Cocktail, and Rainbow-Bazooka-Blast your enemies to their death. Homing bullets, automated turrets, and ice-beams spice up the rainbow-colored carnage.

体育館の天井に挟まったマッチョを助けるゲーム.description: This is a new type of shooting game in which the player rescues muscular trapped in the ceiling of a gymnasium by hitting them with a ball.

Legend of Kendor Demo.description: Legend of Kendor is a Fantasy Free-Roaming Action Adventure Roguelike game. This is about people in Kendor trying to save their loved ones. You make your own path and adventure with consequences.

东方异乡录 ~the Apocryphal Gensoukyou.description: 《东方异乡录 ~the Apocryphal Gensoukyou》是一款东方Project主题的短篇视觉小说游戏。主要讲述了在河城荷取的邀请下，雾雨魔理沙、爱丽丝·玛格特洛依德、帕秋莉·诺蕾姬三人在虚拟世界“Apocryphal Land”中冒险的爆笑喜剧故事。

GRINDSHIFT.description: GRINDSHIFT is a stylized hoverboard game with ramps, rails and jumps. There are no gameplay objectives or unlockables, just endless hoverboard riding and score counting.

Arenas Of Tanks Demo.description: Fire up for fun with Arenas Of Tanks, a tactical toy tank game! Use skill and strategy to defeat enemy tanks and upgrade your team

Gastro Force Demo.description: The player takes the role of the last soldier of the highly specialized "Gastro Force", elite troopers trained to infiltrate the enormous alien guts to fight them from the inside!

Super Brawl Rush Demo.description: Super Brawl Rush is a boss rush beat'em up set in the scorched post-apocalyptic lands of the near future. Choose your champion and fight your way between swarms of bloodthirsty thugs, mutants and cultists.

漂流佣兵 Demo.description: This is the fantasy of a two-dimensional traverser in a different world. You can take a leisurely and strategically deep adventure. You can also collect beautiful girls without hurting your wallet, and form your own harem... ahem, mercenary group.

发现姐姐是妹控的我今后该如何是好.description: 《发现姐姐是妹控的我今后该如何是好》是一款短篇百合视觉小说，主要描述了主人公樱自从看见了那个场景之后，对姐姐态度的变化，心灵不断成长最后happy end的故事。

Monty on the Run.description: In this classic platformer from 1985, take on the role of noted small subterranean mammal criminal Monty Mole, recently escaped from Scudmore Prison and fleeing for his life! Can you make the cross-channel ferry in time?

Inexperienced Driver.description: "Inexperienced Driver" is a top-down arcade driving game. The player has to drive from point A to point B and, if possible, collect all the banknotes on the road while avoiding obstacles.

Our Home.description: On Yonit's birthday, he encountered many horror stories. and this will be a birthday that he will never forget.

Wanted! Monty Mole.description: In this classic platformer from 1984, take on the role of Monty Mole and grab as much coal as you can from the South Yorkshire coal pit, for a long, cold winter and a bone chilling Christmas lies ahead. Avoid flying pickets, carnivorous fish, deadly hairsprays, and a host of other surreal hazards.

Cosmic Strike - The last Sub Sector.description: Giant capital ship combat! Equip your crew, choose your ship and rage battle across the stars in this top down 2D strategic shooter. Unravel the story as you fight hordes of enemies, build up your base, and become the fleet commander this sector needs in its darkest hour.

Crossedland.description: If you've always loved building villages, farming, and taking care of villagers but wished there was more action and exploration, Crossedland is the home for you!

Tunguska: The Visitation Demo.description: Tunguska: The Visitation is a top-down survival horror that brings you to the perilous Tunguska Exclusion Zone, where you'll face deadly traps, infectious mutants, bandits, and well-armed rogue military. Will you survive and thrive, or will you become Lost To The Zone?

再刷一把 PlayAgain.description: 你是一个前往轮回的灵魂，被神秘人拦截，送你到了一个叫做"神魔之塔"的地方，冒险由此开始... 本游戏融合了卡牌抽取+角色养成+宠物养成+宠物合成+暗黑类刷宝+爬塔+轻微肉鸽+符文之语等玩法的游戏，如果你是一个喜欢刷宝玩家千万不要错过！！

Card Craft Demo.description: Card Craft is a roguelike deck builder where you battle cards on a grid. Master the 4 symbols: Sword, Shield, Magic, and Bow. Build unique decks and create new strategies. Journey across the map buying new cards, forging upgrades, and finding quests. Choose from different heroes!

The Farmer Was Replaced.description: Program a drone to automate a farm and watch it work at hyperspeed. Earn money to unlock better technology and become the most efficient farmer in the world. Improve your problem solving skills and train your brain to think in an algorithmic way.

Jones Playtest.description: Jones is a first person exploration game set in an endless void.

Insectoid Descent Demo.description: Shoot, slice and blow your way through the relentless swarm in a top-down pixel art world. At your service is a combat drone, reclaim scrap and use refinery for health & resupply. Explore and find upgrades, defeat the hive mind.

The Jean-Paul Software Screen Explosion.description: Modern, multi-monitor, customisable screensavers that EXPLODE! into your living room, office, man-cave, International Space Station, or anywhere you have your computer attached to screens.

Ronin Trail Demo.description: The war ends and your skills are no longer needed. Aimless and starving, you set out on a journey to Edo, the City of Opportunity. Travel through the countryside and find your purpose as a wandering nobody. Can you make a name for yourself?

ZombieMaze.description: 'Zombie Maze' is simple top-down shooter game with maze. You need to find way to escape. Only way to escape is helicopter on the roof!! RUN!!! and kill that ZOMBIES!!!

FETUS.description: Fetus is an arcade hardcore platformer set in ancient Rome.

Moontrain Demo.description: A Point n Click game set in a strange new world. All Aboard the new, exciting and strange adventure. Keep your hands, quills and tentacles inside for the whole ride.

Spiderbro.description: Help Spiderbro through a strange dystopia and overcome the shadow spider that is constantly hindering you. Collect items and solve puzzles and keep moving, don't let the shadow spider get the better of you.

A Bavarian Tale - Totgeschwiegen Demo.description: “Totgeschwiegen - Chapter I” (“deathly hush”) is a third-person RPG detective story, set in rural Bavaria in 1866. As the young Medical student Valentin Schmidt you will travel to Wolpertshofen, when a sudden death causes turmoil in the small Bavarian village.

Jones.description: Jones is a first person exploration game set in an endless void.

mrFOX.description: "mrFOX" is is a classic 2D side-scrolling platformer. To collect all lost treasures you will visit three different colorful locations.

Researchity Open World Survival Game Dem.description: A survival open world survival crafting game. Build your own base, Tame the wild live, farming, collecting resources. You will need to do all this in order to Survive. You might never know what is out there until you go looking for it

Turf Wars: A Snail Escape.description: Escape the garden in this snail-paced rougelike where you got to expand your turf or dry out trying. Danger lurks behind every bush, so just remember this one important rule: STAY. ON. YELLOW!

Bomb Dolls.description: an endless gay road trip through an apocalyptic wasteland! 3-player co-op! eat burgers, pop pills, slam soda, inhale donuts! collect lost souls and trade them for cute outfits! kiss your girlfriends to share life energy! fend off enemies, navigate minefields, outrun the storm, try not to explode!

Viking Life.description: You are an ordinary Viking. Your task is to gather a squad and attack other settlements, after each victory you will have a choice of 4 abilities, each with a unique pumping or talent. After death, you lose all skills and troops.

Take no Prisoners.description: "Take no Prisoners" is a classic 2D platformer shooter. Big group of terrorists captured the city area. You are the last fighter remaining of your special forces squad. Find and kill all enemies and get out of the conflict area area.

Faraway.description: Escaping the planet is your main goal.

Stellar Watch.description: Stellar Watch is a dynamic tower defense game with space shooter elements. Deploy, upgrade, research drones to protect the spaceship. Steer the course of the ship to gain tactical advantages for drones.

Apparatus Demo.description: Lost, trapped, and alone within the Delta Labs. You must find your way out with your life, any slight mess-up could be your life in this 2D story platformer

The Wraith of the Galaxy.description: The Wraith of the Galaxy is a third-person space combat game.

Super SpaceMail Demo.description: Super SpaceMail is an Adventure game about connections where you play as a mailman delivering letters in space, making friends, and solving a mystery way bigger than this universe.

舞Hime:节奏连消.description: “Dance Hime: Rhythm Matching” is a VR game that combines match-3 with music and dance. It focuses on match-3 and girls' hot dance. In addition to the sense of achievement after a successful match-3, players can also enjoy the immersive dance of elven girls.

A Day Out Demo.description: A Day Out is a monster-hunting, paranormal-investigating, and case-solving co-op shooter game. Unlock gadgets and upgrade your base as you discover a new supernatural world with your friends!

Ein's Sword Demo.description: Simple field battles and training. Defeat enemies that appear in the field and obtain ability points every time you level up. Raise your preferred status and advance the battle to an advantage. Easy to use and comfortable to play.

Pandemic 1993.description: Survival horror set in Japan! Fight off various creatures, search for your missing wife and child, and escape from the town safely!

Battle of Tanks.description: Don't let the army of enemy tanks reach the southern border of the battlefield. You have several guns at your disposal and the ability to call an airstrike. Move around the battlefield in the top view and choose the right guns to attack. You need to hold out for the allotted time.

Resonance of the Ocean.description: Pick up what the waves wash ashore to make instruments. Use those instruments to answer the echoes heard from beyond the ocean.

Interwoven Demo.description: Welcome to Interwoven - a bite-sized adventure inspired by traditional turn-based JRPGs. Follow an unlikely trio on their journey to defeat the Obsidian Drake atop Anvite Mountain. Weave together dynamic strategies with the game’s unique Augment Battle System and carve your own path to victory!

Battle Waves: Card Tactics Demo.description: A strategic Auto-Battler with Deck-Building action! Compete in 1v1 Online PvP showdowns or try your hand at escalating PvE difficulties. Unlock over 20 factions and experiment with thousands of synergies, Wishlist Today!

Pixel.description: Pixel is a minimalist platformer + puzzle game! Control a being that aims to reach somewhere... always jumping, dodging, avoiding and tricking obstacles that seem not to let you proceed. Died? Just try one more time =D

Classic Memory Game.description: Classic Memory Game is a game of memorization skills, designed for the entire family and suitable for people of all ages. It is inspired by the popular game of pairs where the player requires concentration and memory.

Junkyard War.description: Junkyard War is a unique take on the tower defense genre. Clear trash from the junkyard and recycle it into valuable resources while holding off waves of your competitor's army trying to make the trash disappear by burning it all down!

Running on Magic Demo.description: Woosh! Get ready to flee! Welcome to Running on Magic, a forced-scroll platformer where a quirky wizard is being chased by a tireless Grim Reaper. Hurry through procedurally-generated mindfully drawn environments as you defeat unalike enemies. Don’t let the Grim Reaper get to you!

Exodus Vigil Playtest.description: Explore the Dark and Dangerous Temples and Tombs of Ancient Egypt in this story-driven 3D puzzle game. Follow the familiar story of the Israelite Exodus from the Egyptian perspective.

SHOCKWAVELAND OF THE BLIND.description: A first-person immersive bomb disposal sim with stealth mechanics that lets you taste the anxious life of a sapper. Work with specialistic equipment to disarm a wide range of explosives. Gather intel to choose the right path in the multi-layered levels and stay out of sight from armed militants.

Detective Fantasia DX.description: A corpse has been found on the beach! Explore a summery island to gather clues and uncover the truth in this mystery game, Detective Fantasia DX!

Boss Hunter.description: Join our Boss Hunting friend in this bite-size, indie developed, boss battle game. You will encounter 6 unique and challenging bosses to defeat, but don't let the small number fool you. These are 6 bosses that won't give up easily. You must have the Boss Hunter spirit!

凶宅 HouseHaunting.description: 《HouseHaunting》 is a horizontal puzzle solving game. You need to solve puzzles in a haunted house. There is no fixed sequence for solving puzzles. You can freely explore the room, and finally complete the task "she" gave you, satisfy "their" wishes, and finally find "your" memory and destination.

Summa Expeditionis.description: Summa Expeditionis is a survival and strategy game set in ancient Roman Empire. Follow the career of a Roman soldier from Legionnaire to Centurion. Build and manage your camp, recruit more soldiers and face the barbarians for the glory of Rome.

Bloody Hell.description: Bloody Hell is a Bullet-Hell Metroidvania about using the blood of demons to your advantage. Fight Epic Bosses, and take revenge on the terrorising demons.

FunBall 3D Demo.description: FunBall 3D is a casual game, that involves platforming and collecting score, and if you are not doing that you are racing against the clock, Funball will travel around different maps and challenges.

Unwording Demo.description: Unwording is a narrative puzzle game about happiness, gratitude, and the power of our thoughts. Use a combination of exploration and word puzzle gameplay to reshape reality and guide Tom through the course of three painful but transformative days of his life.

By the Vine.description: By the Vine is a Christian-based Visual Novel. The story follows a young adult named Calum, who has to live on his best friend's farm after burning down his house. What hijinks will ensue as Calum adjust to his new life on the farm?

A Game with a Kitty 1 & 2.description: Foil a little nerd's world domination plans with Kittey in A Game with a Kitty 1 and help a grumpy little Archchancellor solve a mystery in Darkside Adventures! And as a bonus, the collection also features Treasure Hunter Man 1.

logik Demo.description: A minimalistic, stylized puzzle game where you have to move the striped block through a maze of cubes, out of the puzzle area. Progress through cute, colorful sections of puzzles as you try to uncover the solutions.

Nuclear Fighter.description: Is a fun and fast 2D platformer with a side view. Your goal is to escape from the city and survive.

Celeritas Demo.description: Celeritas is a fast paced runner shooter and platformer, made for speedrunners.

KONKORD Demo.description: KONKORD is a planet overrun by mad creatures. Free the planet by destroying the creatures with various weapons you find along the way.

Mr. Pumpkin 2: Kowloon Walled City Demo.description: Mr. Pumpkin 2: Kowloon Walled City is a sequel to the Mr. Pumpkin franchise. Our protagonist, an insignificant guy with a pumpkin head, will explore the Kowloon Walled City of Hong Kong, and witness the stories happening within these walls.

DELETE AFTER READING Demo.description: Meet Cinco, Nina and Tomate, 3 kid ghosts with special powers living in your attic and join them in their adventure. Become a secret agent to change the fate of the best video game ever created! Don't get caught by Destiny, it might turn you into the ugliest deep sea-fish.

全城感染：通向地狱.description: Infection City: Hell is an adventurous role-playing game. You will play a policeman who will rush back to your family's apartment on the night of the zombie crisis and try to rescue them. But the apartment was already a purgatory.

IDEA Demo.description: IDEA is a game about discovering and sharing. Explore gorgeous landscapes, roll down highways and stumble upon welcoming cottages and abandoned dumpsters. Help your ideas find their way – and share them with the world when they stop, before beginning your journey anew.

Command & Control: Spec Ops (Remastered).description: Tower Defence about the war against the Syndicate.

Truck Rally Hyper Hardcore.description: The challenging races that you only know are just the beginning level of this game. Absolutely realistic behavior of the machine. No arcade controls. Using the laws of the real physical world. Only for hardcore players.

U96.description: U96 is a action-roguelike about deep sea exploration.

Elden Gunfire 2 Demo.description: A comic, funny and cute online multiplayer third person shooter game for everyone with fantastic cartoon 3D next generation graphics and captivating gameplay.

PUT PUD Nudli's Adventure Demo.description: Become a hero who saves the island of cats. Explore these varied areas of this island. Fight Chef The Cat’s creatures and after that face the meowing horror. The game is hard, but if you can give it time, you will become better and better.

Toggle Cube.description: Toggle Cubes is a game where you have to guide people to the stars by toggling cubes on and off. You have to overcome monsters, fireballs, and spikes by using keys and teleports.

Cyber Drift Demo.description: (Please try the DEMO) Welcome to the world of Cyber, hold your steering wheel for the next drift track.

Bounder.description: In this unique top-down platformer from 1985, as a living tennis ball bounce across dozens upon dozens of screens of tricky platforms suspended in the sky. Land on special tiles that produce a number of effects.

Jones Demo.description: Jones is a first person exploration game set in an endless void.

Omega Squad.description: Lead a team of marines inside a space station infested with monsters. Level up your squad and upgrade your weapons in order to clean the station of any threat. But don't forget to manage your squad as health and fatigue will play a big role in your squad's performance.

Charging Out Dead Zone.description: This is a zombie car parkour game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

Aria and the Crystal Kingdom.description: Wield cards as your weapon in this deck-building fantasy RPG inspired by Slay the Spire and Paper Mario! Battle against enemies in strategic turn-based combat, travel across a hand-drawn world, customize your deck, and grow strong enough to face whatever lies ahead!

God-Machine Demo.description: Prepare for a mix of endurance-combat and arcade shooting game. Play against dangerous robots, cyborgs, and mutants, in rogue-like arenas that evolves as you fight. Are you brave and skilled enough to endure?

Shido's World.description: Explore an amazing world with the Shido and learn a little more about our history. Many adventures, beautiful places and remarkable stories await you in the Shido's World

the Binding of Survivors.description: A game of rogue adventure, mowing, coolness, and walking. A group of characters of different backgrounds and abilities have come together to explore the deepest secrets of this evil unknown planet. Defeat the tidal wave of enemies, different bosses, and achieve various challenges and achievement.

Catch Me! Demo.description: Compete online against your friends and other players in this chaotic and fast paced 4-player game of tag! Race across different locations, jump through windows, electrocute the other players or throw cats at them. (No cats were harmed in the production of this game.)

The Lab - Escape Room Demo.description: Walk through a futuristic complex while solving puzzles and discover how you got there. What are this misterious creatures? Why everything looks abandoned? Could you escape from The Lab?

The Sunny Life Demo.description: Start a new life in Atirin! Will you run the best shop in town? Why don't you check out what does the neighbourhood has to offer? Choice is yours! Take your time and enjoy yourself in Atirin

Under Siege.description: "Under Siege" is a top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker. The goal is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies.

Space Theory.description: "Space Theory" - a space top down shooter game. The player controls a spaceship and fights against space pirates, blows up enemy space stations and acquires upgrades at the end of each mission.

Biters & Bullets.description: Kill thousands of zombies, collect loot, and become a lean mean killing machine! Battle and survive hordes of monsters in this high octane casual game with rogue-lite elements. Defeat bosses, hot-wire cars and stack power-ups to infinity. How long will you survive?

Anger Foot Demo.description: Anger Foot is a lightning-fast action FPS where the only things harder than your ass-kicking feet are the ass-kicking beats.

Crush them!碾碎它们！.description: In the quiet and peaceful grassland, a group of uninvited guests suddenly came! They are ordered by Satan to raid the walls of God! You have been hired by the gods as a new warrior, sworn to live and die with the city wall! Now, follow the will of God and crush them with your fingers!

Larry The Unlucky Part 3 Demo.description: Help Larry find a cure for his wife and break his curse of unluckiness by solving riddles and puzzles on his adventures around the whole world.

Flashback 2.description: The acclaimed sci-fi side-scroller that became a retro gaming classic returns, with modern graphics and gameplay! After overcoming the Death Tower, Conrad and his allies must once again face the Morphs, the alien race that threatens all civilizations.

The Man Came Around Demo.description: The Man Came Around is a point-and-click thriller filled with tough choices. Occida is shaken by mass protests. As the fight between The Many -an activist organization- and the government intensifies, the protesters are faced with brutal repression. Play five citizens trying to leave this mess.

GhostCast Demo.description: This multiplayer first-person shooter is fast-paced, you'll die, but not be dead, you'll be a ghost, but you can be human again.

Spell Cast Demo.description: CO-OP Time survival game with roguelite elements, up to 10 players online

The Roots.description: In this game you gonna explore the stars memories. With main character, you gonn

Gem Setter Demo.description: i'm gem setter, a block sliding puzzle game about moving ice in an abstract world. solve clever puzzles using ice blocks to change your shape and open new paths, then build your own levels using the built-in level editor.

Desert Things.description: Desert Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the desert location within a certain time.

City Things.description: City Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the city location within a certain time.

Chaos War.description: 在这场战争中，你要扮演一个魔女，以魔法书射击魔法的方式击败怪物获取更强大的魔法书，结束这场战争。

A HAUNTED HISTORY Demo.description: A Haunted History is a survival horror game, that focus mainly on the story. Discover everything by exploring the ambience, finding clues and solving puzzles, and also experiencing some lil' bit... weird situations.

العدم.description: لعبة الغاز مكونة من ١٥ لغز , وبعد حل اللغز سوف تواجه اسئلة عن حالة معينة وبناءا على إجابتك تنتهي اللعبة, و يوجد ٦ نهايات للعبة.

TIMESTRIDE Demo.description: Manipulate time to overcome obstacles in a clever way. A sci-fi FPS game with large variety of weapons and foes set in a remote military research lab where an experiment has gone horribly wrong.

Strange Investigations: Two for Solitair.description: An investigation into a fellow detective’s death uncovers details of his last case – and now Dana may be the next target!

Blast Cats.description: Blast Cats is a love letter to classic 3D platformers! Bomb your enemies to smithereens and smash them flat with your mighty hammer! Find precious gems as you run and jump through secret worlds. Fight powerful foes and show them who’s boss! Adventure explodes unto the world, hang in there baby!

SEARCH ALL - BIRDS.description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the birds in a large location. The birds will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

Airdrift.description: Casual survival game where you build and fly your own airship, explore flying islands, craft tools, farm crops and more.

bearcycle Demo.description: bearcycle combines fast-paced motorcycle racing with wacky platforming madness. Grind, grapple, and rocket your way through the forest, local city, and beyond! So grab some berries, catch some air, and land a trick in this unBEARably fun classic.

めだアビ Demo.description: A short 2D action game with mysterious characters!　 Two games, one with boss battles where you have to find a way to deal damage, and one with more abilities to use on each stage!

めだアビ～プシーニの謎～ Demo.description: 選んだ主人公によって物語が分岐する2Dボスアクション！　独特の雰囲気の漫画で進行するストーリー

180 SECONDS.description: In the period of 180 seconds you will analyze every object in your house... when the ambulance passes, the thunder, and the ringing of the phone. You live during the time of a pandemic and your mission is to use your real-world knowledge that you have learned about viruses. Would you be infected?

Hook 2 Demo.description: Get Hook’d on unhooking the hooks again.

Chinese Empire Demo.description: Chinese Empire is an economic city-building strategy taking place in the picturesque areas of China. Create your own new empire that will go down in history!

Casebook 1899 Demo.description: Leipzig 1899 - A German city on the threshold of the 20th century characterised by industrialisation, progress and innovation. But the darker sides include theft, robbery and murder. Detective Joseph Kreiser takes up the fight against crime.

Railroads & Catacombs: Prologue.description: Start your training in Railroads & Catacombs! Learn how to build your cards in the most effective way. Test your deck against the first boss and master your strategy for the full game.

Shadow of Asha.description: Asha's shadows are invading and corrupting Narkian. It's up to you to stop her!, level up, explore the village for resources and become stronger.

Marbles on Stream Playtest.description: Marbles on Stream is a Marble Racing game for EVERYONE! You can simulate races yourself or stream it on Twitch.tv with your viewers! Many features in game to help interact with your viewers and engage with them in unique ways. 3 ways to play! Download and stream! Download the MoS app on your mobile device! Get on Twitch.

Heavy Truck Simulator.description: Be the best miner and heavy-duty trucks mechanic! In this realistic simulator you will drive, repair and customise the biggest quarry machines and vehicles. Deliver the ore through the most difficult terrains and expand your network of mines, quarries and stone-pits.

SCRAP RIDERS Demo.description: Become Rast, a member of the outlaw bikers gang Scrap Riders, make your way through the wastelands and the big metropolis controlled by corporations. Act as a smuggler with caustic humor to survive in this post-apocalyptic world.

Evangeline's Defense.description: The game that mixes the mechanics of Top Down shooters with those of Tower Defense. Collect materials, build your defenses and kill as many demons as you can as you move freely around the world and defend the Archangel Evangeline in this fearless adventure

Ocean Hell.description: Ocean Hell is a multiplayer survival adventure game where the objective is to escape the under sea research facility your stuck in. Play with friends or play single player in this horror survival game.

Parabellum Galaxia.description: Prepare for war in this VR Space Strategy Simulator. Design your ships, complete your missions, defeat your enemy.

STRANGER Demo.description: Protect yourself against a STRANGER trying to break into your house, use the limited locks and look and listen where the intruder is coming from. Lock the windows, reset the power, stay focused. Survive until 6am and begin to unravel the mystery behind your sudden and mysterious STRANGER

我感染HIV了吗.description: A word game, does not support the handle, the operation is the mouse and keyboard space. It can be said that it is very simple. The theme of obsessive-compulsive disorder and psychosis is a large text dialogue, which is more depressing. Please be careful if you don't like it.

简易五子棋.description: It's a simple game where two playIt's a simple game where two players play chess one after the other until one person plays five pieces to win. Although the rules of this game are simple, they are very wise,

Chronos Builder.description: Outstanding 3D map creator tool for Sci-Fi, Cyberpunk, 19th Century, Medieval and Fantasy for TTRPG environments. Create maps, export them and show them on your games!

Adventures at the North Pole.description: Look for snow-covered tracks, collect evidence at the site of abandoned parking lots, communicate with Eskimo leaders and shamans, and find out what happened to the ship "Silent", its crew and captain.

Lockdown VR: Circus of the Dead.description: You are an aspiring group of performers and have been invited for a performance. Assigned to an abandoned dressing room due to a lack of facilities, strange things started to happen. Alone or with up to 6 players, explore, gather clues, and escape before its too late!

Project Utgardr Demo.description: Project Utgardr is an adventure, parkour and puzzle solving game in an old and far land. Based on exploration and nordic mythology... "This is a non-game and none is playing with it..."

One Step Away.description: One Step Away is a narrative puzzle game inspired by actual events of child trafficking. Uncover two children's vivid escape stories in this bleak and monochrome world.

0Hz ZERO HERTZ.description: Press buttons to the beat of the music while aiming and shooting in this simple but difficult skill game. Will you get through it?

Monster Fighter Demo.description: Enjoy adorable monster fights with your friends and family. Multiplayer game mode for two people only. 2D fighting game, where you will have to prove your skill and face countless challenges.

Kingdom´s Edge.description: An adventure multiplayer hack n slash in a vertical world. Explore the Deepth with your class to earn knowlodge and recources to build your domain. Play with up to 2 of your Steam firends or solo. The characters have 4 abilities with combos and can be upgraded along the game.

Soul Shard.description: Soul Shard is a 3D platformer, 2-player local coop game set in a Victorian London Steampunk factory. Nimue and her sidekick Ambrose, a cyborg bear, are on a mission to destroy the factory so that it can no longer produce cyborg laborers that the owner has been using to replace the working class.

Grindstone Demo.description: Grindstone is a puzzle game where epic adventures are just your 9-to-5. It’s your job to mine grindstones from the Creeps that lurk on the mountain in over 250 levels of intricate puzzles and hazards, all in the hopes of saving up enough grindstones to take your family on a much needed vacation.

Olliefrog Toad Skater.description: Olliefrog Toad Skater is the amphibian-based skateboarding game where its easy to be steezy!

Grid Leaper Demo.description: VR Platforming taken to the next level. Jump. Climb. Grab. Swing. Fly. Dodge. Do whatever it takes to reach the goal. Taking place across 90 levels, Grid Leaper brings you on a journey through 20 unique environments designed to harden you into a master.

VR CHINESE KUNG FU.description: Immerse yourself in the kung fu of the mysterious East. Observe the oriental fairy world from the perspective of VR, and deeply experience the mysterious culture of the orient.

Curse Crackers: For Whom the Belle Toils.description: Help Belle the acrobat and Chime the living bell recover her kidnapped boyfriend from her rival Bonnie, who has suddenly returned with strange new abilities and a crew of trouble making, graffiti loving skeletons! It’s up to Belle to take Bonnie's new crew head on and get her boyfriend back!

Withering Rooms.description: Withering Rooms is a 2.5D horror adventure set in a procedurally generated Victorian mansion that changes each night. Sneak through Mostyn House to gather weapons, distractions, magical artifacts, keys, and crafting materials.

Drunk Games.description: "Drunk Games" is a 2D top down shooter with Battle Royal elements. The player, surrounded by other characters, must collect as many bottles as possible, knocking them out of other drunkards!

Mayor T-Rex.description: Major T-Rex and his gang are back in town. A new apocalypse is coming because the nature can no longer support humans and their constructions.

Paper Flight - Super Speed Dash.description: Paper Flight – Super Speed Dash is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

Paper Flight - Speed Rush.description: Paper Flight – Speed Rush is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

The Call of Krul'ar.description: Survive the horrors of the unknown as you expand your lands to keep from being dragged into the darkness; and devoured by that which lurks inside. Every time you make an action, the world around moves forward too. So be strategic in your choices, and be sure they are worth it.

Revived Forest.description: "Revived Forest" is a 2d platform game. The main goal is to collect all the seeds and save the offspring of the ents. Be careful - there are dangerous orcs and lumberjacks!

Meat Beating: The Second Coming.description: Seriously all you do is beat your meat.

Lone Ruin Demo.description: Venture into an old, magical ruin to seek an ancient power in this highly replayable, top-down, roguelike twin-stick shooter. Combine and optimise your spells to defeat twisted monstrosities and dive deeper into the Lone Ruin.

FREERIDE: The Personality Test Playtest.description: An Action-RPG that's (not-so) secretly a Personality Test. Use Physics-based telekinesis to make your mark on a strange world of Spirits. You will not be told when you are making decisions. You will never be judged in terms of Good or Evil. You will simply face the consequences of your actions.

Awake.description: Awake is an isometric puzzle game about a young girl named Aya who is suffering from insomnia. Aya must navigate various obstacles in her path as she moves between different planes of consciousness. Join Aya on her journey to explore the depths of her dreamscape and uncover the root of her anxiety.

Cool Game.description: Traditional roguelike where you build your team to defeat stronger and stronger opponents. Choose your teammates, their position and your opponents wisely, as one mistake can cost you the entire game

Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun.description: Load up your Boltgun and unleash the awesome Space Marine arsenal to blast your way through an explosion of sprites, pixels and blood in a perfect blend of Warhammer 40,000, frenetic gameplay and the stylish visuals of 90’s retro shooters.

Terror-Daktil 4D.description: In this challenging and addictive twist on the classic arcade shooter, originally published for the ZX Spectrum in 1983, try to survive for six days and six nights against the ruthless onslaught of the Terror-Daktils, with only 3 primitive cannons for protection.

Putin Orcs Defender.description: Putin leads his orcs army invaded Ukraine. Putin's orcs want to plunder vodka and washing machine,and slaughter all. You must take up arms to fight back their invasion.

Samurai Solitaire. Return of the Ronin.description: Help Ronin return home! Unique solitaire inspired by Japanese culture!

Formula Bwoah Closed Beta.description: Formula Bwoah is a strategic arcade top down motorsport racing game where you not only drive the car, but also plan and react to dynamic racing events like changing weather, track conditions, tire degradation, etc.

Tiny Robo Puzzles.description: Tiny Robo Puzzles Contains 4 Tiny Sokoban Style Puzzle Games that you can enjoy!

Wormatozoa Demo.description: A gross 2D point-and-click precision platformer about parasitic worms. Guide them through a human body as they evolve from tiny parasites to city-engulfing monsters in this tough-as-nails arcade slither-em-up!

Tall Poppy 2.description: In this comedy-horror adventure, explore the city of Boots Bay where you must go through hell to discover the reason why Tall Poppy is tormenting you. It's time to put an end to his terror once and for all!

Lost Snowmen.description: A puzzle-platformer starring three characters with different skill sets, who will have to assist each other during their adventures in order to fulfill a variety of level objectives.

The Search for Fran 2.description: " The Search for Fran 2 " Welcome to Sans Fran City. You are here to search for Fran, again. While searching, You can also talk with people and go on Quests , Collect Glorbs , Drive Cars , Fly a Drone , Crash Cars, Try a "Challenge" and much more !

Voltaire - The Vegan Vampire Demo.description: An action-farming-roguelite, full of whimsical flora and mischievous creatures! Voltaire, the lastborn of Dracula, had decided to swap human flesh for ~*plant flesh*~ to satisfy his dark cravings. But be careful: going vegan is (㇏(•̀ᵥᵥ•́)ノ) 𝖓𝖔𝖙 𝖋𝖔𝖗 𝖙𝖍𝖊 𝖋𝖆𝖎𝖓𝖙 𝖔𝖋 𝖍𝖊𝖆𝖗𝖙.

Aces and Adventures Demo.description: Aces and Adventures is a deck builder RPG with poker-powered combat. Journey through a world inspired by Norse and Middle Eastern mythology to save the Life Tree from the evil that gnaws at her roots.

Svarog's Dream.description: Old Slavic Gods are dying in a conflict with the new God and they summoned you as their last hope. Be their doom or help them. Fight beasts, fight demigods or even fight Gods, ally with them, explore the world, die and be reborn in this unforgettable adventure.

SailSim.description: This sailing simulator applies actual physics to simulate the behavior of a sailing vessel. This means you can actually capsize or sink a vessel if you are not careful. In some cases the simulator can even reproduce unpredictable results based on your actions, selected parameters and conditions.

Frebbventure.description: In a world gone wild, there's only one animal man enough to put his foot down!Join Frebb's small clique of reluctant "friends" as they rumble, tumble, and action-platform their way through the craziest journey of the year!

Mate.description: Mate is a third-person story-based game with a multi-ending game with puzzles and physical controls.The protagonist, the perpetrator of school violence, is anxious that his actions will be revealed to others, which leads to psychological hallucinations and nightmares.

Lys and Ruka's Magical Bag Demo.description: Something strange is afoot as a mysterious dungeon appears outside the town of Litos. Gather weapons and items to fight the enemies before and get out of sticky situations in this fast-paced action RPG from desunoya!

Old Roots.description: Old Roots: fight your fear and survive your fate. Inspired by the geography of Siberia and with inspiration from games like Doom or Hellblade, you will have to face your own fear and overcome your enemies... without losing control.

The Coven of Calahree Demo.description: Three wacky, wild, and witchy sisters are up to no good in this fantasy RPG world. They’re off battling dungeon beasts, performing odd jobs and quests for the local townspeople all in hopes to gain as many new followers as they can for their new Coven…The Coven of Calahree

Ink World.description: "Ink World" is a 2D platform jumping game with the theme of Chinese classical ink painting. The story tells that the protagonist constantly improves his abilities through battles, thereby eliminating many beasts in ancient Chinese legends.

Panda Run.description: "Panda Run" is a 2D platform jumping game. The game is easy to operate, has a relaxed atmosphere, and has a cartoon screen, which is suitable for playing for a while at leisure.

Repairny (リペアニー).description: "Repairny" is First-person perspective action game. Repairny and drones are constantly attacking to player with light sword or laser gun. Control player direction to guard with player's light sword. Then attack with your light sword. Destroy all of enemy in field to clear stage.

The Cub Demo.description: The Jungle Book meets the armageddon. A story-rich, old-school tough platformer inspired by SEGA classics but built for today. Platform parkour through the remains of humanity as smooth apocalypse-wave tunes and stories reveal more.

Bargue Playtest.description: Bargue is an online role-playing game with 12 people. You can be a good customer, a bad mafia, or a neutral thief. To survive each round, you must convince the opponent with voice chat. At the end of the day, the surviving team wins!

Ekko - A Thief's Melody Demo.description: "The pirates abducted my sister!" In a colorful archipelago world, play as Ekko, a young heartful thief studying at the Guild. Confront or avoid pirates, guards & robots. Sail the ocean on a cute turtle and climb every island. Defy ancestral Guardians, find the truth & become a Thief Master.

NecroBouncer Demo.description: Rogue-like dungeon crawler where you have a chance to play as a necromancer, who works as a bouncer in a dungeon club. Choose your path, try out endless builds, and go on to defeat hardcore bosses to acquire and unleash their powers on hordes of enemies!

DAGURI: Gambling Apocalypse.description: 도박묵시록 다구리는 오픈 월드 도박 시뮬레이션 게임입니다. 당신은 호기심에 시작한 도박에 재산을 탕진해버린 주인공 '다구리'가 되어, 빚을 갚기 위한 여정을 떠나야만 합니다. 월드를 자유롭게 돌아다니며, 맵 곳곳에 미니 게임 형태로 배치된 노름판에 돈을 걸어 열심히 재산을 늘려나가세요.

Pickup One.description: This is an parkour pickup game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible.

Stonkers.description: One of the world's first real-time strategy games, originally released for the ZX Spectrum in 1984. Move your units across varied terrain to meet the enemy, managing strategic positioning and supply lines.

Robotry! Demo.description: A physics-based platformer without a jump button. Walk, jump, climb and parkour by directly controlling each leg of a confused baby robot. Go from a glitching toddler to a somersaulting acrobat in the story mode, or tackle your friends in multiplayer versus modes!

Eternal.description: Eternal is a stylized combat action RPG, where you fight your way through a fantasy landscape using a variety of weapons, shields, consumables and spells

Hell Division.description: Hell Division is a game from the 3rd person, which is a battle of combat drones.

Moonatics.description: MOONATICS is a hyperactive 2D fighter with a focus on KICKING ASS... featuring a colourful cast of freaks and misfits, rollback netcode, and stylish hand-drawn animations OOZING with character!

Polar Explorer Simulator Demo.description: Live a few days of an "ordinary" polar explorer and overcome all the difficulties. You can play alone or as a team. The more polar friends you have with you, the easier it is. But there can be a strictly limited number of polar explorers at one polar station.

Toroa.description: Soar, swoop and glide across the vast Pacific Ocean as Toroa, the Northern Royal Albatross. Discover the hidden wonders of the sea and sky on your epic journey home with the help of Māori God of the winds, Tāwhirimātea.

Let's Cook Together 2 Demo.description: Let's Cook Together 2 is a plot-driven co-op game. Use teamwork to fight against Nutri Inc. - a dystopian food government. Cook and serve dishes like the future depended on it. Travel across the world to make cooking meaningful again. Take back the taste.

茶叶蛋大冒险.description: 这是一颗茶叶蛋的故事，也是一次智力与决策的挑战！在《茶叶蛋大冒险》中，你需要操作茶叶蛋破解各种谜题，走出大门。看似简单却暗藏玄机！脑洞大开的关卡和搞笑有趣的画风将带你进入一个全新的烧脑世界！解题的关键也许是一个文字，也许是一个动作，看你能否破解其中奥秘！

天体计划 Demo.description: "Celestial Project" is a Roguelike WarChess game. It is the first game of the story "Celestial". Command the special operations forces, resist and study unknown alien creatures from space, defend the five starship civilization spacecraft under construction on earth, and retain human kindling!

Bookstore Simulator Demo.description: This is a realistic Bookstore where you can read real books of several different topics. Interested in learning about business communication, world history, Rome, Greece? Into fiction and romance? Find and read any book in this realistic virtual bookstore.

King Rabbit - Race Demo.description: Race with friends through dangerous obstacle courses in this action-platformer. Hop quickly to survive obstacles, compete with friends, and win prizes. Enjoy infinite replayability, leaderboards, customizations, cross-platform support, and perfect controls.

YOW.description: YOW - YE OLDE WORLD is a new gaming experience. 3D representation, physically very correct object destruction and intuitive operation with fun potential in the game. Catapult. Targets. Opponents. Projectile arsenal from simple to painful - This makes playing fun.

The Pegasus Expedition Demo.description: The Pegasus Expedition is a story-driven sci-fi grand strategy game set in a key moment for humankind’s survival. Facing an overwhelming threat at home, humanity sends expeditions to the Pegasus Galaxy in a desperate attempt to find a refuge for the population of Earth.

Movie Theater Simulator Demo.description: This is a movie theater simulator where you can watch fair use documentaries and other video on various subjects. Want to go to the movies without leaving your house? now you can get the movie theater experience from your bedroom with virtual reality simulator

Arcade Flight.description: You're controlling a plane that is going forward in an infinite and randomized space filled with barriers. Use your reflexes to dodge the incoming barriers in high speed. Collect coins along the way to later spend them in the store section.

Saving Sheep.description: Saving Sheep - a simple 2D arcade shooter. The player is a shepherd, saving the lives of sheep and his own, fighting off a large pack of wolves.

Crafting Town Demo.description: Crafting Town Is : A Crafting game with Simulation&Building where you can Craft and Develop your Village, Source Management and Quests.

HyperNova Demo.description: A 2D side-scrolling shooter in which you advance by defeating enemies in a world where everything is made of voxels. Defeat enemies, collect reinforcement items, and take on powerful enemies that appear one after another!

Castle Reborn.description: "Castle Reborn" - old school 2D slasher. In this game you slash your enemies, dodge attacks and use the ancient magic against monsters. Try to survive in a mysterious castle, that is getting more and more dangerous.

TitTok 3.description: TitTok 3 - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws! Continuation of the TitTok 2.

Shake Ground.description: "Shake Ground" is a classic top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker and the main goal is to defeat all enemies and survive in the battle.

Gacha Garden Demo.description: In this relaxing idle / creative sandbox, drop your coins into the pot for a reward! Expand your ever growing item collection and use your imagination to create your own unique garden.

Merge Beasts - Defense Game.description: The evil Beasts are attacking our temple, and we need your help! Merge the Beasts by dragging them on top of each other to build up your defenses. Fight off waves of evil Beasts and take down bosses to unlock new levels.

Galactic Merchant Demo.description: Galactic Merchant is sci-fi business simulator (a.k.a space tycoon game). Starting from single ship startup you can grow it to intergalactic monopoly. To do so, you could trade, mine, produce goods, smuggle, rob, give bribes, engage in politics, save planets and use many other options.

Plane Attack.description: Control an airplane with a third-person view, and your task is to destroy all enemy equipment on the battlefield. Stock up on armor and fuel to last longer on the battlefield. The plane is equipped with an endless supply of missiles and bombs. Minimal interface and understandable for any language.

Hardcore Trivia Playtest.description: Challenge your brains and have a fun time! Hardcore trivia offers questions for many needs. It's time to test your knowledge! 8 themes: All-Stars ice-hockey, Caribbean Flags, The Roman Empire, European Flags, Solar System, Learn C++ Quiz Part1, General knowledge, U.S State Flags Trivia...

Bonk'd Audio Visualizer.description: Lightweight 3D audio visualizer with a minimalist, modern design.

A Weekend in Puzzleburg Demo.description: A Weekend in Puzzleburg is a cozy slice-of-life role-playing game. No need to fight monsters or save the world from impending doom - you've merely booked a relaxing weekend getaway in a town known for its puzzles. Welcome to Puzzleburg!
