停留此刻 Stay in the moment.description: 《停留此刻》是一款单线路的短篇视觉小说，讲述了白小夕与律晓文的师生之间，因为一本诗集所引发的互相改变与和解的故事

Home Solo Car Racer.description: It's a small toy car home racing game with 39 indoor levels. You are alone in the game. it's a single player game. But with the option to save multiple user profiles.

Immortal Tactics: War of the Eternals De.description: Experience a Fast-Paced Roguelite Turn-Based Strategy game with a New Turn-Based System which will need you to plan early on and create strategies that would lead your army to victory. Create an army with different Characters and Leaders to choose from and explore this Roguelite world.

SHPR.description: SHPR is an arcade shooter, arena survival roguelike in which you have to choose items, create builds and synergies that will help you to defeat enemies and bosses to be able to pass to the next levels.

Youmandriver.description: Do you know how to drive a fast car on open roads and a lot of traffic ? With realistic vehicle physics, traffic density and roads ? Realistic roads are designed for legal speed, not to let a gamer be 80% of the time full throttle driving a 500 HP car...

Delilah.description: Eastern Europe is the newest Circle of Hell, but outside its walls things aren't much better. Relentless action, pixelated gore, 256 colors. That is Delilah. And yeah, it is inspired by other shooters starting with a 'D'.

Rogue Soulstone Demo.description: Collect the Rogue Soulstones in this physics-based, fast-paced action roguelike RPG to achieve ultimate power. Learn spells to create powerful synergies, decimate hordes of corrupted souls, face titanic bosses, die, upgrade and try again with a new build.

Pixel Survivors: Roguelike Demo.description: A rogue-lite game where you must face hundreds of monsters with increasingly difficult bosses that strong enough to take you down. Choose your abilities, build your favorite combat style, become stronger and survive as long as you can!

AI UNDER TEST.description: The fear of artificial intelligence is nothing new, but will it always be for the bad? Solve puzzles and follow the creator's and creator's conversation during the testing phase, until the moment they are interrupted by external matters.

CubeShoot:LitteYellow.description: this is a tower defence game, character cant move,but you can choose your weapon,and your evolution way and get special result ， randomn map, random weapon and random enemies; we add some roguelite elements and character can get permanent upgrade.

Midnight Renegade: Recollections.description: A Victorian 2D action platformer where you shoot and slash through grunts until you reach their boss, the Chief Constable.

Gossamer Matrix.description: A retro-inspired FPS about good business practices with an emphasis on equipment interaction.

Roots of Pacha Demo.description: Be a part of a thriving stone age community. Discover “ideas,” domesticate crops, befriend animals, and contribute to the growth of your village. Play with friends in co-op or explore the early days of civilization in single-player.

Future Mirror.description: "Ten years from now, I will be dead..." A coming-of-age fantasy adventure tale, Future Mirror is a visual novel that explores fate and the choices that affect our future, tragedy, relationships, and happiness.

Welcome Back Demo.description: You died! Reincarnate in 5 animals to prove GOD You are worthy of returning to the world in this spiritual adventure. A short, experimental and multi-genre game with 5 gameplay styles, each with its own unique mechanics.

Little Town Shooter VR.description: This game is a VR shooting game. You need to get money by killing opponents and unlock more weapons. Finally find a way to defeat the final boss.

Over City.description: "Over City" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game, jointly developed by independent game producers ying liu and nan yu, and published by heiheigame.

Caddywack.description: In caddywack, you race against the clock to whack a ball into the goal with your car; in this physics-based car puzzle game, you play through 18 different levels, each with its unique set of challenges.

Mount Wingsuit 2 Demo.description: Are you ready to up your wingsuit game to the next level? Mount Wingsuit 2 has everything that made the original great, plus all it needs to be the definitive wingsuit VR app. There is a whole new mountain, new game modes and a vast, open world.

Slayers X Demo.description: So.... got what it takes to be a X Slayer?!?... 7 weapons, blood and gore, twisted music by Seepage & Psyko Syndikate, and maps where you can blow up everything. its awesome. started making it in 1998 in high school with my friend and now im 37, so i have life experience now.

Spirittea Demo.description: Hey human, we've got problems! This town is crawling with troublesome spirits, and you're the only one who can see them. You'd better get that old bathhouse up and running, maybe that'll help them chill out!

Yakiniku Simulation.description: Simple and easy game! Just chill out and simulate eating yakiniku!

Hellscreen Demo.description: Use a rear view mirror to blast your way through a digital Hellscape in this 90s-inspired retro-fps. Shoot behind you, detect invisible enemies & never fall victim to enemy traps.Find new weapons, unlock abilities & warp to maps at any time!Objects In Mirror Are Closer Than They Appear!

Groven Demo.description: Live as an aspiring blacksmith that wants to earn his fortune through his craft in this blacksmith RPG. Accept jobs from the village bulletin, gather materials in underground expeditions with your uncle and earn, earn, earn! Rise to become the greatest (and wealthiest) smith in all the kingdom!

BURST WITCH.description: A bullet hell game with the classic scrolling shooter gameplay

BOOM!.description: Oh no, you have lost your legs! Use your sci-fi gun to rocket jump your way up, but be careful; one wrong move and you might just fall right to where you started.

Super Arkanoid.description: "Super Arkanoid" is a relatively relaxing casual game. The player controls a horizontal board to block the falling ball.

Wuscar Playtest.description: Wuscar is a thrilling FPS Multiplayer experience. Collect weapons, Upgrade your Robotic limbs and become the strongest Wuscar known to man.

Operation Defensive!.description: Operation Defensive is a tower defense game but instead of monsters following a track they follow a player. place down towers to fight those monsters and try to get to the highest wave you can! have fun!

Paper Trail Demo.description: Paper Trail is a top-down puzzle adventure about leaving home, set in a foldable, paper world.

三国英雄坛.description: This is an open-ended text strategy simulation game with no specific route to achieve achievements or impact the ending. The direction of the game is determined by the players themselves, recruit the characters they want to recruit, and collect their favorite props.

Nine Lives or Less.description: Nine Lives or Less is a rogue-like action game about a cat going on an adventure with a special jetpack.

Evolution Tag 2 Demo.description: A unique twist on the MOBA genre. Evolve, survive, build bases, control armies, and fight other players in an intense 10vs5 match between humans and the undead. Or try out a multiplayer PvE game mode where you must survive against 20 waves of enemies.

Putinator.description: The Russian army tried to clone their leader, thus resulting in a never ending mindless horde of Putin zombies... In this retro inspired shooter you take the role of a soldier sent as clean up crew to a town on the outskirts of Chernobyl, with one mission. KILL ALL THE PUTIN ZOMBIES.

Beastly Muscles.description: You are a talented bodybuilder, now you need to become a citizen of a famous bodybuilding capitol. Plan your schedule, watch your stats, take jobs as you like and climb the rankings to become a top bodybuilder.

Keita's Adventures on the African Savann.description: It tells the story of a young African boy, Keita, who follows migratory animals from the Serengeti National Park to the Masai Mara game Reserve to seek medicine for his family. On the way, he encounters dangerous wildlife.

The Last City.description: Find food, build your colony, recruit new workers, feed your population, craft tools and equipment, cook food and research technologies!

CANDY EATERS TOURNAMENT.description: "CANDY EATERS TOURNAMENT" is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

Entity Researchers: Prologue.description: You just got hired by EIRI; researching and battling the Visitors, a dark sci-fi RPG with themes of exploration and survival.

The Shadow Government Simulator Playtest.description: A turn-based strategy game where you lead a secret society towards world domination. Investigate the influential and convert them to your faction via bribery, seduction and intimidation. Reshape society's power structures to fend off rival societies and the world's nations in your quest for power.

Meet me at NooN - Demo.description: Meet me at NooN is a cozy puzzle game with brain-scratching time-loop mechanics. Control two spirits that create time loops each day, learn their different behaviors, how they can interact with each other and how these interactions are interfering with their time loops.

Eyes in the Dark Demo.description: Fight with light against the dark in this "roguelight" platformer starring Victoria Bloom! Drive back the darkness that's overrun Bloom Manor and conquer swarms of creatures as you discover powerful new items to upgrade your arsenal. Are you ready to enter the ever-changing manor?

Hop For The Best.description: A clay styled frog platformer. Hop, climb, dash and sprint your way through 10 clay worlds in "classic platformer mode" or put your skills to the test in "challenge mode" with hard precision platformer gameplay. With no attacks and worlds filled with obstacles, all you can do is... Hop For The Best!

Highwater.description: Earth has flooded, and the planet is doomed, but there’s still time to enjoy the view. Guide Nikos and friends through the flooded world of Highwater and beyond in this turn-based strategy adventure game, where they’ll have to fight for their chance to escape.

Beacon of Neyda.description: In a world where a robot revolution failed, the last humans search for a way to survive and escape. Beacon of Neyda is a side-scroller strategy game where you have to survive waves of enemies while creating and upgrading your base. Build where you want - Defend what you can.

Banana Drama.description: Banana Drama is an indepentend early access RTS game offering a singleplayer and multiplayer experience. Your monkey king is held captive by evil dinos - he needs help! Get free early access and be part of the banana crew. Please consider giving us feedback on Discord :)

Music Store Simulator.description: With Music Store Simulator you can lead a musical instruments manufacturing company. Create, sell, earn and reinvest improving and developing your business. Expand your Brand and climb to success in order to become the world's largest manufacturer of musical instruments!

NoWayBack无路可退.description: No way out is a cartoon style third person shooting game. You need to play the main character of the game, chicken bro, who is forced to move forward because the 'W' of keyboard is pressed by the headset. Defeat the enemy, get speed and overcome different levels with different mechanisms.

6-Mon Adventure.description: Embark on an adventure with 6-mon the little robot. Take control of the robot and travel through a disused factory, avoiding falls, protecting yourself from projectiles and traversing dangerous levels to stop the activities of a crazy AI.

Keep it Cool, Man.description: Keep it Cool, Man fuses the funky style with typing arcade-shooter gameplay. Add to it a mix of a stereotypical American movie like Independence Day as story and there you have it... man.

Alaskan Truck Simulator Demo.description: Be a trucker, not a truck! Step into the boots of Alaskan truck drivers. Get behind the wheels of huge machines and brave one of the harshest and most dangerous environments. Take up the challenge and see if you can survive long enough to fully experience the raw beauty of wild Alaska.

CORGI.description: A fascinating platformer about a space dog - a traveler who ended up on a strange planet, plowing the endless expanses of space.

Panta Rhei Demo.description: Time is of the essence. Literally. Venture into the ever-changing Realm of Time and uncover a mystery that brought time itself to a halt. Fight your way through corrupted creatures in a challenging adventure rogue-lite where time is your best weapon.

Mushi Come Home Playtest.description: Play as a tiny lil' mushroom who's lost in the forest and can't find its way home. Explore unique areas freely at your own pace, chat with friendly inhabitants, and take on different adventures to get back home!

Terminal Madness - Awakening.description: Terminal Madness 2 Awakening is the sequel and continues the story of Crypto, who tries to achieve his dream and become the greatest hacker in the world. Help Crypto to overcome all odds and immerse yourself in this fun, classic styled point and click adventure game.

Something Strange.description: Go about your normal every day life and meet new friends in this short visual novel!

Nightmare Hunter.description: Nightmare Hunter is an arcade game where you have to defeat the coming nightmares.

救赎之渊.description: Dungeon Redemption is an Indie turn-based tactical roguelike where you command adventurers on journeys into the deep of dungeons. Master survival puzzles, and dive into ever-changing maps to guard the holy contracts! The gameplay is challenging enough to satisfy the strategy lovers.

Round Table.description: Round Table is a fun virtual reality action game for everyone! You are a knight of King Arthur's Round Table practicing swordplay. The wizard Merlin has conjured up a training course for you in King Arthur's throne room. Grab a sword and get to it. How many rounds of Merlin's parcour can you do?

Space Menace.description: Space Menace is a real-time sci-fi space exploration and space battle game. You play as a space captain, seeking fortune and glory as you see fit. Leave your mark on the world and determine the fate of the galaxy with your decisions.

The Witch Blade.description: An exciting classic adventure in the world of dark fantasy with honed game mechanics, memorable enemies, and retro aesthetics.

The Witch Blade Demo.description: An exciting classic adventure in the world of dark fantasy with honed game mechanics, memorable enemies, and retro aesthetics.

TactiCats Demo.description: Knock down your enemies and collect all the cats and achievements in this pixel art party game for true cat lovers. Use different power-ups and survive the dangerous traps to show your friends who's the fluffiest of them all!

Time Flies.description: A game about our limited time in this world.

Berserk Reborn.description: Berserk Reborn is a collectible card MMO where you will fight to rule the world of Udhin. Form squads, get legendary cards and defeat your enemies to become a legend of the world of Udhin.

Adamstown Demo.description: Adamstown is a casual, strategy and puzzle, city builder. Create endless towns full of cars and people. Explore new puzzle types and unlock more challenging modes.

LuPR: Lunar Post Recruit Demo.description: A retro first-person shooter party game where 1-4 local players battle with or against AI bots as soldiers in the Planetary Faction war. Choose from 6 different arena-style game modes. Throw grenades, shoot black holes, set explosive traps, snipe and have a party as your faction fights for victory!

Loathful Demo.description: Loathful is a Survival Horror in first person with PS1 graphics. Bring yourself in a retro-style adventure where all your nightmares are brought to life. Survive your demons, dive into your darkest fears to overthrow a mysterious virus who seems to have put his hands on this universe.

Turbo Golf Racing Demo.description: Turbo Golf Racing is an arcade-style sports racing game for up to eight players online. Slam into oversized golf balls and race your friends in an explosive dash to the finish flag.

Hamster on Rails Demo.description: Come aboard this adventure through different worlds with your railroad builder Hamster friend! Help the Hamsters village to collect minerals and crystals, building crazy railways to solve the fun puzzles.

Just Another Runner.description: Take a quick enigmatic run up memory lane. Don't even think about slowing down, 'cause the present surely won't.

Delusions of a Lost Soul Demo.description: Play as Benjamin Farwell, a paranormal detective. Return to Lansinet Castle to solve puzzles, avoid traps, and free your partner's trapped soul.

E-ON.description: Log In to the near future metaverse platform E-ON. Explore and connect with Ellie as you break the bounds of your unverified account and uncover the truth of the world and Ellie.

Dead End City Demo.description: A post-apocalyptic arcade shooter. Collect fuel and dodge enemy fire as you fight back against the evil Scorpio gang. Mixes cars, shmups and themes that would have been right at home in 80's anime and arcades..

Cato Demo.description: Cat + Toast = Cato = Buttered cat paradox = Anti-gravity 🍞🐈🧩

Roppongi Hunters.description: Join our protagonists in resolving the mystery behind the disappearing people and unravel the secrets behind it all in this classic turn based JRPG with a twist.

Brinefall Demo.description: Gather resources to build your own home and village. Explore a vast open-world to find all its secrets and explore its mysteries. Defeat enemies and gather loot in a game that combines sandbox and RPG.

LIMINAL PHASE.description: LIMINAL PHASE is a VR action horror game set in an alternate '90s. Fight disturbing monsters, solve peculiar puzzles, and explore your fractured mind, as it gets harder for you to separate the real world from the games you play.

WHATEVER Demo.description: Inspired by true events. Drifting the giant cargo ship through a tiny, winding canal... What could go wrong?

Rue la résistance.description: Rue | la résistance is the third project of the RVT studio, which tells about the life of a group of partisans operating in the territory of occupied France. The game is based on the principle of a theatrical production: it is based on the play "Ghost Sonata" by August Strindberg

Dust Remains [First Boss, Early Demo].description: Diverse boss rush: from intelligent beings to brutal beasts. Use systemic mechanics and varied tactics to beat each boss. If you fail, you may be captured, maimed, robbed, or set back. But learn from your failure and you will never die. Chip away at the behemoths before you until only dust remains.

Goddess Of Card War 2.description: "Goddess of Card War 2" is a card game with classical Chinese graphics. Each card has different skills and attributes. Players need to collect more cards to grow their team.

ライクドリーマー BETA.description: A pop and cute bullet-hell shooting game from Cosmo Dreamer "Outside". Both beginners and experts can enjoy speedy and active playing.

Water Me!.description: Indie 3D puzzle-platform adventure where you play as a water and change states to solve puzzles, find collectibles, create mini garden cities, learn about flower cultures and save the world one plant at a time!

Arcadia.description: In this highly addictive top-down arcade shoot-em-up from 1982, originally for the ZX Spectrum, defend yourself from wave upon wave of deadly alien combatants using your Ion Thrust Drive and dual Plasma Disruptors.

Crash Forts.description: Crash Forts is an addictive physics and destruction game. You have to destroy various structures with the help of tools.

Road Trip.description: Road Trip - You have to face a small road adventure. Get behind the wheel of your car, but first you have to see it in order.

Mida's Adventure.description: A puzzle adventure game crafted to bring back the feeling of playing old Shareware DOS games!

二分之一.description: 《二分之一》是一款反乌托邦题材的视觉小说+战棋游戏：黑与白、感性与理性、自由与秩序：遵循你的信念，加入你的阵营。

Canterz Paranormies.description: Canterz Paranormies is a 2D Top Down survival horror game based on the story of the most renowned paranormal investigation team of the US called "Canterz Paranormies" who got a request from the owner of the Texas Haunted house to investigate it for the paranormal evidence.

Ghosts of Hollow Creek Demo.description: A fantasy story-rich turn-based RPG with customizable characters and romantic interest.

Pumpkin head.description: This game is a side-scrolling 2D action shooting game created with dot pictures. Control the main character, Pumpkin Head, as he runs through various stages such as the sea and the desert while battling the slime army!

Stellar Space.description: Stellar Space is a new take on a classic arcade game with a modern, rogue-like, form for new players to enjoy!

The Tower of Wowers Demo.description: Battle your way up 60+ floors of hand-drawn enemies in this satirical RPG!

The Way of the Badass.description: Join Scarlet, Princess of Badass, in her crusades against the takeover of aliens, monsters, hybrids, and "Cancel Culture" as she brings toughness back to humanity. Lead desperate allies, from a Nazi to a hobo and other Special Ed students, in liberating humankind from the satire of the Far Left.

Lawnmower game: Mortal Race.description: Lawnmower game saga continues. Try to finish different tracks below the target time

Bug Dolls: Soviet Project.description: This is a horror game about a small town engulfed in dangerous dolls.

Unoffensible Playtest.description: Towering over the battlefield you will physically interact with everything. You will have full freedom to slowly buildup a powerful army or quickly strike the enemy at a weak point. Unlock upgrades and discover new allies. RTS like this is impossible without VR.

New Year's Eve Miracle Demo.description: This is a short cute visual novel about New Year's magic, friendship and miracles.

Robber Sam.description: Robber Sam - You have to take on the role of an ordinary man named Sam, who decided to become a robber.

Station Osirius.description: Osirius Station - The State has lost contact with Osirius Station. You are assigned the task of recovering to the station and reporting what is going on there.

Pirate treasure.description: Pirate Treasure - A logic puzzle game in which you have to hunt pirate treasures!

TOTEMS.description: TOTEMS - A 3D logic puzzle game in which you have to destroy various blocks and magical totems! Your task is to destroy the blocks so that all parts of the totem are on the ground! But be careful, there are other important rules in the game!

Second Thoughts.description: Second Thoughts is a psychological text-based game where each day you are tasked with executing someone based on the limited information provided until one person remains with their full story revealed.

God Edge.description: Travel across Azmra and slay barons using the God Edge; A sword capable of transferring power from the slain to the slayer!

The Legend of Chibi Ninja Demo.description: CHIBI NINJA is a ruthless 2D Puzzle platformer. Play as The Legendary Hero and destroy hordes of mechanical beasts to save your world from a mind controlling extraterrestial parasite using detonable BOMB SHURIKENS. Be very wary though, you can only endure one single hit. Are you up to the task?

Where's Oswald.description: A short horror experience taking place in a dream or a memory.

Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society.description: On the outskirts of town lies a mansion said to house the entrance to a maze overflowing with treasure. Do you wish to discover the magical mysteries hidden inside?

The Sand Knight.description: Kill your foes and power up your mech in this combat-heavy game of destruction and mayhem. Maneuver around the battlefield, avoiding enemy fire while dishing it out in kind.

Catastrophe.description: Catastrophe is survival horror dungeon crawler. Try not to get lost in the labyrinth as you choose to slay the dungeon's inhabitants or sneak past as many as you can.

Planetary Planter.description: Planetary Planter is an open-world farming game where, instead of farming normal plants, you grow celestial bodies while exploring an alien world.

Resuffer Demo.description: Resuffer is an action rogue-lite where you venture through psychedelic cycles, try to survive crushingly difficult, ever-changing chambers, fight hallucinatory bosses, and smooth-talk your inner demons into reshaping your entire experience!

Spellthief Erinn Demo.description: Spellthief Erinn is a 2D Puzzle Platformer where you take control of the enemies magic attacks and use them to your advantage. Solve the misteries, explore the enviroment and reach the chest with a hidden spell. Find, steal and collect them all!

Eden Island.description: Eden Island is a realistic-style survival game. As a survivor, you will explore and survive on a beautiful tropical island, craft weapons against beasts, farm and hunt, build your own home.

Little Astronaut Demo.description: A little astronaut in a huge danger. You are Sky, an engineer of the SBTC Science Bio Technology Corporation. You have one mission: explore what happened at the Mars Bioresearch Facility where all the communication was lost. You are only a little astronaut, but what you will find, is a huge danger.

Unwording.description: Unwording is a narrative puzzle game about happiness, gratitude, and the power of our thoughts. Use a combination of exploration and word puzzle gameplay to reshape reality and guide Tom through the course of three painful but transformative days of his life.

Airport Administrator Simulator.description: In Airport Administrator Simulator you have the chance to know the smallest details of how a big airport works.

Oyster VR.description: Oyster VR is a first-person and virtual reality exploration based learning game about oyster reef restoration at the bottom of the Hudson River in New York and New Jersey.

Ultimate Obstacle Course.description: Welcome to the first taste of an infinite playground of possibilities, where intense, adrenaline-fueled free running meets immersive VR simulation. Run, jump and slide your way through a virtual gauntlet with your body as the controller, and prove yourself to be the ultimate obstacle runner.

Star Hearts: Launch Point.description: Star Hearts: Launch Point is a tight 2D action adventure featuring an 8-bit retro aesthetic in classic NES-fashion. Journey to the galaxy’s edge and discover the origins of Prin - an interstellar revolutionary in the making - as she embarks upon her first space-faring adventure!

Celeritas.description: Celeritas is a fast paced runner shooter and platformer, made for speedrunners.

Ghost Song Demo.description: On the desolate moon of Lorian, a long-dormant Deadsuit awakens from slumber. Journey beneath the surface on an atmospheric 2D adventure of self-discovery, ancient mysteries, and cosmic terror. Explore winding caverns and acquire new abilities to unearth this alien world’s long-buried secrets.

ZOA Protocol Demo.description: A Third Person Sci Fi Action/Survival RPG, ZOA Protocol casts the player in the role of Subject ZOA398 who must battle an overwhelming Alien Invasion in order to return Earth to the control of Humanity, all while managing inventory, character skills & crafting more powerful equipment and armor.

Beanstalk.description: Maybe there is a castle in the sky. Maybe there is a goose that lays golden eggs. And maybe your little broth won't get hurt if he falls down from the humongous beanstalk that's now growing in your garden. But you can't take any chances so you decide to climb.

ExcitingBatting.description: In Exciting Betting, the laws of physics are applied to give you a real-life feel. You can choose from a variety of restraints and learn various hitting techniques, such as hits, bunts, and homeruns. Record the highest cumulative score among users. Challenge the home run world champion.

建安外史 The Tales of Jian An.description: 這是一款三國歷史戰棋遊戲，遊戲以劉備為主視角，用遊戲的模式來描述東漢末期黃巾之亂直到三國時代的一段歷史故事。遊戲玩法是比較傳統的回合製戰棋模式，劇情對東漢末年和三國時代有全新的詮釋和解讀，能讓您在賞玩之余，了解更多的歷史文化內容。

Lost Boy : Lost Island.description: Boy lost in island and need to look for anyone alive and his mother and need to survive.

Shell Soldier.description: Shell Soldier is an intense first person game that takes place in a dystopian future. Featuring frenetic firefights with a diverse set of enemy combatants ranging from tactics to weaponry, and also a large variety of deadly weapons at your disposal.

出发吧冒险家.description: This is a simple and fun roguelike game, which can adventure with small partners. Hundreds of treasures are superimposed infinitely to combine infinite linkage effects! You can also DIY your own level and watch other players break through; There is also a lively Colosseum. Join us quickly!

Space Bees.description: RougeLite + Aircraft Shooter, a thrill-based game, kill the incoming enemies, upgrade your fighters and continue to face the tidal wave of enemies.

Impossible Challenge.description: Impossible Challenge is a very very hard reflex platformer game. Try to complate levels and enjoy your suffer! Attention : If you think you are a pro gamer, this game will break your heart.

VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industr.description: Train your professional skills in VR Health & Safety Trainings For Industry safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

The Neroe Demo.description: Action-adventure roguelike game in which you can catch and control creatures. Explore the open world, find the secrets, get items and complete the dungeons. Play solo or local multiplayer: each player makes his own adventure!

Running Over Zombies.description: Use 13 different cars to run over the endless horde of zombies in a fully physics-based environment! Get more gas by killing zombies to keep your car running, then collect gold and use it to upgrade your cars to make them better so you can kill more zombies!

驰骋三国.description: 最炫回合三国，挂机福利多

Veins Demo.description: Renovate homes with your friends in this radical fast paced organ-based physics defying multiplayer refurbishing experience!

Island of Aito.description: Island of Aito is an interactive survival / item management / dating simulator game with visual novel elements.

Netspectre Playtest.description: Netspectre is a hacker roguelike set in a ruthless, cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate networks, improve your machine, navigate the challenges of daily life as a netspectre in a futuristic megacity, and perhaps even become one of its many legends!

ウェアヒューマン.description: Game theme: JRPGs that talk about violence and mythology Read the story from the point of view of a character from a 'discriminated race' to think deeply about discrimination. In the combat part, the tense BP battle system offers the thrill of 'hunt or be hunted'.

Road Defense: Outsiders.description: Protect the cars on the road! Equip your towers and improve your skills to defend the lawless roads. The hordes of criminals trying to kill you and destroy the cars get bigger and bigger as the level progresses.

Feisty Fauna Demo.description: Feisty Fauna is a casual roguelite where you're a cute animal trying to survive. Whether it's by laying traps, being a ninja, or charming minions, you will hunt other cute animals in this eat-or-be-eaten animal world.

Out of Bounds Demo.description: Out of Bounds is a puzzle shooter where you need to "create" a game while "fixing" bugs!

Blade Bros ACTION!.description: "Blade Bros Action!, presents you a new game genre "Hack n' Plataformer", is a fast paced gameplay where is a mix from hack n' slash and plataforms games, joins the retro pixel graphics, a cool soundtrack, stylish bosses, dynamic battles, swords, skills, magic elements and so forth".

ThanksTaking.description: Play as a bloodthirsty turkey seeking vengeance on everyone in the household! You must try to escape the house before you are caught and cooked. Use a large variety of brutal attacks to take down your enemies and show them who's boss!

Battle Charge.description: Medieval 3rd person action RPG. Lead your troops and loyal companions into short but intense skirmish battles. Charge into the enemy lines. Use the best strategy to defeat the opposing army and defend your ground. Think tactics, epic clashes, shield walls, executions, traps & more. Survive & levelUp

Burn Depth.description: Burn Depth is an tense, underwater, exploration-focused horror game. Pick your target, manage your vessel's resources, survive the dive, and uncover the mysteries on the ocean floor. Can you handle the pressure?

Before The Kingdom Falls.description: Will you be able to hold out long enough to prevent the kingdom from falling?

Walk Hero Demo.description: Go forward. Kill enemies. Collect loot. Get stronger. And again. An unusual mix of genres will allow you to focus solely on the choice of equipment and upgrades.

xiaotongSteamTest Playtest.description: Wandering in Space is a virtual reality first-person shooter featuring role-playing and roguelike elements. Players control a survivor in a wrecked spaceship, create powerful builds with various weapons and special abilities, and defy death to fight mutants and armed survivors.

SHOOTER LEAGUE - ROBOT GOAL.description: Robot Goal is a multiplayer first-person shooter with a soccer twist!, score goals with your gun to win! Choose one of many champions with each their own abilities! Use your gun or abilities to attack players! Do very accurate passing! Use your gun for defense and more!

WASTE Demo.description: WASTE is a pseudo 3D RPG where you take on the role of a Dustbin/Garbage man, collecting WASTE from the houses of the street you are working on, avoiding obstacles like cars, bikes, dogs.. If your customer is happy, they will invite you inside to play on their new computer or ask other favours.

The Lost Mines.description: The Lost Mines is a remake of the first game I made for MSX computers. In this puzzle game, you must collect all the resources to advance to the next level, avoiding the guardian and fighting against the clock. Old style difficulty with remastered graphics and sound.

Ever Seen A Cat? 2.description: A relaxing hidden object game. Find even more cats in several stylish environments! Every play through is different!

Lit Up.description: LIT UP to end the darkness. Place the items and watch the magic happen in an intriguing puzzle.

Koko, the Last Leaf Demo.description: Delve into a mysterious world of Gods and magic as the last of the leaf kind. Fight epic battles for revenge against evil forces. Explore fantastical lands inhabited with magical creatures and peculiar allies. Search for the realm of the Gods and stop them from making a grave mistake.

Molecule Make lab.description: Molecule Maker Lab is a puzzle game about chemicals with futuristic and minimalist themes. Rotate and arrange the atoms in the correct position until you form a beautiful molecule.

The Lost Mines Demo.description: The Lost Mines is a remake of the first game I made for MSX computers. In this puzzle game, you must collect all the resources to advance to the next level, avoiding the guardian and fighting against the clock. Old style difficulty with remastered graphics and sound.

Commando Mountain Rescue.description: Beat The Mountain - Save The Day!

Lamoneo.description: Lamoneo challenges your perception and logic. Every door reveals a dreamlike world in which fragments of different cultures and different times mix creating views of dream like beauty. This is non combat 3rd person adventure game.

Late photographer 4.description: A simple and easy beauty dynamic jigsaw puzzle and relaxing music can make you have a good mood The right mouse button can quickly complete the puzzle

Esport Tactics.description: Esport team manager combined with turn-based strategy, Esport tactics takes the best of both genres. Control every move your player makes, choose your tactics wisely, manage your team with expertise, and compete for the league championship!

Survival Island.description: Survive through somewhat harsh environment! collect & craft item, manage resources. be aware that you have limited space and time.

Dub Club.description: A third person multiplayer virtual music venue featuring an in-game live music stream.

Link The Cubes.description: Link The Cubes is a relaxing puzzle game with cute little cubes. Solve the puzzle levels by connecting the cubes and moving them to the goal.

Alcyone.description: Alcyone is a Science Fiction 3D First Person Shooter (FPS) Video Game set in an Open World mid-crisis New York City (NYC) that can be freely explored by the players.

Project: Maidenless.description: Scavenge for loot in an unforgiving world filled with other players and monstrosities that mean you harm! Craft great Weapons, Armors and Utilities using the resources gathered in Raid to grow stronger. Enter the Great Arena and fight other players in structured 1v1, 3v3 and 5v5 PvP!

Orbit VR.description: Blast your way through the universe in epic battles full of insane destruction.

Hunteroids.description: Our cities are being attacked by meteorites & you are the only one able to protect us! However, your weapon can only destroy one type of meteorite... Create bubbles in the sky & transform all meteorites until they have the right shape, colour & rotation before exploding!

Siege of Dungeon.description: “Siege of Dungeon” is a strategic rogue-lite game, where players challenge strong, cunning monsters within a limited time by combining relics and skills to build up your team. What’s waiting for you deep down in the dungeon? Could it be a rare and precious treasure, or the beginning of despair...?

GHOSTWARE: Arena of the Dead Demo.description: GHOSTWARE is a retro-fps combining the lore-heavy plot and exploration of adventure games with the fast action of '90s shooters. You and other ghosts have been trapped inside an Arena FPS created by a Wizard's unwillingness to overcome his nostalgia. Escape the past, shoot your way out.

Portobugia.description: Portobugia a is survival game where you manage a port and you must supply a city with goods and food.  You must unload boats, but, be careful, some of them could be infected!

Band Camp Boyfriend Demo.description: Will you lead your marching band to victory as drum major? Explore band camp and attend rehearsal alongside an unforgettable cast of characters, where every choice matters. Find love or face tragedy in 7 routes with 35+ different endings in this colorful, musically-rich otome visual novel.

Taste Of Heaven Demo.description: Become a cook in the realm of spirits. TASTE OF HEAVEN is a cooking RPG and a nice pinch of roguelite. In this HD 2D handcrafted game, you will have to manage your customers’ mood and appetite in real time. Discover unique recipes and items in the world where worlds are made.

Saga Of Elster Land.description: Saga of Elsterland: The Destruction Book is a 2D turn based dungeon crawler's RPG. Enter the world of Elsterland and you are going to have an epic adventure with colorful cast of characters. Manage your team, take the challenge then enter the dungeon.

The Orb of Darkness.description: The Orb of Darkness summons you! Join our little Goth friend as he explores the many different worlds of the dark universe as he tries to find his way back home!

Put Your Brain On.description: Put yor Brain On it`s a game about thinking...in which you are a farmer and you have to plant the harvest before the sun go down. Hurry up !

New Year's Eve Miracle.description: This is a short cute visual novel about New Year's magic, friendship and miracles.

Uligo: A Slime's Hike.description: Join Uligo the slime in this sticky journey to find the way back home. Jump, dash, get launched, stick to any surface to triumph over any obstacles in your way. Will you overcome the dangers ahead?

Spirit Eyes.description: Spirit Eyes is a horror game in which, as an experienced exorcist, you take a contract to an abandoned house in Wyoming. Player must discover the type of ghost and try to get rid of it. As you try to communicate with the spirit, you will have to make choices that will affect the course of the game.

Mawthorne.description: Explore the ancient underground of this strange, alien world in this metroidvania platformer! Navigate your way through 9 different areas of the underground and encounter powerful bosses that make you stronger, open paths, or alter other areas of the world!

Miner of Minerals.description: In the exciting game "Miner of minerals" you play as a miner and your task is to dig up as many gems as possible to earn a lot of money. Upgrade your equipment and try to set a record for mining minerals every time!

Supernova Tactics Demo.description: Customize your army with different traits and items. Unlock permanent upgrades to go deeper in this survival Auto-Battler/Roguelite hybrid!

Whispered Secrets: Tying the Knot Collec.description: A typical carriage ride quickly takes a shocking turn when you encounter a cloaked criminal attacking a bride at the Osmont estate! Can you stop the horrors of the past from setting fire to the present before it’s too late?

FunBall 3D.description: FunBall 3D is a casual game, that involves platforming and collecting score, and if you are not doing that you are racing against the clock, Funball will travel around different maps and challenges.

tiltfire.description: Ignite your rocketship engines and zoom your way through the caves of tiltfire. Fly around tight corners and blast AI drones in this fast paced top-down shooter.

scuffed Playtest.description: Scuffed is a single-player 2D movement shooter where the goal is to prove to your enemies just how much greater your capacity for violence is.

Samsara Playtest.description: Saṃsāra is a souls-like that challenges players to meditate on overcoming loss, failure and death through a core mechanic of reincarnation as 9 different avatars. A 3D, third-person, action role-playing game (RPG) in the vein of the ‘Soulsborne’ genre and Shadow of the Colossus.

Stadtleben.description: Stadtleben is a strategic city building game in which you place gardens, streets and buildings on squares to create a big city. Here you should build as many or high skyscrapers as possible in order to be able to plant more tiles.

Band Camp Boyfriend.description: Will you lead your marching band to victory as drum major? Explore band camp and attend rehearsal alongside an unforgettable cast of characters, where every choice matters. Find love or face tragedy in 7 routes with 35+ different endings in this colorful, musically-rich otome visual novel.

The Outlaw and Newcomer.description: A suspense ADV of mobsters in Eastern Europe. Walk around the nostalgic city and talk with fascinating characters as you uncover the identity of a terrifying poison. The game system combines elements of exploration, collecting, and visual novels.

Lone Bastion.description: A top-down space shooter where you switch between the wings of the space station you are trapped in to fend off endless waves of enemies.

刀剑演武.description: 新版本来袭，全新的玩法，更多的福利，数不尽的元宝免费赠送，激情重燃！冒险不掉队！

风墓战记.description: war chess game paying tribute to fire pattern

Olgob The Bold.description: Traverse the Mutating castle to hunt down the Bear Lords and free the orcs. A Metroidvania Soulslike RPG where the world evolves as you progress through the story. As the world evolves so can you.

Deck Adventurers II.description: Save the Valley from the hordes of monsters that ravage it in this turn-based tactical combat and deck-building RPG game.

Stonegeon.description: Stonegeon is a 2D action game with adventures in the dungeon. By fighting monsters, collecting resources, making items, searching treasure chests in the dungeon, and finally to the deepest part of the dungeon, unlock the long sealed secret.

Letux Game.description: Letux Game is a 2D Top-Down action rogue-like with powerful bosses and awesome upgrades.

The Night of Death.description: Let's escape from the shrine to find the five beads sealed in the red box to avoid various goblins.

Eiyuden Chronicle Rising Playtest.description: Eiyuden Chronicle: Rising is an action RPG set in the same world as Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes. Features town-upgrading mechanics, fast-paced combat. A prequel to the world of the Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes.

Android Simulator Demo.description: Android Simulator is a futuristic FPS game in which you take the role of an android who is in charge of a spaceship colony. Keep a firm hand on the flight route and manage the right water balance for plants, oxygen level, and spacecraft parameters to securely deliver the colonizers.

Panique à Temple A-Steak.description: Two secret agents must learn to work together on the most dangerous mission of their careers: recovering a magical Aztec artifact hidden in a theme park owned by a multi-billionaire who has the world in a tizzy because of his terrifying reputation.

Chesslands.description: Chesslands is a turn based tactics game where you train chess pieces with 4 unique abilities each and deploy them into battleground to win your opponent.

Push Comes to Shovel.description: Push Comes to Shovel is a snowy sim-adventure set in the frigid town of Windrow. Become the Blizzard Wizard you've inspired to be and clean up the town. Upgrade and utilize a variety of plows, snowblowers, shovels and tools to complete chill jobs.

Conditus.description: Show your friends who's the strongest ninja, and make them suffer. Or team up with them to eliminate your enemies.

BeachRun.description: - Difficulty is an integral part of the game - Pixel art drawing style - Music will not make you bored

Magic War.description: Game Features: - Beautiful Pixel Art - Dynamic Music - 30 levels - Hardcore

The Accursed Crown of the Giant King.description: Epic, classic-style fantasy role-playing game. Single player, party based, featuring real-tie with pause gameplay. Combines open-ended exploration with an overall quest.Deep, complex role-playing system, with many skills, powers, spells, and items.

Aegis Descent Demo.description: In this fast-paced roguelite vehicle shooter, WW2 is ending, and a secret testing facility is overrun by an unknown alien force. The best pilots of the war are asked to take an experimental hover tank on a perilous mission - To descend into the caverns below the facility and face this new threat.

EvoMon.description: Evomon is a modern take on the tamagotchi games. Take care of your evomon since its infancy and discover its new evolutions, have fun playing the mini-games, adventure in mysterious expeditions, battle intensely against different monsters to reach the title of Evomon Champion.

The Rhythm of the Knight.description: ROTK is a VR rhythm game based on your reflex and lightsaber skill. Deflect shots, slash projectiles, slash enemies, dodge obstacles, use your powers to break others. All this to the beat of a dark techno song in hand-crafted levels designed to match the music.

STAR MATH: Interstellar Rogue 2 Demo.description: Star Math is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game where you use your maths to defeat the enemy! Humanity is fighting a robotic threat from space of its own making! You will fight through a huge 100 area procedural saga map to defeat 9 boss ships, before you can fight the mainframe in the final battle!

TDS - War Games.description: TDS - War Games is a fast paced, local 2-4 player split-screen shooter where you and your friends competitively combat each other over the objective set. Customize your player loadout, choose an arena, setup a game-mode and start battling. Only the merciless will claim victory.

Herodes Demo.description: It's 2197, and humanity faces a mysterious disease that cannot be cured by any treatment already known. There's only one option left: brute force. You must enter the body of Pacient Zero, find the source of the disease and destroy it before it is too late.

Microbrewery Tycoon Demo.description: Economic strategy about microbrewery management. Your craft beer should become famous all over the world!

RED FLOWERS.description: A lightning-fast action platformer in which the enemy always outnumbers you, and the cost of a mistake is death.

World of Buh.description: Take control of the destiny of a Buh as he makes his way through an adventurous retro wave world populated by many other Buhs. Some may help you to find what's this all about... but most of them will try to get in the way and do what only the one and only choosen of the Buhs can do.

轻语谱.description: Whisper Books is a visual novel game of plot quality signature, embellished with illustrations, dubbing and interactive options. Whisper Books resembles a mini library of stories. Players can vote for new story auditions and winners will be developed into expansion packs.

Anglerfish Demo.description: The game only saves when you die. Every time you die, something changes. Every change is based on where and how you died. Go on an epic adventure only equipped with your trusted shotgun, your wit and your strong stomach for disturbing exploration. Can you survive a night at the bar, Anglerfish?

Forlorn.description: Forage, craft, build, hunt, explore. Tackle the wilderness and anything lurking in the shadows in this single-player survival horror adventure.

Gacha Garden.description: In this relaxing idle / creative sandbox, drop your coins into the pot for a reward! Expand your ever growing item collection and use your imagination to create your own unique garden.

Brave Survivor.description: Brave survivor - In this heart-pounding beat em up, you take on the role of a brave survivor whose fist punches a path to freedom through hordes of enemies. Beat bad guys mercilessly, collect bonuses and destroy bosses in this incredible game!

Long Journey.description: Long journey - Many people know that a large amount of sweets is bad for teeth .. But not for this skeleton! Embark on a long adventure with this skinny sweet tooth and collect all the donuts!

CARDMON.description: CARDMON is a new adventure inspired in old monster-catching games. Jump in and explore the TOJO region while trying to catch all the Cardmon. Defeat every carder and become the Regional Cardmaster in this aestethic world!

Fearless Rider.description: Fearless Rider is an exciting driving game where the player must avoid hitting or getting crushed by obstacles.

Murdo's Quest.description: Rescue your family and defeat Count Othar in this old-school platformer. Inspired by the "Addams Family" game for the NES. This game presents a unique and challenging platforming experience.

Capture Note.description: Super fast notes on screenshots. Just take screenshot and add note and save it.

Enter the Chronosphere.description: A tactical bullet hell roguelike where each turn is a slice of real-time action.

Legacy of Sin blood oath.description: Legacy Of Sin Blood Oath is a real-time strategy, RPG, survival and route defense game. CONTROL the battlefield, DEFEND routes from different enemies! Take COMMAND of an army of soldiers! Win and gain experience to unlock new upgrades and unique abilities for the battlefield. Conquer, WIN!

RoastTogether.description: A casual game that relies on your drag-and-drop hand speed and simple strategic decisions.

Tomb Explorer VR.description: Tomb Explorer VR is an adventure game where you navigate/explore ancient ruins and tombs in search of historical treasures, relics and artifacts.

Decisive Strike.description: A sci-fi team-based Third Person Shooter where strategy is as important as your reflexes.

Light Bringer.description: Light Bringer is a 2D side scrolling fantasy strategy game with development elements. Explore, gather, build and then when night falls, survive! All in the style of beautiful hand-painted graphics. Will you bring the light?

东方妖精武踏会.description: You will role-play as playful fairies with unique personalities, and accomplish your own Gekokujō in Gensokyo where the strong gather! Make your own favorite fairy character the strongest with your own hands!

东方华心传.description: A classic pixel side-scrolling action game with Rogue-lite. Play as Hata no Kokoro on a journey of self-discovery and use combinations of different emotions to fight battles as beautiful as a dance!

Temple of Boonil.description: Temple of Boonil is an abstract first person puzzle game with a unique striking retro visual style. Use lights and colors to clear obstacles and explore an ancient temple along with its forgotten history.

Tomboy Adventure.description: Start a relaxing adventure together with your childhood friend!

LEGO® Bricktales Demo.description: In this puzzle-adventure, use an intuitive brick-by-brick building mechanic to solve puzzles and bring your creations to life! Experience a charming story as you explore beautiful LEGO® dioramas and help the people inhabiting them.

A.I.D. - Artificial Intelligence Defence.description: Lead the operations of an artificial intelligence program with only one aim – to clear the Earth from the remains of humanity. Conquer the world campaigning on a single-player dynamic battleground or play with your friends during a real time strategic gameplay.

Class Five Menorial GAME Demo.description: This is class 5 memorial game. It is a simulation game that can be moved through WASD and has classroom scenes inside

Connected Hearts: Fortune Play Collector.description: Love can wound and heal. It is a feeling inherent in everyone. But can you get love by force or deception? Find out in this new game!

Walk Hero.description: Go forward. Kill enemies. Collect loot. Get stronger. And again. An unusual mix of genres will allow you to focus solely on the choice of equipment and upgrades.

December 24th Demo With Free Multiplayer.description: From the creators of Gazmatera: Return of the Generals! December 24th is a fast-paced classic FPS, inspired by the Quake 2 and Team Fortress. Collect crates to earn bonuses, destroy your enemies with 9 types of weapons and play with your friends with support up to 18 players on one map!

Elena's Journal - Unfinished Expedition.description: Help Elena discover the City of the Amazons in a Time Management adventure!

FERRUM inc.description: Become an operator who controls a robot of FERRUM inc. Participate in 5-by-5 battles where you can choose your fighting machine and use a unique camera control system. Time to spill the oil!

Ikusaotome.description: Freely adapted from the Nordic mythology our戦乙女: search for spirits, do competitions or fly races. It is designed for fun, but you can adjust the challenge mode also it needs some practice for the advanced options.

The Struggle of Combat.description: The Struggle of Combat is randomly generated side-scrolling shooter. After mysterious enemy launches attack on the prison, all of the worst criminals have escaped! Join the action to capture those criminals and find out who was behind this attack!

Desert Revenant.description: Desert Revenant is a strategic Roguelike Deck Building RPG packing a huge variety of cards to do battle with. Think about your every move and make careful decisions in hand-crafted encounters as you cut deals with Jinn and humans alike in your adventures amongst the dunes of Elmyr.

Sunday Gold.description: Sunday Gold is a point-and-click, turn-based adventure game set in grim, dystopian future. Play as a ragtag trio of criminals to hunt down and expose the dark secrets of an evil mega-corporation and the malevolent billionaire behind it.

Nuwe: First seeds Demo.description: Adventure game with a spectacular design and innovative 2D, 3D platform mechanics. Located in a beautiful universe full of incredible creatures and landscapes.

Joyride.description: Joyride is a low-poly style racing game, You will drive your vehicle through roads with different scenery in different seasons, In this game, You can race with yourself, And even operate a drone to watch your driving process, Good luck

Last Day Zombie Survival VR Demo.description: A stranger, who awakens in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discovers they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious unknown person.

Closer Than You Know.description: A cozy, updated spin on the familiar point-and-click adventure games. Sam is on a big quest to save her home planet--where Hope has been outlawed. Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery in this charming adventure.

Paranormal Preparatory School.description: This school for supernaturals isn't hell, but it is a hellmouth! Can you make peace between the vampires and werewolves, and close the portal to hell?

Paranormal Preparatory School Demo.description: This school for supernaturals isn't hell, but it is a hellmouth! Can you make peace between the vampires and werewolves, and close the portal to hell?

Beast Whalers Demo.description: Beast Whalers is a naval tactical roguelike about assembling and controlling your own fleet to battle bizarre sea monsters. Trade and upgrade unique ships, use their special abilities, and maneuver carefully between enemies on tight, procedurally generated levels.

Mollycoddle Mayhem Demo.description: Mollycoddle Mayhem is a couch co-op game for up to four players where you work together to spoil and pamper babies that have been anonymously abandoned. Cook, clean, change diapers, and perform various other tasks before the little ones get too upset.

Post Solis.description: Post Solis is a real-time sci-fi strategy game. Your only ally is a tiny ray of the sunlight. It moves across the planet, and you can only build in its area. Anything plunged into darkness is destroyed. The game is built around the key mechanics of following the slipping ray of light.

Formula TOP.description: Fun top-down 3D formula racing game with tense side-by-side battles against competitive AI or other people in online multiplayer. The perfect blend of tight arcade controls and immersive world of formula.

SquareMan-Boy Demo.description: A neon style puzzle platformer where you constantly bounce around from block to block. Avoid lasers by using your dash, world rotators and teleporters to your advantage.

Delta Manifold.description: Explore a strange interconnected world, find weapons to shoot those that stand in your way, and discover hidden upgrades and abilities to discover even greater secrets in an action adventure first person metroidvania.

Fix Me Up - Hospital Edition.description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a Doctor?

Art Mahjong 4.description: Excellent entertainment awaits you in this latest version of the popular "Art Mahjong" series. The game offers many challenging levels and mahjongg boards that, once unlocked, reveal beautiful backgrounds.

Paracreat Demo.description: A parallel universe with monsters you can tame!

IRON GUARD Demo.description: A sci-fi Tower Defense game. Strategize to destroy waves of rogue robots and assist the powerful turrets with player controlled drone. Build and collect resources and help evacuate your crew from the alien planet.

Nazralath: The Fallen World.description: Nazralath: The Fallen World is a story-driven, dark fantasy game inspired by the works of Zdzisław Beksiński; focusing on a compelling narrative and exploration through a rich, strong sense of atmosphere.

Swinging-Man Demo.description: Swing yourself across the city, attack enemies with your momentum. A mini swinging rogue-like action game.

Yupitergrad 2: The Lost Station.description: The legend is back - bigger and better. In Yupitergrad 2 the players have extended mobility, selection of tools, and much richer game world, with an open-ended structure.

Path of the Midnight Sun.description: A charming Visual Novel / Tactical RPG fully animated in Live2D! Collect, craft & cook in the world of Arvium, and fight your way through hordes of enemies. Time is limited, and every choice is meaningful. Focus on the narrative & romance in Story Mode, or challenge yourself in Hardcore Mode.

Cheaphaven Demo.description: Cheaphaven features a brief respite full of farming, building and upgrading, a small town of NPCs for all your chatting and shopping needs, and vaguely humorous descriptions for everyday items. Day/night cycle, market values, a pigeon, all the things that are supposed to be in a farming game

Deep.description: Deep is about the protagonist's deep inner world, solving the mystery and leaving here.

Formula Bwoah.description: Formula Bwoah is a strategic arcade top down motorsport racing game where you not only drive the car, but also plan and react to dynamic racing events like changing weather, track conditions, tire degradation, etc.

Tirsy's Tale.description: As the Age of Dragons comes near an end, join young Tirsy on a great journey to the Land Beyond. Traverse vast locations full of challenges from hostile creatures to nature itself. Meet companions along the way to assist you in reaching the valley of the Drahkin, who harness the power of the dragon.

BlockStar VR Demo.description: BlockStar VR is a VR shooter where you put your reflexes to the test by shooting blocks and completing challenges in an action-packed futuristic tournament. Play the 40-mission story mode and show that you have what it takes to flex on the leaderboard!

Catch the Yeti!.description: Catch the Yeti! is a puzzle game set in a snowy forest where you try to catch, the yeti! Your goal is to corner the yeti by shaking snow off the trees.

Super Asqr.description: Super Asqr is a collection of different game types and modes, both single and multiplayer, offered under one package with simple but elegant visual/audio feature set. Being a live game and guided by community, all these game modes are shaped by player feedback!

Crafting Town.description: Crafting Town Is : A Crafting game with Simulation&Building where you can Craft and Develop your Village, Source Management and Quests.

Lander Odyssey.description: With limited fuel and several dangers lurking, use your skills to rescue astronauts trapped in various unique places on the strange planet. It won't be an easy rescue.

DesktopMMD4:Born to Dance.description: The fourth generation of DesktopMMD born to dance,Brand new Theater-Mode, Fully supports using of MMD's VMD format dance motion file and PMX/PMD models directly , It's never been easier for MMD models to dance on your desktop. Support MMD's physics engine, Support STEAM workshop.

Secret of the Vikings - Mystery island.description: After a severe storm a group of Vikings and the brave Finnja strand on a strange island and face unknown challenges and dangers.

Paracreat.description: A parallel universe with monsters you can tame!

Legend of Rome - The Wrath of Mars.description: Experience a challenging match 3 game and help the Roman people appease Mars, the god of war! Build and restore the proud city to its original splendor.

Android Simulator Playtest.description: Android Simulator is a futuristic FPS game in which you take the role of an android who is in charge of a spaceship colony. Keep a firm hand on the flight route and manage the right water balance for plants, oxygen level, and spacecraft parameters to securely deliver the colonizers.

Alkali.description: Explore the world as an Alkali metal in this innovative precision platformer! Explosively react with water and other elements to traverse obstacles, while picking up chunks of metal before you deplete your alkali metal body.

Meteor Blasters.description: Meteor Blasters is a non-stop action space shooter. Inspired by Asteroids, this game will see you choose between 6 different ships each with their own characteristics and utilize a variety of weapon powerups to eradicate the space rocks. Play 4 players Co-op or Versus Mode with friends.

Accursed.description: Accursed is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a mysterious ever-changing house in a slow-paced, atmospheric world and survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

Germinal.description: Jump, hover and clean your way through this precision platformer combining permissive jetpack mechanics with a compassionate narrative about getting lost in your own fear.

Moi Mei: Hidden Objects.description: A game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you, in the role of a young priestess Mei, will have a journey into magical space. Search for talismans and ingredients for rituals, enlist the help of cunning and greedy Voodoo spirits to save your beloved!

Koko, the Last Leaf.description: Delve into a mysterious world of Gods and magic as the last of the leaf kind. Fight epic battles for revenge against evil forces. Explore fantastical lands inhabited with magical creatures and peculiar allies. Search for the realm of the Gods and stop them from making a grave mistake.

Life on the Edge.description: Life on the Edge is an educational tower defense game. You play as a cell struggling to survive waves of bacteria and the COVID-19 virus. Protect your cell and build an understanding of cell biology at the same time!

Germinal Demo.description: Jump, hover and clean your way through this precision platformer combining permissive jetpack mechanics with a compassionate narrative about getting lost in your own fear.

TheFlame.description: The Flames is a top down shooter where you fight a powerful boss called Hodaya and help save the Wisp the leader of the planet.

Escape If You Can.description: Quick and easy, little game. You have to escape in a given time and for this you have to find and switch switches and get over for example poisonous liquid and drops. Impediments can decrease your health and kill you. Mixture of a maze game and the first level is a little bit of platformer game.

Corridor Sigma.description: 90's-style first-person shooter set in a large alien base filled with angry monsters.

AvatarShop.description: AvatarShop is the application that automatically generates kawaii girl avatars at the click of a button and allows you to make simple arrangement of the avatars! The avatar you create can be exported in VRM format. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse.

Project Gunship.description: Rain hell on the enemy from 12,000 feet in an AC-130 Gunship. Project Gunship provides an authentic and historical simulation of combat in all gunship variants from Vietnam to present day.

Isle of Arrows Demo.description: Build an impenetrable fortress, tile by tile. Place buildings, build roads, and expand your isle to defend against waves of invaders in this roguelike fusion of tower defense and board game.

Plow the Snow!.description: Fight the cold, plow the snow and rescue Snow Angeles in this arcade 1-4 player co-op experience! Clear the streets, parks, cemeteries, lunaparks and other parts of the city from the effects of The Great Blizzard and become a city hero!

Heroes of Rome 2 - The Revenge of Discor.description: Caesar and Cleopatra were kidnapped by the Roman goddess Discordia! Don't waste time and go on a journey full of adventure, myths and legends.

Turbo Golf Racing Playtest.description: Turbo Golf Racing is an arcade-style sports racing game for up to eight players online. Slam into oversized golf balls and race your friends in an explosive dash to the finish flag.

Sker Ritual Demo.description: The round-based co-op survival FPS and spiritual successor to the award-winning British horror, Maid of Sker. Play solo or up to 4 players to survive the supernatural onslaught of the Quiet Ones.

Northland Heroes - The missing druid.description: The druid Farandi was kidnapped by dangerous trolls and his tracks are lost in the depths of the forest ...

Koa and the Five Pirates of Mara - Demo.description: Join Koa and her best friend Napopo on an action-packed adventure through the islands of Mara! Outwit traps, manoeuvre dangerous environments, and explore a series of dazzlingly different landscapes on their quest to recover stolen pirate loot.

Tales of Inca 2 - New Adventures.description: Join the Incas on their exciting journey, fight against demons and mystical monsters and experience exciting adventures!

Rummy 3D Premium Beta.description: Realistic 3D Rummy simulation with Singleplayer, Multiplayer and Tutorial. With configurable AI strength and many adjustable rule and game variants you can start exciting Rummy tournaments - or just play for fun!

拾光物语.description: 2D top down view open world sandbox survival farming game. Survive, adventure, hunt, gather resources, craft, build, farm, fish, trade, become an adventurer, complete various tasks and explore this fantasy world.

武儒绘卷 - 天地奇缘.description: "Wuru Painting Scroll - Romance of Heaven and Earth" is a development game with a mythological background. Players can formulate their own development routes in the game, or defend their homeland and the country, fight in all directions, or seek wisdom and courage.

Eshe's Wish Adventure.description: Help a Eshe the cat find coins to her get her greatest wish! Eshe's Wish Adventure is a casual side scroller game developed for charity. Eshe can jump on enemies, explore the world of wishes, travel through portals, and eventually earn her greatest wish!

Ballads at Midnight.description: When a sarcastic bard is arrested and exiled to an abandoned castle, she expected to be at the mercy of a hungry, blood-thirsty vampire. She soon discovers that the vampire, Lucius, is not starving: he is gravely bored. She may just survive on borrowed time, one ballad each midnight.

Solitaire Beautiful Garden Season.description: Garden season, whenever you want! "Solitaire Beautiful Garden Season offers hours of challenging gameplay.

DopeMine Arena Demo.description: DopeMine Arena is a Bullet-Heaven Roguelite. Simple controls and auto-firing weapons put the focus on levelling up and making good choices to survive the onslaught of enemies. Earn coins to increase the stats of your characters. Discover the weapons and items that pair together .

The Secret Life of Dorian Pink (Prologue.description: Prologue chapter of Dorian Pink, a choices-matter narrative RPG set in an alternate universe of the Picture of Dorian Gray by Oscar Wilde. Save your boyfriend Basil from the Devil by making questionable choices, gaining allies, and making doughnuts explode.

No Return.description: No Return is a first-person psychological horror game set in modern-day China. With a focus on family tragedy, the story unfolds as our protagonist is mysteriously prevented from returning home by an unseen force. Can he navigate a nightmarish maze of hallways and uncover the disturbing truth?

Slopecrashers Demo.description: Slopecrashers is an arcade snowboard combat racer in which a wild crew of animals band together on a world spanning snowboarding tour! Do stunts & combos for extra boost and collect items to protect yourself or attack the competitors! You can ride on your own, or battle it out in local multiplayer!

폴라 펭귄 포스트 Demo.description: Penguin Delivery Service!! Run a logistics company in Winter Mountain, the land of snow! Place the items in the bag so that the penguins can deliver them safely. Do people's favors and gain trust. You can help the Pola Penguin Post settle and penguins become recognized as residents.

Spell Welders.description: Play as 1 of 17 different welders in this strategic turn-based RPG! After you choose your spell, decide how you will cast it. Will it be fast? Accurate? Powerful? You've never had control like this before as you weld your way to victory!

Last Day Zombie Survival VR.description: A stranger, who awakens in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discovers they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious unknown person.

Lenny Loosejocks in Space.description: You guide Lenny and Donga in their epic quest to save the human race from the evil Sluggees. It's the groundbreaking point-and-click web adventure game sequel to Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout in all its pixelated glory - exactly like you remember playing when you got home from school in 1998.

One Many Nobody.description: The future of human kind is at stake. The planet's energy resources had run out and the urge to find an alternative source has become the only priority at any cost. Are you willing to accept your fate in this pixel art puzzle-adventure game set in a futuristic distopic world?

Railbound.description: A relaxing puzzle game about fixing train connections from the makers of Golf Peaks and inbento!

Saleblazers Demo.description: Build a shop and survive a perilous open world with up to 8 friends in the ultimate multiplayer shopkeeping survival experience.

Super Ride Grandpa.description: Race your grandpa against other grandpas (and goompahs).

Triple Jump.description: Triple Jump is an auto-running puzzle platformer where you have a library of different “jumps” that you can assign in any combination to three slots. You are then faced with levels that require some combination of those jumps to solve.

Song of Calamity I - Music, Paranormal E.description: A pixel-art-JRPG about the young woman Calamity, who travels into the strange world behind the veil to find more than she bargained for. Beat up dark fairies, explore a colorful and dark wonderland, meet talking mushrooms, cute cats and lots of new magical friends!

Drunk or Dead 2.0 L.description: Immerse yourself in the virtual nightmare of Drunk or Dead 2, a post-apocalyptic VR world where you and your crew fight to survive against a nearly endless zombie horde with the help of a little booze and a whole truckload of high-powered guns.

Tad the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Ta.description: Your favourite explorer, Tad Stones is back! Embark with Tad and his friends on a new journey through different cities where you will encounter challenging puzzles in your quest to get the emerald tablet.

Norgame. Город полярной ночи Demo.description: Help the moon girl defeat the ancient monster that stole the sun. The action in a fabulous adventure puzzle game takes place in the scenery of the polar cities of Norilsk and Dudinka under the mysterious light of the Aurora borealis.

Slot Shots Pinball Collection Demo.description: Slot Shots Pinball Collection Early Access Is Here! Early access includes five tables- Slot Shots Casino, Super Vixel Land, Bass Hunter, Neon Nights 2 Skylines, and Outergalactic Aliens Deluxe! Purchasing early access will also include one more future table as it's developed and released.

Gates of Nesphera VR.description: Gates of Nesphera VR is a roguelite inspired dungeon crawler. Explore vast corridors, fight against powerful Keepers and use deadly power of Nebula to grow in strength. Be careful though, the mighty power is treacherous and can devour you if not used wisely.

Moonphase Pass Demo.description: A rougelite meeple placement game. Help Lili as she fights back against the Red Moon to protect her forest hut!

Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm.description: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is an action-adventure game that takes you to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations. Become a legendary warrior of Tikal, train with the army of the time, explore mystical places of this mythology and finally, acquire the powers of the ancient gods.

Cyber Car.description: Feel yourself in a futuristic world piloting ships through incredible scenery! Made for VR, Cyber Car will undoubtedly be a relaxing and immersive experience. Put your problems aside, and come ride and enjoy the best virtual reality experience ever made!

20 Minutes Till Dawn.description: Shoot down an ever growing horde of Lovecraftian monsters to survive the night. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds. Unlock a diverse cast of characters and weapons with unique powers.

It's Hard Being A Dog.description: IHBAD is a 2D roguelike, Hack N Slash Platformer game where you play as a dog! Fight strange creatures and mighty mythical gods as you uncover your origin in this dark dystopian world.

Ballistic Zen.description: Skate. Strafe. Wallrun. Master a unique movement system based on old-school air-strafing, updated for the modern age. Use your hoverblades to find hard to reach collectables and beat time trials in an open world. Feel the Ballistic Zen.

Automata Ecosystem.description: Turning cellular automata into an audiovisual experience. Automata Ecosystem is a GPU-powered cellular automata simulation with complex interactions and procedural audio generation.

SenS.description: In the Beginning was the Nothingness... Enter the Unknown, explore the Infinite, find your own SenS.

Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip Demo.description: Embark on a road trip like no other in this co-op narrative survival adventure. Visit fun locations, meet wacky characters, and manage your resources wisely. And yes: you still can date some hot monsters ;)

Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator.description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator Build. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

Army of One : War Worlds.description: Army of One is a first and third person shooter style game based on teams and solo confrontations, with melee combat and objective-oriented multiplayer gameplay. Prove to everyone that you are the best, that you are literally a one-man army, for rewards and abilities.

Cryospace Demo.description: You are not a soldier. Not a fighter. Just an ordinary maintenance guy. Yet you have to fight. And you are forced to run. But chiefly: you must help the frozen crew survive on a spaceship. You are the only one who can save others. You are made a hero against your will. You become a leader. A slayer.

Die to Survive.description: Gory rail shooter filled with action, explosions, boss battles, weapon upgrades, deamons and zombies ... lot´s of zombies.

Selaco Demo.description: Selaco is a brand new original shooter running on GZDoom, featuring thrilling action set pieces, destructibility, smart AI and a fleshed out story taking place within an immersive game world.

Neon Speed.description: NEON SPEED is a casual racing game.You need to ride on a high speed between another cars on the road and earn points to improve your car later.You can choose the best car that will absolutely fits you!

Sinus.description: Shoot, loot, hack, level up, die, upgrade. SINUS is a futuristic action-platformer RPG, with metroidvania and roguelike elements. Synergize skills, weapons and items. Control powerful turrets, enemies or even cheat death. Explore generated maps to complete missions and stop SINUS, humanity's savior.

学園スイーツ発見 ～双目（ざらめ）のドーナツ編～.description: A beautiful girl 2-choice quiz adventure game where you can experience a little variety of languages! Enjoy multi-end collection and online ranking in Challenge Mode!

The Immortal Demo.description: This is running game in 2D Platformer, enemies will appear on the way, kill them all if you want to reach the end of the land, Lung Cu. You have to focus on the game 100%, just one hit of enemy everything will back to the beginning.

Tiles Playtest.description: Embark into a procedurally generated world with limited ressources. Try to make it as far as possible before you run out of food.
