On your journey to discover all five relics scattered in the world, you will strive through different biomes, collect food, uncover items, construct buildings and more!

What Lies Between Demo.description: Transported to a new world, jump and dash your way across the strange land to return home!

The Last Secret.description: Award winning visual novel adventure. An epic, upbeat tale with challenging and fun puzzles, humorous storyline and quirky characters. Solve the "last secret", save your friends and maybe find true love on the way, too...

Froggie.description: Froggie is a platform game with retro graphics

Battle Waves: Card Tactics.description: A strategic Auto-Battler with Deck-Building action! Compete in 1v1 Online PvP showdowns or try your hand at escalating PvE difficulties. Unlock over 20 factions and experiment with thousands of synergies, Wishlist Today!

Food Fight.description: Food Fight! Retro shooter where you take out every boss until you achieve victory.

午时已到.description: A VR shooting game that restores the western cowboy duel.

Virus_.description: You are a computer virus, programmed to to adapt and learn to aid in getting full access of different computers and servers. Will you be able to adapt fast enough to complete your job?

鸡从天降 Demo.description: "Chicken Fall" is a pixel-style horizontal shooting Roguelike game. The game was made by myself alone. In the game, the player controls the protagonist, the chicken boss, and with the help of friends, defeats the bandits in the forest composed of various carnivores.

Virus_ (Un-Released).description: You are a computer virus, programmed to to adapt and learn to aid in getting full access of different computers and servers. Will you be able to adapt fast enough to complete your job?

Seeds of Unity Demo.description: A unique story-driven farming RPG that also has aspects of sci-fi, romance, and exploration embedded within. Create lasting friendships, help the newly found colony thrive, investigate the unexplored surface, and perhaps even find that special someone along the way.

Ninja Sneaking R.description: Idiot girl who invaded the enemy's castle. Kunoichi. Quickly conquer all 100 stages without being spotted by the enemy.

Quantum Tripper.description: Identification with something absolute and manifest as pure observation. Seeing things differently is a feature of our perceptual systems. Removed from the materialist plane of existence and world substantiation. Regions of the brain will find particular sets of images more challenging.

Necrosmith Playtest.description: A necromancer simulator. Assemble the dead using different body parts while upgrading your tower, combine the abilities of the different fantastic races to fight your way through the hordes of enemies and overrun the ’chosen ones’. To tell the truth, the dead are pretty, uhm, dumb.

Quest room.description: The main goal of the quest is to get out of the room, and for this you need to solve riddles and find hidden clues.

Tactic Legends.description: Tactic Legends is a free-to-play, player-vs-player turn-based strategy game for mobile, inspired by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics and Tactics Ogre. Characters and environmental objects are 2D, while the game maps are in a 3D rotatable space.

Quest room Demo.description: The main goal of the quest is to get out of the room, and for this you need to solve riddles and find hidden clues.

Puddink.description: Puddink is a relaxing physics puzzle game in which your goal is to stack blocks of pudding to reach the flag!

龙魂：魔都异闻.description: 《龙魂：魔都异闻》是一款融合收集／养成要素的文字冒险式RPG游戏。主人公作为游戏开发者，竟然在真实世界遇到了巨龙？而这些巨龙竟然就是她所开发游戏里的“龙魂”。随着更多龙魂的出现，虚构逐渐污染了现实。为了防止自己生活的日常被破坏，主人公必须与龙魂伙伴并肩战斗，解决龙魂引发的诸多事件，阻止黑幕的图谋，揭秘魔都背后的阴谋！

The Original Wizard Demo.description: The game is a Dungeon Crawler, where the player must survive the succeeding dungeons and defeat Impeficus on his throne.

窒愛SUFFOCATE.description: "SUFFOCATE" is a first-person horror survival game. The story takes place in modern Taiwan and combines family, religion, politics and other elements; avoid the chasing of spirits in the mansion, seeking the unbearable memories and truth while exploring the environment.

Wet Dreams.description: Wet Dreams is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

The Hexad Trials (Ning's Wing 3) Playtes.description: 六名主角、六重视角，在一个巨大的死亡迷宫中，能否群策群力，逃出升天？

MENOS: PRECURSOR.description: MENOS returns for an all action, third person sequel. Harness the power of Telekinesis and gunplay in fast paced, physics based combat against overwhelming odds. Throw enemies, stop bullets, pickup guns from afar. Anything that isn't bolted to the ground can be used as a weapon.

Barkhan.description: A harsh sand planet has become the stage for a brutal war between three Great Clans. For the power over rare minerals each wants to prove their superiority. In the heat of dynamic battles with the enemy's troops, be prepared to face and attack giant Sand Snakes.

Mist Monkey: wanderer.description: From the mind of award-winning visual artist, Xander Clinthorne, comes a meditative indie-game about wandering and taking it slow. This title takes you deep into a beautiful pixel-art world with flow state inducing gameplay, The Great Monkey's wisdom to discover and a stunning original soundtrack.

Maestro VR Demo.description: Maestro VR is a rhythmic music video game where you become an orchestra conductor in Virtual Reality. Feel the unique experience of conducting a symphony orchestra.

PixelWorld.description: PixelWorld is a pixel-art action RPG in a procedurally-generated fantasy world. Explore the open-world encountering randomly generated quests, fast-paced combat, loot, pets, and more.

TIMESTRIDE.description: Manipulate time to overcome obstacles in a clever way. A sci-fi FPS game with large variety of weapons and foes set in a remote military research lab where an experiment has gone horribly wrong.

ZEROCRON.description: ZEROCRON is a straightforward, classical arcade Twin-Stick Shoot-Em-Up with a strong Commodore-Amiga-era feel. Blast asteroids and enemies to burning pixeldust!

Homemade TCG.description: Yugi-inspired card game -roguelike with an extra deck. Enemies use the same cards / rules as you. Reduce opponent's life from 20 to 0; by playing cards and attacking. Pick cards of 3-choices after each win. Currently 120 unique cards, 5 floors, and the final boss. DEVELOPMENT STOPPED

CUBEGRID.description: Cubegrid is an addicting puzzle game with lots of puzzling fun. The perfect pastime gaming experience for anyone who loves tricky brain teasers and strategy. A puzzle game perfect against boredom for children aswell as adults.

AISZplus.description: You destroy the runaway electronic organ AISZ. Vertical scroll STG with all 5 levels.

ROUGH KUTS: 3D.description: ROUGH KUTS: 3D is a First Person Shooter, inspired by old public domain horror movies.

Eden Universe.description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a god? This game will definitely answer that question. In Eden Universe, you play the role of a god tasked with leading his people to victory and glory. Start your own religion and use divine powers to rule the universe of Eden.

Dwarfenstein.description: Fight your way through countless enemy waves in this story driven mix of First Person Shooter and Tower Defense. Bring death to various creatures in different worlds. Kill, collect crystals, level-up, die and revive again.

Hovercars 3077: Underground Demo.description: Hovercars 3077: Undeground® - flying cars, apocalyptic tracks, difficult weather conditions. Collect and buy cars with Bitcoins. Play in leagues, time trial, arcade. Play online or offline with a friend or AI. Loosely inspired by Cyberpunk, 5 Element, Wipeout, Blade Runner, NFS and 1983, 1990, 3077.

KiNoKoe : Tree's Voice - Demo.description: You play as Hiro, a young Japanese man whose life is filled with a boring job. One evening, you see a strange light in the park’s trees near your home. You walk to the oldest tree and discover strange symbols on a piece of bark...

Quetzal Demo.description: Embark on a mystic journey in Quetzal, a fast-paced precision platformer where you use obstacles to your advantage. You’ll discover a mystical underground world, defeat blood ravenous stone creatures, and survive tortuous obstacles in your quest for answers and meaning.

DOLPHIN HUSTLE.description: Somewhere in the wastelands of the ocean lives a young dolphin. He likes to get high and hang out. All he does is hang out. But it so happened that the cyber Internet sucked him in. It's time to end this.

The Revenge of Mr.Samuel.description: Samuel! The name of the dark evil master god of a distance universe created by himself. 4 fellas felt to this dimension by a huge mistake made by Huseyin –our hero. Help these 4 fellas to return home safely and defeat Samuel if you can!

Captcha Kills.description: A crossover between Among Us and the Turing Test. In this multiplayer battle royale, you deceive others into believing you are artificial intelligence and not human. Hide amongst the AI, eliminate players you believe are human, and be the last person standing to win.

Sprout Valley.description: Sprout Valley is an upcoming farming simulator game where you can step back from the busy life and grow the garden of your dreams. Captivating story, hand-crafted experience, cute graphics and many more!

Core Iris.description: Fast-paced third-person shooter based in the capture the flag game mode. Play as a team and build your way to victory with building mechanics.

Damien Crawford's Golf Experience 2022.description: This game is meant to capture the feeling and essence of playing golf for the very first time. No stats and no frills like range finders and gauges. Just golf.

Class Five Memorial GAME.description: This is class 5 memorial game. It is a simulation game that can be moved through WASD and has classroom scenes inside

Sisters_Possession2.description: シスターズ・ポゼッションはsrpgです。女の子に憑依する事で戦いを優位に進めていきます。

Galactic Explorers.description: Galactic Explorers is a top-down 2D retro space shooter inspired by early games such as Galaxian, and Asteroids.

Hotel Manager Simulator.description: You have been hired as a hotel manager. Now it is the time to prove yourself that you can bring benefits to the hotel while keeping hotel customers happy as much as possible by satisfying their appropriate needs. Good luck, fellows!

Curro.description: Curro is a first person shooter game. Set your record in the world generated endlessly.

Erroneous Playtest.description: Join the Battle with your Friends in this futuristic First-Person Shooter with Team Deathmatch, Free-for-all, King of the Hill, and more!

Mortificare.description: Try to survive as long as you can in this fast paced game. Lets see how long you can keep on playing!

Net Knight.description: Delete MalWare, collect cards, customize your digital hero, and explore an infinite procedural world based on the "real" net. Inspired by the Battle Network series, experience an Action-RPG offering a unique story, colorful characters, grid-based combat, and an infinite digital world to explore!

Devexus.description: An unsettling descent down the demoniacal pages of the occult tome, the Sacramentum Devexus.

Sky Caravan Open Beta.description: Welcome to the Skyways, caravaneer. Complete missions, manage your ship’s resources and make tough decisions to keep your crew alive and happy. Or not. Choices have lasting consequences in this Text-Based RPG. You are the captain - and the clouds are waiting!

Little Astronaut.description: A little astronaut in a huge danger. You are Sky, an engineer of the SBTC Science Bio Technology Corporation. You have one mission: explore what happened at the Mars Bioresearch Facility where all the communication was lost. You are only a little astronaut, but what you will find, is a huge danger.

Archtower Demo.description: Archtower is a mixture of Roguelite and ARPG. Explore the mysterious Tower, build your characters, improve and develop your clan. Use different skills from power crystals to optimize your builds. And try not to die. But don't worry, the game gives you options to survive and keep your loot on defeat.

Putty Putter Demo.description: A grid-based movement golf game where you control a putty-like creature with the unique ability to expand and form different shapes. Do you have what it takes to stretch your brain power to the limit and conquer all mind-bending puzzles on offer?

Build Lands Playtest.description: In Build Lands you will have fun and relax building cute islands, freeing your imagination and building your own cute islands, being able to share in the workshop where the community can download them to have fun assembling them! Relaxing fun for all ages!

I H8 Ur Face.description: Want to slap the sh*t out of someone but don't want to do time for it? Load an image of the poor bastard on to the dummy and release your rage!

Void Prison.description: Void Prison is a fast paced, endless arcade twin stick shooter that puts you inside of an ever shrinking ring. Survive by fighting emerging enemies around you and don't get consumed by the void. Complete achievements to unlock new skins and powerups and get on top of the leaderboards!

PongBreak.description: Clean up the scattered programmable matter in a fun and challenging tennis like format. Multiple control schemes allow for casual or precise gameplay.

THERE'S A RIKISHI IN MY HOUSE.description: A casual escape game with 15 multiple endings.

It's Kooky Demo.description: It's Kooky is a hand drawn hidden object game. Unlike any other, you will have to find those quirky/silly characters hidden throughout the map within the time limit. Have a kooky fun time!!!

Koncolos Demo.description: "Do you know a monster that dwells around here?" she asked. An ordinary barkeepers' journey, intertwined with the only survivor from a shrouded monster hunter company, started with this question.

Last Days of Lazarus Playtest.description: After their mother's suicide, Lazarus returns home to his sister Lyudmila. But unexplained events make the world and even reality collapse around him. Looming death, a spreading malediction and the supernatural threaten his sanity, yet Lazarus pushes forward to find the truth about his family.

Tower Of Wishes 2: Vikings.description: Climb the tower and save your Vikings! Tower Of Wishes 2: Vikings is a family friendly Match 3 with modern design and aesthetics. The game also includes extras such as Pipe Join, Memory, Chain Solitaire and Sliders for that bit of extra fun!

True_Aim.description: True_Aim is an Aim Trainer software designed to offers a complete warm-up program for competitives Shooter games in a really short time (4 minutes), powering an smart analysis algorithm that adapts in real time the difficulty of the exercises to push the player's performances further and further.

简单模拟.description: This is a simulated business game in the form of cards

Isolate ME!.description: An exciting survival game with roguelike elements in which you have to play as a police officer in a city engulfed by a pandemic, look for infected people and isolate them, manage the budget and hire police officers, set up vaccination centers and propaganda stands.

Eldertrail Demo.description: Eldertrail is a turn-based strategy with rpg elements and adventure cards based exploration. You will take control of unique heroes, explore the world, build up your town, fight tactical battles, craft legendary weapons, level up and evolve your units and heroes to take out your opponents.

Cuisineer.description: Explore the world of Cuisineer as you enter dungeons and defeat monsters to get vital ingredients to cook delicious food to serve at your restaurant in this super cute and tasty rogue-lite dungeon crawler!

The Lizartian.description: The Lizartian is a top-down action-adventure game. We will embody a lizard tamer, a Lizartian, who will have to travel the vast lands of Dekoto to enact his revenge. Along the way, he'll face dangers like savage bandits, rugged terrain, and the legendary sandstorm.

ME_iON.description: ME_iON is an online multiplayer shooter game with offline base-building mechanics, that's weird wacky and funny there are also funny little watermelons with banana guns so what's not to love about that :D

Eyes of Darkness.description: Psychological horror, featuring early 90's graphics and music, vast player's freedom and multiple endings! Leonard White, a professional inspector, is looking for his ex-girlfriend, Kimberly Frances, gone missing in Goodsprings, a small town near Nevada holding the darkest secrets...

Road to Vostok.description: Road to Vostok is a hardcore single-player survival game set in a post-apocalyptic border zone between Finland and Russia. Survive, loot, plan and prepare your way across the Border Zone and enter the Vostok.

Space City - Build Your Empire.description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy that will make you immerse yourself in a new world.

Deicider Demo.description: Win back your freedom through gladiatorial combat and discover the secrets of the arena and its creator. Arm yourself with the strongest equipment you can find and face this crooked, 2D, roguelike, dungeon crawler.

Joker Poker - Video Poker.description: Enjoy the Casino Experience with Joker Poker!

Deuces Wild - Video Poker.description: Enjoy the Casino Experience with Deuces Wild!

Skellies Ain't Scary Demo.description: Skellies Ain't Scary is a bullet hell rogue-like with minimalist graphics. Delve into dungeons, collect guns and items. Build the strongest synergies and beat all the bosses. Uncover the secrets of the dungeon and collect the lost treasures that await you.

Goodbye Dr Sanchez Demo.description: You and your friend have been kidnapped by the maniacal Dr. Carlos Sanchez. One of you managed to escape and now is wandering through the house. But the other remains imprisoned in a room with the necessary equipment to find the exit. The both of you must communicate to escape together!

次元战纪.description: 这是一款角色扮演，融合roguelike元素的魔幻游戏，采取跳下去的玩法不断闯关，击杀boss拾取道具获得更加强大的能力，主要操作键位：↑↓←→移动，SHIFT位移，SPACE拾取道具，R更换子弹，鼠标左右键攻击等。某个魔法世界遭受次元力量的辐射导致生物变异，作为救世主的你保护世界的重任在你手中，你需要不断地获得道具不断增强自己的能力而更好的通过关卡，之后进入二周目，开始无限的BOSS战，可以通过金币学习技能继续强化

Pizzamon Demo.description: What happens when a pizza fights? Enter Pizzamon, the story of a young adventurer competing in the Chef Championships.

Knotwords.description: Knotwords is a minimal and elegant logic puzzle — with words. Arrange each section so every word across and down is valid. It may look difficult at first, but you'll be surprised at how quickly you pick it up! This is the kind of game I've been trying to design my whole career — I hope you like it

Duline Demo.description: A simple yet challenging geometric puzzle game

LENDARIOS STORY BRIGHTNESS PART 1.description: It's an anime-style RPG game that has a wonderful story and excellent gameplay that will delight you and there will still be part 2, part 1 will just be an appetizer for part 2 that will come later this year

Deliver Us From Evil (DUFE): Masquerade.description: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel. Keldran and Ace are two centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister and If they cannot conquer their fears, they may find themselves wandering the halls forever.

Do Not Feed The Monkeys 2099.description: Spy on strangers through security cameras, invade their privacy and discover their intimate secrets in this digital voyeur simulator. Welcome to the future of The Primate Observation Club. Even in 2099 the golden rule about messing with your unlucky subjects still remains: DO NOT feed the monkeys!

Himno The Silent Melody: Ruins.description: Himno - The Silent Melody is an atmospheric roguelite action RPG. Explore different interconnected environments, gather materials to create your unique arsenal and build and automate your base.

Square Journey.description: Square Journey is a minimalist arcade game that aims to help Square reach the depths of his inner dungeon in search of a greater understanding of himself.

RETOOLED.description: Put your combat skills to the test in this fast paced FPS. Resist and rebel against a rogue AI, will you conquer and reclaim or perish?

Forest Grump Demo.description: The cheesy space schnitzel, monsters and guns, old smackdonald, freaky forest, killing friends, or the first day in forestry. Name it whatever you want, the ultimate action-packed FPS/CTF/RPG is here. Plus, this game is funny as hell. Start playing today!

Offenders.description: Make deals with people to identify and distract your enemies in order to eliminate them one by one and clear the areas from them until you reach their leader.

Randy And Teddy Adventure Road Demo.description: A puzzle 2.5D platformer where Randy, main character, and Teddy, his pup go on an amazing Adventure Road! Go with them and travel to 5 worlds where you'll meet pesky robots that will make this journey hard. Solve challenging puzzles and earn stars and achievements in this Mario-like platformer.

GreedFall 2.description: Dive back into the unique world of GreedFall again in an even deeper RPG experience. Uprooted from the island of your birth, find your freedom, explore the old continent and forge your destiny through alliances, scheming and battles!

Treats Please!.description: This is a retro-styled puzzle game about keeping a hungry pet happy with tasty treats. Choosing treats the pet will enjoy will reduce their hunger strength level and choosing things they cannot eat will only make them hungrier!

Bombardier Demo.description: Bombardier is a quick and chaotic multiplayer game which supports up to 4 players in an arena. Use the environment and bombs to your advantage and battle to be crowned the ultimate Bombardier!

Soul Night.description: The main character is a kula who masterfully scatters his enemies - ninjas to the right and left.

Delusional.description: When Kevin, the burglar, gets lost in the woods, he comes across an old abandoned mansion nearby. Later on, he'd decided to rob this mansion. However, he later discovers that the mansion he is attempting to rob is owned by an ex-doctor who is now known as a wanted Psychopathic Murderer.

Looping Bravery Demo.description: Looping Bravery is a turn-based deckbuilding roguelike strategy game. Manipulate the time itself and find a way to save Earth from an alien invasion by traveling back in time to stop an event known as "The Marking". Fight in the past to save the future.

Fly By Knight.description: Fly and fight your way through the magically altered tree you once called home! Free your friends from the prison gems that bind them! Find all your friends to open up an escape portal and get to safety!

HEN, CHICKS AND CATS.description: Save all the chicks, but choose your moves carefully or they might fall into the wrong paws.

Just A Humble Swordsmith.description: Craft swords from a variety of styles and materials in order to best equip the adventurers who come into your sword smithing shop. Strategize and watch the adventurers fight their way through a dungeon full of monsters in this idle battler!

Animation Sketchpad Playtest.description: An extremely fast hand-drawn animation application for desktops. Designed by an animator, for animators with a focus on desktop and pen tablet as the main tool.Minimal UI ,hotkey driven workflow and simple feature set lets animators draw and animate at lightning fast speeds.

Overrogue Demo.description: A card deck-building roguelite! Explore labyrinths each time from level 1!

Blitz Roads.description: Blitz Roads is a futuristic action-packed vehicle combat racing world. Compete in numerous racing tracks with 6 different ways to play. - And test your racing skill with “Challenge Mode”. Start your engines. Ready. Set. Let’s Play!

来人 LIGHTWORKERS.description: A Free, 2D Visual Novel / Adventure "来人 LIGHTWORKERS"

Evergreen.description: Evergreen is a simulation game about leaving the stress of the city behind and starting a new life in a mountain valley.

PUT PUD Nudli's Adventure.description: Become a hero who saves the island of cats. Explore these varied areas of this island. Fight Chef The Cat’s creatures and after that face the meowing horror. The game is hard, but if you can give it time, you will become better and better.

Paraperspective.description: ParaPerspective is a stylish and minimalist puzzle game where your perspective affects how the world works. Help the little guys get to their destination by rotating the camera and directing them through seemingly impossible geometry.

Pretty Girls Escape.description: Erase blocks of the same color connected to each other, slide the entire block left and right, remove obstacles, and lead the character blocks to the exit! Conquer stages, collect Pretty Girls' costumes, and enjoy dressing them up!

Big Ambitions Demo.description: Big Ambitions is a revolutionary role-playing business sim. Starting from the bottom, you take over the city, from small businesses to huge corporations. Your goal is to become the biggest tycoon of New York.

Bonelords.description: Build up yourself & your defenses in Bonelords! Defend against waves of enemies! Attack using a large variety of weapons & tools! Scale your power, and face the great hordes of Spegroon!

Snipe Hunt Demo.description: Explore atmospheric, spooky mazes. Bring tools with you to test evidence scattered throughout the mazes. Uncover the identity of the monster while avoiding becoming its next victim. If you're feeling brave, lay out a trap with the right bait to capture it or simply escape to try again later.

Eschew.description: Eschew is a bullet hell where you play as an unknown alien visitor, traveled to Earth in search of a stolen, cosmic power source. Survive the overwhelming onslaught of Earth's military might!

Fowl Scourge.description: In this Dark Fantasy Action-RPG you are part of a plague doctor guild where every encounter with your patients is a boss fight.

Fowl Scourge Demo.description: In this Dark Fantasy Action-RPG you are part of a plague doctor guild where every encounter with your patients is a boss fight.

Sokolor.description: Sokolor is a sokoban game with innovative mechanics. Push the colored cubes into their correct positions, but first you need to paint yourself the same color to be able to push them!

Redemption Cemetery: The Stolen Time Col.description: After a terrible accident, you wake to find yourself in another realm! A dangerous entity threatens to destroy the constructs of time itself, taking humanity into darkness along with it! Do you have what it takes to save the world before it’s too late?

Eden Remains: Arrival.description: Eden Remains: Arrival is a Sci-fi First Person Action-Survival game. You play an elite dropship trooper sent to investigate a distress signal at a remote research facility on Eden. Fight, gather resources, manage vitals and craft supplies to stay alive.

Murus.description: An adventure platformer where the grass has been cursed & the terrain has taken to the skies. Jump, swing & glide your way through the perilous world of Terraloft, all the while avoiding touching the verdant ground!

Roxy Raccoon's Bowling Bash Demo.description: 10-Pin Bowling where you are the ball! Watch the time and avoid obstacles as you aim for the high-score and conquer the ever-changing landscapes. The next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga awaits as a new foe approaches!

Nectar Demo.description: An explosive Shoot ‘Em Up like no other, Nectar focuses on five hummingbird sisters, each with their own playstyle. Defeat powerful bosses, unlock new cosmetics, compete in online leaderboards, and save your world from the invading bee army!

Night Racer Demo.description: Enjoy this Indie racing game featuring cross-platform multiplayer, many levels, championships, cars, skins, boosts, toppers and more

Vapor World: Over The Mind.description: The strange vista reflected in his eyes... Is it a dream or a reality? To escape the twisted world, the boy begins his journey.

GRAPPIN Demo.description: After a difficult awakening, you stumble upon the Grip, a mysterious artifact and grappling hook. Climb up the Mountain to bring back the Grip to the top and unravel the mystery surrounding the Grip. Bon voyage!

Dreamless: The Madness from the Sea Demo.description: Dreamless: The Madness from the Sea is a metroidvania game based on the works of the American writer H.P. Lovecraft, the master of horror. Play as Ambrose Blackwood, a British archeologist whose fate is irrevocably bound to the mysterious city of R’lyeh and to its monstrous inhabitants.

Forest Of Tails: Arena.description: Forest of Tails: Arena is a real-time action arena game that pits you against bugs, animals, and even other mice. Fight your way through waves, gain new skills, and loot powerful equipment to fight your way to the top.

Paws for Adventure.description: Hunt, Fight and Meow your way to saving the cat colonies. A purrrfect adventure for cat lovers.

End of Night.description: 1943. You are sitting in a boat with Josef, rowing from Nazi-occupied Denmark to safety in neutral Sweden. As he crosses the ocean, the sea gives way to the streets and people that populate his mind. Your journey becomes a living landscape of recollections from the night of his escape.

Skator Gator 3D.description: Explore new open locales with skateboard in hand or while grinding on pipelines — Greenjamin's skating into the third dimension in SKATOR GATOR 3D!

Unknown Number: A First Person Talker De.description: An innovative voice-controlled adventure game, played through a series of interactive 'phone calls'. Join the heist and save the world... using nothing but your voice. Will you answer the call? *WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS*

Survive 10 Minutes Please Playtest.description: Survive 10 minutes please is an action roguelike 2D zombie game where you have to survive a zombie horde by any means. Kill them, Upgrade yourself, Choose your abilities and try your best to survive in a challenging game.

Reborn : Fate Of Gods.description: Reborn is a first person psychological horror game. You have to survive from gods awakening and need to find out how to get more strength while you are surrounded with enemies.

The Block.description: A minimalist city building toy. Place randomly generated buildings on a square and watch your tiny city block come to life!

Anime Armpits.description: Anime Armpits... It can't get better than this...

ROUGH KUTS: 3D Demo.description: ROUGH KUTS: 3D is a First Person Shooter, inspired by old public domain horror movies.

Sapiens Demo.description: Create your own primitive civilization and lead your tribe in a world you shape. Start with nothing, build towns and industry, and advance through thousands of years of technological advancement in this intimate yet expansive colony sim.

天若有情.description: 《天若有情》是一款全新3D爱恋MMORPG游戏！游戏拥有次世代完美画质，清新细腻的地图场景，恢宏大气的3D无缝大地图，重现端游视听感受，丰富的社交玩法成就相伴相守；专属DIY捏脸，千万组合，彰显个性；自由立体飞行坐骑，带你畅游四海八荒！百变灵殊任你选，可爱小鸡，喵狗全齐。特有的王权交互系统，助力成就帝王梦。

SHINOBI NON GRATA Demo.description: Shinobi alert! Use your 7 shinobi weapons to survive the bloodshed! Introducing a hard core 2D ninja action game by Hyper-retro graphics.

Count Pumpcula.description: One misty moonlit night, Count Dracula is attacked by an orange object from the sky. He finds himself awaking on a mysterious island with a pumpkin stuck to his head. With the new power of the pumpkin that protects Dracula from sunlight, he must find his way off the island and back to his Castle.

Jelly Forest.description: Help the cube jump over the steep rocks and get as far as possible before he loses all his three hearts

Demons Crusher.description: Demons crusher is a side-scrolling platform slasher.

StoneDEF.description: You have to fight off waves of enemies using magic staves.

Frog lands.description: Solve riddles, go through dangerous traps and overthrow the dark magician!

Kamigami: Clash of the Gods Demo.description: Easy to play, hard to master, join this adventure on an unique card game where you are able to do everything you ever wanted. Collect cards, build your decks, play offline on history mode, challenge your friends online or take on the world in a ranked system!

EpicRecovery.description: A shooter game with endless fun of turning back and forth. The game system is simple, with a short stage lasting less than one minute, in which you aim for a high score until you run out of remaining airplanes.

Picture Builder Demo.description: Innovative art puzzle. Build pixel pictures from blocks by stacking them on top of each other.

Dark Slime.description: Go through a huge number of caves, solve many puzzles, and fight against the strongest enemies!

Chaotic Loop.description: Reach that gold medal in this colorful platform game! Or just do your best score!

Spacewing War Demo.description: Blast off for a retro shoot’em up experience filled with clever twists and secrets!

Pit Fighter Tycoon.description: Slavery. Violence. PROFIT. You're an alien slaver - abduct humans to build the most powerful gladiator team in the universe! Surgically enhance your slaves, or grind them down for profit. Become the worst kind of corporate overlord in this strategic auto-battler & management game.

Raven Demo.description: Go to your happy place with Raven: A relaxing, trick-taking card game. Embrace the serene atmosphere while trumping your AI opponents. Win the bid, choose trumps and play cards to win points for your team.

FIRE HEAT.description: FIRE HEAT is a 2D simulation sports game! Immerse yourself in the world of sports and entertainment. You will have a completely unusual approach to sports games, knock down skittles with a butterfly knife throw, throw glass bottles into rings or kick a cake instead of a ball.

Realm of Divinos Demo.description: Adventure through lush landscapes and encounter captivating characters. Use your sword and your words to shape your destiny in a world steeped in magic and mystery. Will you be friend or foe to the two kingdoms? Will you become a revered hero or a feared villain? It’s up to you!

Tameshi Demo.description: Tameshi is a retro-themed vertical scrolling shoot 'em up for 1 or 2 players (local co-op). Battle through 7 stages of relentless waves of enemies all bent on your destruction. Destroy them first before taking on the end of stage boss.

Skullborn Demo.description: Skullborn is an infinite massively multiplayer sandbox game! Begin as a skeleton, fight, gather resources, and craft armor/weapon to upgrade your bones! Explore and team up with other players around the world.

American Catur/Traditional Playtest.description: If “chess is the gymnasium of the mind,” as French scientist and philosopher Blaise Pascal once said, then I say "American Catur is the Full-Distance Ironman Triathlon of the mind" CEO Eric J Curtis. We have two fundamental tactic offensive and defensive bombs controlled with a roll 6 & 8 sided die

2D Brick Breaker Game | REMASTERED.description: 2D Brick Breaker Game | REMASTERED is a relaxing/casual retro game where you shoot balls and break the variously colored bricks. There are also a lot of different powerups to make the game more immersive. The game has 100 unique levels.

Mantra.description: At the end of the 21st century, one individual sets out to make up for past mistakes. After being partially responsible for the downfall of modern society, they decide to take it upon themselves to ease their own conscience and save humanity.

Disco Tomb.description: Disco Tomb is a sci-fi retro FPS / boomer shooter made just like the good ol' days! Use magic spells AND guns to fight your way through huge waves of enemies in freaky dungeons or out in the open desert against the hordes of the invaders! Oblivion awaits!

In The Workplace Of Madness.description: A monstrous entity looms over the employees of an insurance company. Theo, A normal office worker, finds himself engulfed in a deadly nightmare with no way out as secrets about the workplace are uncovered.

KOTOMASHO: I Can't Believe This NEET Guy.description: A Gameboy Color and Anime inspired adventure game with RPG elements. The protagonist is a NEET 21 year old guy who suddenly acquires the Power of Dreams and transforms into a Magical Girl.

BoomCrash.description: BoomCrash is a small physics-based game aimed at destroying buildings and other architectural structures using explosives.

Collapsed Demo.description: Challenge your mind with a 3D physics-based puzzle game. Take control of a cannon and use your limited supply of cannonballs to bring each level crashing to the ground. Using gravity, momentum, and logic, plan how to knock down each structure and leave nothing standing after the collapse!

Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory De.description: Guide the adventurous Ayla as she attempts to rescue her doggy sidekick Falafel from the vertiginous confines of Dr. Kobushi's laboratory. Over a hundred pixelated puzzles will have you avoiding killer robots as you engage with memorable characters.

After He Was Gone Demo.description: "After He Was Gone" is a Tactical RPG. NO level-up system. Character's skills and items will change the battle situation significantly. Collect the treasures and lead therianthropes from getting out from the world of board game. Don’t worry. If YOU don’t lose hope, we can rewind the time any time.

Ned Kelly: Armored Outlaw.description: This game is an alternate history themed FPS. Based on Ned Kelly, an Australian outlaw in the 1880s. It all kicks off where the real gang met their end. Can you survive the initial police raid at Glenrowan?

Memorabilia.description: Find notes and clues that will lead to memories. Change the present by manipulating your past. You must save your childhood friend in order to escape the mansion of memories.

Isle of Rein.description: Isle of Rein is a thirty minute adventure that takes place on Rein, an unobserved island in the Hudson Bay. You are a young agent tasked with investigating the research team's communication absence. Upon visiting the island, you must adjust to extreme circumstances.

Siege of Dungeon demo.description: “Siege of Dungeon” is a strategic rogue-lite game, where players challenge strong, cunning monsters within a limited time by combining relics and skills to build up your team. What’s waiting for you deep down in the dungeon? Could it be a rare and precious treasure, or the beginning of despair...?

Almost Home Now.description: A 10 minute horror experience of a girl walking home alone at night.

Generic RPG Idle Demo.description: Turn-based combat stripped to the core. Get loot, optimize your equipment, defeat mighty foes, enjoy the story.

Mega Demon Blaster.description: Blast demons until you can't escape no more! Mega Demon Blaster is a casual arena based shooter where you create builds for your weapon and try to break the game before you die! Enemies comes in waves and they get stronger and stronger but luckily you do to.

Open The Gates! Demo.description: Become king of your own castle in this strategic sidescrolling castlebuilder game. Manage the economy, build defenses and keep your citizens happy. Control diverse armies and fight in large-scale real-time strategy battles.

Stickman Synthwave Escape.description: Play as stickman, escape the mysterious secret laboratory and collect all the pills! Stickman Synthwave Escape has stunning colorful graphics, hand-crafted levels, tight controls, fun gameplay and synthwave soundtrack.

Galactic Liberation.description: "Galactic Liberation" is a classic 2D arcade scrolling shooter, with a side view. Nice graphics and atmospheric music will immerse you in a space battle.

MAGITERRA.description: Magiterra is a farming simulator game with RTS controls. With a little bit of added fantasy elements, create your crop fields, produce hundreds of resources, fulfill many different missions, help your kingdom prosper and live in wealth!

Arsolid Productions.description: Your dreams and wishes have come true in this immense new world of adventures and stories, in a game like never seen before.

Egglien.description: A retro space themed action shooter where your bullets send you flying through the air!

Rabbitoad.description: A frog-like rabbit is the main character's high-difficulty 2D action In order to fulfill the wish that "I will not be mistaken for a frog" Aim for the place of the goddess.

刀光剑影.description: This is a moba type game. In the game, players can choose one of five different characters and destroy the enemy crystals to win. The game provides a variety of weapons, players can buy equivalent weapons according to their money reserves, or sell weapons.

Upirja.description: Upirja is a first-person horror adventure set in the late 19th century in the Balkans. A murky evil distresses the lives of the villagers of a remote region surrounded by snowy mountains. Your mission, as inspector of the King, is to rid these lands from the ghoul that haunts them.

Akapulka - The Rainbow.description: Akapulka is a meditative game about floating across unique ancient ruins and collecting flowers.

Demise Sanctuary Demo.description: Fight hordes of otherworldly monsters and explore procedurally generated dungeons in this addicting twin-stick action roguelike with beautiful pixelart. Mastering risk/reward mechanics and creating powerful Artefact synergies will be key to survive and escape the Demise Sanctuary!

Clarent Saga: Chronicles Demo.description: A novel with great RPG turn based battles. A great entry point for newcomers!

Not Your Mama's Autobattler.description: Invite your friends, build your team and prepare for battle.

Piggy Jump The Hardest Game.description: Here is the Hardest game ever made! Game about Piggy, who is a basketball player with a dream to defeat everyone. Jump, Dodge, Dunk and Fly with Piggy to complete all 45 Levels and mini games. Piggy Jump is a big challenge for thos who like difficult games!

Rogue Soulstone.description: Collect the Rogue Soulstones in this physics-based, fast-paced action roguelike RPG to achieve ultimate power. Learn spells to create powerful synergies, decimate hordes of corrupted souls, face titanic bosses, die, upgrade and try again with a new build.

It's Time Demo.description: Play as a young scientist who invents a time portal and uses it to bring back his dead wife. Soon, things become chaotic in his life. Make choices and help people as you progress. Decide whom to save, your family or friends. Your choices determine the ending.

Shooting girl.description: It's a casual stress-busting shooter game where you beat enemies to get gold for upgrades and unlock weapons and the more levels it is, you have to think about how do you complete the game by refine Weapons . Also there alot fun things like turntable flip cards and other mini-games and CG in here.

Abyssals.description: Abyssals is a Survival City Builder in the dark depths of an inhospitable planet. Build your underwater colony, explore where light can’t reach, and hunt for scarce resources. Expand your infrastructure and power your lamps, as danger lies in the deep, hidden in the dark.

Astral Shipwright Demo.description: Build and upgrade your personal ship to travel around a strange new planet.

Survival: Fountain of Youth Playtest.description: Survival: Fountain of Youth is a challenging single-player open-world survival game set on the Caribbean islands. You play as a stranded 16th-century explorer crafting your way through the struggles of survival in order to unveil the secrets of an ancient civilization and your own fate.

Meteor Blasters Demo.description: Meteor Blasters is a non-stop action space shooter. Inspired by Asteroids, this game will see you choose between 6 different ships each with their own characteristics and utilize a variety of weapon powerups to eradicate the space rocks. Play 4 players Co-op or Versus Mode with friends.

TypeOut Playtest.description: This isn't your typical typing test. Unlock Powerups, create a loadout, and battle your way through prompts as fast and accurately as you can to allocate powerups and strategically attack your opponents in an effort to slow them down.

Secret Meadow.description: Secret Meadow is a whimsical survival sandbox role-playing game in which you embody a fairy and claim your own piece of safe haven in the middle of a dark magical forest. It is a whimsical, cozy and slow-paced adventure game blending gameplay elements from different genres.

Ah Diddums.description: In this classic ZX Spectrum game from 1983, take on the role of the loyal Teddy, trying to leave the toybox to comfort a crying baby. But watch out! The other toys, scared that the baby being comforted will lead to mother turning out the lights, will try to stop you!

The Adventures of Detective Bron Demo.description: The Adventures of Detective Bron is a detective-adventure game in which you have to investigate all kinds of crimes: from murders and missing people to robberies. Solve all the mysteries and test your deductive skills!

Spellarium 8.description: That's not your regular Match3 game! It is a Match3 Puzzle. Part 8 has a new bonus game and a new gameplay you won't see in other Match 3 games.

Seasons.description: A precision platformer that each season introduces new mechanics and new challenges, in a beautiful and dangerous world, are you ready?

DEAD ZONE.description: DEAD ZONE is a multiplayer first and third person survival shooter. Your task is to survive within a closed area filled with many enemies.

Clan Wars Playtest.description: Play a 3D MOBA shooter with a twist. Harvest and mine resources, build and upgrade items, level up, keep track of your progress with our progression system.

UNDETECTED Demo.description: Stealth your way through the shadows and uncover a corporate conspiracy. Become a cyber-augmented agent in this gameplay-focused stealth game that brings classic sneaking to the modern era.

Super Adventure Hand.description: It’s the world’s most adventurous hand! You play as a hand on a gripping handventure, a quest, a calling, through a strange and dangerous world. And in the end figure out why your beloved arm has left you.

DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris Demo.description: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!

YGeia.description: Ygeia is an introspective puzzle-solving adventure game in which the player must overcome a series of challenges that could lead to anxiety.

Space Aces.description: Space Aces is a video game made for the spring 2022 offering of CAP 4053 at UCF. The player controls a space fighter capable of movement in 3 directions and rotation in 3 directions. The game supports any controller, keyboard, and the Thrustmaster 1600M flight stick.

Cyrah's Ascent.description: Cyrah's Ascent is a third-person combat game with high mobility. Imbued with essence, Cyrah must defeat the Laust and avenge her people.

GOODBYE WORLD Demo.description: "GOODBYE WORLD" is a narrative adventure game. Play through 12 stages of a puzzle platformer while following the two protagonists through 13 chapters of their story.

Wildlife Planet: The Incremental Demo.description: Wildlife Planet is a Simulation & Idle game with the theme of wildlife and nature. You will unlock more and more species as you level up and learn the species knowledge. This is a game with refreshing scenes, immersive background music, and different kinds of wild animals and plants.

Star Hearts: Launch Point Demo.description: Star Hearts: Launch Point is a tight 2D action adventure featuring an 8-bit retro aesthetic in classic NES-fashion. Journey to the galaxy’s edge and discover the origins of Prin - an interstellar revolutionary in the making - as she embarks upon her first space-faring adventure!

It's Time.description: Play as a young scientist who invents a time portal and uses it to bring back his dead wife. Soon, things become chaotic in his life. Make choices and help people as you progress. Decide whom to save, your family or friends. Your choices determine the ending.

Realm Of Cubes.description: Realm Of Cubes is a voxel-based action adventure RPG. It takes place in a handcrafted voxel Fantasy world!

Smash Crates Demo.description: Smash Crates is a local/online fighting game of pure chaos. BUILD, DESTROY and MANIPULATE the battlefield to your advantage. Fight for glory with up to 4 friends as the Crates of myth and legend. Be there and be square!

Technicity: Prologue Demo.description: Free Prologue to Technicity, a first-person city-building game with powerful tools that allow you to build faster and bigger. Design your own construction blocks and furniture in factories, terraform the open world, use vehicles to travel in cities that you or your friends create in solo or co-op.

Candy Bar.description: Candy bar is a dating simulator with a set of mini-games. You ended up in a new city thanks to a candy store inherited from a wealthy relative. Meet the locals, invite them to your new store and treat them to candies.

Foreclosure Simulator.description: Manage a bailiff in Foreclosure Simulator. Do business, earn money, buy new houses and vehicles. Decorate your home and garden according to your imagination. Enjoy the open world.

Schizoids.description: In this classic top-down space game from 1983, you can take on one of the most dangerous jobs in the galaxy: garbage disposal. Try to survive for as long as possible, while knocking the giant garbage pods into a black hole with your Space-Dozer.

Space Turbo.description: Space Turbo - A dynamic 3D arcade game in which you have to fly a futuristic space plane through an endless tunnel and avoid various traps.

Potion Permit Demo.description: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a brewing cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

Twin Ruin Demo.description: Switch bullet hell into bullet heaven. Jump into a world filled with enemies and powerups, race to harvest all the power you can before the area is consumed by a engulfing fire storm. Try Survival and try and last 3 mins, and top the leaderboard.

echo.description: Echo is a puzzle game, where a clone reflects all your moves. Your goal is to solve puzzles and find out how to destroy your clone.

格斗少女.description: This is an easy decompression fighting game You can play alone or fight with your friends on the same screen On the basis of fighting, the explosive clothing system is integrated.

Robo Legend.description: As Robo, you will decide the destiny of Gear Town and its robot people. Make decisive choices, explore biomes, solve puzzles and mini-games, battle hordes of robotic enemies in this cute pixel-art Twin Stick Shooter RPG, and write the Robo legend.

MaDevil Demo.description: MaDevil is a singleplayer adventure-rpg in which you are the last sane survivor of a devil-caused apocalypse.

The Newton Mystery.description: The Newton Mystery is a 2D puzzle platforming adventure where you play as a group of friends who have formed a rag-tag monster crime-solving team. Join them on their journey of self-discovery, wacky interactions, and realizations that everything is not as it seems in the sleepy town of Newton...

Fantasy Fighters.description: Fantasy Fighters is a turn-based game with single-player and two-player modes. Pick a class of fighters, build your score and unlock new class levels and game items to build a great team!

Until The End Demo.description: In Until The End, you play as Zoe, a young nurse who has just graduated. At the Montagne Institute, you will help her make the best decisions for the well-being of her patients in a palliative care unit.

Wastelander Demo.description: Wastelander is a turn-based colony-building strategy game with roguelike elements. Build a colony up from nothing on a remote desert planet, unlock unique buildings and re-activate powerful relics to protect yourself from destructive storms. Every game and every colony is different!

MIRADOR.description: MIRADOR is a 2D action game. You arrive at a temple... Kill several monsters to grow, get skills, and go through it!

Sudoqube.description: Randomly Generated 3 dimensional sudoku puzzle game.

Navy War.description: Ready for the naval battle? Online ships are waiting for you!

SPQR - Crime Stories in Ancient Rome.description: SPQR is a mystery thriller drama about a PTSD ridden legionary turned detective, whose cases lead him spiraling deeper into a web of deceit, corruption, and murder when he unmasks a powerful cult with a plan to destroy the republic.

Ocean Riders Demo.description: Extravagant racing game with overpowered turbojet engines on huge waves.

Atelophobia.description: AteloPhobia is a game with elements of Point&Click, RPG and horror. Something is hiding in the basement of the house... And it's definitely not rats.As you descend, you begin your terrifying and deadly adventure.

Eniko: Ghosts Of Grace Demo.description: A story-rich action rpg that pays hommage to 90's gaming with it's retro 2.5D pixel art look. Join Livia, a gusty but ambitious young Warrior, in a tale that explores the meaning of family, loyalty, ambition and war. After a fateful encounter, everything Livia believes in will be put to the test.

Dream Walk: Mortgage.description: Dream Walk: Mortgage is a top-down arcade-style game that requires on quick maneuvering and simple multitasking. While avoiding bad-guys, petting cats, and collecting sunflower seeds, you must also remember to click the interest button. Accumulate Dream-Dollars to buy new shoes and dream-houses.

NeoPiano Demo.description: NeoPiano is a midi vizualizer software which brings live performances to life.

SuperDuck!.description: Explore levels, create paths for the ducklings to reach the exit and save them from being stranded in this puzzle platformer.

Beat The Clock Demo.description: Test your reflexes, skill and resolve to see if you can Beat The Clock

Cold Land.description: Help a bear find its lost cub in a beautiful lowpoly snow land. Activate runes along the way to be able to access new regions.

FLAM THE PURGE OF THE CENTURY.description: FLAM est un justicier des temps modernes. Les ordres lui sont transmis, au sein de son bataillon par le colonel "Marco Banzini". Il doit coûte que coûte se livrer à des missions pour régler les conflits tout en essayant de préserver sa propre vie.

Genimas: Life reborn Playtest.description: you are Drassil, a demigod raised and trained by Freyja far from civilization, your destiny is to defeat the evil entity known as Ragnarok and to achieve it, you will have to evolve genetically traveling through the 9 Nordic worlds.

Arto Demo.description: Fight through unique biomes against challenging enemies and bosses as you piece together the mysteries of a broken world, in an action role-playing experience that paints a new path.

猎魔战纪 Playtest.description: 该游戏是一款独立制作的回合制RPG，喜欢回合制RPG的朋友一定不要错过！游戏中你可以体验逐步变强然后击败一个又一个强大BOSS的快感。每个角色可以选择不同的培养路线，你可以根据你自己的思路选择角色天赋，进行装备搭配，以及练习技能！ 总之，如果你喜欢回合制RPG这个游戏你一定要尝试一下，我相信你玩了之后绝不会后悔！

Turtles vs. Mushrooms.description: Finally, it's the turtle's turn to rise! Spin, jump, and smash your way through dozens of tricky old-school platforming levels, all with unique gimmicks and mechanics, to challenge even seasoned platform gamers.

Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 6.description: A great hidden object game set aboard a cruise ship

Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 7.description: A great hidden object game set aboard a cruise ship

Guardian Mage VR Demo.description: Feel like a battle mage, able to embody powerful spells and bring them down on opponents from the air! Control the course of the battle with the help of rune magic, summon your troops and erect defensive structures. This world is in your hands!

Belarus Simulator: Preventive Strike.description: You are the ruler of a democratic independent state of Belarus. Unfortunately, you receive troubled news. An act of aggression is planned against your country. You need to do everything in your power to stop it.

AstraX.description: AstraX is a side-scrolling action game about flying ships that can destroy everything in their path.

Monkey Adventure.description: Run, jump, attack, explore. Cross the various dangers and reach the destination.

Z-Warp.description: Z-Warp is an intense vertical shoot’em up presented in retro pixel art style, featuring frenetic arcade-inspired action where blasters, bombs and KILLER specials are your only allies.

Granvil's Fairytale.description: Granvil's fairytale is an interesting and challenging platform adventure that gives you a lot of satisfaction. By controlling the movements of the dwarf, you need to show above-average dexterity to move on to the next stage. At the same time, you will see an world full of obstacles and surprises!

Legacy of Sin blood oath Demo.description: Legacy Of Sin Blood Oath is a real-time strategy, RPG, survival and route defense game. CONTROL the battlefield, DEFEND routes from different enemies! Take COMMAND of an army of soldiers! Win and gain experience to unlock new upgrades and unique abilities for the battlefield. Conquer, WIN!

Railbound Demo.description: A relaxing puzzle game about fixing train connections from the makers of Golf Peaks and inbento!

Beautiful Ukraine.description: Experience the beauty of Ukraine in this interactive puzzle game. Piece together gorgeous photos and videos of landmarks, cities, and natural splendor. All sales will be donated directly to charities in support of Ukraine and its people.

Karagon: Prelude.description: Survive, shoot, construct, and ride killer elemental robots. Explore multi-floor buildings, craft equipment and obtain schematics, progress through technology tiers, build a base. Alone or with friends in this post apocalyptic open world survival robot riding crafting shooter game!

XEARZ.description: XEARZ is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with a retro feel. It features a multi-plane that can be moved to the front and back. The player uses a melee weapon, the blade, a gun that can use guided and reflective rounds, and subweapons such as grenades to defeat enemies. Weapons can be upgraded.

Falling Elevator.description: Welcome in Falling Elevator which is a casual unique game. Have you ever been stuck in an elevator? Well, if no, be ready for what's worse. Besides the fact you're stuck there with a few people, THE ESCALATOR IS FALLING !!!

Pure Logic Demo.description: Explore logic symbols. Discover the rules. Solve complex puzzles. Conquer all zones. Feel the power of your logical side!

I Was Lost Demo.description: Move walls, avoid danger in a labyrinthic poem, and create your own stories in this unique puzzle experience where each level is a poem's verse unraveling as you progress. Control not only your position but also move walls to create new paths and escape from seemingly impossible situations.

Mysterious Things.description: Mystic Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the map within a certain time.

3D PUZZLE - Castle.description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

Sciophobia: The Fear of Shadows.description: The year is 2014 and you are a reporter with The Maire Weekly News. In search of a new article, you have dug up all you can find, until you stumble across a promising headline from 1962. Will you find the truth about The Greer Property or will you die alone wandering in the forest?

Splitgate - Test Server.description: Splitgate is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer shooter that features player-controlled portals. This sci-fi shooter takes the FPS genre to a new dimension with its portal mechanics, delivering high-flying, multi-dimensional combat.

Star Stuff Demo.description: A cosmic puzzle adventure about a young alien’s first day at a star factory. Explore thoughtful levels, code your own bots, and save the ever-expanding universe!

Cultivation Story: Reincarnation Playtes.description: Cultivation Story: Reincarnation is a top-down pixel art style action roguelike based on cultivation and Chinese mythology.

Realms.description: Welcome to Realms, a first-person shooter inspired by the rules and aesthetics of popular tabletop RPGs. Use The Die of Chaos along with your abilities and alternate gun fire to help Fortuna explore different realms and destroy any and all threats along the way.

Late photographer 5.description: A simple and easy beauty dynamic jigsaw puzzle and relaxing music can make you have a good mood The right mouse button can quickly complete the puzzle For more clothing, please install free DLC

Delete Virus;.description: Let's become a computer vaccine 'CCAV' to fight computer viruses and aim for A+! Rhythm action game DELETE VIRUS; for passing the virus practical test.

异界生存.description: Special forces cross into the alien world and encounter powerful monsters! One shot, one shot, live! Third person shooting survival game.

Nedia Hotel.description: Experience the thrill of not being able to do anything but run from the horrors within the Nedia Hotel. A First person, PSX stylised Horror game that takes you to Nedia hotel to finish a simple task of carrying 8 plates! Though, is it really that simple?

Night Escaper.description: Survive untill dawn !Night Escaper is a Rogue-like game which has 20 stages.Choose artifact, strengthen artifact, and acquire skills to destroy enemies.Survive at every stage with luck and skill.

From Within.description: Delve into a fantastic old-school RPG featuring great characters and an exciting storyline, from the makers of Skyfall and Ashes of Immortality.

Hearts United.description: In the beginning, there was only once race, today known as the Ancestors. Now, there are more, and the conflicts are ever rising, on an eternal war for survival, after consequences of ill resolved problems, all races and people, for once, will have to learn to work together or be destroyed.

Airport Service Simulator.description: Welcome to the Airport Service Simulator, where your skills will be put to the test on the airport apron!

Unpetrified.description: Play as a sweet, curious stone creature, experience different emotions and see, hear, and feel how the world changes around you. Explore a world filled with flora and fauna, where you interact with your surroundings in unique ways in this single-player narrative adventure.

禁忌taboo.description: 《禁忌》是一款关于表里世界、梦境与现实的悬疑恐怖剧情游戏。 故事围绕中学生徐灿的视角，讲述春游校车事故之后，徐灿意外觉醒某种诡异的感知能力，与神秘少女岳灵药一起重返废弃矿镇调查真相的同时，逐渐寻回被遗忘的记忆……

Chickenoidz Super Party.description: Chickenoidz Super Party - is a multiplayer top-down shooter for 1-4 players. You can play local or online. Get use of the wide armory and special features. Destroy the enemies and shot the arenas to pieces. Become the winner of the chicken PvP battle!

Tiny Arcade Racers.description: Tiny Arcade Racers is a top-down 2.5D arcade racing game. Players may choose to compete against AI drivers in the World Tour or race for the best timing in the Time Trial. In the in-game garage, players can customize the colours of their vehicles.

Apocalive.description: Apocalive is a casual fun to play third-person zombie shooter developed by a single person. The game includes several locations and different game modes. Some are Fast-paced, while other are slow.

SUPEROLA CHAMPION EDITION Demo.description: A challenging runner-style platforming adventure, in which you’ll have to guide a burger loving llama in its quest to defeat the Hotdog Aliens and recover the stolen hamburgers... before they get cold!

Potatoes Demo.description: Potatoes is a puzzle/platformer game in which you control multiple characters by recording what should they do. Make potatoes collaborate to reach the objective in 50 different levels of increasing difficulty!

Legend of a Soul Hunter.description: Legend of a Soul Hunter is an action-adventure game with RPG elements. Explore islands and many individual dungeons by ship. Get items with different abilities, defeat monsters and become a successful soul hunter!

Drone Tinkerer.description: Drone Tinkerer is an open-world racing game with many RPG elements. In a sci-fi world full of secrets, defeat your racing opponents with speed or weapons, modify your unique drones with hundreds of upgrades, and experience mini-games and riddles to keep getting stronger to discover the truth.

Nosher Demo.description: Nosher serves up the perfect platforming meal. Nosh on a variety of 'enemy treats' to possess their powers and movement, opening up more of the stages to find those hidden secrets you remember from classic '90s platformers.

Creature Creator.description: BUILD. PAINT. PLAY. Create your own creatures to explore online worlds with friends and collect parts to upgrade in this creative multiplayer experience!

Frontier.description: The year is 1809, and you have set out to find your fortune on the new frontier! But beware: the legends of Native American lore are more than just campfire stories out here... Wendigos, Skinwalkers, Yetis and more are all too real in this newfound wilderness. Build, craft, and fight to survive!

SpellRogue.description: SpellRogue is a turn-based dice roguelike where you roll Mana Dice, spend them to cast powerful spells, gain legendary artifacts, upgrade your spells and experiment with potent combinations to annihilate your foes.

Legends of Kingdom Rush Demo.description: RPG turn-based combat game with deep tactics and bad jokes! Do you have what it takes to save the kingdom?

The Otherwilde.description: A gorgeous world of photorealistic natural assets, cute villages, and unexpected NPCs. Explore the open world map, gather herbs, create potions, hunt wild animals, build bases, and farm. Currently Pre-Alpha Early Access.

Super Stereotypical: The Rise of Indiema.description: Whip your way through hordes of supernatural monsters and bosses! For fans of classic-vanias and linear 2D side-scrollers with a goal of mastering each stage and destroying its boss! Discover hidden items, secondary weapons and even vehicles!

The World of a Mermaid.description: Welcome in the underwater world of a mermaid, with aquatics creatures & the queen, welcome in The World of a Mermaid!

Project: The MIR Incident.description: Escape from a wide laboratory dominated by battles between rebelling test subjects and armed scientists. Solve puzzles, get into battles, and discover secrets as you progress through this action-packed 2D-Sidescroll-Adventure.

The Elf Maiden.description: You are the Fair Maiden. Walk upon the lands to gather the souls of fallen warriors from past events and escort them to the Holy Land. Fight to gain power and free the fallen who deserve rest and peace.

THE ILLUSION: NIGHTMARE.description: THE ILLUSION NIGHTMARE Is a horror game made by professional crew In the art of horror. You will have the opportunity to experience one of the most powerful types of psychological horror Based on an environment designed in every detail to be a real hell that makes you terrified.

Parallel Demo.description: Parallel is a first-person (third-person optional) RPG adventure game, you will explore a parallel world with a new civilization. Each player will go through different environments, from mysticism, paradise to claustrophobic and destruction scenes. Your choices can change the course of story.

Perish Song Demo.description: Perish Song is a 2D action rogue-lite. Traverse through different environments as you battle unique enemies and bosses. Discover the secrets of the world as you dash and blast through anything standing in your path. Each death is an opportunity to learn, adapt, and overcome.

Regulator City Demo.description: Lead a group of tactical trained experts to control the gangs in your city - modifying the status quo on the streets in this real-time, squad based, action game.

Knights of Fate.description: The Triskelion Knights are an elite force selected and trained to protect the country. They're the King's right hand and they are now called to the biggest mission of their lives, to stop a Shaman from regaining his full powers and starting another war for the souls of the people.

Reborn Souls.description: As a Maiden of the Ecclesia, Sabrina is in charge of special assignments, in lands where dark magic, urban legends and folkore are all real. While investigating a new incident in one of the appeased villages, she will learn much more than she bargained for...

That Which Was Lost.description: Delve into a fantastic old-school RPG featuring great characters and an emotional storyline developed by the makers of Ultima Adventum.

Nightmare: The Lunatic Demo.description: Nightmare: The Lunatic is a hardcore action roguelite platformer game where you escape your nightmare. Swap between 3 weapons constantly, use special attacks, and dodge and parry enemies' attacks. Strengthen yourself by collecting powerful and distinctive totems.

封妖录.description: 讲述一个斩妖除魔的故事，故事中有正义，也有阴谋，有算计，也有恩情。整个流程只需要4-5小时。

Nano Organism.description: Nano Organism - is a real-time strategy game, you control nano cells to control the entire organism, lots of puzzles, dynamic progression, lots of research, achievements, free choice of development direction and progression.

BCI Horror Attraction.description: Meet BCI VR Horror Attraction: The Mad Trail created by members of BCI LAB room. This game gives you optimized fear by measuring brain waves during play. Also, you can check your shooting skills by scoring right after the expedition. Welcome to the tense BCI VR Horror Attraction: The Mad Trail.

A-Mazing Enigmas.description: After venturing into the Trials of Old, help three characters traverse puzzle rooms using the world and the skills unique to each one of them. Guide them to the end of these trails and get the treasures that are held within.

Project Wunderwaffe: Prologue.description: Project Wunderwaffe: Prologue is some part of the full version of the game. The gameplay starts in the realities of World War II, the Soviets and Allies are coming. Your task in the game is to keep enemy troops as far away from your base as possible. Fight and survive!

Bunker 22.description: You are a geneticist who woke up in a forest house. Everyone you knew has turned into bloodthirsty zombies, the world is dying out and a secret experiment is to blame. The only way to prevent disaster is to go to an underground laboratory to create a cure and save those who are still alive

Boo!.description: Exciting missions and crazy shootout with numerous and interesting opponents. Assembling abilities will allow you to complete tasks in a variety of ways. Collect and combine upgrades to suit your playstyle. Make your way to the end of the story to find out the secret and save humanity from monsters.

Animals Transport Simulator.description: Hurry up to take as many orders as possible. Get behind the wheel, but and be careful with the animals.

Drums Rock Demo.description: Drums Rock is an arcade drums game for VR, follow the rhythm of rock with your drums and smash the demons. Live a unique campaign: with different levels, challenges, songs and worlds. Drums Rock is an ideal game to feel like a rock hero, while destroying hordes of demons to the rhythm of rock!

Synergy.description: Humans live on a hostile planet. In this survival city-building game, develop your city, face natural disasters, make the right choices. Explore this environment-changing world while keeping your people happy despite extreme weather conditions.

夏日相册.description: "Summer Album" is a relaxing word game, accompany Xiao Xia to spend a fulfilling day in the morning, help her repair the album, and see what secrets will be discovered?

King of Kalimpong.description: You're a fast-moving minivan with a projectile weapon in this Online Multiplayer PvP Battle Arena. Shoot rocks at your friends and capture their flag. Boost, jump, dodge, and flip to survive. Block projectiles with well-timed kicks, and smash other vehicles to bits when they get in your way.

Bubblegum Galaxy.description: Bubblegum Galaxy is a cute building strategy game about rebuilding the galaxy tile by tile. Discover and design new planets, complete missions, explore your office and befriend your co-workers... all while trying to find out who deleted the galaxy!

Gehinnom Demo.description: Gehinnom - is a multiplayer horror survival game for 1-4 players. (Demo is singleplayer only) Face the demons from the depths of Gehinnom, the objectives, loot, and map will always change. your goal is to defeat the demons by performing a ritual.

Astro Bandits.description: "Astro Bandits" is a classic 2D top-view arcade scrolling shooter. Earth has been attacked by aliens and you need to destroy enemy starships and to save the planet. Nice visuals and atmospheric music will immerse you in the Aerospace Forces.

Just Upstream Demo.description: In this Physics-based VR Adventure, Jump, climb, and swing through mystic nature as Paul, A Frog. On a journey to find self worth, meet new friends, find hidden secrets, and get to the root of your fears.

The Rewind Factory Demo.description: A software update fails and you end up in a test track. The only way out: complete the test track. You can rewind trough time, wall run, dash and slow time to complete the test chambers as fast a possible. Can you beat the fastest time in this FPS movement based game?

Samuda Interval.description: Samuda Interval is a visual novel, slice-of-life, murder mystery & supernatural game. You play the daily life of Park Haewon, a college freshman attending classes, working part-time jobs, and meeting new people. Solving the serial kidnapping & murder case is your highest priority.

Adventure Trip: London Collector's Editi.description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

Other Demo.description: Challenge your friends in Other ! Collect 5 letters to eliminate your opponents, be the last player alive to win !

Slaughter Cannon 2.description: Slaughter Cannon - Continuation of the first part of an exciting physical puzzle! In the game you will find even more exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.

Block Breaker 2.description: Block Breaker 2 - Sequel to an exciting puzzle game with many challenging levels and beautiful graphics.

Notice me, Leena-senpai!.description: Oh no! The Demon Lord is attacking! Help Leena-senpai defend her town against a horde of demon lord goons!

The Trials Of Beadie.description: The Trials Of Beadie is a 2D side scrolling platformer that relies on precision playing mechanics such as run, jump, wall jump, dash, fast fall, hover, and wall grab. Play for fun or speed run as fast as you can. You can die as many times as you like, but there are no save points and no continues.

Smiths & Legends.description: Smiths & Legends is a top-down co-op Blacksmithing RPG. Craft recipes within the time limit with your friends while defending your shop from monsters. Go through the 60+ levels, fight monsters and bosses, and level up your party!

Einar - Loki's Traps Demo.description: You are a Viking named Einar, who when comparing himself to Loki is caught in a trap.

Silent World.description: Get rid of fatigue in Silent World! Listen to relaxing music and casual skateboarding in the sunset or early morning. It’s just a simple 2D pixel game.

Ante Mortem.description: What would be your first and last wish if you died tomorrow? Explore this mysterious and frightening island. Solve its puzzles. And discover the truth before sinking into the purest madness that can exist... That of knowing your death.

Island of the Ancients Demo.description: A single-player third-person / first-person action-adventure shooter set on a mystical island. With a companion by your side, fight your way through scores of deadly creatures. Discover new weapons and companions to tip the odds in your favor. Your family's survival depends on it.

Wassie Tale.description: Wassie Tale tells the story of one courageous Wassie & their treacherous journey. Hop, fly, swim & slam your way across diverse levels in this lore-rich, challenging 2D Side Scroller. Do you have what it takes to become the savior of all Wassie-kind?

Lightout 2.description: Lightout 2 is a psychological horror game with a scary atmosphere, the game takes place in an Abandoned hospital.

The Bastonnes.description: When all families gather around a table in a dark room, you know peace is not the outcome. Try to eliminate other families and be the last one standing.

CAVE VR.description: CAVE is the original VR puzzle game, looking for a journey of exploration in the ancient mysterious cave ruins, the ruins of the ancient inhabitants are from the exit ruins in layers, and the horse-hunting treasure hunt on the road seems to imply on.

A Contusion Demo.description: A Contusion is a leisurely hardcore top-down roguelite shooter where the hero gets lost in the labyrinths of memory. A variety of weapons, armor and shields, grenades and first aid kits, powerful artifacts and perks will become faithful companions on the path of memories.

Arth Island.description: Gather resources, set up a camp, choose your class, level up your skills, don't die of cold or starvation and battle the other failed experiments to survive as long as possible on this procedurally generated island

Mebula.description: Mebula, seal Mebulies, train them and fight to be the best!

战争指挥官.description: Super shocking military strategy game world! Lots of weapons and combat effects. * Collect more advanced commanders and build weapons and equipment. * Loot resources, build military units, and pass various interesting levels. * Legion battle, you can attack other players.

Kanpeki Demo.description: Dragged into her own mind, a fashion obsessed high-schooler must escape a twisted version of her rural hometown. She explores empty streets and abandoned buildings as a mysterious light in the distant forest watches over her. A horror game about perfectionism.

Circadian Dice Demo.description: Circadian Dice is a game inspired by single-player deck-building games, but instead of upgrading a deck, you build up a set of dice! Use 10 different heroes and 60 game-warping relics to take on 13 hand-crafted scenarios, in runs that take 10-30 minutes. Lots of secrets and unlocks to discover!

PARANECRO.description: Our character is a detective with a busy business life. But it has a bad history. He lost his wife and 1-month-old child in his womb in a traffic accident. That's why he's a bit of a psychiatrist. After losing his wife, he experienced strange events.

BYTE CATS.description: Delve into a story-driven adventure and channel your inner kitten in this challenging old-school platformer. Perform wall-jumps, evade deadly obstacles, hunt mice and use powerful abilities to destroy everyone who stands in your way!

Gem Setter.description: i'm gem setter, a block sliding puzzle game about moving ice in an abstract world. solve clever puzzles using ice blocks to change your shape and open new paths, then build your own levels using the built-in level editor.
