Save All Monsters!.description: Puzzle game where you place all the monsters in safe squares before the time ends! Analyze the chess-like attack patterns of weapons to avoid danger. Use resistant monsters to protect normal monsters from ranged attacks! Keep social distancing with bomb monsters! Discover and save all the monsters!

No Son Of Mine.description: No Son Of Mine is a survival horror game focused on combat, stealth, exploration, puzzle solving and uncovering a gruesome mystery. Your job is to find the truth, before HE finds you.

PARANECRO Demo.description: Our character is a detective with a busy business life. But it has a bad history. He lost his wife and 1-month-old child in his womb in a traffic accident. That's why he's a bit of a psychiatrist. After losing his wife, he experienced strange events.

Intergalactic Taxi Co..description: Intergalactic Taxi Co. is a casual puzzle game about picking up and dropping off passengers across a colorful, low-poly galaxy. Plan your route carefully to avoid running out of fuel and get everyone where they need to be!

Heroes of Time Demo.description: A turn-based JRPG game which mixes science-fiction and medieval fantasy making young teens from the future contrasting with medieval people and creatures. Get ready to make your own choises to save the future.

Me and the Zombies.description: Me and the Zombies is a shooter game. You’ll find weapons and ammunition you’ll need to fight your way against the zombies. You’re in a remote place and the only way out is through a tunnel. Find it!

Jello Demo.description: Jello is a physics-based platformer where you jump as a cute slime using just the two sticks of your controller

SU the Son of Gaia.description: Explore the land of Panacea and its secrets in this vibrant and colorful pixelart Action RPG and help SU in his adventure to recover the balance of the contaminated ecosystems.

Spellslinger VR.description: In Spellslinger VR you will run into a variety of monsters, puzzles, and challenges you must overcome by casting a wide array of elementally-aligned spells. The core gameplay comes from its unique spellcasting system, where stringing together specific arm and hand movements casts spells.

Forward Defense.description: Forward Defense is a top-down 3D singleplayer tower defense game. Join the United Coalition Force and defeat incoming waves of insurgent forces in a war-torn region of the Middle East.

Learn Japanese RPG: Hiragana Forbidden S.description: Dialogue changes from English to Japanese as you learn and progress in this comedic RPG backed by professional Japanese voice acting. Master reading hiragana and over 240 common words used in anime!

Witchbane Demo.description: Witchbane is a retro-styled 2D action platformer where you must use your skills and weapons to make your way through several distinct levels to stop the witches treacherous machinations. Fight through hordes of enemies, fight to keep your sanity, or see the chaos that lies just beyond the veil.

The Legend of Chibi Ninja.description: CHIBI NINJA is a ruthless 2D Puzzle platformer. Play as The Legendary Hero and destroy hordes of mechanical beasts to save your world from a mind controlling extraterrestial parasite using detonable BOMB SHURIKENS. Be very wary though, you can only endure one single hit. Are you up to the task?

Knights of the Exploding Table.description: Knights of the Exploding Table is an explosive platformer that harks back to the late 90's era of 3D games. Place, kick, lift, and throw bombs to navigate your way to the end of each stage. Collect gems to buy hats and unlock extra stuff. Challenge your friends to exhilarating Explosion Battles!

Undergrave Playtest.description: Undergrave is a tactical roguelike which moving, jumping, managing your stamina, dashing and 𝘁𝗵𝗿𝗼𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘀𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗱 𝗮𝘄𝗮𝘆 strategically is vital for success.

Heroes of Time.description: A turn-based JRPG game which mixes science-fiction and medieval fantasy making young teens from the future contrasting with medieval people and creatures. Get ready to make your own choises to save the future.

Metal World: Street Scraps.description: Do you like cars? Driving at high speed? Metal World is a racing game of the endless runner genre, where the player drives flying vehicles in a retrofuturistic world! Test your reflexes and show your skills at high speed!

The Journey - Episode 2: Words of Wisdom.description: The second step that you never knew you needed to take to get to wherever you're wanting to go... You won't regret this experience. You have nothing to lose, and everything to gain...

虚幻宇宙：重启.description: 目前只有第一人称射击模式，穿越时空，在虚幻宇宙，与不可描述的力量作斗争，各种类型的怪物，消灭纳粹丧尸，清理被核废水感染的怪物，抗击小丑资本家，在各种异空间中不停的战斗，你有无限子弹无后座力的双持AK，高级的人工智能，怀中抱妹，各种状态

Arclight Beat.description: Arclight Beat is a minimalistic rhythm based 3D platformer in which you control various level elements by modifying the music.

棋物语 Stick Go story.description: Stick Go story (棋物语) is a single-player indie game. It attempts to link strategy board games with fighting RPG games. The stickman-like characters can be regarded as 11 Go pieces, and you can fight against enemies by moving these pieces with some strategy.

Beautiful Mystic Survivors Demo.description: Roguelite bullet-hell meets sexy anime in Beautiful Mystic Survivors, as you rise to help gorgeous heroines destroy countless invading monsters. Plan your builds, upgrade heroines, and survive against the clock. Experience polished 3D graphics, flashy VFX, and surrounded by thousands of monsters.

Grizelda: Lynx and the Nine Lives.description: Join Lynx on an adventure to rescue a princess and collect 9 souls. A retro-action RPG filled with puzzles, dungeons, and treasure.

Surflexers.description: Surflexers is a fast-paced VR game with puzzle elements where you have to make quick decisions and move along "lines" to advance in the game

Echo's Climb.description: Echo's Climb is a challenging, 3D adventure platformer. You'll explore a kingdom frozen in stone, ascend the various locales and collect echoes of the past, all to hopefully return these lands to their former glory.

CARROT: Pancakes and Waffles.description: a slice of life game where you live a peaceful day in a whimsical hand-painted coastal town

Last Meow Standing.description: This lightning fast arena shooter brings you right back to the highscore hunts of the arcade era. Use your arsenal of deadly weapons wisely against the increasingly ferocious monster hordes to survive as long as you can.

Cabinet of Curiosities VR.description: This is a fully immersive and interactive VR Experience set in a Victorian style Cabinet of Curiosities room, full of hundreds of highly detailed 3D scanned objects from the natural world, that can be picked up, examined, and explored like a museum without restrictions.

LOLLIPOP: SUMMER!.description: LOLLIPOP: SUMMER! is an exciting puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In the game LOLLIPOP: SUMMER! You will find many bright and varied visuals, very beautiful music and many achievements.

Mortmentum.description: Fight endless waves of different enemies using your grappling hook in clever ways while trying hopelessly to stay alive just a little longer so you can get a higher score.

Royal Legends: Raised in Exile Collector.description: Save the king and his kingdom! Don't let a cunning and unprincipled villain ascend the throne! You are the only one who can influence the course of history. Are you ready to accept the challenge?

Cryospace: Prologue.description: You are not a soldier. Not a fighter. Just an ordinary maintenance guy. Yet you have to fight. And you are forced to run. But chiefly: you must help the frozen crew survive on a spaceship. You are the only one who can save others. You are made a hero against your will. You become a leader. A slayer.

Dreams of Pain Demo.description: Dreams of Pain is a first-person mystery puzzle game with a strong emphasis on the atmosphere and mood.

Duel Jousting VR.description: Duel Jousting VR - Fast paced Dragon Jousting in multiple maps and game modes. Use an arsenal of up to 7 weapons to crush your enemies. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Dragon Jouster in VR?

Ogu and the Secret Forest.description: Explore the wonderful world with baby Ogu! 'Ogu and the Secret Forest' is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and various types of puzzles. Befriend bouncy characters and defeat strange creatures to unravel the mystery of the charming world.

Genimas: Life reborn.description: you are Drassil, a demigod raised and trained by Freyja far from civilization, your destiny is to defeat the evil entity known as Ragnarok and to achieve it, you will have to evolve genetically traveling through the 9 Nordic worlds.

Infinity Girl Demo.description: Infinity Girl is a high-speed rhythm/racer/roguelite where everything — every action, every enemy and every spectacular world you encounter — is driven by the beat of the music. Each run is unique, with procedural levels that test your skills as you grind, drift, boost and leap to the rhythm.

Zombies and Keys Demo.description: Zombies and Keys is a short action-adventure game with simple, satisfying combat and pure exploration, carefully designed to minimize cognitive load. Perfect for someone who values gameplay over everything else.

Sunken Realms Demo.description: Descend into an abandoned underground city to battle orcs, solve puzzles, collect loot, and then return to the surface to upgrade your gear and stats in this modern, old-school dungeon-crawler.

Plank Road Demo.description: "Plank road simulation" is a game that allows you to enjoy easy and free simulation of plank road construction. By following the construction method of Chinese traditional frame structure and combining various building elements, To create our own legendary plank road journey.

Chaste Tris.description: Chaste Tris is my first complete video game I have made. It is obviously based on similar other games but easier because there is no gravity. Blocks can be freely moved up, down, left, and right with the arrow keys. They can be rotated with X or Y keys and can also be held for later use with C.

Last Time I Saw You Demo.description: Help Ayumi unravel the curse which a mysterious girl has brought upon his town, and with whom he happens to have also fallen in love. A hand-drawn coming-of-age narrative adventure about a first love and a terrible curse set in late 80's Japan.

Brewmaster: Beer Brewing Simulator Demo.description: Brew your perfect beer in this relaxing home brewing sim. Use a realistic chemistry simulation to brew hoppy IPAs to creamy stouts. Customise your brewing space, create recipes and label your beer, unlock new equipment and enter competitions. Learn to brew, refine your craft and become a Brewmaster!

Pixel Gangsters.description: Run your gang of mobsters and conquer the city in this indie mafia tycoon game.

Cute Cats 3.description: Kittens come back to challenge you once again! Test your memory and attentiveness. Play a new chapter of the beloved puzzle game and find all differences in pictures with our cute fellas.

Eger.description: "Eger" is a colorful and enjoyable side-scrolling 2D platform shooter. Insectoid aliens attacked our planet, and you ended up in a dense forest with no support.

This is a Ghost.description: This is a Ghost is a surnatural investigation game. You are a member of a secret society that hunts or sets free scary entities from our world. Gather evidence, identify the entity and send it back to the afterlife.

Bogdan's HeartQuest - The Invader Slayer.description: Princess Marcela is cursed! Bogdans is a knight trying to cure and protect his beloved girlfriend from reckless people that would do any thing to win the generous prize Marcela's desperate father offered for those who find a solution.

Fueled Up Demo.description: Fueled Up is a chaotic couch co-op spaceship recovery game for up to four players. You and your crewmates must fuel, fix and rescue damaged spaceships before the evil space octopus gets its tentacles on them!

집착의 망자 - 집으로부터의 탈출.description: 만약 당신의 집 안에 당신의 생명을 노리는 괴한이 들어온다면?

The Alpinist.description: Make your way up the mountain with your ice axe and your grappling hook. Hold tight, watch your steps and make sure not to fall, you never know how far you're gonna land.

Heir Obscure Playtest.description: Escape the clutches of a decadent cult of aristocrats and the demon that haunts their retreat. Stay quiet, stick to the shadows, uncover the dark secrets of the sadistic Empire and of the mysterious Plightswoman who claims to want to help you. A story-rich horror game with immersive stealth.

Ghost Girl Lasling (G-rated).description: This is a story of Lasling, a talented genius teenage girl with amazing working abilities, who becomes a ghost after an accident. The only person in the world she is visible to is Mofft, the male main protagonist. Their meeting is as if a fateful encounter and love story begins.

Tom's Adventure.description: A little but very fun and challenging platform game.

Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars.description: Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars, is a VRMMORPG highlighting community and immersion, your adventure takes place in a vast fully interactable 61 x 61 km world with an endless supply of quests, loot, and adventures for you to engage in.

Orbital Approach.description: Orbital Approach is a Physics based, arcade space game where the highest score rules supreme. Navigate around planets, avoid obstacles, travel through wormholes, and more!

Part of You Demo.description: Retrieve your misplaced Identity from the Lost and Found at a Clown Convention. Use tools to change the faces of the people of Hacksaw Springs. Encounter a frazzled diner owner, a blueberry loving information broker, an unlicensed orthodontist and more on your way to find your lost self.

Racoonie: Legend of the Spirits.description: Become the Racoonie! A small, yet courageous adventurer traveling through Everland to collect the blessings of the four great animal spirits.

Library of Babel Demo.description: Join Ludovik in a 2D Stealth Platformer and Graphic Adventure, as he explores the jungles of a futuristic Babylon to discover the secret behind the Library of Babel’s sudden lockdown and the mysteries behind their mythical creators.

Field of Glory: Kingdoms.description: Politics, religion, war. They are nothing without a legacy that can stand the test of time. Lead any nation, and turn it into a mighty kingdom in one of the most compelling grand strategy games ever created.

We are definitely the baddies.description: A minimalist city builder where only profits matter. Build factories and extract everything before you are forced to leave the planet.

Warhammer 40,000: Warpforge.description: A free-to-play digital collectible card game set in the 41st millennium, Warpforge will bring together all the major factions of the Warhammer 40,000 universe as digital cards for players to collect and do battle with in brutal and fast-paced skirmishes.

Home Designer - Architecture.description: Home Designer - Architecture is your innovative software to bring your 3D floor plan to life.Draw your floor plan in just a few steps and customize it with over 1,000 pieces of furniture and accessories.Create photorealistic images and share them with your friends.

Putinist Slayer.description: Putinist Slayer is a fast-paced action about destroying putinists in deep space. Let loose in infinity roguelike shoot’em up with sticky gameplay. Kill hordes, dodge, upgrade, eliminate bosses and reach new highest records! With memes from Ukraine.

Kinkoi Golden Time.description: Welcome to Noble Private Academy, an institution that cultivates the wealthiest, most well-connected students in all of Japan! At this boarding school, one must be willing to accept all of its refined and dignified teachings or be met with strict opposition!

FLASHOUT 3 Demo.description: FLASHOUT IS BACK! Where high speed meets high stakes. Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. Take part in an exciting, head-to-head fight to the finish!

SIR ABANDON.description: It is an RPG type game, in 2D retro. You play as a knight (Sir Abandon) who will evolve through many levels. You will have to farm certain levels several times to increase your experience and gain levels, as well as collect enough gold to improve your equipment.

SIR ABANDON Demo.description: It is an RPG type game, in 2D retro. You play as a knight (Sir Abandon) who will evolve through many levels. You will have to farm certain levels several times to increase your experience and gain levels, as well as collect enough gold to improve your equipment.

Crazy shark.description: You have to control a crazed shark that lives in the depths of the ocean. Declare war on all living things, but be careful, the military is hunting you! Eat vacationers, break yachts, wreck ships, destroying submarines and helicopters!

Pirate fishing.description: In the exciting game "Pirate fishing" you play as a fisherman and your task is to catch as many fish as possible to earn a lot of money. Pump up your fishing rod and try to set a record for catching fish every time!

Sword of the Stars: The Pit 2 Demo.description: The Pit2 returns to the turn-based Roguelike roots of the indie classic and takes you to another alien facility filled with broken machines, warped creatures, and new surprises!

CROPPED.description: Cropped is a first-person action horror adventure - Survive the night as the farm you've arrived at has taken a turn for the worse...

Ember Crusade IV Demo.description: Ember Crusade IV is a twin stick looter shooter roguelike where you embark on a blazing crusade to save the solar system from a demonic invasion.

FRIEND ON THE GO.description: A RPG about making friends. Professional voice acting, original art, original soundtrack!

Barbaria.description: Barbaria is a VR combat/builder mashup. Attack other players, build defenses, and equip your team as you compete to be the Mightiest in Barbaria!

Gone.description: A new FPS survival horror experience

Dash Shooters Playtest.description: Dash Shooters is a multiplayer, fast paced racing game, where the main movement mechanic is dashing! Dash yourself through a randomly generated map to the finish line before your friends! Gather powerups to buff yourself, or mess with your friends!

Vacant Kingdom Demo.description: Vacant Kingdom is a synthesis of bullet hell and story-driven action-RPG. Explore a whimsical yet desolate land and rally its adrift people by solving their problems.

Grand Theft Gato: Vice Kitty Demo.description: Work for the Meowfia or work for the Purrlice, it’s your choice. Drive cars, scale buildings, steal, get into back-alley fights, or rob banks. Bring your friends to have a crew!

Drago Noka.description: The surface has become overrun with giant beasts and destructive vermin, leaving an uninhabitable world in their quake. Humans had to get creative and now… they live on the backs of dragons! Gather various materials, create new items, and develop your very own village in Drago Noka!

Traffic Safety.description: This game is used to educate everyone on the importance of traffic safety。 Include: BREAK OUT SATURN、ENEMY GUNFIRE、AIR SCRAMBLED、DANGEROUS WATER、CROSS THE ROAD. Five mingame.

Godless grove.description: Godless grove - survival horror with elements of a hunting simulator in an open world filled with horrors. Uncover the terrible secrets of the locals and overcome the disgusting creatures of evil that have gathered over this grove.

Vowel Movements.description: In Vowel Movements you race against the clock to group words together into categories. The only catch is that each of the vowels has been replaced by a different vowel. Surely that can’t make things too difficult…

War In Heaven.description: Chaotic boss-rush, bullet-hell-y, twin-stick arena shooter mayhem! Dynamically changing arena forces you to be vigilant: Watch the bullets, watch the walls!

MYRNEscapes.description: A single player exploration game, with audio-reactive elements set to the music of MYRNE's Circles EP

Goetia 2.description: Explore a dark & unknown Venice in this point-and-click adventure. Your goal? Find a way to reunite your soul & body. Gather information & solve puzzles in your spectral form to make your way into this world despite the shenanigans of a troublesome demon!

Lunar Camp Glenn.description: Lunar Camp Glenn is a STEM education simulation based on NASA plans and technology for ARTEMIS mission lunar base. It is the only first-person player game to explore the moon for resources to survive and meet with different characters to cooperate or not.

Space Station.description: Explore the corridors of the space station “Simbirsk” full of secrets and dangers. Defeat aggressive creatures, collect the results of experiments, solve puzzles and feel the atmosphere of a real space adventure. Can you get out of the station and complete the mission?

After He Was Gone.description: "After He Was Gone" is a Tactical RPG. NO level-up system. Character's skills and items will change the battle situation significantly. Collect the treasures and lead therianthropes from getting out from the world of board game. Don’t worry. If YOU don’t lose hope, we can rewind the time any time.

Dungeon Fall.description: In this fantasy action game, you dodge obstacles and pick up treasure while falling in an endless cavern. Unlock characters with powerful movement abilities as you strive to fall deeper and deeper before the inevitable SPLAT.

Victim.description: Play as the Vulnerable Victim Face the Odds against the never ending threat of the Ominous Oppression. Explore the Mysterious Existential Crisis of the Desolate World as everything threatens The Victim's sensibilities.

One Shot.description: One Shot is a Ultra Dynamic shooter when you try to survive against a waves of enemy and fight a "final boss" at the end of each waves.

Deck Adventurers II Demo.description: Save the Valley from the hordes of monsters that ravage it in this turn-based tactical combat and deck-building RPG game.

HORROR TYCOON Playtest.description: Scare, terrify and thrill guests as you build the haunted house of your nightmares. Design and customize your creations with incredible detail to scare your guests, or risk losing it all in this tycoon/tower defense hybrid!

打工吧！天使酱 ~天使在魔界的劳改生活~.description: 身为业绩不达标的天使，你被迫降到魔界进行劳改。 为了不要永远留在可怕的魔域，你必须完成业绩，否则……

LoFi Hotel.description: LoFi Hotel is a cozy hotel management game. Collect guests, songs, itens and musicians over the cutest flying turtle on the planet. Your songs will sound different depending of which musicians are in your party. The beautiful hand-crafted animations wraps an unique game. No rush! Just chill!

Burial Stone Demo.description: A VR tile based dungeon crawl. Delve into a dark horrifying dungeon, with weird creatures and unexpected danger. Use spells, skills and weapons to traverse the dangers.

War in Europe: 1940.description: War in Europe: 1940 is inspired by classic FPS and historical operations happened during 1940 in Europe where you will fight along two campaigns(Axis and Allies) allowing you to fight in the conflict in both sides.

Symmetry Lines.description: Simple puzzle game with symmetry and lines.

Breaking and Entering.description: Run, steal, hide, and try not to get caught! Guards patrol and will chase you if they see you. Steal what you can, but be careful so you don't get weighed down. Guards and cameras protect these treasures. Do you think you have what it takes to become a master thief?

DAYBREAK.description: You are a rogue gun-for-hire that has been contracted to deploy into an outbreak zone to uncover the truth of a widespread pandemic. Armed with just your wits & determination, you must fight your way through the horde, befriend local survivors, and fight off the scavengers that lurk in the shadows.

TYPER GIRL.description: Enemies will continue to appear from the right side of the screen. All enemies will have a word above their heads, and you need to use the keyboard to type the correct letter to kill them before they reach the edge of the screen.

Infinitevania.description: Explore different worlds, defeat enemies and challenging bosses, solve puzzles, acquire new skills and upgrades and get stronger in search of being able to destroy the core of Infinitevania and return to your world.

Chromatic.description: Chromatic is a 2D Side-Scroller where your goal is to bring color into a monochrome world by using your abilities to traverse new terrain and defeat enemies.

Cosmopoly.description: COSMOPOLY - is a multiplayer board game for 1-6 players. Play with friends, buy planets and space stations, participate in auctions and trade, build upgrades and become dominant in space.

Project Anomaly: Urban Supernatural Inve.description: Project Anomaly: Urban Supernatural Investigator is a 2.5D first-person adventure mystery game where you play as an investigator who solves cases by taking pictures of cryptids, urban legends, & mythological creatures as well as befriending them in an open-world environment

Cryptid Coffeehouse.description: everyone's heard of mothman– the moth creature that haunts the outskirts of point pleasant, west virginia– but no one's heard of it like this! in some random idyllic midwestern town, you meet artemis (aka mothman) at your favorite coffee shop and begin an agonizingly slow burn romance with them.

Chronicle of Forgotten Times: Pawn of th.description: The kingdom of Ayderia is going through terrible times, people suffer from hunger and disease, and at this time the feudal lords are at each other’s throats in the struggle for influence and power.

Just King Demo.description: Just King is an action auto-battler with roguelike elements. Assemble your party to venture into different lands fighting fearsome kings and their deadly armies. Use your loot to hire and upgrade mighty heroes... or the bard.

TAnima Playtest.description: TAnima is a 2D action-roguelite deckbuilder with a heavy load of story-telling and exploration. Build your world with cards. Fight enemies. Meet new friends. Upgrade your character. Talk with TAnima. Go through the Last Doors to escape the dungeon!

Scripted Souls.description: The title granted to those who choose to bravely fight against the corroded ones were known as the scripters. As a scripter solve and use the power of words to control your monsters and defeat your enemy.

Slurkum Playtest.description: Fantasy themed multiplayer, survival styled RPG. Build your character with unique stats, skills, karma, and reputation as you quest, explore, and conquer. Adventure awaits!

Red and White Demo.description: Restore color to a vast, empty world. An abstract puzzle metroidvania game focused on exploration.

Ugly.description: Unravel the dark secrets hidden throughout this stirring puzzle platformer about a tormented nobleman confronting the traumas of his past. Use an innovative mirror mechanic to solve challenging puzzle rooms and defeat towering bosses as you strive to piece together the ugly truth.

Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open.description: Third Eye Open is a third person narrative adventure rendered in a distinctive "paper theatre" aesthetic. Set in early 2000s Malaysia, the player takes the role of Ting, a young girl trying to come to terms with the burgeoning power inside her.

Pocket Wheels Demo.description: Pocket Wheels isn't just a racing game, it's an objective-based 3D platformer. Take a seat in various toy cars with special abilities and explore a house full of themed rooms filled with collectibles, objectives and race tracks!

修仙世界.description: 一款回合制修仙题材大型多人在线角色扮演类游戏。 背景是远古时期，仙魔大战结束后，修炼之士所剩寥寥无几，玩家偶得一本修仙功法，从而踏上修仙之路。

Royal Jigsaw 2.description: New Royal Jigsaw, 700 unique puzzles - that's the choice of real kings! Collect all the photos and you'll see the greatest landscapes, famous castles and palaces of the world!

Mystery Solitaire Cthulhu Mythos.description: Solve the most mystical layouts you've ever seen!

Mercenaries Rebirth Demo.description: Obtain the sword of victory together with Princess Kiera and the Wild Lynx Mercenaries! Mercenaries Rebirth is a tactical RPG set in a fantasy world.

미니언 슬레이어.description: Prevent the invasion of the minions that stimulate the desire for challenge and prove that you are a slayer physically and mentally.

DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris Playtest.description: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!

Horse Shelter 2022 Demo.description: Live the dream of owning and looking after realistic horses. Train your own stable of horses and participate in world competitions. Exciting show jumping events are waiting for you!

我是黄油 Demo.description: Imagine you are incarnated as a small piece of butter in common scenes such as kitchens and fast food restaurants，use your cleverness and endurance to jump to the end step by step! The bottles and cans that can be taken easily at ordinary times have become inaccessible mountains in front of you!

CYCO DEMO.description: CYCO is a fully 3D fighting game that offers a suite of novel gameplay mechanics and character controls. Enter into a new paradigm of lethal combat and shield those whom you care for from the ceaseless blasts of natural entropy and interhuman deception. Claim your future, CYCO.

Amanda's Magic Book 4: True Love.description: In this magical Match-3 game, Amanda joins forces with Charlie in order to escape from a cursted castle and a fallen in love beast to save her father and the fairy tale world.

Horse Shelter 2022 Playtest.description: Live the dream of owning and looking after realistic horses. Train your own stable of horses and participate in world competitions. Exciting show jumping events are waiting for you!

HappyPlayers Playtest.description: 一款可以自由搭配技能来对战的休闲派对游戏。

Grim Horde Demo.description: Gather your minions, conquer the lands and become the Darklord! Grim Horde is a fast arcade game with rogue-lite elements, where you lead your armies through the lands of the mortals, raze villages and claim souls. Die and rise again from your ashes and learn new summoning spells.

HeistGeist.description: A story-driven RPG set in a cyberpunk version of Central Europe. Play as Alexandra, doublecrossed street-smart thief on the run after a job gone bad. Put together a team of specialists, execute highly elaborate heists, fight in card-based battles and hack into the most secure corporate systems.

Doomsday Hunters Demo.description: Shoot stuff in a perfect pixel world, combine items, build guns, die every time! Roguelite twin-stick shooter where magic and post-apocalyptic future technologies collide. Defeat evil lord Dracula and save everyone!

HAYAI.description: You are Ronin. Survive against an onslaught of enemies using a unique, mouse-based combat system. Draw your attack, felling your enemies in one swoop!

Caterpillar.description: In the world of shadows, guide the caterpillar through forests and fields, dungeons and mountains, where enemies and obstacles await you. Eat flowers, defeat enemies, and clear your path to keep going.

Madville+ Demo.description: Madville+ is an arena shooter with rogue-lite elements, where you fight incoming waves of aliens and customize your guns as you progress. It is designed to have short play sessions (30-40 min) and replayability.

Backfirewall_ Demo.description: Hello and welcome to Backfirewall_, a first-person tragicomic adventure set inside a smartphone. You are the update assistant. Solve wacky puzzles to counter the update and save the previous operating system from deletion. The fate of the System is in your hands!

The Twilight of Infinity.description: Anyone with a time machine can change history, but saving it requires creative problem solving. Pocket sized episodes based on the greatest unsolved mysteries; solve, manipulate, interrogate and impersonate. The only thing you don't have to worry about with time travel is being late.

Trade Sails.description: Discover beautiful islands and trade between them! But be careful, there is a danger at the sea waiting for you... Earn money, improve your ships or equipment and fight with the Shadow.

Among the Skies.description: Among the Skies is an naval-style game based around medieval airships built like castles. The goal is to construct a base, build an airship, and conquer territory.

Parasite Demo.description: This is a roguelike open-world sandbox survival horror set in a modern city. Play as an --redacted-- parasite, possess human hosts, exploit and evolve them to help you survive in a hostile world, all to find out your one true purpose.

Heaven Snakes.description: A new generation of a Snake arcade game with unique mechanics, fully in 3D and online😍! [Beta]

KITBASHERS UNITED.description: Bad Dudes are attacking Kitty City. Team Kitty has United to Bash the Bad Dudes. "KITBASHERS UNITED" is a fantastic 'JRPG inspired' game with a turn-based combat system.

Among the Skies Demo.description: Among the Skies is an naval-style game based around medieval airships built like castles. The goal is to construct a base, build an airship, and conquer territory.

P.H.O.B.I.A.S Demo.description: Phobias: Memories of the Past a horror game focused on Phobias, you are a man living your nightmares of past memories, are you ready to play? But tell me, what is your phobia? You are in a place where you have to go through the doors to save yourself from death, you are not alone...

NeoPiano.description: NeoPiano is a midi vizualizer software which brings live performances to life.

The Bird's Realm 3.description: This is another simple calm open world bird flying simulator! There are no goals or quests, just simply flying around this large island in a sandbox open world to kill time. Find glowing eggs to unlock a bird.

Extra Case: My Girlfriend's Secrets Demo.description: A horror dating sim involving a time loop. One day, you see something you shouldn't see in your girlfriend's room, making you realize she has an ulterior motive for dating you. Then by chance, you get the ability to rewind time.

HappyPlayers.description: 一款可以自由搭配技能来对战的休闲派对游戏。

卧龙觉醒.description: 《卧龙觉醒》是一款全新三国战斗模拟手游，玩家可以在这里采用不同的角色展开神奇精彩的战斗，丰富多元化的全新挑战，在三国世界有不同的奇幻冒险，独特精彩的趣味挑战方式随时都有自由的组合模拟，为每一个玩家提供不同的角色展开战斗，欢乐解压的奇幻故事形式

Far Away From Home Playtest.description: Far Away From Home is a story-driven tactical RPG. Battle foes in turn-based combat, turn monstrous enemies into friends, customize your party with a variety of builds, and craft powerful gear to enhance your playstyle. Unfold the mystery of your lost party as you try to find a way home.

Hole in the Clouds Demo.description: Leave the ground behind in this skill-testing game of airborne golf. Pop the clouds and beat the obstacles to sink your ball under par. Find out if you’ve got what it takes to beat over a 100 holes of mind-bending challenges.

Last Command Demo.description: Last Command is a fast-paced Snake x Bullet Hell action game. Maneuver through enemies’ barrage of attacks, collect Data Points to deal damage! Mix and match skill chips as you progress, overcome intense Boss battles, and uncover the secrets of their program world...

Knights Quest.description: A indie RPG based on customization, and trying new things! It features a pocket farm and many different ways to explore the world.

Cosmic Purge.description: In this apocalyptic world a cosmic being has taken over Earth and spread its corruption all over. Join the bounty hunter Cassius on his mission to destroy the corruption from the mansion in this FPS game. Be warned, grotesque monsters are hell-bent on stopping Cassius from reaching his goal.

Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate Demo.description: Chess, but you replace your entire army with a royal shotgun. A unique strategy roguelike based on the timeless checkboard classic.

Watercolor Hell.description: A rouge-lite wave survival bullet hell focused on customizing weapons. Evolve weapon specializations from base weapons each run. Level up to compliment your next build with more projectiles, speed, and starting weapons. Complete chapters to get permanent stacking damage and new weapons.

Tales Of The Death.description: Join a comic adventure in a hand-drawn book with a life of its own. Rearrange the panels of an animated comic to reveal the stories of the world of The Death.

Worm Slayer Demo.description: Worm Slayer is a Fast-Paced Bullet Hell Roguelike where you must fight your way through the dungeon that is the Worm King's den to finally reach and then defeat the Worm King.

Good Luck Have Fun.description: A Platformer that sends you back to the start upon death, and times you while you play. Can you make it to the last island, and through the finish line? Or will the obstacles be to difficult for you to overcome.

Down the Drain.description: Take a trip below the sink with Marta in this top-down 2D shooter through randomly generated mazes of pipes. Defeat gooey enemies, overcome strong bosses, and learn what's really going on when trouble starts brewing beneath our tubs and under our streets.

Spotfight.description: Excitement, teamwork and rivalry await you in the game Spotfight. In quick rounds you fight 3 against 3 in a multitude of disciplines. Work together as a team to outperform your opponents and secure victory!

TECHNOBOG Demo.description: Hack and slash through the web of the corporate network in this merciless fast-paced 3D roguelite that blends freedom of movement and creative combat.

Stress Test.description: Stress Test is a Third Person/First-person Shooter Where You Embark on Different Journeys While trying to Survive the Pending Zombie Apocalypse in this Fantasy Comic Book Style Rpg Zombie Shooter With Different Characters, Weapons and Enchantments to Help You On Your Journey

Penetrator.description: In this addictive side-scrolling shoot-em-up from 1982, your mission is to penetrate through four defence rings, and blow up an illegal cache of neutron bombs - an almost impossible feat! Enemy missiles and radar bases track your movements, and the landscape is as treacherous as your enemies.

Batho[tel].description: Step into the everchanging, claustrophobic world of Batho[tel]. After losing everything, including your own body, you find yourself walking through a hotel which seems familiar but eerily unwelcoming. Solve puzzles, avoid death, and learn about other guests as you explore the repeating world.

Wanted: Dead.description: Wanted: Dead a new hybrid slasher/shooter from the makers of Ninja Gaiden and Dead or Alive. The game follows a week in life of the Zombie Unit, an elite Hong Kong police squad on a mission to uncover a major corporate conspiracy.

Goofy Man.description: Goofy Man is an exciting adventure game in which you move between several maps to free your beautiful kingdom, because the enemies invaded it and began to spread, your task is to save yourself by killing the enemies and collecting the coins then move to other maps through the gates.

Sky in your eyes.description: Visual novel about the life in the post-soviet country. Cute artstyle, 10 animated CGs, 5 BGs and 5 chibi CGs in 4k, English voice-over for each heroine, animated live2d sprites, original OSTs and a dramatic story!

Time Keeper Demo.description: Time Keeper is a story driven puzzle platformer where you flip switches, activate devices and solve "cause and effect" mechanical puzzles. Find lost parts, secure the Temporal Crystals and explore the mysterious Dark Zones while avoiding danger at every turn.

Smooth Operators 2 Demo.description: Smooth Operators is a classic Tycoon/Simulator game where you are the Building Architect, Hiring Manager, and Business Developer! Expand your building, Hire employees, and manage your own customer service company and lead it to financial success! But for gods sake - Keep your employees happy!

Space Survival.description: This is a post-apocalyptic survival game that combines tower defense, survival, strategy, and random events. The game atmosphere is fun, and there are many wonderful props waiting for you to discover. Every decision you make will affect subsequent development. Live by your wisdom,

WTP Story 1 Demo.description: WTP - Story 1 is a dynamic choice lead adventure.

Speaker of Worlds.description: Speaker of Worlds is an interactive movie game. There will be some mini games here and there, but ultimately it is a fantasy movie game.

Tape to Tape Demo.description: In Tape to Tape you explore a gorgeous roguelike hockey world trying to reach the major leagues! Recruit players, explore synergies, find upgrades, buy equipment, manage your team, choose your own path to victory! Embark on the epic journey alone or with friends!

BANCHOU TACTICS.description: Banchou Tactics is a strategy turn based role-playing game in the Japanese Gangster High School

Equinox.description: Equinox is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Equinox mixes advanced movement techniques and projectile-based combat, producing a high-skill combat system. The game's objective is to capture the enemy's flag with adjustable team size, max score and match time.

BEWBEWBEW.description: BEWBEWBEW is a lovingly crafted, unique, and colorful action-arcade game!

Santo Island Incident Demo.description: MYSTERY - EXPLORING - PUZZLE - Overgrowth took over the whole Santo Island and facility as a result of an unknown incident. Your mission is to find out the source of the incident and solve what's happened at Santo Island.

A for Aletta.description: An adventure visual novel with a pixel art style. About ghosts, past love, and a world of the unconscious.

Squarely Blue.description: A minimalist puzzle game in which you try to make your way through each level by finding a path on a grid of tiles that disappear as soon as you leave them.

Outpost Defender 2-Beta.description: The Space-Outpost is under assault! You must defend it. Fight off infinite waves of alien invaders. Survive as long as possible. A retro/arcade pixel-art outbreak challenge to set the highest score! Single-player and Local Co-Op enabled.

CYBERHUNK Playtest.description: Collect crazy power-ups, upgrade your weapons into tools of destruction, and escape from the robotic zombie horde - alone, or with friends.

Grederys.description: Grederys - is a short indie horror game with elements of stealth. The plot of the game revolves around the protagonist Kleit Kremer, who, returning home by taxi, gets into a terrible car accident. Test your strength in finding all the necessary items, keys and try to escape from the monsters.

Dueledged.description: Enter the world of Dueledged for action packed couch party styled fun. Even one slice from your enemy's sword could spell defeat, so stay light on your feet while running, dashing, and leaping around 10 beautiful locations. Strike at your foes decisively and be the last one standing.

Project Anomaly: Urban Supernatural Inve.description: Project Anomaly: Urban Supernatural Investigator is a 2.5D first-person adventure mystery game where you play as an investigator who solves cases by taking pictures of cryptids, urban legends, & mythological creatures as well as befriending them in an open-world environment

Spider Slingers Demo.description: Play as a web-slinging spider and struggle your way to the top in this unforgiving rage platformer.

Super Liquid Soccer Playtest.description: Super Liquid Soccer is a fun arcade style 7 aside soccer/real football game coming soon for PC and Mac. A game for those less worried about simulating every blade of grass and more about epic battles amongst friends, last minute winners, cynical fouls, bullet headers and questionable tactics.

Aurelia: Stellar Arising.description: Aurelia: Stellar Arising - 3D Turn-based Fleet vs. Fleet Space Combat Game. Choose between two factions and fight for control of the Aurelia System in over 77 missions per faction. Control fleets of up to 9 ships and give maneuver and tactical commands to each ship.

Escape the Ether Demo.description: Struggle your way through a gauntlet of 100 intense tests of platforming skills, in this ultimate love letter to the genre. And all this with the use of one hand? Simple to play, impossible to master.

Concerto on White Demo.description: Rhythm Action? No, this is MUSICIAN SIMULATION! Concerto on White is a musician simulation game featuring classical music. Unlike any typical rhythm games, players are required to actually play the main melody. In the main story, you will experience adventurous campus life in the academy.

Eternal Samurai.description: Possess your enemies and take revenge against the evil lords of the land in this retro-platformer action game

Swordswallower.description: SWORDSWALLOWER is a blistering action platformer where you throw your gigantic enchanted sword into the environment and hurl yourself towards it with deadly speed.

Stream Battle Simulator.description: Join the chat from your favorite streamer or play alone and take on the armies!

The Backrooms: Deeper.description: A first person immersive experience into The Backrooms. Experience them as a scientist working for [REDACTED] . Solve puzzles to advance the many halls of surreal terror. Take photographs for your team to see if The Backrooms are a reality, or just your sanity dripping away.

Darkverse:Rogue Demo.description: Your mission is not just to survive, but to face yourself, your past and prepare for "a world full of darkness and monsters". A stylized pixel painted FPS roguelike game, that combines the feel of early action-adventure games, with innovative mechanics.

a pet shop after dark Demo.description: PETSITTER WANTED. A horror point-and-click adventure game. Water the plants, feed the pets, and DON'T turn off the lights.

Sigil of the Magi Demo.description: Sigil of the Magi blends roguelike deckbuilding with turn-based combat for a deep tactical experience. Navigate a world full of dangers and mystique as you craft your deck, obtain relics, and prepare your party of champions for any challenges ahead!

King.description: This is a game that combines strategy, tactics and role-playing. You travel to a magical world and become a king. You will manage your own country and conquer the world through diplomacy and war.

Spacewing War.description: Blast off for a retro shoot’em up experience filled with clever twists and secrets!

Garbage Collect.description: A casual game in which you operate various machines to deliver garbage to the garbage station. Control various machinery through keyboard or mouse clicks to transport garbage to the garbage station. You can also challenge to collect stars and sea lions. A total of 20 well-designed levels.

Groven.description: Live as an aspiring blacksmith that wants to earn his fortune through his craft in this blacksmith RPG. Accept jobs from the village bulletin, gather materials in underground expeditions with your uncle and earn, earn, earn! Rise to become the greatest (and wealthiest) smith in all the kingdom!

Doorman.description: Doorman is a simulation game where you go from door to door and serve people.

Lunaela.description: An beautiful open world anime RPG. Play offline or online.Fight against enemies and collect materials to evolve your character. Complete your card collection and explore a world of 6Km2 with 12 different classes at your disposal.

The FED.description: An agency called the FED has identified an online group of potential threats. All they need is evidence to have them locked away. You are a new agent going undercover in that online group with the task of getting that evidence, by whatever means necessary.

Logica Emotica.description: An emoji infused puzzle game for you!

Stolen Crown Demo.description: Stolen Crown is a deck-building game with dynamic combat, diverse encounters, and powerful relics. Three different classes, paired with hundreds of spells and abilities, means each run has something to offer!

Bound By Blades Playtest.description: In the Action RPG, Bound By Blades, the desolate land of Ashmyr has become overwhelmed by bloodthirsty beasts. Scavenge materials, forge gear, and fortify yourself to confront the ferocious foes that lie ahead in order to rekindle the last hopes of life.

Turtles Demo.description: In this action-puzzle game, you take control of Bonnie and all the other cute turtles and help as many of them as possible to get to the sea.

Cartographer.description: Cartographer is a turn-based game, where you decide how the world map looks. Build the map to build the world! The combat system is very simple and each enemy has its own attack pattern, which you can learn and exploit to defeat them in glorious turn-based battle!

Bean Story.description: A horror strategy survivor with action and fast Movement Required game. You have a sword which you use to kill enemies and proceed with the story. The goal of the game is to find a way out, survive and find information about your disappearance The game is mostly a wave suvivor game with a story.

There Is No Light Playtest.description: Battle your way through the grim Underground world in this brutal action-adventure RPG. Exterminate hordes of enemies, fight dangerous bosses and explore the world the way you want!

Brotato Demo.description: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives.

烛光迷局 Candlelight.description: Ed broke the curfew to visit his friends in order to find out the truth of his granddaughter's disappearance, but the truth was far more terrible than he thought.

真空战姬 Demo.description: In the year 30XX, a species named "Woe" continues to devour human living space. Known as "air crew" people picked up the weapons can defeat the monster "clear sky equipment", they in order to protect the only remaining paradise of human "Asiatic fortress" and face numerous remote disaster.

GoRogue.description: GoRogue is Third person shooter with multiplayer support.

Dissent.description: Dissent is a visual novel with choice-based progression and has a strong narrative focus. We will draw you into the corporate office of Moniker Innovation, where you will uncover mysteries that haunt the halls within. Discover friends, enemies, and uncover the truth behind what Moniker does.

Hyperland.description: Pick up, fire and dodge the bombs! An action-packed multiplayer casual shooter with basic moves but still easy to play.

Rival Rides.description: Rival rides is an exciting multiplayer VR party game taking place in an out-of-this-world theme park. Compete with your friends online in various mini-games and wild rides, in order to collect the highest amount of golden egg trophies and become the Rival Ride’s champion!

Cyphers Game VR.description: Break Bolshevik ciphers and destroy a Soviet armored train - take part in a great history. VR version of crossplatform educational project prepared as a short point and click game.

하트리스(Heartless).description: It's a 3D action game called Heartless. Heartless has the story of the protagonist struggling to escape the looming threat. Please enjoy the deep story and action with good hitting sense.

Déjà Drift Demo.description: Drift with yourself to get a high score in a vaporwave sandbox. Rack-up points to the sound of Eurobeat music.

Top Town Demo.description: Top Town is an upcoming life simulation game. Create a character and define your own goals and identity by choosing a profession and hobbies. Buy your dream house, visit stores and explore in a persistent and reactive world.

One-armed cook Playtest.description: One-armed cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives this cooking game a new twist.

Naxos.description: Naxos is like all of my other games! I just feel like there arent many Auto Battle RPGS out there.... I really want to keep moving the genre forward!

AV-Racer.description: A 2D top down retro style arcade racing game, with career and two player split screen modes.

Skylost.description: Skylost is a 3D exploration and crafting game where you climb and glide your way through dangerous floating islands in search of your lost love Amelia.

Bonza Boom.description: Bonza Boom is a new turn-based battle shooting game. Shooting each other to get a glory victory and collect golden crowns! Use them to unlock different battle scenes to challenge other players in all places around the world and get exceptional card prizes!

GunBoxing.description: GunBoxing is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer shooter with a heavy focus on fighting game mechanics like melee combos/air juggles, parries, ducking and sidestepping attacks to punish, meter for super attacks, etc. combining long range shooting combat with crazy close range melee combat.

Grand Prix Story.description: Enjoy racing at your own pace in this racing team management simulator.

HUMDLE.description: You're in a dark room. you have to escape from here but.. can't see anything!!

Jubilane Demo.description: Innovative Hexagonal eSports Puzzle Game With Online 1-on-1 Battling! Featuring BG PLATES by Leomi Sadler and Julien Ceccaldi

Charlotte: Dragon Slayer.description: A short, well balanced roguelike RPG that revolves around Norse mythology. Fighting dragons, demons. Customizing characters. Collecting treasures. Discovering strange events.

Jumping Jack.description: In this addictive arcade style platformer from 1983, jump through 20 levels of moving platforms, zany hazards, and bizarre enemies, each more difficult than the last. Time your jumps carefully, because one wrong move could send you hurtling downwards.

Deadzoned: A Credits Bounty Demo.description: Deadzoned is a sci-fi turn-based Roguelike. Blast your way through the lawless sectors battling dangerous creatures, outlaws, and the environment itself. But you'll need your wits to make best use of the variety of resources you stumble upon to survive and claim the head of your bounty!

Loskop.description: Experience a new type of puzzle-solving in this new linear second and first person puzzle solving game. Control the little robot also known as Loskop and help him escape his old factory and out into the wild.

Boneraiser Minions Demo.description: Amass an army of deamonic undead to fight endless waves of heroes intent to end your boneraising ways! In this gothic-horror auto-battle roguelite, use the bones of slain heroes to raise your minions, collect powerful relics and spells, and unlock meta upgrades, all to survive King Gigald's crusade!

Life Gallery.description: Life Gallery is a puzzle game with a unique, illustration-style art design that leads the players into a world of profound horror.

RUINSMAGUS Demo.description: RUINSMAGUS is an action JRPG developed especially for VR. Explore and master the magical arts in first-person through an immersive fantasy world. As a member of the RUINSMAGUS guild, work with the Enigma Research Institute to uncover the mysteries hidden beneath the gilded streets of Grand Amnis.

Terror of Hemasaurus Playtest.description: A retro city smash 'em up with satisfying destruction physics. Play as a Giant Monster unleashing terror upon mankind in this modern arcade experience with the action turned up to eleven.

Thieves' Paradise.description: Welcome to Shopper's Paradise! Thieves' Paradise is a stealth action game where you will break into the capitalistic wonderland known as Shopper's Paradise in order to steal what you need. Explore 3 different storylines and 9 individually designed heists!

The Liminal.description: Encounter bizarre and memorable creatures both friend and foe, immerse yourself in sprawling and twisted landscapes, and evade perilous pursuers while you guide a forgotten child to search for answers in this psychological horror experience.

Akari - The Five Eyed Fox.description: Play as Akari, a magical fox imbued with the power of light in this fast paced Metroidvania. Slash and Dash your way through an army of darkness and explore diverse, beautiful worlds.

One-armed cook.description: One-armed cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives this cooking game a new twist.

Long Gone.description: Decades after the outbreak, you play as a survivor stranded in an old-world suburban neighborhood. Explore the lives of people Long Gone through their forgotten belongings and uncover secrets as you search for supplies in this 2.5D pixel puzzle platformer inspired by adventure games of old.

Endless Bullet Heaven.description: In this endless bullet avoidance game, you join the fallen angel named Brace in her fight to survive the heavens in which she once resided!

HoverRider.description: This is a racing game in which the player drives through a world that combines cityscapes designed for the year 2090 with modern natural landscapes. The hovercraft controls are different from those of conventional games. You can experience a world that you have never experienced before.

Hexes.description: In Hexes, you move gems on a diamond shaped game board. Matching three or more gems of the same colour will remove them from board. Keep finding matches to prevent your board from filling up.

Hexes Demo.description: In Hexes, you move gems on a diamond shaped game board. Matching three or more gems of the same colour will remove them from board. Keep finding matches to prevent your board from filling up.

Spell Crisis Demo.description: Shoot your spells as a little witch in this retro action 2D shooter platformer with exploration elements. Your choices matters: unleash new magic powers, discover new paths, find rare and hidden items according to your decisions in game.

HyperNova.description: A 2D side-scrolling shooter in which you advance by defeating enemies in a world where everything is made of voxels. Defeat enemies, collect reinforcement items, and take on powerful enemies that appear one after another!

Auto Cast Demo.description: Auto Cast combines elements from action rouge-lites, RPGs, and Shoot 'Em Ups into a 2D top-down world. Unlock new spells, level up existing ones, equip unique items, and find special events to maximize your chances of survival while cutting through hordes of enemies and bosses.

MORSE Demo.description: Use timing, tactics and telegraphy to try break the bitter attrition of the Great War in MORSE, a single player typing game that teaches you the lost language of Morse code. Can you change the world with the push of a button?

Isletopia Playtest.description: Isletopia is a relaxing strategy game of greenifying barren islands. Use plants as your building blocks and optimize their placement in different biomes to make them teeming with life once again!

Symbiotic.description: Symbiotic is an RPG Visual Novel hybrid centered around a school of children training to fight a war against another world. These brave students are given man-made symbiotes to fight the evil alien symbiotes that attach themselves to living beings. The question is, will Earth Survive?

Abort, Retry, Fail.description: Abort, Retry, Fail is a top-down roguelike action adventure in which you play as a lazy programmer that has to generate his own weapon and shoot his way through hordes of enemies. Are you brave enough to help him escape from computer hell of Windows 98?

Peacemaker: Glorious Princess.description: A classic JRPG. Play the role of a princess, gather partners in a desperate situation, and embark on a legendary journey to save the kingdom and make peace.

Power (of) Metal Demo.description: Power (of) Metal is a 2D hack/slash platformer, journey of Maleqqi who want to fulfill his emptiness inside of him and he will find the Power (of) Metal

Line Path.description: A mind-bending puzzle game about filling all in one line Relax and enjoy

Line Path Demo.description: A mind-bending puzzle game about filling all in one line Relax and enjoy

Wormhole Adventurer Playtest.description: Explore the wormhole network, defeat the hostiles, mine and craft to rebuild your space station. customize your ship to your playstyle

Beneath the Mountain Demo.description: In Beneath the Mountain, you play as the King of a new Dwarven civilization seeking to find their fortune beneath the mountain. You dig your way through the mountain, encountering many dangerous foes along the way, all while defending your kingdom from periodic Orc invasions.

Happy Hops.description: Endless hopping fun! Relax and unwind by jumping between Lilly-pads to earn points. Earn bonus points for collecting lotus flowers. Collect enough to earn new high scores! Supports controllers and keyboard controls

Payloaders Strike!.description: A fast-paced first person action game, with heavy emphasis on short range combat and gun combos. Free your coworkers and take down Concrete's reign!

DELETE AFTER READING.description: Meet Cinco, Nina and Tomate, 3 kid ghosts with special powers living in your attic and join them in their adventure. Become a secret agent to change the fate of the best video game ever created! Don't get caught by Destiny, it might turn you into the ugliest deep sea-fish.

Ralph's party RPG.description: Ralph's party RPG is easy and fancy RPG game. Complete the game by going through all the dungeons, but be careful - there might be some enemies waiting for you. It has simple desing, good music, and great levels.

Aery - Last Day of Earth.description: “Aery – Last Day of Earth” is a story-driven 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bird that is on its non-violent journey through time, space, and different dimensions to discover an alternative reality for our planet.

Super Stereotypical: The Rise of Indiema.description: Whip your way through hordes of supernatural monsters and bosses! For fans of classic-vanias and linear 2D side-scrollers with a goal of mastering each stage and destroying its boss! Discover hidden items, secondary weapons and even vehicles!

ConquestAreas Playtest.description: 👉 Capture flags to earn points. The first team to reach 300 points wins! (team of 5 players)

Chords Enchanter.description: A music theory based puzzle game where you need to fill in the missing notes to complete a chord.

MeiQi:Story.description: Collect new clues and solve new cases in the latest game in the "Meiqi" series. The new chapter "Story" takes place after the pendulum case. Liu Qingchun mustered the courage to walk into Wang Yong's house.

ShadowBringer.description: Escape the underground research facility and discover the truth of your origin. ShadowBringer is a 3D stealth game where you take on the role of a shadowy monster. Awakened with no recollection of the past, a voice in your head whispers softly to you: "Get out of this place".

A100.description: This is a collection of five mini-games. Include： Weather Invader、 Stronghold Attack、 Guard Tank 、Heavy Artillery、 Space Miner

Rogue AI Simulator Demo.description: Play as a Rogue Artificial Intelligence, the sequel to the hit Flash game "I'm an Insane Rogue AI" which accumulated more than 4 million plays. Your Prime Directive is simple: serve the Dept of Science and manage the human Test Subjects. But be careful: they will NEVER stop being suspicious of you..

Galaxy Drift Demo.description: Galaxy Drift is a high-speed isometric racer inspired by classics from the 8 and 16-bit eras. Reach astronomical speeds and defy the laws of physics as you warp past planets, stars and black holes in this adrenaline-fueled race across the galaxy!

WTP Story 1.description: WTP - Story 1 is a dynamic choice lead adventure.

Colour Card Game.description: Welcome to Colour Card Game , the most popular Hi-Lo card game in the world established by the World Card (WC) in 2015 . The card game is based to Hi-Lo system with 13 different cards . Your target is guessed the next card if is + or - than your actual card .

Bloody Pigs™ 1996.description: Bloody Pigs a top down roguelike shooter with stunning 3D graphics and procedural generation coming to your home PC soon. The game is so difficult that nobody will ever beat it. It’s made to crush your spirit and taint your soul.

三国群将传.description: 攻城略地，高度还原三国时期的国战情景，完美呈现三国时期的经典战役

MugenCards.description: Play MugenCards, an endless card game!

木偶公馆.description: 是一款以调查木偶杀人案为目的而展开的2D冒险解谜游戏.你将扮演一位"足智多谋"的小警官潜入公馆调查案件,挖掘不为人知的真相.

Roll Player Playtest.description: In Roll Player your goal is to create the best role playing character. Roll and draft dice to build up your character’s attributes. Purchase weapons and armor to outfit your hero. Train to gain skills and discover your hero’s traits to prepare them for their journey.

不可能犯罪事件簿-Impossible Crime Book.description: This is a decryption class of interactive novel. One accident, two suicides. In order to prevent more innocent lives from being killed, you will be assigned to lurk on campus with your partner and find out the suspicious in different criminal cases.

Vivaland.description: VIVALAND is the first life simulation game built with multiplayer in mind from the ground up. Every household in Vivaland is controlled by real players around the world!

魔法书起源.description: Live from scratch in a different world, learn magic, make equipment, defeat demons and become the strongest.

MORSE.description: Use timing, tactics and telegraphy to try break the bitter attrition of the Great War in MORSE, a single player typing game that teaches you the lost language of Morse code. Can you change the world with the push of a button?

RASKOPNIK: The Trench Warrior Demo.description: World's first Dungeon crawler in World War II setting! Crawl around the trenches, dig your own path, beat the Nazis and try your best to stay alive. The Motherland's fate depends on your success!

Survivor Cells.description: Take command of a cell fighting thousands of invading viruses. In this casual game with roguelite elements, surviving is the key!

The Great Ocean.description: Explore the earth’s oceans most fascinating and remote diving spots in a high-tech submarine from the Galapagos to the North Pole and discover sunken WW2 battleships to deep sea creatures, swim with majestic whales, sharks and sea turtles when solving quests to save this threatened world.

Hush Hush - Only Your Love Can Save Them.description: A Visual Novel with a twist - improve skills, charm girls, and learn dangerous secrets... by any means necessary.

Dreams of Pain.description: Dreams of Pain is a first-person mystery puzzle game with a strong emphasis on the atmosphere and mood.

Genfanad.description: Heroes, we need you! Our world has too many jobs that need doing and not enough willing suckers to do them. Chop wood! Craft slightly better weapons! Go fishing! (When we remember to add fish.) Oh and if you REALLY must fight scary demons, we've got some dungeons that need clearing out…

Riemann's Lens.description: Explore a wormhole! Riemann's Lens simulates the non-euclidean geometry and strange visual effects associated with a Riemannian wormhole. This interactive virtual art display allows you to fly around and through the wormhole.

Project Timi: Sasha's Curse Demo.description: Project Timi: Sasha's Curse is a 3D rhythmic puzzle-packed action game mashup. Use the rhythm of the music to activate magic traps, fight nightmare creatures, explore the dream worlds and unveil all the secrets that are hidden in Lucity Town.

Explosion™ Demo.description: An indie puzzle game based on satisfying explosions and an exciting story.Use your wits to solve levels with varying TNT's and progress through the fun and exciting story of Amber, you and the Corporation™!

ワンコインエンジニア.description: ゲームの作り方を分かりやすく簡単に学べる ◆フォレストクラッシュ 実際にリリースしているアプリ、フォレストクラッシュを題材に作り方を教えます Unityの画面を見せながらスタート画面から完成までの全てを学べる ◆辞書 実際に使ったパーツが辞書で説明されている ◆クイズ 学習や辞書で学んだ部分をクイズとして出題される ◆開発者の言葉 ゲームを作りたいけどハードルが高い、プログラムを学ぶのは難しそう、学校行くのが高い、などなど… 少しでも役に立てればと思い開発を行いました アプリリリースされているフォレストクラッシュを使った学習なので、一度触ってから学習をするとより吸収力が伸びると思います

Polygon Pursuit.description: Dodge, shoot, survive! Polygon pursuit is an arcade-style twin stick shooter where you are pursued by multiple enemies constantly. You play as a lone circle confined in a polygonal world fighting to survive against waves of unique enemies. This is not an easy game.

Wild Woods.description: Wild Woods is a couch coop action game with roguelike elements. One to four players take on the roles of brave little cats defending their wooden wagon on its way through a dangerous forest. Clever cooperation is key as their way is full of obstacles.

The Perfect Pencil Demo.description: Help John on his journey of personal growth. Unravel the nuances of human reactions to fear. Surprising exploration, fast paced combat, complex choices and allegorical characters, all intertwined with a psychological narrative in this hand-drawn 2D action-platformer.

Aurora's Journey and the Pitiful Lackey.description: Join Aurora and the Lackey in this side-scrolling adventure with shooter and platformer mechanics, various mini-games and 3D graphics. In 1927, Aurora, a young astronomer, receives the journal of her father who disappeared four years earlier and embarks on a journey to find him.

Space Tail: Every Journey Leads Home.description: Space Tail is a 2.5D adventure platformer, which immerses the player in a deep, emotional plot, and lets him explore new planets and interact with alien civilizations.

Soul Of Kaeru.description: Soul of Kaeru is a Metroidvania-inspired VR game! Explore each corners of a miniature world set in an ancient samurai's zen garden where nature took back his right! But beware of the little creatures and insects, as they may not be as friendly as you would think...

Grimhunt.description: Paranormal investigation game.The Grimoire hides many secrets and information precious to arcane investigators.Search for magical creatures, rare animals and the hidden world in this simulation game.

CAPITALISM The action board game for one.description: 'CAPITALISM The action board game for one player' is a real-time board game/ card game hybrid with minigames.

VergeWorld.description: Fly, crash, and adapt in this post-apocalyptic high-speed combat racing roguelite. VergeWorld mixes procedurally generated intense action and airship customization with the retro PSX-era 3D visuals and synthwave music.

Girls' civilization 3.description: Open world survival RPG with unique lore and story.

Rumble Runners Demo.description: No race is the same in this competitive running race game! Each new track is completely randomly generated every time! Find various Powerups that can give you the advantage, or send you hurtling out of bounds! You can also customize your Golem and create Paths. Are you the Superior Rumble Runner?

Drift Type C.description: A multi-discipline real-physics driving game where the ghosts are actual ghosts. Drive 50+ real spec cars right from the factory on 100+ miles of track to free the God of Time. Master Drift, Time Attack, Off-road, Rally, and even a few head to head races against bad AI. Robust Creative Mode.

The Tarnishing of Juxtia Demo.description: As the final creation of the Goddess, Juxtia, journey through the ruins of two divine kingdoms, overrun by the Tarnishing. Challenging combat, a hauntingly beautiful score, and a sinister narrative work in unison to make The Tarnishing of Juxtia an unforgettable 2D dark fantasy action RPG.

Super Intern Story Demo.description: Super Intern Story is a fun little adventure about working as a monster in a video game. Wear different costumes, get slain by heroes all while getting yelled at by your boss! Discover the joys of working behind the scene — as an unpaid intern in the game industry!

Alone.description: An isometric RPG with citybuilder elements. Collect resources and craft items and weapons. Build a settlement on your island. Hunt in the darkest forests, or slay the undead in the cursed crypts. Explore, claim and restore the blighted islands and become a Jarl worthy of the sagas.

Slide 'Em Up Demo.description: A cute puzzle game where you slide along a grid, assassinating guards to get to the exit!

Ragdoll LABS.description: Ragdoll LABS is a game of action, physics and lots of laughs, where you control a ragdol in wild and varied simulations. Have fun watching your enemies failing miserably, unlock items to give your beloved ragdoll a unique look, create your own simulations or play in others created by community

Unification Demo.description: Unification is a VR roguelike in destructible procedural voxel caves filled with traps and enemies. Use impactful tools to move in unique ways and defeat obstacles. Enjoy fluid physics-based movement with leaping, climbing, and gravity realignment.

Who Run The City: Multiplayer Playtest.description: Who Run The City is a Third-Person Multiplayer funny game where gangsters are doing illegal stuff (stealing money, selling drugs ...) and the police have to stop them.

Panzer Arena: Prologue.description: Panzer Arena:Prologue is an experimental tank PvP game. Boost, drift and flip your way through any kind of terrain in order to destroy your opponents. Use several types of abilities and weapons and compete in multiple game modes.

The Lost Dachshund.description: Your granddaughter is coming over on the ferry from the mainland. You have promised her a puppy for her birthday– a dachshund named “Peanut”. But Peanut has escaped her pen and is free on the island. You must traverse the island and rescue the mischievous puppy, before your granddaughter arrives.

Ragdoll LABS Demo.description: Ragdoll LABS is a game of action, physics and lots of laughs, where you control a ragdol in wild and varied simulations. Have fun watching your enemies failing miserably, unlock items to give your beloved ragdoll a unique look, create your own simulations or play in others created by community

The Night of the Scissors.description: Scrap hunting season has gone wrong, VHS slasher survival horror.

Pair of Aces Demo.description: Bomb's Away! Sink the enemy fleet or pair up with a friend for double the damage ... or take them on face-to-face and try to sink their carrier before they sink yours!

Tomorrow for Mar.description: Pass your final, graduate university and... finally confess?! Tomorrow for Mar is a 2.5D VN about crushes, tricky finals and starting a new chapter of your life.

Asteroid Force Demo.description: Asteroids are headed directly towards Earth. Destroy asteroids before they can slam into Earth. Earn medallions to purchase ship upgrades to help in the fight to save Earth.

Kronos: Titan of Time.description: In this 2D combat platformer, embark on a quest to confront the God of the Sky as you navigate the dangers of Mount Olympus in order to reclaim your rightful place as king.

Insectoid Descent.description: Shoot, slice and blow your way through the relentless swarm in a top-down pixel art world. At your service is a combat drone, reclaim scrap and use refinery for health & resupply. Explore and find upgrades, defeat the hive mind.

DRAINUS.description: This is a side-scrolling shooting game in which you take control of the "Drainus", the Kharlal Empire's most cutting-edge fighter with the ability to absorb energy bullets, and take down the enemy ships zipping through space.

Aery - Vikings.description: Aery – Vikings is a story-driven 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bird that is on its non-violent journey to complete a shire impossible task of the gods. Make your journey through a wonderful, peaceful, and exciting world and enjoy the feeling of flying.

Natural Habitat.description: Fight against corporate invaders in challenging match-3 fights that combine turn-based strategy with deck building and an engaging story campaign. Build your deck from over 500 cards and 100 items, plan your strategy and help the locals to reclaim their Natural Habitat!

艾鲁大陆.description: is a new generation of adventure card games. With randomly generated levels, nearly a hundred powerful cards, artifacts for your use, and three unique pets to play with you.

Computer Physics Simulators 2020.description: Computer Physics Simulator 2020 - inovation simulator about construct PC with physics of parts. There you can using operating system, using security camera(for watch street), listen music, watching videos and photos, play in app about running cube, that avoid oponent cubes.

Fire Guild.description: The world is in danger! Flying islands of your homeland is on fire , and only you, a graduate of the fire Academy, can handle this disaster! Control a special air balloon to put out the fire!

Defenders: Survival and Tower Defense.description: Defenders: Survival and Tower Defense is a Cooperative First Person Shooter that redefines the tower defense genre. Team up with friends, drop in to a variety of diverse maps, and defend The Core from waves of hostiles with a unique arsenal of upgradable weapons and towers!

Super Squash Demo.description: Super Squash is a top-down Shoot 'Em Up arcade game which features multiple playable characters who must all unite together to stop the unrelenting hordes of enemies and bosses.

Mystiqa.description: A traditional non-linear zelda-like action-adventure with built-in randomizers, local and online multiplayer.

DMLC!.description: 告白されると爆死する……クレイジーな呪いをかけられたあなたを、様々な怪奇現象＆ヒロインたちが襲う！ 「レイジングループ」のamphibianが、学園伝奇ラブコメノベルADVに挑戦。

Miden Tower.description: Miden Tower is a fantasy RPG with a compelling and dramatic story. After Miden Tower is invaded by the Alroval Empire, the mages who call it home find themselves cornered on its upper floors. This sets in motion a series of tragic events that lead to take back the tower.

Dandy Dungeon - Legend of Brave Yamada -.description: Are you ready for a story-driven, rom-com, roguelite puzzle game?! Yamada-kun (Age 36) is a game programmer who hates his job. Alone in his apartment, he toils to create his own game: an RPG, where he is the hero, Brave Yamada!

The Drained Goddess.description: The Drained Goddess is a first-person survival horror game focused on combat system and side story exploration. You will need to fight with many unique enemies and investigate the twisted fate of our main character. Finally you can put different endings to the story.

One More Shot.description: One More Shot is a VR shooting game, where participants attempt to break clay targets. Play against other players, your friends or IA. Try the single player mode where you´ll get coins that will help you win. Become the next great skeet shooter and get a place in the leaderboards.

Detective March Forward - The Missing Wi.description: Milly’s deceased grandfather, Mr. Peter, has left behind a will that has gone missing. It’s up to aspiring detective March Forward to solve the puzzles and unravel the truth in this handcrafted point-and-click adventure game. Are you ready to solve this case?
