Horse Riding Deluxe 2.description: Horse Riding Deluxe 2 is almost all about horses. You can buy, tame, train, feed, and personalize horses. A number of quests and racetracks await you in the huge open world.

R.I.C.O. 2: London.description: RICO London is a gang-busting, name-taking, explosive co-op shooter. Battle your way up the high-rise tower stacked with East End gangsters solo or with a partner. Crash through doors, dodge bullets and turn the weapons of the fallen into your personal arsenal. Do whatever it takes reach the top.

Welcome To Chichester OVN 3 : The Myster.description: When a guest at The Violet Hotel is found dead, Grendel Jinx and her "friend" are forced to investigate the death - or else pay for repairs caused by a microwave oven accident.

Self-Checkout Unlimited Demo.description: Explore and unravel the mall of your mind in this surreal adventure game.

Tunnel Bird.description: Flying with you,Look at your global ranking!（Version new function: leaderboard）

Hubris.description: A recruit of the Triple-O is sent to the Twin planet system to search for agent Cyanha. To survive, you’ll have to shoot, swim, climb and jump your way through the harsh environment of a planet being terraformed. Together with pilot Lucia, you have to fight the wicked enemies of the OOO.

Spacen: The Beginning.description: As Gary Rogers, the player battles through hordes of enemy spaceships in several missions, evading projectiles, asteroids and defeating powerful bosses. Gary collects debris from destroyed enemies and exchanges them at the home base for ship and weapon upgrades.

King of the Streets.description: King of the Streets is a 2D fighter inspired by the 80s/90s arcade classics. All characters are based on real world people and places around Aotearoa New Zealand.

Two Weeks Game.description: Nikolay must gather his comrades and find proofs to stop the visual novel contest. But every time he dies durring his quest - he wakes up semperfideling on lecture at his Sharaga.

Super Space Slayer 2 Demo.description: Save the galaxy from the demon king Luciferus by blasting demonic cultists and more! Based on the legendary Google Play title, Super Space Slayer 2 features completely re-designed mouse, keyboard and gamepad controls that make it even better than the original.

99 Anime Girls.description: 99 Anime Girls is a cute anime-style indie platform game full of action, adventure and surprises. Rescue each girl on the platform levels, then adventure and chat with them to gather resources, progress the story and uncover a multitude of secrets.

BallClimbing.description: Spin, jump, go to the top of the mountain.

The Abnormal Place.description: The Abnormal Place is a game about Abigail, a young woman who has lost her voice and has found herself in a strange resort and hotel inhabited by monsters. Abigail must recover her voice and navigate through the hostile world or she'll be forever trapped.

溜冰的猪少.description: IceTime is a leisure action level game, you need to complete the level through superb operation on the extremely slippery ice.

Chessmates.description: Chess become mad, can you keep control on it? Play as a chess knight, defeat chess enemies in a new chess world.

Freddy Spaghetti.description: Meet Freddy. Freddy is spaghetti. Oh, and conscious. Follow along Freddy's story as you plunge head first into challenges and obstacles.

iMemo.description: You assign the number of blocks and create a game field where you need to find paired images.

Get Gem.description: Simple 3D 3rd person view search game. Manipulate a 13 year-old Saya and a 23 year-old Saya to find jewelry in her grandfather's mansion in the countryside.

Escort Alia.description: Simple TPS. Escort your companion, Alia, to destination. It's a 3D version of the classic 2D maze. Alia thinks for herself and responds to enemies and follows the player.

Cauldrons of War - Barbarossa.description: Cauldrons of War Barbarossa is the turn-based strategic wargame you will launch whenever you want your WW2 shot but don't have time for a monster strategy game.From June 1941 until the Battle of Moscow, play the USSR or the Axis forces in one of the largest and bloodiest operations in history.

Uniform Girl.description: This is a search for beautiful girls. Through the wiping of the gentlemen, the girls and girls interact to trigger the unlocking of all CG.

SpaceFoes.description: A space shooter inspired by old school games. You set the order of the levels, get new weapons and upgrades. Each stage has a boss and a sub-boss with unique skills and challenges.

Madness Fantasy.description: Five friends leave for a crazy weekend, but end up arrested. Now they will be forced by police to infiltrate a dangerous criminal organization and take on crazy missions. Will you succeed in take them out of this mess?

The 99 - Action-Quiz.description: The 99 - An Action-Quiz Don't just answer the same stupid questions! At The 99 there are randomized quiz, memorie and puzzle elements in one little game.

Evade.description: Evade is a fast paced bullet hell shooter focused on dodging attack patterns made of hundreds, even thousands of bullets. Shoot your way through over 30 different bosses, and recruit defeated enemies as powerful assists.

3dRudder Driver for SteamVR.description: Use your 3dRudder VR foot motion controller with more than 2,000 titles from the Steam®VR library, thanks to the 3dRudder Driver for Steam®VR. Discover total motion control at the feet. Focus your hands on the action.

Soldier Matt Sowards.description: Fight Enemies as Matt Sowards! Ported from Mobile! Soldier up! and Gear up! Soldier Matt Sowards is a fun plat-former I made to challenge myself & others. Enjoy a Free Fun Endless Shooter with levels and many enemies to face off! Play endless fun in this combat force in a 2D World!

Get Out....description: As you are the Bad Father who killed his daughter, you must to get out of your home, Before you die...

Vibrant Venture.description: Vibrant Venture is a singleplayer 2D adventure platformer game featuring a quirky cast of characters! The game features four playable characters with multiple unique abilities that can be combined for extremely versatile, fluid and fun movement!

Jay and Silent Bob: Mall Brawl Demo.description: Play as Jay and Silent Bob in a retro 8-bit sidescrolling brawler solo or with a friend. Pummel enemies with hard-hitting combos, dash attacks, and elbow drops as well as a random assortment of weapons as you battle your way out of the mall and back to the Quickstop.

The Monster Breeder Demo.description: Turn-based fantasy gladiatorial game with monster breeding. Crossbreed various species to create monster hybrids for gladiatorial combat. Manipulate juvenile creatures’ traits with magic and alchemy. Manage your enterprise, craft items and upgrade your base. Fight in the arena for gold and glory!

Personal Space.description: Escape the clutches of friendship and social expectations in this top-down puzzler about living with social anxiety.

驱逐.description: A simple shooting game. Destroy the big BOOS by buying weapons and blood packs by defeating enemy dropped coins

Lucen.description: Explore unknown lands and fight mythical beasts on a quest to ask the old gods to restore light to your village. Harness light with your sword and bow to cut down your foes, and discover ancient secrets.

CHAR01 VR.description: If a super AI rules the world, how can you fight back? Welcome to the vr gunship squadron. Try to figure out the secret behind. This is a fixed third-person view vr game. Play this game is like play remote drone in VR.

Wallpaper Master.description: New Features:Stop motion wallpaper, also supports webpage, video live wallpaper, micro-motion wallpaper, artificial intelligence wallpaper.

Faircroft Antiques: Treasures of Treffen.description: Dive into the world of art with Faircrofts Antiques! Join conservator Mia Faircroft as she explores the town of Treffenburg to find and restore priceless antiques. Tour Treffenburg through 20 beautiful hidden object scenes! Get to know the town's residents and find their connections to the past!

紫塞秋风 The Wind Road.description: "The Wind Road" is an ARPG real-time combat game, constructing a martial-arts world based on the ancient Silk Road under the background of a fictional era.

Necrolepsy Demo.description: Bounty hunting isn't all sweat and grit! Travel through an exotic world as Lira, platforming though obstacles, juggling enemies, surviving nightmares, and looking for a cure of her Necrolepsy!

Total Arcade Racing.description: Total Arcade Racing is a fun 2D top-down arcade racing game where you zip around closed circuits. Play solo or with up to 8 friends on the same screen in various game modes.​ This game is a tribute to old school arcade racing games like Super Sprint, Slicks 'n' Slide and Super Cars.

Lucid Dream.description: Lucid Dream is Point and Click horror game. The girl dream of being trapped in a weird place even though you fell asleep as always. Collect the item and Find clues! Escape and wake up from the dream!

Saturn Quest: Shadow of Planetus.description: Saturn Quest: Shadow of Planetus is a shameless 8-bit style clone of Shadow of the Colossus! You are Captain Navigator. Fight the evil minions of Planetus! Save Saturn! Save Galaxy!

Coronavirus Evolution.description: Choose a character and fight online to get maximum antidote and cure as many coronavirus people as possible!

Destiny of the World.description: Take on the role of a major country during World War II. You will control your country's production, trade, research, espionage, and command your troops in battle. The game starts on the eve of the Germany invasion of Poland on September 1, 1939, and covers the war until September 2, 1945.

Radical Solitaire.description: Never a bad deal. Always a RAD DEAL! You can't lose so stop being a loser and start wasting all your time playing Radical Solitaire!

Jade Cicada.description: Jade Cicada is a puzzle game with mirror-like movement of figures where you have to simultaneously get two figures to certain areas along the way bypassing tricky enemies and ..... walls.

Fantasy Story.description: Fantasy Story is a tight, punchy platformer with more than 80 rooms across four distinct zones, all employing unique mechanics to make for new challenges. Enemies are varied, tough and there are plenty of secrets to uncover. The world is deep, rich, and ready to explore.

Apastron.description: The multiverse is in danger! Defend the world of Coelho #6, in this retro styled open world FPS.

Watcher Chronicles.description: Become a glutton for punishment and persevere, alone or with a friend, against 20+ merciless bosses and legions of skeletal nightmares in this savage yet charming 2D souls-like.

Space Force.description: Space Force is a single - player, local, arcade, shooter game. With over 1000 waves to survive, leader boards to prove yourself to be the best, unique arsenal to tear through your enemies. The Space Force is a game that was inspired by "Metal Slug," "Galaga," and "Hawking Raptor Call of the Shadow."

Simple Farm.description: Craft lights and grow your farm after a cataclysmic event wipes out the sun.

Endgame: Road To Salvation.description: A high-octane road trip through a besieged world during a demon-infested zombie apocalypse. Rescue survivors, form a caravan, call in various support drops or air strikes, loot random structures for supplies or craft them yourself, modify common vehicles into post-apocalyptic machines of war.

Breaking Blocks.description: An exciting 2D action platformer in the vein of arkanoid.

Once Upon an Electric Dream.description: Princess Rosavel is on a deep space mission but can’t quite remember her purpose. Can she recollect her memories and find out why she went on such a dangerous journey?

Kyo's Routine.description: Kyo's girlfriend is in hospital, and to save her $20000 are needed. Kyo will begin a boring routine to make money and finally ask her to marry him.

からかい上手の高木さんVR.description: Virtually experience the playful and relentless teasing of heroine, Takagi-san, in Teasing Master Takagi-san VR - 1st Semester (Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san VR). With sales of the original comic series exceeding 8.2 million copies in Japan, the romantic comedy makes its debut on as a VR animation.

Blueplanet VR.description: Blueplanet VR is a new way to experience strong presence in some of the world's most remarkable locations.

YoloMic.description: Use YoloMic to be visually alerted of external sounds such as door knocks. Never miss another pizza delivery while blasting your headphones again!

Card Blitz: WWII.description: WWII card game - simple but deep, challenging but friendly. If you are into military history, collecting and fast game sessions then Card Blitz is perfect for you!

抵抗组织.description: 玩家将扮演二战法国抵抗组织的一员，在法西斯控制的城镇中完成组织提供的任务，为将德国人逐出家园而奋战

Infinite Way.description: Infinite Way is a deck-building roguelike where you travel, fight and survive in post apocalyptic world.

Fishing: North Atlantic.description: Commercial fishing in North Atlantic! Discover majestic world of Canadian Nova Scotia while admiring the vast diversity of ocean life. Search for the ocean gold with upgradable fishing boats and various fishing gear as you progress in your fisherman career.

What's Inside??.description: A light-hearted comedic romance novel for all ages, starring three academic girls each with their own personalities and quirks.. Unravel a mystery in a contemporary, fantasy, apocalyptic and sci-fi setting.. Can you save the human race from disaster?? Discover What’s Inside!!

VIY.description: Once upon a time, the great misfortune happened at an estate. The landowner's only daughter died under mysterious circumstances. People say that she was friendly with evil forces.Before she died, she had expressed a wish that for three days after her death the prayers for the dead should be recited by you...

Echoes of Nocturnal Chords 夜弦之音.description: About the game: On a quiet midnight, a famous girl suddenly disappears unexpectedly. The protagonist followed the clue obtained at the girl's house all the way to the back of the mountain, but when they met, something strange happened ...

GoldFish Brain.description: Goldfish Brain is a 2D scrolling platform action game . It adopts a Metroidvania-like design. You need to explore maps and find various ability items to strengthen yourself and break through more challenges.

Lonely Mountains: Downhill Demo.description: Just you and your bike - take it on a thrilling ride down an unspoiled mountain landscape. Make your way through thick forests, narrow trails and wild rivers. Race, jump, slide and try not to crash - all the way from the peak to the valley!

Dreamjob: Programmer Simulator - Learn P.description: A programmer's career sim. Acquire actual coding skills while playing! Learn programming from zero, earn skill points, change your office, create devices and games with visual programming. Our code learning game is a perfect introduction to Python, C++, C#, Java, or JavaScript.

Code Arcturus.description: Code Arcturus is a retro inspired arcade-style action platformer, with aliens, robots, spikes, explosions, and lots of coins. Blast your way through levels, compete for the fastest times on the leaderboards in Speedrun mode, or put your skills to the ultimate test in Nerfed mode

Spy Story. The Elusive Evidence.description: Explore the delightful world! Solve the most spy layouts you've ever seen!

Dark Solitaire. Mystical Circus.description: Visit the weird circus now! Open the mystery world to yourself!

Dangerous Solitaire. Zombie Fever.description: Play all the patience games and overpower all the zombies!

Mystery Solitaire. Dreamcatcher.description: Play all the patience games and plunge into the world of dreams!

COMBAT ARMS: THE CLASSIC.description: Combat Arms: the Classic is a multiplayer game, free-to-play modern first-person shooter. The game is a relaunch of Combat Arms in its glory days delivering gamers a nostalgic high-quality FPS with an extensive arsenal of weapons.

Microodyssey.description: Microodyssey is a narrative-driven 2D platform game, representing a travel into the greater scientific question: what there is at the start and at the end of everything?

AftLife -少女と猫と、失われた世界-.description: A girl and cats make "Heartful Comedy & Mystery" Comedy depicting calm everyday! The big mystery is solved in story. New Stories from Update Story is composed of short stories that are completed. Please wait for update!

Maggie's Movies - Second Shot.description: Become a movie director and help Maggie survive her second shot at fame, as she directs her first feature-length pirate movie!

Eat'n Eaten.description: A tower defense but instead of towers you have a buzzing ecosystem of plants and creatures with needs : your organisms need to eat in order to evolve and survive! Try to maintain balance of the food chain until you annihilate the very last invader!

Oh So Lucky! Doctor : A Surgery Soap Ope.description: Oh so lucky! Doctor is a hospital surgery/life simulation, which deals with many issues such as job loss, betrayal, friendship, shyness.

Nightwalker.description: Nightwalker is a short horror adventure game where you play as a wannabe investigator.

The Long Sky VR.description: This game is the VR version of my other game "Long Sky", which integrates all the optimizations of the latter and is completely re-created for VR control. In the game, players will come to the spacecraft, avoid meteorites and enemies in a 3D parallel battlefield.

Elite Tanks.description: Elite Tanks is a tank action shooter with arcade mechanics. Take on 100 levels of enemies and try to get to the end without running out of reinforcements! You probably won't be able to beat it.

DockYard.description: Bad physics meets first game project. Dockyard! It's a game. Best send it to your friend as a joke. At least they'll get a good laugh out of it.

Sokpop S07: sok-worlds.description: Make and explore 3d collage worlds in sok-worlds! Release your inner creativity and use internet images to create weird, funny or artsy worlds!

Football Manager 2021.description: New additions and game upgrades deliver added levels of depth, drama and football authenticity. FM21 empowers you like never before to develop your skills and command success at your club.

Football Manager 2021 Touch.description: Stripped-back and simplified for speedier seasons, FM21 Touch is the time-saving alternative to the desktop classic, focusing largely on the managerial essentials – tactics and transfers.

Dark Space.description: Overcome difficult platforming challenges, solve puzzles and escape dangerous enemies hiding in every corner of Dark Space!

Humanless.description: Play as a super skilled combatant, with superhuman speed and agility. Fight against merciless demons, while dashing and jumping to dodge evil traps through carefully designed levels.

Floor 13: Deep State.description: Floor 13: Deep State is a dynamically generated dystopian thriller, inspired by the 90’s classic Floor 13 and created by its original team. In a free society, citizens make their own decisions, can challenge authority, and are able to speak their truth. Your job is to put a stop to that.

PROXY.description: Experience our combination of cover-based gun play and kinetic melee combat as you fight ever increasing waves of enemies. Choose between Trent or Alicia, and utilize their strengths and abilities to get the highest score possible!

9 Till Void.description: 9 Till Void is a turn-based deckbuilding roguelike that features neither deck nor cards. As the newly-appointed Spellsword of these lands, you must fight your way through the corruption, with an arsenal of carefully chosen spells, to reach the source of darkness and destroy it from within.

Find Me.description: A lost shadow seeks to be reunited with her human girl, while searching for memories and avoiding the dangerous city lights. Find Me is a 2D puzzle platformer set in a beautiful, surreal cityscape.

Blightbound.description: Blightbound is a multiplayer dungeon crawler that tasks three heroes to venture down from their mountain refuge to face the abominations of the Blight - a mysterious and corrupting fog that enshrouds the land.

Swatch Out!.description: Discover all the colors in the Art Zone by surrounding creatures the same color as you! Make yourself red, blue, or yellow, and discover how to become orange, green, and purple in this action title.

The Last Kids on Earth and the Staff of.description: Join Jack and his friends in an epic, post-apocalyptic quest to save our world from the Queen of the Slime Monsters!

What Makes Us Special.description: What do you need to start a school newspaper? The team of course! Nobody is perfect. Everyone is different.

Hecaton.description: Hecaton is futuristic action rogue-like set on Titan, a terraformed moon of Saturn. Play as a Bounty Hunter and fight your way through an army of space pirates. Brave the surface of Titan and begin your descent to find the Pirate Base and your ultimate goal.

Smashing Spirits: Brazil’s First Boxer.description: Fight Spartans at Brazil Island with fiercely boxing combos on this insanely fast-paced fighting-platformer! Play with Aiyra, an indigenous boxer fighting in the middle of a conflict between her own people and foreigners coming from beyond the seas.

尸灾-生还者.description: In another failed invasion plan you were caught in a storm Cut off contact with friends who have worked together for many years The city was thrown into a mess by the explosion of the laboratory and the spread of the virus You are blocked by many virus-infected creatures and enemies

The Company Man.description: Battle the corporate machine in The Company Man! A 2D action-adventure where you can hit your crazy coworkers with a keyboard and shoot your evil bosses with emails. Survive the struggles of working life and fulfil your lifelong quest to be CEO!

Seek Girl:Fog Ⅰ.description: "Seek Girl: Fog I" is a strategy adventure game where you will rescue trapped girls in the mysterious fog. The suddenly appearing mist in the Kingdom Forest trapped the girls in it。You are a warrior recruited by the king to rescue the lost girl.

The Tide.description: One day, strange fish began to appear! A new disaster thriller about the struggle between human vs. fish.

蔚蓝月下.description: The story will be accompanied by three heroines, and everyone will find their own love in this real and imaginary world. Is it the dark-skinned school girl who is available, the cold and mysterious girl, or the afterimage that I have been unable to reach in my memory?

ATRI -My Dear Moments- Demo.description: "As the world sank, I found you." In the near future, a sudden and unexplained sea rise has left much of human civilization underwater. In a little town slowly being enveloped by the ocean, an unforgettable summer is about to begin for a boy and a mysterious robot girl...

Sweet Solitaire: School Witch.description: Study school magic! Solve the most mystical layouts you've ever seen!

Need for Speed™ Rivals.description: Erase the line between single player and multiplayer in this street-racing rivalry between Cops and Racers. Seamlessly join a world where your friends are already racing and chasing.

Cyberemo 2007 Demo.description: Cyberemo 2007: “Wake up damn you, Emo, we have a lot of veins for cuts!” Old-school platformer breathtaking game.

ゴシックマーダー -運命を変えるアドベンチャー- Demo.description: 命を狙われる当主を守るため、メイドの少女が恐るべき殺人計画に挑む！20世紀初頭英国の伯爵家を舞台にした恋愛ミステリーゲーム。予知夢を元に殺人計画の謎を推理して、当主の命を守る――待ち受けるのは死か密やかな恋か？　選択によっていくつものエンディングに分岐します。

イヌワシ ～うらぶれ探偵とお嬢様刑事の池袋事件ファイル～ Demo.description: お嬢様刑事とうらぶれ探偵が挑む１７の事件！　池袋を舞台に男女コンビが大活躍！元ギャング執事に天才高校生ハッカーなど個性あふれるキャラクター達と力を合わせて、サスペンスにコメディ、オカルトなど多彩な事件に挑もう！

Ruin Raiders.description: Ruin Raiders is a turn-based tactical roguelike where you command customizable squads on a one-way journey into the ruins of an ancient civilization. Master turn-based combat, craft new technologies, and dive into ever-changing ruins to unveil the past!

Digitizer.description: Digitizer is a Sci-Fi RPG set in a post-capitalist world. It’s a story-driven open-world game with multiple factions. Fight, craft, drive and make your story choices that will bring the conflict to its end.

Snake Core.description: Are you ready to command a range of different units as they battle aliens in a mission-based take on the classic Snake? Select your path to victory!

Polary.description: Polary - is a casual game that will test how good your reaction. Orange targets appear on the playing field in a random place, the task is to click on them and earn points. And how many points can you earn?

Crazy Projectile.description: Test your reflexes by firing a projectile at the right time, the projectile will teleport and you will have a new objective, you must unlock all levels and collect coins to enable THE INFINITE LEVEL.

Squatch.description: Squatch is a puzzle game in which you attempt to connect all squares in a scene by color matching their sides.

Abacus Finch.description: Play as Abacus Finch or Abbie Finch to track down and find out what has happened to the dreaded Pterofractal egg taken by Pigeonacci.

Tidal Shock.description: An underwater arena shooter with a shocking twist. 8 players battle in a classic respawn arena to capture the reactor and boil the competition!

Darkbolt.description: Play as the survivors of a Lovecraftian apocalypse, where resources are scarce and horrors abundant.

Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath.description: Become a doctor in a romantic medical drama with aspiring intern Allison Heart!

Horned Knight.description: Horned Knight is a challenging 2D action-platformer where you must overcome all fears, enemies, and traps as the Hero Knight. Rewrite destiny, with your trusty sword, young Knight - the realm depends on it!

Handball Manager 2021.description: Finally state of the art handball management. Prove yourself as a manager and trainer in the daily business of professional handball.

Willy Jetman: Astromonkey's Revenge Demo.description: Willy Jetman: Astromonkey's Revenge is an arcade shooter full of action, exploration, RPG elements, lots of humor and impressive bosses. Explore, fight, earn experience, purchase weapons In an exciting adventure in the Metroidvania tradition.

I saw the night.description: FPP single-player adventure game with occasional surprising and violent shooter scenes. Unsettling and insightful thriller spiked heavily with thought-provoking, witty comebacks and wry humor. Made in Unreal Engine 4.

Blaster Squad.description: Explosive side-scrolling couch co-op run'n'gunner with hundreds of levels and unlockable ammo types. 1-4 players.

STRAIGHT ON 8.description: Skeet simulation game with the focus on keeping muscle and eye movement memory while in between practice sessions or tournaments

Mirastell.description: Mirastell is a 2D Action-RPG with a unique flavor of turn-based combat, set on a mysterious, abandoned space cruise liner. Discover what lead to the fate of the passengers, and earn weapons and items by exploring, and defeating enemies.

Fire Protection Training Simulator.description: This Fire Protection Training Simulator was designed and developed to provide employers, of any size, with the most cost-effective method of verifying their employees understanding of fires, how they're started, how to prevent them and how to properly respond in the event of one.

Need for Speed™.description: Ready to own the streets? Get behind the wheel of iconic cars and floor it through Ventura Bay, a sprawling urban playground. Explore overlapping stories as you build your reputation – and your dream car – and become the ultimate racing icon.

Need for Speed™ Most Wanted.description: The open-world action in Need for Speed Most Wanted gives you the freedom to drive your way. Hit jumps and shortcuts, switch cars, lie low or head for terrain that plays to your vehicle’s unique strengths. Fight your way past cops and rivals using skill, high-end car tech and tons of nitrous.

Hexagon Heroes.description: Hexagon Heroes is a turn-based strategy game about controlling the map while balancing economics, military tactics and technology to overwhelm and destroy other players.

Sunrise 7.description: You are a shadow. Run to escape the Sunrise!

STRIKERS 1945.description: The vertical scrolling shooter game released in the arcade by "Psikyo". You can set the difficulty level, controls, screen orientation, etc. In addition, online rankings have been implemented! Aim to be the world's best Striker!

GUNBIRD.description: "Marion" the little great wizard in the steampunk world. The masterpiece of the "Psikyo Shooting"! Online rankings are available.

Samurai Aces.description: Samurai and ninja fly in the sky! Freaky Japanese-style shooter known as the debut of "Psikyo". We' ve got online rankings!

Horse Racing Rally.description: Horse Riding Rally - Free 3D Racing is the most realistic 3D Horse racing game. With lifelike horse animations, immersive graphics, addictive gameplay, and heated competition Horse Riding Rally is the must-have game for all ages. Have you got what it takes for this challenging experience?

Super Mombo Quest.description: Bounce and stomp through an enormous interconnected world, doing some intense acrobatics and getting huge combos! A superfast precision platformer that mixes up a Metroidvania world with classic Arcade mechanics.

Battle Ram.description: Battle Ram - an experiment of scientists developed in a secret secret laboratory, a powerful creature against robots, who will win?

Arc Defence.description: Arc defence is a game in genre classic top down 2d tower defense, But in difference of classic TD, enemies can fight back. Use towers upgrades and special abilities to stop waves. Be ready for epic battle and try to protect our lands!

Black blood.description: Black blood is a mix of hardcore Tower Defense strategy and top-down shooter. Act as a defender against alien invaders, attack and destroy all their insidious plans...

Ultimo Reino 2.description: Time of guilds, wizards, warriors, blacksmiths, tailors, scribes, alchemists, woodworkers, animal tamers, brewers, traders, traitors and murderers. The Ultimo Reino II begins!

Evil Heart Fever.description: This game is an intense bullet hell roguelike shooter, evolve and destroy the celestial army to try to open the hell's gate. Items, references and transformations based in : Lovecraftian universe, biblical sins, and all types of angels and celestial creatures.

Rangok Skies.description: War has started! Rangok Skies is a vertically scrolling arcade shooter inspired by the genre classics. Highly replayable with 4 different characters, each with their own unique ship, weapons, and bombs. Includes 2-player local co-op.

Sand to Surf.description: Gain and maintain speed as you surf the treacherous sands of an ancient desert to rescue your world in this blend of the extreme sport and adventure gameplay genres.

Space Haters.description: Space Haters is a tough-as-nails vertical shoot 'em up featuring classic arcade-style gameplay and set in the ruthless world of intergalactic music. After his sell-out gig, Photon is on his way to the greatest after-party the galaxy has seen. However, his haters want him gone. For good.

Without A Voice.description: In the depths of a forest, an exiled princess whiles her time in solitude. One day, a mysterious, beautiful maiden appears, throwing her world out of its alignment. A dark fantasy visual novel following the intertwining paths of these two women. In seven days, the wheel of fate will splinter...

Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborv.description: Kick some grass in Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville, the wackiest shooter yet!

Clockwise Demo.description: "Clockwise" is an adventure, puzzle, horror game with different playthroughs. It combines the feeling of being watched with the ones of confusion and fear. Will you find a way out of the haunted house?

Maze Slider.description: Maze Slider is an ice slide puzzle game where players need to slide their way to the level exit. This game is inspired by the ice slide puzzles that can be found in Pokemon. But this game expands on the idea with all new mechanics.

Mindframe: The Secret Design Collector's.description: Could you survive a deadly game where your opponent knew your secrets?

Fill all.description: Is an exciting puzzle game in which the player paints the corridors of the maze with their movements

Berry mayhem.description: Berry mayhem is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses. There are 27 different levels available.

Flatland: Prologue.description: Flatland: Prologue is a full and original game (not a demo) and also a prequel to Flatland Vol.1. Run as fast and precise as you can through Flatland, a minimalist neon-style world that is about to change forever. A fast-paced hardcore platformer with hand-crafted levels and challenges.

Knight's Retreat.description: A chess game without any chess. Rearrange your troops to bring your best Knights back to your Kingdom in an abstract medieval world.

Em-A-Zurvival.description: When Andrew wakes up from his apartment, he is greeted by an unfriendly shriek. He innocently wanders around the apartment and comes across Frank…who is eating his wife. Could this be Em-A-Li’s doing? Uncover the intertwined characters of Em-A-Li and Andrew as the story continues.

Democratic Socialism Simulator.description: Pave the road to a post-capitalist society!

ABSOLUTE.description: ABSOLUTE is an escape game. Experience a unique puzzle on every level. Make use of any available tools to solve the puzzles and clear all the levels.

The Astro Parcel Service Demo.description: Deliver packages as fast as you can while surviving the hazards of space and the crippling pressure of your employer, The Astro Parcel Service.

Kernmantle.description: Kernmantle is a twin-stick climbing game with exploration, platforming, and light puzzle elements. Control a physics-driven character and scale a 2000-meter vertical canyon filled with challenges, characters, and secrets.

Education.description: Having done some terrible things in his youth at school, his memories call Bart Blake back to that place, in his nightmares.

Shoot Them 2.description: Shoot Them 2 is Come! When the danger came again, the clone female soldiers began to purify themselves, not only being able to reproduce themselves, but also producing new and stronger soldiers. This time, we are going to fight against these clone female soldiers in a new scene.

HANGMAN II.description: A grim sequel to the puzzle of guessing words. The rules are the same - you need to guess the word, and you have the right to make a mistake 6 times, otherwise the man will be in the noose. And be careful - the game contains many secrets...

Rebirth Online.description: Adventures await in a world brought to life by realistic graphics! Experience genuine adventures in the grand world of Rebirth Online. Battle, craft, explore, and combine different types of equipment and abilities to create your own style of play.

Ace Campus Club.description: In order to inherit the inheritance, you decided to lead a campus club from the ground up to become one of the famous ace clubs. Along the way, a girl catches your eye, and an unforgettable story occurred. Can you make it with the girl, and achieve your end goal, it all depends on you.

No Exit.description: No Exit is a fast grappling game that pits you against several environmental challenges of hell. Time your swings and glide skull demon to safety. It is Imbued with most beautiful hand-painted artwork with enchanted musical score and narrates personal journey through pain.

Fairy Fire - Defender of the Fairies.description: Up for some retro arcade action? Extra weapons, upgrades, smart bombs etc are your favorite tools? Then this great arcade clone is for you! Survive waves of evil creatures in this fantastic, fast paced side scroller. If you like games like Defender, Data Storm or Drop Zone, you will LOVE Fairy Fire!

Racingmaybe.description: A drag racing game with a complex upgrading system where driving faster than the speed of light used to be possible. Which is fast. Real. Fast. Even your rusty car can race this fast, if you're good. But first, see if you can break the soundbarrier

Utopia Syndrome Demo.description: Utopia Syndrome is a series of short sci-fi mystic horror adventure games. The first game, Wake Up, tells about the fate of people who live in an underground shelter and struggle to survive against a terrible evil.

Fractured Core Demo.description: Fractured Core is a cyberpunk JRPG set in 2105 Germany. Play as Michael, a Raven Operator of Athena Private Security Company as he undertake various missions throughout the nation.

Anitons.description: Anitons is an vast world monster collection RPG featuring base building, farming and real time combat. Explore vast world and tame, look after and evolve creatures that you will catch.

Crown of the Empire Around the World.description: Crown of the Empire: fun adventures await! The queen needs your help!

Cork The Volcano.description: Join Rus the Dinosaur, Hippo the Hedgehog, and Syd the Sloth, to put a stop to whoever's causing the volcano of Pear Island to erupt!

Ponpu.description: Inspired by the classic gameplay of Bomberman, Ponpu takes the concept in a new direction, adding new mechanics and features while packaging it in super-slick, hand-drawn graphics.

Lusitania.description: Welcome aboard the RMS Lusitania, a luxurious ocean liner sunk by a German U-boat during World War 1. Immerse yourself in this detailed unique experience of how this great liner met its final moments on the 7th May 1915.

Elemental Echos.description: Enjoy sitting back at the classic feel of the turn-based RPG's you grew up and fell in love with. Follow the story of Tyra, a War-Axe Wielding Spellslinging Half-Elf and her friends to discover the dark past of magic and the mysterious history of her parents.

Locked Up Demo.description: The game takes place in a house where terrible events occurred earlier. You will have to repeatedly wander along the same corridor in order to uncover the causes of insanity and understand who you are.

Radio Station.description: Radio Station is a single-player first-person game in which you have to get out of the existing situation.

The Singularity Trials.description: The Singularity Trials is a VR Swordplay & Physics game where you attack and rebound droids on to targets for massive score multipliers. Defend yourself from incoming attacks! Choose between 3 Solar factions and emerge as their champion. Are you ready to beat the trials?

东方华彩乱战2 ~ Touhou Blooming Chaos 2.description: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 is an brand new rogue shooter where you control a character of a varied cast to explore an all randomized labyrinth. Enjoy the excessive fun of reaping enemies and character training. With balanced difficulty, you can always find your place as either beginner or veteran!

Metallic Metronome.description: Slash down the monsters - with rhythm!

The Casebook of Arkady Smith.description: An open world investigation game set in a futuristic city. Take on the role of Arkady Smith, the famous investigator in this third person adventure game.

Ninja Scarf.description: It's okay to cry--as long as you save the day, right? Join Cry, a young ninja, as he overcomes his shy nature to stand against a powerful threat. Journey through each exciting area, master four unique weapons and, most importantly, make your dear father proud in this 2D action platformer!

Demelia's Isle.description: You just woke up on a beach. Simply trying to survive, you find yourself immersed in a quest against the demonic forces that are awakening again in this isolated kingdom.

Spirit of Adventure.description: "Spirit of Adventure" is a classical 2.5D dungeon crawl RPG game in which you'll take charge of a group of adventurers searching for the next callenge.

Keep the Balance.description: Ever throw an elephant on a scale? Or chased an elephant away with a hair dryer? It's very easy. But always: KEEP THE BALANCE!

Core Decay.description: Explore vast facilities across a dying Earth and uncover a sinister plot to preserve humanity no matter the cost - even if it means redefining what makes us alive - in an atmospheric immersive sim that explores the nature of consciousness and individuality.

Kairos'Light.description: Change the future of Edmond, a desperate guy who failed his life. In this simulation, improve the town of Thésye, earn money, buy a castle, and collect cattails.

NEAVE.description: Neave is an atmospheric parkour game. The world is made up of beautiful vistas and narrow alleyways that come together to create moments of intense beauty and fast paced platforming.

Edge of Dreams.description: Edge of Dreams is a first person action with roguelike elements. You are the lone survivor in this strange space station. Shoot, explore, kill guards, create builds from items and skills, DIE, and repeat.

Streamer Life Simulator.description: Streamer Life Simulator is a very comprehensive streamer life simulation game. Be the most popular streamer in the world.

Cosmic Journey PC Live Wallpaper.description: If you are a fan of deep space then this live wallpaper is for you.

30 days of plague.description: This is a game with the background of new coronavirus, the story happened in w City, you and your family will face the epidemic together. All your choices will lead to different endings. Revisit the story of the epidemic and survive it。 It's a total of 30 days of epidemic life.

SECTOR 40: The Soviet Legacy.description: SECTOR 40 is a fictional discovery game with a slightly sinister atmosphere. Have an adventure in the darkness of Siberia and discover the heritage of the Soviet Union in its sad fate.

Pity Pit.description: Dig Dug meets Downwell! Dig your doom, save Gwendoline from the Devil Johnson! 2D platforming, digging, ores, crafting, bombs!!

ASTRA-256 Assembler.description: A good mind-breaker useful for solving a real tasks. For example, tasks that programmers solved when sending man to the Moon. Along the way, you’ll acquire Assembly programming skills and refresh your math knowledge.

Party Animals.description: Fight your friends as puppies, kittens and other fuzzy creatures in PARTY ANIMALS! Paw it out with your friends both online and offline. Interact with the world under our realistic physics engine. Did I mention PUPPIES?

Naturalist Stories.description: Take photos, get rewards and unlock new animals in your nursery

Deeproot Manor.description: Your younger brother, Richard, has gone missing. There are rumors about an abandoned manor, deep inside the woods. Believing that to be your brother's last destination before his disappearance, you sneak out of your home and step forth into the forest...

Challenge Speedball.description: Challlenge Speedball is a cooperative multiplayer game based on the competition paintball variation called Speedball.

Ultimate Truco.description: Ultimate Truco is a competitive simulator of the famous classic of the deck called "Truco" or as it is called by the French "Truc".

Henchman For Hire.description: Henchman for Hire is a VR game designed by students where you drive, jump and sabotage Peace City for the super villain Dr. BAD while traveling on a surprisingly resilient moped!

Astro-g.description: Astro-g is a gravity-based space puzzler, challenging players with over 40 unique levels and environments to conquer! You’ve only got one shot to make it to the portal, and it’ll take all you’ve got to weave together a safe path to victory!

Patrick's Parabox.description: A mind-bending recursive puzzle game about boxes within boxes within boxes within boxes. Learn to use infinity to your advantage as you explore a deep and elegant system.

Line Simulator.description: Punch, throw, steal your way to the front of the line in Line Simulator! Find new and bizarre ways to skip the line in five unique environments. Explore the halls of a convention, push your way to the front of a supermarket queue, and discover that not everything is what it seems in this wacky game!

ReThink | Evolved 4.description: ReThink | Evolved 4 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors. Use new gameplay mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

Hadean Tactics.description: Hadean Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding game fused with autobattler elements to create a unique strategy experience. Use your cards to influence the actions of your units and help your Hero defeat the Six Wings of Hell!

Man Face Spider I.description: Hardcore and retro classic fixed shooter games, like space invaders. It have an old CRT monitor effect. Very exciting and impressive. Man face Spiders are evil aliens,you will kill all of them.

Puyo Puyo™ Tetris® 2.description: Japan’s beloved puzzle game series Puyo Puyo and the world-renowned Tetris® game franchise have teamed up again to deliver even more Puyo-popping and Tetrimino-clearing fun in Puyo Puyo Tetris 2.

Turniej Robotów.description: Turniej Robotów: naucz się informatyki poprzez przygodę! Studiuj na wirtualnym uniwersytecie, zacznij programować, rozwiązuj realne zadania informatyczne, pracuj z odpowiednikami rzeczywistych programów i systemów, pomóż bohaterom przeprowadzić śledztwo w Akademii...

The House of Da Vinci 2.description: Become an apprentice of the famous Leonardo da Vinci. Solve handcrafted mechanical 3D puzzles and discover hidden secrets. Navigate through mesmerizing environments of the Italian Renaissance. Travel through time to influence your surroundings.

GraFi St.Patrick.description: GraFi St.Patrick - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, clovers, rainbows and changing gravity.

Northern Tale 5: Revival.description: Ragnar - the fearless leader of the Vikings, fell in battle with Evil. But this is not the end! The Scandinavian God Odin decided to return to him not only life, but also youth. Forward to meet new adventures!

Supreme AI: Arena.description: A minimalistic, fast-paced top-down arena shooter against a state-of-the-art artificial intelligence. Fight AI agents whose speed, tactics, gunplay control and obsession to win have been trained for years of virtual playtime and now delivered to you in 60-seconds-long battles.

Darkest Valley.description: Embark on this story-driven action-RPG as you fight through a dark fantasy world. Battle cosmic horrors, craft powerful weapons, and complete quests in pursuit of what lies behind your strange circumstance.

The Metamorphosis.description: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin.

Super DEE.description: You play as Dee, a character that looks like a pee-pee in a 2D platformer-climber. He needs your help to reach the top because he fell down from his balcony. It's very challenging, plus there is also an impossible mode.

PowerSlave (DOS Classic Edition).description: Alien forces possessing horrifying powers have sealed off the once thriving city of Karnak from all outside contact. As a covert operations specialist, you have been trained for all forms of contingencies. Nothing can prepare you, however, for the nightmare you are about to enter...

Revel Rousers.description: Rampage through a boring city turning boring people into party animals to throw the biggest party for your party god!Iso

Banana Hell.description: Jump your way to get the blue diamonds as you try to survive a very annoying banana monologue! A REALLY HARD game!

Down The Hole.description: Down The Hole is a unique puzzle based game where you quite literally have to go down the hole. Falling and using your momentum you can solve puzzles... Oh and don't forget turrets and other baddies have been put to kill you.

Creator's Chasm.description: Enter a surreal world crawling with monsters representing the anxieties and challenges you are too afraid to meet face to face as an artist - whether you're a painter, programmer, musician, writer, or otherwise.

Worm Jazz.description: Worm Jazz is a wriggly puzzler with a unique blend of game mechanics inspired by familiar classics such as Snake and Bomberman. Features smooth jazz, explosive chain-reactions and dapper headwear.

Submarine Titans.description: Submarine Titans is a real-time strategy video game that takes place in the year 2115 after a comet has struck Earth, driving two human factions, the militant White Sharks and the scientific Black Octopi, to establish underwater bases and fight for dominance over the oceans.

Military Service.description: 由MMH Studio獨立開發。 紀念本人與100梯的弟兄們完成4個月結訓。 本遊戲為本人學習Unreal Engine 4的初作，望大家支持!

First Snow.description: Having moved away from her friends and family to attend community college, Allison Merlo is a fresh student struggling with the day to day challenges of life.

Trendpoker 3D: Free Online Poker.description: Play Online Poker without restriction or cost! Compete with community, your friends or family play this truly free Texas Hold'em Poker.

Casus.description: Casus is an old-school dungeon crawler with some modern twists. Draw your own map as you explore a world forgotten by mankind. As you progress through the labyrinths, discover the past using clues scattered in the harsh environment.

Pteranodon's Flight: The Flying Dinosaur.description: Welcome to Pteranodon's Flight! Dip, dive, swoop and soar as you hunt for prey, weave through jagged rocks and brave an erupting volcano! Be careful, though! You might actually learn something!

Venge.description: In an effort to win some money, you decide to explore a once magnificent movie studio that vanished into thin air a few years back. After a terrible fall, you find yourself trapped in the abandoned world of Rotnic Entertainment. Suddenly, you wake the spirits and get transported to THEIR world...

Topang.description: An adventure platforming game that spans 3 separate main characters' introduction stories. A 2-Player combat versus mode is featured containing 15 playable fighters.

Britannic: Patroness of the Mediterranea.description: Explore the Britannic, sister ship of the infamous Titanic, and relive her tragic sinking after striking a mine in the First World War.

Around the Fire.description: Revisit human history in the form of a story. With simple graphics representing the art style from whence it came. Emerge yourself into the world of cavemen, and evolve your knowledge as you slowly understand how the world works.

Nonno Lorenzo.description: Farm, cook, explore and level up in Nonno Lorenzo! An exploration driven farming and cooking RPG where you run your own pizzeria. With an old farm at disposal, you must grow ingredients, level up and explore the island to make it the happy community it once was.

There Was the Moon.description: The moon hasn't set in ages. Under the eternal night humanity is forced to choose one of its own to restore natural order. Step into this beautiful nightmare, walk its luminous halls, and take part in the ceremony of a lifetime.

Tiny Room Stories: Town Mystery.description: Everybody are missing in a town. Find the answers of town mystery in a point and click adventure game with escape the room mechanics

NETABOKU -A robot girl changes my life a.description: This game is a sci-fi romantic adventure(visual novel) modeled after the avatar robot cafe. Japan, circa 2040. Kanto lives in a residential facility for the severely physically disabled. One day, they meet a mysterious girl, Kanata, and their destiny changes dramatically...

The Curse of Zigoris Demo.description: The Curse Of Zigoris is an action adventure pixel art platformer game with a story about a girl who tries to lift the curse from her village.

The Sacred Acorn.description: Tansira is in peril, and the only one that can save it is you. Play as Ima, an adorably courageous squirrel, and explore a beautiful, mysterious land. Solve puzzles, discover secrets, defeat corrupted enemies, and make strange, cute friends that will guide you on your quest.

Planet Morph Demo.description: Alterux, the brand-new alien species with a unique property: It can morph its body into any kind of creature, organic and inorganic alike. Use this power to explore new worlds, combat alien enemies, and unlock creatures to become!

东方祈华梦～Elegant Impermanence of Sakura Dem.description: Touhou Kikamu ~ Elegant Impermanence of Sakura is a fangame of Touhou Project series, it manifests as a traditional STG like most official Touhou Project games.

Aura Kingdom 2.description: Great remake of a classic MMORPG! Enjoy the satisfying MMO gameplay and stunning graphics on your PC! Embark on new adventure to the world Ramayan and screenshot every step of your journey. Summon Eidolons, establish tactics for party battles, and most of all... create YOUR legend as a Hero.

Arcade Redemption.description: Be prepared to put your skills and reflexes to the test in the ultimate rock and roll arcade experience!

あの日見た夕陽.description: This is a completely original, full-color visual novel. More than 700 stills for the full version (more than 400 for the demo version). ※This work contains very extreme and grotesque language. There is no sexual content.

SWISCAPE.description: Oh, my God! The planet has exploded. The aliens have all gone off somewhere. Everyone is waiting for your help. You manipulate a life-saving ball. Swipe and jump!

Alpha Particle.description: Alpha Particle is sci-fi action game about a defenceless particle that must overcome it's obstacles creatively

SpellPunk VR.description: In SpellPunk you will unleash extraordinary powers and turn into a mighty magician who will cast spells by drawing magical symbols in the air with his/hers own hands. And yes, you will be immersed in a stunning, abstract world, experiencing fast-paced magical duels.

Rushberry Mercs.description: 4 player fast paced mining game. Mine and convey berrydium to your base or destroy your opponents to ensure your lead.

Damascus.description: Damascus is a pixel-art MMORPG created by two guys. Create a unique character and explore the strange and fantastic world that is before you. Train any of your 19 different skills. Chat and trade with other players. Make friends and slay all sorts of Dragons!

Under Shelter.description: Will you survive the struggle with cold, hunger, and nuclear radiation? Everything is up to you, the shelter manager.

Rover Wars.description: What if MOBAs and RTS games had a baby? Rover Wars combines resource management, farming, building and strategy into an intense tug of war. Fight in an interplanetary campaign and challenge your friends in the configurable Battle Mode. Rover Wars might be your gateway ticket into the strategy genre.

Plan V.description: Plan V was developed by Painting Practice and used on shows such as His Dark Materials (BBC/HBO) – it is also used as an in-house production tool.

Ashina: The Red Witch: Prologue.description: The story is about Ash. An ordinary girl who takes a journey through a mysterious spirit world filled with strange creatures. Ash must find her way back home...before something else finds her.

Core Defense: Prelude.description: Demo for Core Defense, a roguelike tower defense game with a dash of deckbuilding. Choose a reward, improve your build, survive the next wave, repeat. Highly replayable, difficult, and addictive. You'll want just one more wave, just one more run!

//TODO: today.description: A visual novel about figuring out life with the help of an AI. //TODO: today is a pastel colored slice-of-life story that let's you freely choose your pronouns and romantic preferences!

Victorian Admirals Panama Crisis 1885.description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models.

Spot Sample Witness Simulator.description: This Spot Sample Witnessing Simulator provides the user (trainee) with the opportunity to use and demonstrate their understanding of the Purge, Fill and Empty Method for collecting gas pipeline samples.

KnightRoyale.description: KnightRoyal is a Indie retro pvp Pixel-Game to play from time to time, if you are looking for a Indie retro pvp Pixel-Game to play from time to time, you are here right KnightRoyal is the perfect game for you then.

Stolen Rage.description: This is a revenge game.Destroy everything what can stop you! Destroyable cities, building, trees, vehicles ect. Don't let the aliens to stop you.

Victorian Admirals Samoan Crisis 1889.description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models.

DragonScales 6: Love and Redemption.description: A casual game with tile matching, puzzles and battles. Solve the new DragonScales challenges and shatter the plans of the Dark Empress.

Shinobi no Okite.description: Ieyasu Tokugawa, who ended the era of Sengoku and unified Japan. This man created a highway connecting the capital of Kyoto and Edo. It is called the Tokaido-53-tsugi. On this Tokaido, three ninjas will travel from Edo in this present day with a secret mission.

Valkyrie's Arrow(瓦尔基丽的箭).description: This is an indie game that tests your skill selection and matching strategies. You can use the fragmented time to quickly enjoy the game, thereby releasing work and study stress. . . Ollie gives !!!!!

BLIND QUEST - The Enchanted Castle.description: Welcome Wayfarer! Your journey in the world of Blind Quest begins NOW! Blind Quest is a fantasy role-playing game where you will guide Nathan the mercenary in an epic adventure across the lands of Aetherna.

Escape First 3.description: "Escape First 3" is the third installment of a multiplayer escape room puzzle game for virtual reality or desktop PC! It includes 3 different escape rooms to choose from and can be played competitively, co-op or solo.

Aladdin - Hidden Objects Game.description: Uncover the secrets of the magical East in the newest hidden object game! Unexpected plot twists are guaranteed, so enjoy incredible adventures! Get some equipment and supplies, grab the map and go!

AST-Hero.description: AST-Hero is a top-down space-shooter, with unique graphics and sounds. Everything was custom-handmade. It offers a great player experience and is difficult to master although the game learning curve is easy.

VR Mummy Girl.description: A mummy girl who has been asleep deep inside a pyramid for more than 1000 years wakes up. She doesn’t know what era is it is, who she is, or the reason she's there. She keeps walking, trying to find the exit.

Star Shaman.description: STAR SHAMAN is an active VR shooter with great looks and unique moves. Travel through procedural solar systems to a funky French-touch soundtrack and battle hordes of enemies with a unique spellcasting system that will make you feel powerful.The Universe is counting on you, Shaman!

Locked Up.description: The game takes place in a house where terrible events occurred earlier. You will have to repeatedly wander along the same corridor in order to uncover the causes of insanity and understand who you are.

Little machines world.description: A game in the genre of arcade role-playing racing. The goal of the game is to get into the top three. There are two game modes: 1 - Championship (8 cars participate) 2 - Arcade (8 to 30 cars participate) You can also play with friends on one screen, in any mode.

Project RTD: Random Tower Defense PvP De.description: Project RTD is a Random Tower Defense PVP Game. Players will compete against each other, defending with randomly built towers or attacking other players by summoning monsters to become the “Final Winner”. The thrill of randomness and Strategic Tech Tree. Experience both in one game!

Victorian Admirals Marianas Incident 188.description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models

BEAR, VODKA, FALL OF BERLIN! 🐻.description: This time, Motherland sent you to fight against the Nazi forces to capture Berlin. Kill enemies to get the maximum chance of survival.

Cyborg Arena 2.description: Armed with your minigun, complete all the missions and unleash your firepower on the cyborgs! Keep moving and achieve the best online score !

JACK 'N' HAT.description: The sinister Dr. Voo Doom has kidnapped the Princess of Ririland and incited a civil war! It's up to repairman extraordinaire, Jack and his boomerang hat to save her and restore peace! Jump through 20+ huge levels, collecting Crystals, Stars and more! Can you save Ririland?

6 PEOPLE.description: A man travels in a subway car alone. Where is he going? Will he or any of his fellow passengers arrive at their destination? Are they drawn together by pure coincidence, or something more sinister?

Video Hole Episode I.description: VideoHole is an episodic first person adventure game set in an alien dimension. Meet new allies, find gadgets and uncover the mysteries of an ancient power far below your local video store.

Project Dagger.description: Project Dagger is a retro FPS roguelike, where you have to return the lost Crown of Benevolence to the King of Delvia! However, your journey will not be easy as many foes along the way will attempt to kill you! Unlock new weapons, upgrade stats, battle enemies as you make your way through the world!

FUTURETECH SPACE COMBAT ACADEMY Demo.description: Will you make the grade and save the planet? Become a cadet on your first day of training in this 3rd person space combat simulator.

Planet Morph.description: Alterux, the brand-new alien species with a unique property: It can morph its body into any kind of creature, organic and inorganic alike. Use this power to explore new worlds, combat alien enemies, and unlock creatures to become!

Typing Fingers - Enemy.description: The destiny of humanity lies in your hands, take the brain-ship and battle against unknown alien enemies, across the universe in order to regain control and the peace stolen for us. Only the fastest and most accurate typing master will conquer them all.

Stimuli.description: Stimuli is a Sci-Fi Action Platformer where you are a test subject trapped in a mysterious laboratory and must escape! With a new mechanic added every level, a challenging combat system, and well hidden Easter Eggs, the game delivers fast paced adventure in a sleek indie style!

Canon - Legend of the New Gods.description: Originally called Feng Shen Ying Jie Chuan, Canon - Legends of the New Gods is a strategy RPG originally for the Sega Genesis and Mega Drive consoles.

Zero Tolerance.description: Created by Randel Reiss Kill or Be Killed If this 3D game doesn't your adrenaline pumping, nothing will. Zero Tolerance has you killing alien terrorists who want to annihilate your defense colony.

Shadow Madness.description: The world of Arkose is in Chaos as a mysterious plague, known as "Shadow Madness", ravages the land. With no cure, it strikes without warning, leaving vile creatures and piles of dust where its victims once stood. As the one hope to this doomed land, you must stop this scourge before it stops you.

Motor Mash.description: Get Into the Mash! And Get into the 3D Cartoon Madness, 12 different cars and drivers in a fast, varied, style and weapons, lots of weapons!

Heroines of Swords & Spells: Demo.description: An epic and funny jRPG adventure with intricately detailed world and story. Guide a party of wayward heroines through the perils of this fantasy world.

RADARjAM.description: RADARjAM consists of the constant unpredictability of your enemy’s location. Dodge what you can't see in your radar equipped fighter!

SNIKS.description: Are they caterpillars? Are they worms? They’re SNIKS! SNIKS is a puzzle game about colorful snakes hungry for fruits. There’s only one problem: They keep getting in each other‘s way while eating. Your task: Untie the Gordian Knot of SNIKS and help them eat all the fruits.

Super Bernie World.description: Join Bernie's movement and transform the United States in this free retro 2D platformer.

The Travelyan Home.description: A text-based Lovecraftian adventure game combining role playing and survival horror dynamics, set in a Victorian Gothic environment. Explore the mysteries of the Travelyan home and unravel

Shop Titans.description: Shop Titans is the ultimate RPG shopkeeper simulation. Craft powerful equipment, stock your shop and sell to aspiring heroes… at a markup! Hire heroes and explore dungeons to gather valuable materials to craft with. There’s never a dull moment in the world of Shop Titans!

Duck Duck Goose.description: Fight your friends as ducks and geese with explosive weaponry in this frantic top-down, local multiplayer shooter as a crowd of royal birds overlooks your bloodshed. Avoid a humiliating death in the royal court using Rocket Launchers, Explosive Snipers, Grenade Launchers, and Cannons.

Secret House.description: This is a concise horror Room escape game Every time in a while, there will be terrible monsters here You need to collect random items in the game and fight with them And make sure your life is safe and escape

Forsaken Spire.description: Forsaken Spire is an untethered physics-based climbing game. You see it, you climb it: however you can!

Song of Iron.description: Behind you lies a trail of broken helms, shattered shields. You hold the axe of a fallen foe. Worn and dented, it will suit it's purpose. What lies ahead is still a mystery. Your goal is not.

Corpse Castle.description: Corpse Castle is a procedurally animated high-velocity twin stick fighter set in a deranged body-horror mystery where you must use your bare hands (or what’s left of them) to construct a tower from the flesh and bone of those who stand in your way.

Fantasy Memory Card Game.description: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

Mushroom Cats 2.description: Mushroom Cats 2 - is a cute point-and-click game about Mushroom Cats that live on magical islands. Any girl will melt from tenderness, and the kids will be delighted with the funny Mushroom Cats! This fairy tale will fill any heart with good!

Zatorski, Ph.D..description: Indie-game in the genre of psychological adventure with the elements of rogue-like and visual novel. A meditative, thought-provoking simulator of an infinitely lonely old professor who’s life and existence are questionable. Confusion, terror and despair are a part of a routine here.

Resistance TD.description: Build defense towers, manage your economy and resist the enemy!

Mercenary Skirmish.description: Multiplayer action fantasy based medieval RPG with deep character development. Be a Warrior, Archer, Mage or a Priest. Each hero has different skill-sets and character customization/development. Beat the arena to be the Master!

Spinner Invaders.description: Shoot your way through a thrilling action adventure of 120 waves in 4 different game modes while fighting against waves of enemies and 12 extreme bosses. Save the world from The General by yourself or with a friend locally and play 10 different Challenges.

SWORDSHOT.description: SWORDSHOT is a retro inspired casual sword shooter. BREAK THROUGH THE CYCLE of rotating enemy protectors. BE FAST, BE PATIENT, BE SMART and land the final blow.

Time Rift.description: Time Rift is a fast-paced puzzle-shooter. You’re a hacker-turned-security tester, but your skills will only get you so far - to take down global megacorp VaultCo, you’ll have to manipulate the flow of time!

Nyanco Space.description: Hi Nyancos! How are you? Crying Out Nyanco in the Center of the Universe!

Wacky Golf Land.description: Strap your VR headset on, pick up your putter, and step into our wacky mini golf theme park. Win races at Pole Position, conquer high seas at Pirate Bay, feel nostalgic at Arcadia, or chill with our Cafe Latte. How many holes in one can you make? Its just a Numbers Game

Help Me Now.description: Help Me Now is a horror and suspense game, where the player faces several challenges to save the terrifying house he finds! You control Thomas Histed, an investigative detective who lost consciousness and woke up in a psychopath's home in Arizona! Hide and plan your escape route in time ...

Hats and Hand Grenades.description: Kill your friends and steal their hats in a free isometric cover-based twin-stick shooter. Multiplayer versus battles can be waged locally or online. Face off in colorful arenas with destructible environments.

I'm on Observation Duty 2: Timothy's Rev.description: Your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. Anomalies range from furniture movement to otherworldly intruders. When you spot an anomaly you have to file a report to fix it. You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night.

SOLAS 128.description: Explore SOLAS 128, a game of interconnected puzzles where you redirect and reconfigure rhythmic pulses of light to breathe life back into an ancient machine. BAFTA Scotland Game Winner.

Clea 2.description: Clea 2 is a jump scare free, skill-based survival horror sequel to the 2019 adventure.

Glover.description: Glover is a puzzle-intensive adventure game made up of 6 worlds with 30 different levels. You control a charismatic glove that walks on two fingers, slaps harder than Steve Austin, dribbles faster than Scottie Pippen, and plays with a bouncy rubber ball.

The Legacy: Realm of Terror.description: For the past 400 years, your evil ancestors have been planning this housewarming party just for you. And it's one party you may never leave! This horror classic blends elements of RPG and Adventure games in a one-of-a-kind, spine-tingling package.

Hexplore.description: Immerse yourself in a medieval world. A world where Garkham, Grand Master of the Black Magicians, has sworn to take possession of the Book of Hexplore.

DethKarz.description: You're one of the elite racers chosen to compete at exotic locations around the world and beyond. Strap yourself into a fusion-powered racing machine for an explosive and exhilarating futuristic racing experience.

Pirate Island Mini Golf VR.description: Pirate Island Mini Golf VR is a single or multi-player virtual reality experience set in a scenic tropical island. There are four, 18-hole courses placed throughout the island, with multiple challenges and enhancements that can be unlocked to mix up game play to keep you coming back for more.

Outset.description: Use a GRAPPLING HOOK to explore and uncover the mysteries of a platformer-RPG world in OUTSET.

D3D INSIDE 2: HELL.description: D3D INSIDE 2: HELL is a first-person shooter in the style of low poly. The famous Ded, the storm of all demons, is back to send the demons back to hell!

Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 202.description: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2020 puts you in the role of head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from staff hiring, recruiting, scouting and all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to tournament glory and becoming a dynasty.

Hero Tower.description: Play as the Hero as he is dropped into the Hero Simulation Machine MKI and take-on a tower full of puzzles and monsters. Equip a variety of tools and weapons found in chests on each floor, that have limited uses and reset every floor, giving each one a unique challenge.

Bubble Bounce.description: Pop bubbles by bouncing off the ground. Or logs. Or really anything you can find. Compete with your friends to see who can pop the most bubbles before the time runs out or play in dodge mode to make the last player to not touch a bubble the winner!

Hero Tower Demo.description: Play as the Hero as he is dropped into the Hero Simulation Machine MKI and take-on a tower full of puzzles and monsters. Equip a variety of tools and weapons found in chests on each floor, that have limited uses and reset every floor, giving each one a unique challenge.

A Week In The Cold.description: Traverse the cold slippery ice by sliding and skating while trying to avoid both pesky penguins and ghostly wolves. All the while moving between campfires trying to stay warm.

Outset Chapter 1.description: Use a GRAPPLING HOOK to explore and uncover the mysteries of a platformer-RPG world in OUTSET.

Heartworm.description: Lofi retro fixed camera suburban psychological/survival-horror

VR Mini Bowling 2.description: Welcome to the world of Mini Bowling! In this VR game bowling meets mini golf to create a totally new experience! VR Mini Bowling 2 also brings the addition of Powerups, which completely change the way the game is played!

Rabbit Simulator.description: In a beautiful island, as a bunny, collect some carrots and run around! ᕱ⑅ᕱ This is a simple and relaxing bunny walking simulator game. Your only goal is to collect as many carrots as possible.

Heartworm Demo.description: Lofi retro fixed camera suburban psychological/survival-horror

The Valley of Super Flowers.description: The Valley of Super Flowers is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of the the valley which had been forcefully captured by an Evil Satanis ruler.

King of Cooking.description: Do you want to have your own food truck? You want to expand your business? Do you like tycoon games? Then, this is the perfect game for you!

Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon 2.description: Koji Igarashi and Inti Creates are back with more retro sword-and-whip action! Curse of the Moon 2 brings classic 2D action and a dark, 8-bit aesthetic together with modern playability.

Duster.description: Traveling west is dangerous, and you will die hilariously! Your choices of gear change your gameplay, and unlocking new equipment allows for new strategies! Scavenge for supplies, avoid wolves, and fend off outlaws. You could die of dysentery or bear attack, so be prepared for anything!

Cat in the Box.description: Cat in the Box is a horror adventure game. Help the poor girl explore the mansion and escape from unknown entities that are pursuing her. Use a variety of tools and your wits to overcome any challenges you face. At times, you'll even have to wake yourself from nightmares to survive.

LAST CHICK - 最後のひよこ.description: The second of low-price series of KimidoriSoft! "LAST CHICK - 最後のひよこ"!An action game depicting the majestic daily lives of chickens and their families living in a world where humanity has become a zombie.Overcome the crisis in three modes using two egg techniques developed by the parent chicken.

Bells 'n' Whistles.description: Bells 'n' Whistles is a difficult point-and-click game that tests your ability to multitask. You must deal with the multiple systems on a machine in order to prevent it from breaking down. Are you up to the task?

Skatemasta Tcheco Demo.description: Tcheco is back! Be prepared to survive even crazier stages! Smash, pulverize and destroy - but never lose your gorgeous smile.

Othello Let's Go.description: Othello Let's Go is a beautifully designed strategy board game for all ages. A total of 8 levels of computer AI difficulty, suits for both beginners and experts! More than 100 carefully selected Endgame and Lights Out levels are waiting for you to solve!

Ohayou! Beginner's Japanese.description: Ohayou! Beginner’s Japanese is an educational game that will teach you the basics of Japanese Hiragana and Katakana.

Dreadtides.description: Dreadtides is a strategy game set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy world. Explore a land lost to corruption, harness its resources, research lost technology, and protect your people. Can you build a city capable of defeating a magical cataclysm?

Bone Appetit.description: When the king declares that all food is now his, whatcha' gonna' do? Raise a skeleton slave to steal it back for you, of course!

Sentimental K.description: 'Sentimental K' is a 3D roguelike action game. Weapons, skills, artifacts, bosses, dungeon layouts change randomly every time you play. Try to make synergistic choices and enjoy the unexpected and challenging play!

Nonogram Animal Griddlers Demo.description: If you’re a fan of logical puzzles and Animals this might be a fun game for you. These logic puzzles of Japanese origin will train your logical and abstract thought processes.

Shot in the Dark Demo.description: Armed with nothing but a six gun the lone bandit will need a quick hand and a sharp eye to fend off the nightmares lurking in the dark.

Dream Date.description: Date, communicate, enhance feelings and record good memories with girls!

Move It Up.description: MOVE IT UP V 1.1 brings a unique rhythm game experience with random level generator and battle mode.

Iwate Mountain Dance.description: Iwate Mountain Dance is a tough-as-nails bullet hell boss fighter. Take on unique multi-stage bosses in a grand dance of handcrafted fights, each with their own attack patterns and intense combos, as you explore the lands of Iwate and learn its history.

Library Of Ruina.description: "May you find your book in this place." Combat between the guests and the librarians breaks out as if it were on a stage. Defeated guests turn into books, and the Library grows onward. And eventually, get your hands on… The one singular, perfect book.

CHICARO DENTISTRY.description: It's an educational simulation game for the children that entertains teaching the actual dentist profession

Doctor Klyvinski.description: Play as a doctor in the communist country Kolinisav, diagnose over 30 different unique diseases and treat your patients with 20 different medicines while avoiding the rage of the commissar and the greed of the underworld.

AreaZ Demo.description: Survival cast away style game based on real survival experience and techniques. Adapt to various area(z), fight the exhaustion, manage your food income and energy consumption. Push your survival skills to the limits and conquer final barriers to reach your extraction point.

Shelter Manager.description: We live in a troubled world. Viruses, military conflicts - you never know what danger the world will face tomorrow. It's time to get ready now! Lead a bunker network and start developing society after a global disaster.

We should talk..description: It's not what you say, it's how you say it. We should talk is a short-form narrative game that will make you think carefully about the words you choose. Can your relationship survive the night?
