Comrade-in-Arms.description: Comrade-in-Arms is a Top-Down 2D Arcade-Style Retro Shooter, where the aim of the game is to fight through the waves of enemies to eventually slaughter the boss at the end.

VectorBall.description: VectorBall is a multiplayer VR game set in a vibrant Cyberspace. Throw charged balls at your opponents to kill them, or use a Teleport ball to get out of the way. VectorBall is an intense, exciting VR experience for both casual and competitive players; get your friends (or enemies) and jack in.

Ironlights.description: Ironlights is a VR dueling game with skillful, fluid melee combat. Parry, block, and strike down your opponents using a variety of physics-based weapons. Test your skills in multiplayer battles, or fight to the top of the league in the huge single-player campaign!

Forest monster.description: This is a third person action role-playing game，The player is in a forest of monsters，The player is free to explore the surrounding area. The player must avoid the monster's attack or kill the monster, so as to ensure the life of the monster as long as possible.

CATharsis Demo.description: STORY:This is a visual novel and adventure game set in the present day.(It is not an otome game.)

KARA Accounting.description: An accounting software that gives you an overview of your finances and archives bookings and invoices.

三国梦之队.description: 《三国梦之队》是一款Q版三国养成策略网页游戏，玩家将招募三国群雄，打造属于自己的三国梦之队，和其他玩家展开极致烧脑的策略对抗。 优秀的武将是我们攻城掠地最大的助力，在《三国梦之队》中，我们可以通过去酒馆招募、VIP奖励来获得三国时期的武将，增强自身的实力。 武将根据品质不同会获得不同的天赋技能，品质越好的武将所携带的天赋技能越厉害， 各位主公要根据武将的属性和对阵要求给武将搭配更合适的技能，让武将发挥出最大的威力。

Poly Duels.description: Fight your friends in this fast paced, easy to learn, hard to master fantasy brawler! Dodge, block, parry, and jump over attacks! Confuse your enemy by varying the tempo and types of your combos!

Somny & Yawn: Dream Detectives.description: Both players play as Somny & Yawn, two detectives who investigate the nightmare that invades the Islands of Dreams. With his sharp eyesight, Somny can find clues spread across the islands, while Yawn, thanks to her exceptional social skills, can discover the secrets of the inhabitants.

Mutated Muter's Invasion.description: A fun platformer adventure game about a music note fighting mobs and collecting power-ups and other items (with a couple side-scrolling shooter levels). Neutralize the evil Mutated Muter, a magical monster from the outer space who wants to steal all the music from the world!

SideTracked!.description: An online co-op and pvp adventure action RPG focused around community, socializing, and adventure. In a world infested with a mysterious fog, turn yourself into a hero!

F-117A Stealth Fighter.description: Strap yourself into the cockpit of the world's most elite fighting weapon!

Serial Lover.description: A dating sim rhythm game where you seduce serial killers!

Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown.description: City builder where the fate of your kingdom weighs heavily on the choices that you make. As you descend into Benevolence or Tyranny, you will explore, expand, and influence an unknown land. Engage in real-time combat, Whether solo or joined by your friends, your fate is shaped by your will alone.

Battle for Iwo Jima.description: Battle for Iwo Jima simulates the WWII Invasion and desperate fighting for the island that took place in 1945. Take command of the US Marines, manage your tanks, infantry, and HQ communication in a day and night furious battle against the Japanese garrison.

Skeleton Warrior.description: This is a third person action adventure game. Players are surrounded by zombies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas，Players must avoid zombie attacks or kill zombies to ensure that their health value survives for as long as possible.

Total Madness.description: Total Madness is a super fast, super hectic top down survival shooter with tons of weapons, great style and addictive gameplay.

Race Maniacs.description: Take part in crazy races, where all the turns on the tracks at a right angle!

Cubic Juice.description: This is a game requiring both logic and strategy where the goal is to build solid layers of cubes without empty spaces using given figures with some certain shape. A player gets score with each built layer and this layer of cubes is removed from the matrix.

Puzzle Forge Dungeon.description: Puzzle Forge Dungeon is an innovative mix of weapon crafting and strategy. Craft your own weapons and armors, add magic and defeat your enemies in the dungeons of Anvilar, the Dwarf city.

Golden Light.description: Eat weapons, be scared and question your own mind in this Survival-Horror FPS Prop Hunt Roguelike about meat. Now with online Co-op and Versus modes. Walls are watching you!

Ghosts and Bureaucracy.description: Explore the ruins of an abandoned government building, collect items, learn a multitude of skills, interact with a variety of objects and enjoy individual and absurd dialogues, engage in Undertale inspired battles of persuasions with ghostly politicians and clerks and try to request a treasure.

Ultimate Ski Jumping 2020.description: Winter competitions, summer competitions and even jumping on the Moon! Trainings, qualification rounds and tournaments are all waiting for you! Play the way you like!

Break the Web.description: Break the Web is a 3D first-person shooter game made in an unusual surreal style of 90s shooters with brightly acid graphics and dynamic battles with enemies.

2D Baseball Duel.description: Enter the battle of Pitcher vs. Batter! Challenge the single player teams to unlock their unique pitches, then battle your friends with the fast paced competitive gameplay!

Betelgeuse.description: Betelgeuse is a mind-bending puzzle game where simple rules create complicated puzzles. At the beginning it should be easy for everyone, but later on it's getting really challenging. It consists of six chapters where rules are completely different.

Let`s Drive.description: There are 1.3 billion cars in the world. But how many good drivers are there? Is everyone of them trained and competent? Find out while playing Let's Drive, a driving school simulator that shows you hazardous situations on the road and puts you right in them.

Beach Games.description: Your life is like a fairy tale... You worked hard on your internet startup for the last few years. The dating site you created turned out to be a spectacular success, and you became a millionaire youngster...

PsychoSimulator.description: 30% of our society suffers from psychological problems. Many famous people throughout the history and pop culture were troubled this way and required professional help.

Buried Chambers.description: Buried Chambers is an incredibly addictive and action packed physics platform shooter.

SpartrackVR-Firo Demo.description: Mission Firos est un jeu multijoueur en réalité virtuelle, en déplacement libre, mélangeant énigmes et jeu de tir dans un environnement futuriste.

美少女格斗学院／Beautiful Girl Fight School.description: This is a beautiful girl fighting game. Players control characters to fight with beautiful girls and experience various interesting stories in the Academy. It's a game that you can't miss for those who like the role of beautiful girl or the fighting game!

LilyDeux 警告の黒き百合.description: Lily is girls with the ability. They fight again. This game is a simulation RPG that you can play with no stress. It is a system that has a deep strategic approach.

Gericonia 2 Demo.description: You are the leader of a new Settlement. Sent from the Capital, your goal is to tame the lands and uncover secrets. In this strategy game, you will build a city and manage different resources. Expand your town, battle outsiders, master the unknown and launch expeditions.

Conflict Europe.description: The threat of nuclear war has receded and the balance of fear that entrapped humanity has loosened it's grip. Conflict: Europe shows why the nightmare must never become reality.

Witch College 2.description: Sam suddenly disappeared, leaving just a strange symbol behind! What could that mean?

Sunburnt.description: Sunburnt is a short, arcade-style game following a rather unfortunate fellow, seeking shelter from the sun in a desert oasis. How long will you survive?

Mask of the Plague Doctor.description: Stop a deadly plague in a medieval fantasy tale of swords and surgery! Unearth medical knowledge, prevent the town’s purge, or plot your own escape.

Mask of the Plague Doctor Demo.description: Stop a deadly plague in a medieval fantasy tale of swords and surgery! Unearth medical knowledge, prevent the town’s purge, or plot your own escape.

Battletoads.description: • Over-the-top combat with combos and hard-hitting morph attacks • Wild, varied gameplay sequences for all types of gamers • Hand-drawn animation feels like playing a cartoon • Drop-in couch co-op for three players

Unspottable.description: Unspottable is a competitive couch party game. Blend in the crowd of AI characters, hunt down the other players and use the many different environment specific rules to win the game. Walk like a robot and punch like a human!

Lumin Demo.description: Luciform is a color-based precision platformer that demands quick reflexes and nerves of steel. Can you help “Luci” navigate a dangerous forest to save its people from the nasty Red-Eyed Gorilla?

Crocotile 3D.description: Crocotile 3D is a tile-based 3d modeling application. A great tool for creating lowpoly models and scenes with pixel-art textures. Select tiles directly from tilesets and place them into a scene to give them a third dimension. Use various tools to edit your tiles and shape your models.

Realm Hacker.description: Realm Hacker is a game based on cyber worlds and hackers, allowing you to manipulate characters while building blocks, while using dexterous movement to pass the game level.

Bulk Dominoes VR: Kinetic Rush.description: Build and create domino chain reactions, knock them down, then push 1 button to set them back up again. It’s fun and easy! Plus you will not have to worry about accidentally knocking them down while you're building.

Secrets of Moon Island.description: A simple RPG exploration adventure with swordplay. Plot: You receive a distress call from a long lost, aristocratic ancestor who specialized in research of the unnatural, located on an uncharted island. With your sister, set out to discover the islands mysteries & secrets. What will you find?

Maze Burrow.description: An echidna wakes up one day to find its cozy burrow turned into a giant maze by an evil mole gang! Solve puzzles to progress through the burrow, defeat the mole gang, and escape to freedom in this Sokoban-inspired puzzler.

Fragile Box.description: Fragile Box - this is a physics game in which you play as a ball. Your task is to break the orange cubes and get points for it. You need to avoid red objects that are trying to reach you. If this happens, you will lose. How many points can you get?

The Fairy's Song.description: Marnie, a bored goth girl, accidentally stumbles upon a sleeping female knight in the forest. Together, the pair must work to break a centuries-old curse, while romantic feelings between them begin to grow.

The Astro Parcel Service.description: Deliver packages as fast as you can while surviving the hazards of space and the crippling pressure of your employer, The Astro Parcel Service.

Electronic Squash.description: ‘Electronic Squash VR’ is a game of breaking walls by hitting the ball. ‘Electronic Squash VR’ does not apply actual squash game rules but offers similar sport experience with better visual appearance. Try our futuristic Sport Game in Virtual Reality!

Pirates? Pirates!.description: Pirates? Pirates! is a Reigns-inspired pirate survival RPG. You are a pirate captain in charge of your ship and crew on the most dangerous adventure of all seas. Fight your way ahead, sort out emergencies, and discover legendary treasures!

My Little Cloud.description: A thunder and rain relaxation/ study app with high quality sounds and graphics. Thunder and rain sounds recorded by Emmy-winner and nature recording genius Gordon Hempton.

Cloud Miners.description: 2D couch co-op space mining, adventure and puzzle platformer set in the distant future

MoghVR.description: Mages are as powerful as their imagination.

OneJump.description: OneJump is a minimalistic highscore based jump game. The challenging factor: you only have one chance to jump. You can play in singleplayer and local multiplayer.

KUR.description: Destroy drones, ravage robots and stomp some skull-bearing spiderdroids in a dark-humor drenched take on the classic 90’s shooter.

Tobari 2: Dream Ocean.description: Tobari is back in the latest action platformer from indie developer, desunoya. Use that staff and smack around your enemies for their magic as you traverse the Dream Ocean. Seek out the mysterious voice that calls to you from beyond the sea as you journey with Tobari into this unknown new world.

Vaporwave World.description: "Vaporwave World" is a simple and casual buiding game that has three art packs (Egypt, Roman, 1980s). You can customize the lights in the game, and you will automatically get various types of buiding items over time.

Stalker.description: The background story of "Stalker" is that a teenager encounters various events on the road following a young girl. The teenager(player) can selectively interact and give repairs / help due to these events. How you will lead to different ending. The game was developed during the Global Game Jam 2020.

Entelechy.description: Entelechy - захватывающее приключение в альтернативной вселенной, где развитие технологий привело к возможности отделить душу человека от его тела. На что способна душа без тела? Вам предстоит ответить на этот вопрос!

Higurashi When They Cry Hou - Ch.8 Matsu.description: Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

长安夜明.description: 《长安夜明》是旅人计划的旗下的第四款产品，一款像素西行AVG，还原历史上真实的玄奘还经故事：从长安到西域，一路风霜险阻，一路万里……而这一路上，没有孙悟空，没有猪八戒，没有沙和尚，甚至连白龙马亦不在身边。 这一路，只他一人，孤独而热烈地启程。

大唐西域记 Demo.description: 《长安夜明》是旅人计划的旗下的第四款产品，一款像素西行AVG，还原历史上真实的玄奘还经故事：从长安到西域，一路风霜险阻，一路万里……而这一路上，没有孙悟空，没有猪八戒，没有沙和尚，甚至连白龙马亦不在身边。 这一路，只他一人，孤独而热烈地启程。

Sea Fishing Simulator.description: Go fishing in the North Sea!

Heart Star.description: Heart Star is an adorable puzzle platformer where you guide two little friends through two parallel worlds. Swap between the worlds to solve unique puzzles. Overcome all obstacles with the power of teamwork!

NYC Bungee.description: Take the elevator right to the famous torch of the Statue of Liberty before soaking up the scenery and finally jumping off in this dare devil challenge which is certainly not for the faint of heart!

Evil Inside.description: Evil Inside is a first-person psychological horror game. After the death of his mother and the arrest of his father for it, Mark decides to contact her using the Spiritual board. But it fades away, and here is when all begins... Mark will face his greatest fears to discover the truth.

Sword of the Necromancer.description: Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Defeat the guardians to gain enough soul power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost.

Climb the Tower.description: Challenging 3D platformer with a fantasy theme. Climb the tower and all defeat all its challenges.

Clipped.description: The simple life of a duck may not be so simple after all.. Something terrible has happened and it is up to YOU to figure out what's wrong, but what lies ahead will be a serious challenge, the tiniest mistakes can be your biggest accidents.

KeyWe.description: KeyWe is a cute, co-operative postal puzzler starring Jeff and Debra, two small kiwi birds working in a whimsical post office. They must jump, flap, peck and butt-slam their way across an interactive landscape of levers, bells and buttons to get those messages delivered on time!

Goblin treasure Demo.description: Goblin Treasure is a casual arcade game in which you play the role of a goblin treasure hunter. Collecting diamonds while traveling across various boards. Your main goal is to collect as many diamonds as possible while avoiding goblins and traps.

James Peris: Sin licencia ni control - E.description: Graphic adventure with lots of extras and mini-games. Two difficulty levels and a clue system for those who may get stuck at some point even in the easy mode.

Send them to the sky.description: Use your magic cell keeping those funny villagers in the sky and don't let them down!

Pixel Pileup Party.description: A green on green 4-in-1 game collection styled after the most popular 90's handheld ever!

Ostrova Koshki.description: Action platformer about teenage issues in primitive world

Infiniball.description: Infiniball is a simple yet addictive marble based game.

Galaxy Warfighter.description: Taking its roots from the classic games in the shoot'em up genre, «Galaxy Warfighter» conveys the old ideas in a new way. Piloting your fighter ship, you have to fight hordes of enemies with unpredictable strategies and attack schemes.

Nimbatus - Drone Creator.description: Use the Nimbatus Drone Creator to construct physically simulated drones and try them out in a virtual testing environment. Do you have what it takes to become a drone engineer?

Hellpoint: The Thespian Feast.description: This is a standalone story in Hellpoint universe, a dark and challenging action RPG set in the world where the line between science and occultism is blurred. The Thespian Feast tells the story of an investigator arriving at Irid Novo station 50 years after the Hellpoint events.

Mr Maker 3D Level Editor.description: Mr Maker 3D Level Editor is a platform game, with a level maker. Inspired by the games of the 90s, but with a touch of modernity.

The Galactic Junkers.description: Become the space captain you always wanted to be. There are just a few problems, your ship needs work, there’s a price on your head, and your crew are idiots. Seek your fortune and the truth in The Galactic Junkers, a comedic space combat adventure game.

Season Match 4.description: Try out a challenging mix of match3, puzzles and quests in the breathtaking game Season Match 4! Enjoy nice characters, an amazing plot full of unexpected twists and lots of thrilling match-3 quests.

Mossen Seikkailut.description: Mossen Seikkailut is an indie RPG adventure where you solve puzzles as a dog and face real-time fights on your way to glory. Gain respect by helping others and learn new fighting techniques to defeat those who oppose you. Experience all of this in magnificent 640x480 resolution!

K'nife Fight.description: An exciting party brawler that encourages you to play with your food!

Turret.description: When Artificial Intelligence goes to war it won’t sound like a war. It will sound like a harmony of reason and logic... Mankind will shut it’s eyes in total agreement.

Sigma Draconis.description: A group of colonists from a distant world have arrived at their new home. Equipped with advanced technology but limited resources, they must build to survive. Sigma Draconis is a colony simulation game which focuses on building and resource management.

Rubicon.description: RUBICON is a local multiplayer split-screen party shooter inside an omnidirectional puzzle cube, an action-packed PvP game show where every round has a powerful new weapon and each battle adds a zany new twist.

The Adventures of Spunk Dodgers and Spla.description: Spunk Dodgers and his sidekick Splat are ambushed by a group of space pirates and crash land on a mysterious asteroid! As Splat, dodge wacky space monsters through hazardous terrain on your adventure to help Spunk Dodgers fix your ship!

Detectives United III: Timeless Voyage C.description: Detectives United is out of options and working for the villains!

The Crimson Diamond: Chapter 1.description: Follow amateur geologist and reluctant detective Nancy Maple to the fictional ghost town of Crimson, Ontario to investigate the discovery of a massive diamond in this retro-inspired, EGA text parser mystery adventure!

Tower of the Approval.description: New feeling! Roguelike action!Do you know such a story? ?When you reach the top floor, you will be recognized as a single person ApplivarA story about a craftsman who starts to yearn for such a tower and aims for the top floor.

Dry Visit - Dive into underwater archaeo.description: Thanks to the iMARECULTURE project, you can virtually dive into the 3D reconstructions of 3 of the most beautiful UW archaeological sites of the Mediterranean Sea: the UW Archaeological Park of Baiae (Naples, Italy), the Phoenician shipwreck of Xlendi (Gozo, Malta) and the Mazotos Shipwreck (Cyprus)

Lucid Nina Demo.description: Nina is so full of problems that she barely recognizes herself.Try to understand her world, views and beliefs from her perspective and guide her through her dreams.

Fatal Wings.description: Fatal wings is a classic top down space shoot ‘em. Playing as the last resistance fighters from the similian colony in planet Lithios against a brutal attack led by vernor’s forces

There is no game: Jam Edition 2015.description: A little game that’s not a game, winner of an old game jam that nobody’s ever heard of. So DON'T INSTALL IT!

Energy Island Corp..description: Build and manage an electric grid ! At the start of the day, build new infrastructure and plan your day. Once ready, start the day then watch electricity production / consumption in real time to adjust your buildings settings. The growth of the islands depends on you !

ENDURE.description: Endure is psychological horror experience exploring the human mind and the effects psychedelics can have on a damaged one.

CatDog Puzzle.description: CatDog Puzzle - slide puzzle game. You need solve the puzzle as fast as you can.

Bowmen.description: Lord Pain has risen once more to threaten the land of the living. As the last of an elite race known only as the Bowmen, you must gather your courage and slay his armies once again. Fight off hordes of enemies, equip unique items, and see how long you can survive in our debut title: Bowmen!

Get Good by Vypur.description: A tough, skill based precision 2.5D platformer that will push you to your limits. Can you get good?

Victory and Glory: The American Civil Wa.description: Victory and Glory: The American Civil War is a game of grand strategy and fast-play tactical battles where you take the role of either the Union or the Confederates and attempt to win.

Skid Cities.description: A Cyberpunk City Building Game. Define the city of a twisted, dark, utopian, or dystopian future. Build it in the sky, underground, on the ground. Navigate evil corporations, the Yakuza, android revolts, and unrest. Or embrace them - your choice.

Simplode Suite.description: Simplode Suite is a toolset which does all kinds of things. You can dynamically balance microphone and speaker volume, force borderless fullscreen, optimize your CPU power settings, take partial screenshots, create click through borderless/windowed mode overlays, and so much more.

Lasting Solstice Demo.description: After suffering from amnesia, Kazu tries his best to regain his former self. Without his memories, he has trouble remembering close friends and family. With the help of old and new friends along the way, Kazu slowly goes on to his path through self-discovery.

Project Reborn.description: You are a Sperm Cell that wants to be reborn. Kill other players, destroy viruses and become the first to conquer the Egg Cell! Use thousands of combinations of abilities, many costumes and drones, buy and sell at auction.

Haunted Space.description: Battle capital ships and Lovecraftian creatures amongst the stars in a horror-laced space simulation. In this Grim Dark future, explore, trade, craft and dog fight. Experience the horrors of the void alone.

Bomb Fight.description: Bomb Fight is a local-multiplayer action party game. Destroy your friends or cooperate with them in a frenzy of bombs without destroying your self.

Elfin Clay.description: Mysterious and friendly online game "Elfin Clay" "Elfin Clay" is a collaborative battle game in which thieves made of magic clay collect a lot of treasures.

Dirty Harry's Thunder Drive.description: Rip up the streets of Neon City as a One-Car Thunderstorm. Your mission is to cause as much destruction as possible on the city's busiest highway. Your weapons? Wrecking Balls, Dynamite, and the pure speed of your prized Red Stallion.

The Test.description: You will answer a series of questions that will reveal truths from deep within. These questions may make you uncomfortable, but with great knowledge comes great sacrifice. Can you make it all the way through The Test, and if you do, are you sure you want the answers you seek?

The Horrorscope.description: You will answer a series of questions that will reveal your potential fate. These questions may make you uncomfortable, but with great knowledge comes great sacrifice. Can you make it all the way through The Horrorscope, and if you do, are you sure you want the answers you seek?

Celestial Reactors.description: A virtual reality experience where you explore mysterious landscapes and meet the entities inhabiting it.

TAG.IO.description: Join in the biggest game of Tag in the world!

ANARCHY.description: ANARCHY is an escape / survivor games. Horde of robots, climbing, traps and many other things will try to kill you. It is one of the toughest games on steam right now.

Return to Sender.description: Return to Sender is a bullet-frenzy and rogue-like shooter. Killing each enemy returns a portion of your ammo, resulting in a fluid and chaotic run with nonstop shooting. Fight your way through enemies all while collecting new weapons and upgrades.

Pulse Forge VR.description: Pulse Forge VR– get the highest score in your favourite music by destroying everything. Forge your own map for music destruction and have fun!

降神战役 -A Story of the usurpers-.description: Because of an accident, the war once again descended on this land where peace has been welcomed for less than 10 years. Rebels swarming up, weak religious orders, hostile neighbors in the north. Where will the fate of the country go?

Hack or Die!.description: The Hacky-Sack Platformer! Keep the ball air-born while you kick your way through sprawling levels. Use unique kicking mechanics to rescue your best friend Kevin the dog. Just DONT DROP IT!!!

PIVO.description: PIVO is a game that solves puzzles between 2D space and 3D space. Experience transcending space with a cute corgi.

Dark Room.description: He stared at the darkness and thinking . In early morning , when all the doors were locked , they had all wanted to come in , and now that he had opened one door and the other had apparently been opened during the day , no one came in and even the keys were on the other side of the doors ...

Scorched Islands.description: Move to one of islands and fight with AI or other players at the keyboard. Set shooting angles and power and destroy enemy tanks.5 islands with different conditions and environmentVarious weather effects affecting the battleFull ballistics physicsSurprises to discover

Legacy of Sin the father sacrifice.description: Legacy of Sin the Father Sacrifice is a real-time strategy, survival and route defense game. COMMAND unique troops, CONTROL the battlefield, DEFEND routes from different enemies! Take control of an army of soldiers ! Win to Unlock new Levels and strategy to control the battlefield.

잭과 콩나무: 숨겨진 이야기.description: 원작 동화 '잭과 콩나무' 를 모티브로 한 게임. 전쟁으로 황폐해진 마을에 살고 있는 잭은, 어느 날 한 마녀로부터 알 수 없는 콩을 받는다. 다음 날, 잭은 마당에 자란 콩나무 줄기를 타고 올라가게 되는데.. 잭은 그곳에서 신비로운 콩나무 성을 탐험하게 된다.

Shadow Puppets & Beijing opera.description: The work is composed of a total of 4 acts with about 15 minutes. The images and characters of this work are based on one of China’s intangible cultural heritage: Shadow Puppets, and the story and music of the game are based on another China’s intangible cultural heritage: Beijing Opera .

The Pedestrian Demo.description: I can see the signs in my sleep now, always guiding me closer. Will this really work? Have we almost achieved the impossible?

Idle Warrior.description: Idle Warrior is a little idle/clicker game in which you play an warrior who has to fight against an unlimited number of enemies.

Jetpack Stadium.description: Jetpack Stadium is a hilarious VR sports game that will have you flying around a virtual stadium. Use your head to hit a massive soccer ball into your opponent's goal using two hand-mounted rockets. Duke it out against other players in a soccer-like competition!

Deep Despair.description: Deep Despair is a Minecraft-style survival sandbox. Travel, collect resources, craft items, dig, build, grow crops and survive. Freedom of action is limited only by your imagination!

紅楼夢幻戦⭐202020.description: 🚀Fight your way out of the Galaxy Empire through auto-chess battles, and don't forget to investigate the unsolved mystery of KŌRŌMU along your journey! 💪

Rocket Panda Panic.description: It's a Panda-emic! Spreading across the globe causing panic and fear. Only one hero has the courage, power and cuteness to save us all. Join Pandy and his jetpack as they travel the world, protecting us from the critter panda plague.

There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension.description: There is no game. So don't go messing things up by clicking everywhere. You don’t want to be kicked out of your video game world, do you? Of course not!

CHAOS GROOVE.description: Chaos Groove is a classic fast-paced, over-the-top fighting action, featured with 6 Characters, Online Play (Rollback Netcode), Ground-Breaking Effects, and a Dynamic Combo System.

Tony Stewart's Sprint Car Racing.description: Jump into a 900 horsepower Sprint Car for some Saturday night dirt racing action! Feel the rush as you slide through the turns to take the checkered flag!

Legendary Knight.description: The enemy is invading our territory, and the king leads his men to resist. The king takes on the responsibility of defending his homeland. Vowing to expel tons of enemy forces away from our country, and guard the sacred statues that symbolize our ruling power.

The Botanist.description: The Botanist is 3D platformer featuring magical world of Bob’s dreams and nightmares full of exciting adventures and dangerous creatures. Enter his mind to go through the Dark Forbidden Forest and Broken Land.

Infini Demo.description: Lose yourself in Infinity… but never lose Hope. Try to escape a world of never-ending puzzles and oddities.

Galactic Center VR.description: Explore the center of the Milky Way like never before!

Shell Corp.description: Shell Corp is a 1-8 local multiplayer, physics based egg-centric, party game where you control, paint, and crack eggs! Using simple controls and wobbly eggs, play against your friends, or AI, in a series frantic mini-games. Will you take home the Egg Cup?

TechnoTsunami.description: Solve puzzles to uncover the mysteries of a space cruise ship. Fight or work together with robots which are remotely controlled by humans on Earth. Collect the technology coming from the future which might cause an apocalypse. Save the future and the past before it’s too late.

Witch and Spirit.description: Play Hide and Seek in the Mistery Land with friends in Compete Mode or Collaborate Mode.

Dungeon Warriors.description: Dungeon Warriors is a random dungeon barrage game that we use to polish our lives

Balkadia Demo.description: For fans of "Classicvania" and "Supervania", Balkadia is a difficult 2D action-platformer with Slavic mythology influences and 8-directional whip mechanics.

Until the Last Plane.description: Until the Last Plane is an airfield management game during WW2. Send pilots on mission. Craft spare parts. Repair your planes. Face your enemy and resist.

Beach anime day.description: Beach anime day– a game that is a puzzle. The task of the game is to add up and get a whole picture, from the pieces into which it is cut.

kosmickop.description: In a post apocalyptic wasteland a jerboa is impersonating a police officer, much to the chagrin of a shadowy evil organisation.

Formula Retro Racing.description: Formula Retro Racing is a retro style arcade racing game that’s influenced by the classic arcade racing games of the early 90’s.

Retrowave.description: Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, '80s supercars speeding down an endless highway... Welcome to the world of Retrowave!

Draco.description: Vr Physics sandbox Demo. Very Early access to support the game.

Up on the Rooftop.description: Santa's elves have revolted! Christmas is falling apart, but reindeer are on the case! Knock sense into the elves and ensure Santa can make his delivery on time! Avoid Bears! Make deliveries along the way! They must save Christmas; they will save Christmas!

Up on the Rooftop Demo.description: Santa's elves have revolted! Christmas is falling apart, but reindeer are on the case! Knock sense into the elves and ensure Santa can make his delivery on time! Avoid Bears! Make deliveries along the way! They must save Christmas; they will save Christmas!

Memory Player.description: A memory training game that let you memorize the order of one shuffled deck of 52 playing cards in minutes.

infection point.description: Infection Point is a quarter view Hack and slash zombie hunting game.A gas leak occurs in the city.The main character arrives at a skyscraper that reads "The One" to determine the cause of the accident.What happened in this building?

Xyla and the 'Shrooms of Doom.description: Xyla is a pink haired hero who was raised as an elite Forest Agent. She realised early on in her life that dedication to her jumping and shooting skills would lead her to success. Work with Xyla as she navigates the unpredictable terrain of the forest.

Turtoa: Global Rhythm.description: Feel the rhythm of exotic cultures and amazing instruments in this beautiful aquatic world music game.

Astronaut: The Best.description: Astronaut: The Best is an occult management adventure where people aren't just numbers: they're incompetent screwups. Your duty is to turn them into national heroes, or the government will have you killed.

The Yolk Street.description: Evil boss oppresses his employees to make money again! How do you go about your life when you have financial pressure and want to have a girlfriend? ?！ 「The Yolk Street」will satisfy you all!

Luciform.description: Luciform is a color-based precision platformer that demands quick reflexes and nerves of steel. Can you help “Luci” navigate a dangerous forest to save its people from the nasty Red-Eyed Gorilla?

Dantes Bullet Inferno.description: Dantes Bullet Inferno is a shoot-em-up where the player fights against hell as Dante. This top down shooter includes a speedrun mode called time-dilation.

SokoBunny.description: SokoBunny is new fully 3d look at classic sokoban. Play alone or with your friend online, kick the cargo in the warehouse labyrinth.

Pendragon.description: AD 673. Camelot has fallen. The Round Table must rally to save King Arthur. Narrative strategy game from the creators of 80 DAYS, with elegant tactics and a unique, dynamic story every time you replay.

A Highland Song.description: Enter the Highlands. Lose yourself. Find harmony. Reach the sea. A narrative adventure with rhythm and survival elements, from the creators of Heaven’s Vault and 80 Days.

Hiragana POW!.description: Learn Japanese: The Hiragana. No beating around the bush, get straight into action and start learning the Hiragana.

Typical Cliche.description: So obvious and typical story, just puzzle and dodge traps. (English version will be provided soon.)

Dashing Fire.description: DASH between tiny, monster-infested planets on your journey to becoming the next Sun!

Unlord.description: Lords of the Damned Land - a text quest, a book-playing in the genre of gloomy fantasy, mixed with jokes on the verge of madness. 80,000 words, 1000 pages, 3 win endings and lots of other endings.

AZ: Oath of Brotherhood Prologue 1.description: This game intends to create a simple gameplay and story-heavy experience. Players will help a teenage boy go through a tough time in his life. A story that shows how friendship works when we need it the most.

Drug Dealer Simulator Demo.description: Have you ever thought about expanding your own crime empire, without the legal and moral consequences? SIMULATE IT! Now you will finally be able to crawl into the dark alleys of the drug dealing business! Become a street business mastermind, or a ruthless gangster - it's up to you!

Yoren.description: Yoren is the first cutting-edge realistic VR magic game. Cast spells by drawing rune gestures, explore the openworld collecting crafting ingredients for potions and battle the numerous bosses of fallen kingdoms in the world of Yoren.

Gravewood High.description: A highly replayable stealth horror game set in high school - with destructible environments, randomized level layouts and a smart opponent that develops new abilities the more you play.

Genokids.description: A bizarre music band named Genokids is rocking one of their best concerts to date when The Infinite Empire of Zenodia decides to invade Earth and assimilate mankind, landing right on top of the band and ruining both their concert and mood.

Death courier.description: In 2340. Earth ravaged, nearly destroyed. The last cities try to keep themselves alive and not starve. Hard times ahead. The roads to the other cities are destroyed, devastated or besieged by bandits.

Tranzient Demo.description: Make beats in VR. Full looping music production and sequencing environment in VR with visuals.Who made the beats? You did! This is not a rhythm game.

Humble Rumble Demo.description: Humble Rumble is a multiplayer physics-based brawling party game spanning several maps, themes and modes. Compete or co-operate with your friends across various activities from battles at sea to farming to gift giving.

Surviving Titan.description: You've crash landed on the planet Titan. Suffering from amnesia and armed with only a basic survival kit you begin exploring the planet looking for any signs of life. Can you craft, build, and survive long enough to discover the secrets of Titan and escape?

LOVE - A Puzzle Box Filled with Stories.description: Every life has a story. Every story has regret. But what if you could change the past? LOVE is a puzzle game about finding the things we’ve lost in ourselves and the people who help us find them.

Madden NFL 21.description: Go All Out in Madden NFL 21 where a fearless new generation of rising NFL stars is poised to change the game. Packed with fresh new features and innovative gameplay enhancements, Madden NFL 21 delivers new levels of ingenuity and control developed to inspire creativity on and off the field.

T.A.R.S.description: It is the year 2051, a disease has swept across the planet infecting over 90% of the population. You will take on the role of Samantha in this 3rd person horror shooter. Can you survive?

Pathseeker.description: Pathseeker is an open world role-playing game filled with compelling stories and dilemmas. In this massive world to explore, choose the path to your desired end, be it peace, love, glory, or destruction.

Raider Kid and the Ruby Chest Demo.description: Take some time off your family vacations and delve into ancient ruins!

Amairo Chocolate.description: Autumn. With the leaves just starting to change color, a boy arrives at Yunagi Village. The first person he meets is a girl handing out flyers -- a cute, cat-eared waitress.

Wonderland Nights: White Rabbit's Diary.description: Play as the White Rabbit in a schedule-based visual novel game set in the world of Alice in Wonderland.

Wandering Through The Vines.description: You find yourself in a strange land, by shooting and melee defeat your foes and journey to the end...

Flowers -Le volume sur automne-.description: As the summer heat fades, Suoh Shirahane is just one step away from unraveling the mystery of why her beloved Amitie partner left in the spring.

Shark In Aquarium.description: Shark in Aquarium is an arcade-style game. Your job is to grow your fish business and fight off threats to your aquarium. The game is designed to be cute and funny. It will be a great choice to relax after a stressful study or workday.

Battlefield™ V.description: This is the ultimate Battlefield V experience. Enter mankind’s greatest conflict with the complete arsenal of weapons, vehicles, and gadgets plus the best customization content of Year 1 and 2.

Battlefield™ Hardline.description: Strategy. Speed. Story. These are the core pillars of Battlefield™ Hardline, a cops vs. criminals experience unlike any other.

Sudd City Adventures.description: Sudd City Adventures is a lighthearted point-and-click 2D narrative game set in a world of ordinary superheroes.

PancakeHouse.description: Pancake House is a VR first-person shooting game. If you want to survive and save the world, you must defeat zombies.

Fractured Core.description: Fractured Core is a cyberpunk JRPG set in 2105 Germany. Play as Michael, a Raven Operator of Athena Private Security Company as he undertake various missions throughout the nation.

Relentless.description: In this simulation, discover the impact of market finance on real economy. Take the lead of a trading desk and challenge your financial skills and instincts to earn as much money as possible!

Seven Dunes: Curse on the Golden Sand.description: Seven Dunes: Curse on the Golden Sand is a game about an operation for rescuing a princess kidnapped by monsters in a fantasy desert kingdom. The hero (user) must solve numerous puzzles and deal with countless monsters to complete the operation. It combines adventure puzzles with RPG elements.

Mists of Aiden.description: Mists of Aiden is a first-person story driven horror game. You play as a thief trapped in an eerie mansion. Each choice can open a new mystery of the house and lead to a unique walkthrough and ending. Uncover final secret of the house. Uncover your own secrets.

Pyro the Exterminator.description: A post-apocalypse story of exterminator with contract to clear a military depot

Cube.description: Cube is an adventurer who does not rule out challenges.

Defense And Revenge Demo.description: Defense and Revenge is a turn-based strategy set in fantasy universe. You have to lead orcs tribe, provide defense and take revenge on enemies invading your land.

My Universe - School Teacher.description: Play as a young teacher with a mission: bringing your new school back to the top! Motivate your pupils, improve their results and organize school contests and festivals.

UNNAMED.description: You - an UNNAMED suicide with a question mark instead of a face. But it looks like dying won't be so easy.

Cave Game.description: A simple concept with infinite possibilites. A procedurally generated 2D platformer.

100 Doors Game - Escape from School.description: A girl named Mia is locked inside a school. Help her escape by solving puzzles and riddles, as well as finding hidden objects along the way that open the doors of every single room she finds herself trapped in.

Frontline: Panzer Blitzkrieg!.description: Fight your way through 35 Unique WW2 battles - Aim your targets carefully, counter-attack, and strategically coordinate your Squads. The study of enemy tactics and the use of Special abilities will lead to victory!

Terra Lander II - Rockslide Rescue.description: Terra Lander II - Rockslide Resuce is a sequel to Terra Lander, a homage to the classic early days of arcade retro, but this time you will need to rescue the humanoids of the landing pads from the planet through ten levels of increasing difficulty.

Into A Dream.description: You are his last hope. The only one who can rescue him. Delve deep into the dreams of Luke Williams, a man diagnosed with depression, unfold the heartbreaking story of his life and prevent him from... fading away.

Interference: Dead Air.description: All hell's breaking loose in a mysterious research facility and the only person who can save the day is the night shift security guard in the booth outside. Remotely control systems, guide scientists to safety or just… goof off? You’re not in danger. Yet.

Come on-be with you.description: Suddenly, we were caught in the crisis of virus transmission. People's hearts were tense. Although we could not fight with front-line workers, our hearts were always with them. I believe we will defeat the virus. Please do n’t go to crowded places during the epidemic period.

McSpace Colosseum.description: McSpace Colosseum is a dungeon crawler fully packed with action and roguelite elements. Discover all kind of worlds, collect crazy gadgets &relics, and face blood-lusting bosses with up to 4 friends. Will you rise as the strongest gladiator in this whacky and limitless reality show?

MoonRun.description: Traverse your battle hardend truck on an intense mission off-world, to conquer the invading forces behest on stealing your valuable resources.

Dandelions in the Sky.description: A new student with a mysterious past, and a girl isolated and bullied by her peers. What secrets are they hiding?

Simple LOTO Simulator.description: This Simple LOTO Simulator was developed to provide employers of any size, with a cost effective method to verify their employees' understanding of the Energy Control Procedure usually required under OSHA's Lockout/Tagout Standard.

Peg Solitaire Adventure.description: This game is an implementation of the board game Peg Solitaire. The objective is, making valid moves, to empty the entire board except for a solitary peg in the central hole. Seven types of game layouts.

FatCat with Hat - Reload the Powergun.description: FatCat's life is relaxed. But one day his great love Mrs.Cat is kidnapped by the nasty FatDog. FatCat immediately sets out to save his beloved, but the cunning FatDog is prepared. He sends his henchmen to take out the unloved adversary.

Truck Parking Simulator.description: Discover your skills to park a trailer.

CrocApoca!! Crocodile maiden at the End.description: Take care of a cute crocodile girl and make it through the Apocalypse while your bossy step-sister and some mysterious organizations are getting in your way!

Shape Storm.description: Shape Storm is a sort-of roguelike where you dodge shapes. That's it. Dodge shapes, do it well and win. The game contains 20 unique boss fights where the unique boss uniquely attacks you with unique shapes causing you to dodge the shapes in a unique way.

Zombusters Demo.description: A classic twin-stick shooter with a twist, you will have to face lots of Zombies and other creatures with everything you got. Beware!

Divine Knockout (DKO).description: DKO is a brand new, fast-paced, Brawler set in a stylized world of Gods and Mythology. DKO combines physics-based combat, a vibrant roster of deities and Third-Person combat that puts you right in the heart of the action!

Café Rouge.description: Isis Black, your average American teenager, happens upon a part time job opening at Café Rouge. As Isis delves deeper into this strange cafe, she becomes tangled in the mystery of its haunted world. Will she find friend or foe? Will she find love? That's for you to decide.

Dark Lord: Peacemaker Demo.description: A dark fantasy classic RPG. Customize your race, gender and class. Gather a party with your favorite companions. Change the fate of the characters and the world with your choices.

Intern Pursuit Game Demo.description: A Third-Person Tower Defense game in which you are an Intern sucked through a portal who now must defend the objective from aliens.

Balloon Blast.description: Face off against friends and foes in this vacuum fighting arena.

Heliconian - Starship Crew Control.description: The essence of the Heliconian is to manage a mixed crew of renegades aboard the starship Heliconian. Manage the crew member’s actions and the ship’s functions to survive as long as possible while exploring the star system in the hopes of earning upgrades and ultimately a safe haven.

Dr. Atominus.description: Dr. Atominus is a short platformer with metroidvania elements and a cool sci-fi story.

Atlas Engine.description: Atlas Engine is a world creation program that makes building your map fast and easy! Output realistic images, topographic prints, and even hand-drawn fantasy maps in minutes! You can even save the heightmaps and biome masks for use in other applications such as game engines!

Pathfinders: Memories.description: Memory is the key. Use it to help Pathfinders travel through time visiting ancient human civilizations and search for relics. The path to success is full of entrapments, obstacles, and enemies. Memorize them and draw the safe path for our heroes.

Blind Fate: Edo no Yami.description: Dive into a world that mixes Sci-Fi and ancient tradition. Slash through robots with a trusty katana, use hi-tech implants to navigate the surroundings, dodge enemy attacks, and land devastating finishers. Reclaim the past following the way of the Japanese samurai in the fantastic period of New Edo.

Under Construction: Summer City.description: 3d house design game with a wide variety of options, customization and user-content support.

Another FPS Game.description: Aren't you tired of always playing the same game?

Resistance.description: The command gave the task of downloading information from the servers of the impregnable enemy base at any cost. How to do it? Everything depends on you.

Undead Darlings ~no cure for love~.description: Journey with and learn more about a crew of half-zombie girls through visual novel sequences and as you crawl through dungeons, beating up twisted creatures that were born from the fall of society in fast-paced turn-based RPG combat!

Professor Lupo: Ocean (Demo).description: Professor Lupo: Ocean is a 2D grid-based exploration puzzle adventure from the famed creators of “Nihilumbra”. Trapped below the ocean, take on strange creatures, use water to solve puzzles and escape your fate, while uncovering the mysteries of who you really are.

The Last Shot.description: An adventurous engineer, a diesel-punk world divided by endless conflict, and a whole lot of colossal guns. Sounds like a good time! With massive war machines threatening your home, will you be the one small cog that brings it all to a halt?

Golden Fall 2 Demo.description: Golden Fall 2 is a single character dungeon crawl RPG focused on exploration of an engaging and diverse world. Combat follows a simultaneous turn-based system inspired by roguelikes.

Minions of Elden.description: Kill monsters, kill players, grab their loot, and use it to kill them again in Minions of Elden Online, a 2D sandbox MMORPG!

Draw From Earth.description: Draw from Earth is a Rogue-Like, Turn-based Card Game, You are the Leader, as Flagship, Finding your Origin is your Ultimate goal.

DJIGULI.description: This is a game in the genre of visual novels. In the game, you are immersed in the history of an ordinary car that fell into the hands of the owner is not very diligent. You will get acquainted with other cars of different brands and learn their stories

TCSTRIKERS3.description: Who are you fighting for? My usual job turns into a big mission. An easy-to-understand system reminiscent of the old barrage STG. Pave the way with powerful PowerShots!

Learn Game Development, Unity Code Monke.description: Learn Game Development from a Professional Indie Game Developer. Make your own games and bring your ideas to life!

Interrogation Files: Port Landsend.description: Search through the interrogation footage of suspects of a bizarre and horrific crime. Decide who committed the crime and see them get arrested and have their day in court. The latest interactive video experience.

Final Frame.description: Inspired by Danganronpa and Ace Attorney series, Final Frame is a murder mystery Visual Novel set in modern Japan.

Game Of Puzzles: Dinosaurs.description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

Unforgotten.description: UNFORGOTTEN – a story-driven, non-linear visual novel, where you can immerse in the ethnic ambience of Northern myths and horrors. Can you solve the riddles of the past - without ever losing yourself in the present? Your fate is in your hands!

Syystem - The Phantom Train.description: Delve into the haunted underground of Capital City in this paranormal mystery visual novel. Chase down the elusive phantom of an ill-fated railcar and the curse left behind by its doomed passengers. Tread lightly--you aren't the only one scouring the tunnels...

Undead Run.description: A Halloween themed local multiplayer game, where you have to reach the end faster than your friends. Avoid traps, place new ones. Use different characters, each with own ability, activate traps, choose different routes to leave the opponents behind.

Dark Lord: Peacemaker.description: A dark fantasy classic RPG. Customize your race, gender and class. Gather a party with your favorite companions. Change the fate of the characters and the world with your choices.

Bzzzt Demo.description: Stop evil scientist Badbert from taking over the world in the '80s pixel extravaganza platformer! Become ZX8000, the tiny cunning robot and master your skills in an everchanging world filled with crafty traps and robotic enemies.

斩妖行 Eastern Exorcist Demo.description: Eastern Exorcist is a stunning 2D side-scrolling action RPG set in a fantasy eastern world with the vicious spirits and monsters. Play as a skilled exorcist against chaotic evil to fight your way through the brutal world, and experience different stories of joy and sorrow.

Little Witch Academia: VR Broom Racing.description: Soar through the skies, hunt for ghosts, and become the best witch racer in the world!Experience the thrill of flight across more than a dozen tracks! Cast magic to speed up and slow other teams down as you race to finish first! Purify the school’s restless spirits in ghost hunting missions.

Deranged Park Rangers.description: Free to play massively multiplayer online Shoot ‘Em Up with instant play. Kill sapsuckers in an over-the-top blood and guts filled manner.

Undead Can Dance.description: Undead Can Dance is a dancing battle game where you take control of the undead through rhythm, power and accuracy.

洛秋 Fall autumn.description: Fall autumn is an ARPG game. The game uses an overhead world. There are several forces in this world. The character is a member of the secret department in his country to perform tasks

R.E.E.L..description: You need to fix units of the life support system at the station on Mars. Play and learn the basics of electronics. Explore the maze of printed circuit boards, learn how to use electronic components.

UFO Stalker.description: UFO Stalker is a 2D grid-based, single-player & single-character dungeon crawler RPG with elements of stealth. Figure out alien technology and understand reasons of your capturing.

Creeper World 4 Demo.description: The unstoppable fluid enemy has returned and destroyed every world in its path! Defend against Creeper as it floods across the 3D terrain in this real time strategy game where the enemy is a fluid.

Fear the Dark Unknown: Chloe.description: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

Forza Horizon 4.description: Dynamic seasons change everything at the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up with others to explore beautiful and historic Britain in a shared open world.

The Magic Elevator.description: The Magic Elevator takes you on a journey into 5 magical worlds created by artist Johan Pruys. The worlds include: Magic, Space, Water, Clouds and Happy New Year.

The Riftbreaker: Prologue.description: The Riftbreaker: Prologue allows you to experience the events taking place before the story campaign of the main game. Explore an entirely new world. Gather resources. Build up a base. Defend yourself from thousands of alien creatures.

Boo's Balloons.description: Explore the sky for Boo's missing balloons and return them safely to the fairground landing pad. A simple and short game accompanied by some poetry. For younger children to enjoy as they develop their motor skills.

NOMAD.description: Shoot your way through the sands and catch as many chickens as you can. Why? Because you get to keep any gold you find for yourself! A skill-based perma-death shooter with challenging AI rather than floods of kamikaze sprites. How many chickens can you catch before your inevitable demise?

Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER.description: Play a psychic detective known as ES88 and chase down a rogue esper who’s hidden themselves in the memories of others. With the help of your psychic abilities and a genetically engineered creature known as a NEURODIVER, you choose the way to take them out, but hurry, these memories are fading fast!

Jetpack Vacation.description: Prepare to take flight! Explore a tropical paradise with your own handheld jetpacks where you can hang out with other players, score some goals in Jetpack Stadium, or try your hand at target shooting! Pack your virtual bags and get ready for your own Jetpack Vacation!

M.U.S.T. Repeat.description: M.U.S.T. Repeat is a logical puzzle game in which tiny robot Q.T. uses the Repeat mechanic to navigate the rooms and defeat enemies. The higher the Repeat is, the more difficult it is to navigate through the room, but you have to increase your Repeat in order to defeat the higher level Guard Bots.

Masquerade of Miasma.description: A bubble pop style game set during a Medieval plague, where proper sanitation, social distancing and toilet paper are key. Journey through this beautiful Medieval community, joined by other medical professionals, to save your home.

Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers.description: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers is a yuri visual novel about love between three girls while fighting against a curse.

Nullum.description: Nullum is a minimalist puzzle game. The goal is to eliminate all tiles by creating matching numbers.

Krim: The War in the Crimea, 1941-42.description: KRIM: The War in the Crimea 1941-42 is an operational/strategic simulation of the German 11th Army’s operations in the Crimean Peninsula from late October 1941 through 4 July 1942.

Space Mercenary Shooter : Episode 2.description: Space Mercenary Shooter is an episodic FPS inspired by early shooter games, featuring handcrafted levels and a fully voice-acted cast of characters.

Best Friend.description: "Best Friend" is a 3D horror game. Escape and survive from your beloved doll named David after you don't have time to play with him. Follow the advice that David has told you, survive, and remember that you must never turn your back on David!

Zibbs - Alien Survival Demo.description: Zibbs - Alien Survival is an open world game where you play as an alien trying to survive on the unknown planet - Earth.

Bragger's Run.description: A Procedurally Generated Rogue-Lite Action Game: Bragger's Run takes you on a death race across a hostile continent where you'll collect treasures and trophies from your kills. Play as the Gunslinger, the Duelist, or the Wizard and see if you have what it takes. Can you make The Run?

Kaleidocraft.description: Craft kaleidoscopes, mandalas and more in a utopian universe that truly welcomes your creativity. Share your art on a wholesome social media and be rewarded instantly with love, followers, new shapes, color palettes and decorations for your holographic room. Enjoy your exposure, for realz!

回到2001买房子.description: 在游戏中，玩家作为一个买不起房子的普通人，因为偶然的机会穿越到2001年。你是否能利用这次机会，用传越者的知识来重拾当年错过的投资机会，实现财富自由，进而实现人生价值。

For Evelyn Demo.description: For Evelyn is an intriguing tale of love, betrayal, and the ultimate sacrifice, combining point & click with classic adventure and RPG mechanics. Step into the world of Aura and unravel the truth about the past while completing quests, meeting new friends, and fighting to protect the ones you love!

Shing! Demo.description: Experience the most exciting and immersive beat-em-up combat system ever – become a kickass ninja and slice some demons in style!

Space Cats Tactics.description: Fight nerve-wracking spaceship battles in this turn-based tactical space opera RPG! Manage your crew of feline warriors to adapt to every strategic situation and dive into a thrilling space opera story where your choices will determine your path.

WC.description: Hospital. Today, a lot of visitors. Among them there is a small boy with a bladder problem. Suddenly, he longed to the toilet. The main thing is not to be mistaken the door.

Software House Simulator.description: EAT, SLEEP, RELEASE A GAME, REPEAT.Release games, console, controller, etc... and try the thrill of becoming a billionaire!

Roller Drama.description: Play this mix of story-driven and sports game where you lead a team of five Roller Derby athletes with challenging personalities. Manage full-contact matches on skates with a mix of strategy and real-time controls: team results and life debacles are all part of the story.

Space Junk.description: Intense action, retro-styled visuals, a sizzling synth soundtrack and tons of cool Sci-Fi references, all rendered in vibrant, neon graphics. Get your trigger-finger ready, turn the lights down, the sound up, and blast your way through level after level of fast paced, Junk smashing action!

Dark Renaissance.description: An exciting Interactive History Drama that will let you experience first-hand the real and darker story of Renaissance. Take on the role of an indomitable mercenary captain, fight fearsome enemies, make influential choices and forge your own path to glory.

Launched!.description: Launched! is a small scale RTS about building and launching an arsenal of missiles at the other island in the distance.

Ash of Gods: The Way.description: A turn-based story-driven tactical card game with constantly changing rules for every fight. Use two decks to capture checkpoints, fight two enemies at the same time, win duels, use traps and power runes, defend your commander from a deadly enemy and more. Adapt your strategy to end up victorious.

幽灵高校 Demo.description: An average college girl takes an elective class and everything is different. Death, spooky, enveloped her, uncovering the truth, looking for clues, making the right choice was the only way.

Red Frontier 2.description: Explore beyond the constant dust storm and discover the alien horrors on red wastelands. Hide from human-sized centipedes in the darkest corners and run away while being hunted by a giant blood-thirsty snake. Use your gadgets to plan ahead your next travel on the surface to avoid looming death

Anicon - Animal Complex - Rabbit's Path.description: A romance, comedy, fantasy Visual Novel - filled with adventures, misadventures, adorable animals, brother conflicts, circus cleaning, collecting puzzle pieces, and more - all in one package!

Flatland Vol.2.description: In this second episode of the series, Square crosses the most dangerous part of Flatland: the flooded wells. FLATLAND Vol. 2 is a fast-paced hardcore platformer featuring hand-crafted levels and lightning-fast respawns. Run, jump, die, learn, repeat.

Disc Ninja.description: Immerse yourself in a breathtaking virtual reality setting and practice your Disc Golf skills in the comfort of your own home.

Escape Planet 17.description: Escape Planet 17 is a action cyberpunk platform game where you can Interact with other characters to create unique paths. Use your fighting, shooting, hacking and scanning abilitys to solve crimes, defeat your enemies and escape the Planet .

b 2.description: b 2: online-only multiplayer --- an alien place --- you are the bee: fly where you want, play as you like

Oik 3D.description: Casual physical clicker puzzle. The continuation of your favorite series is now in 3D!

Title_Pending Demo.description: Congratulations! You've been hired by an up and coming Game Development Studio to play-test their New Game (which as of now does not have a title). Not only that, you'll get to talk with the Lead Developer of the project, Matthew Stanton, who will give insight on his team's creative process.

Frame Outsiders.description: 「テレポート」でターゲットを奪え！　新感覚《画面ループ》、潜入アクションアドベンチャー！――アタシが部外者だとしても、想いは世界を欺ける。

Type Up.description: Choose a character, a setting, and start typing. Want different characters? Add your own!

Hunting Moon.description: Before Yoru try to end his own life, a succubus girl named Lilith appeared.

Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.7.description: As daily life goes on unchanged, the girls - and Haruto - continue to sharpen their fangs. They are summoned for a mission of unprecedented scale, against the religious organization "TFA", where Enishi and Kuroe await. What kind of hellish scenes will Arisaka have to face on the battlefield?

The Rewinder Demo.description: The Rewinder is an adventure puzzle game based on Chinese mythology. You play as Yun, the last known Rewinder, who can communicate with spirits and explore other people's memories to alter the past.

For Evelyn.description: For Evelyn is an intriguing tale of love, betrayal, and the ultimate sacrifice, combining point & click with classic adventure and RPG mechanics. Step into the world of Aura and unravel the truth about the past while completing quests, meeting new friends, and fighting to protect the ones you love!

Hit Zero: Chronos.description: Hit Zero: Chronos is a 2D shooter game. You’re given the power to control time, time moves only when you move! Use your time stopping powers to erase every enemies in the area.

Accident: The Pilot.description: Become a journalist who researches old car accident cases. Help victims and perform first aid, obtain evidence and reconstruct the events to discover what really happened.

Fatec's Out.description: Fatec’s Out is an epic adventure that shows how a digital games professor has to protect the universe’s reality that’s being built beneath his feet. Being a game of the nostalgic and acclaimed Beat’em Up genre, it will make you remember what makes the most famous games of the 90’s timeless.

Cube Escape Collection.description: In this classic point-and-click adventure anthology you follow the path of Dale and Laura and other famous Rusty lake characters such as Mr. Crow and Mr. Owl. The series will be updated, preserved and bundled to survive the end of the Flash Games era.

The Magic Storm.description: A hiddenobject game from 7-y.o. storyteller. The graphics are based on the works of a young artist.

Professor Lupo: Ocean.description: Professor Lupo: Ocean is a 2D grid-based exploration puzzle adventure from the famed creators of “Nihilumbra”. Trapped below the ocean, take on strange creatures, use water to solve puzzles and escape your fate, while uncovering the mysteries of who you really are.

Down2Die Demo.description: Down2Die is an advanced zombie survival game that offers many ways of replayability and customization. The game features many ways to counteract your enemies with traps and upgrades. Work together with a team up to 4 survivors and level through the waves to be at your best when the "unknown" occurs.

Hyzer Sky.description: Challenge three full length disc golf courses with 20 discs of different speed and stability. Play rounds of 18 holes or only the front or back 9 or just practice single holes. Unlock different seasons and more by gaining achievements and break your course records.

The Almost Gone Demo.description: Experience the intricate dioramas and connections of your life, and the ripples we all make, in this award-winning narrative puzzle game about death, loss, and mental health.

Frame Outsiders Trial.description: 「テレポート」でターゲットを奪え！　新感覚《画面ループ》、潜入アクションアドベンチャー！――アタシが部外者だとしても、想いは世界を欺ける。

风中之烛.description: 我们是否需要探求一个所谓的答案或者真相？我们为了自已想知道的答案可以付出怎么样的代价？在这普通的一天烛即将迎来自己的命运，发现关于自己的黑暗秘密，而原本平静的生活也变得像风中的烛火一样摇摇欲坠。

Timeless Adventure: A Journey to Begin.description: Time stands still in this fantasy puzzle adventure game. Venture as a ghostly wraith through an idle world, in search of answers for Death herself. The only help is your ability to possess living or once-living beings.

Silmaris: Dice Kingdom.description: Unforgiving storytelling adventure with dice rolls and turn-based management. Make the right choices and roll the dice to rally the monarchs to your medieval kingdom by diplomacy, war or deception.

The Medium.description: Discover a dark mystery only a medium can solve. Travel to an abandoned communist resort and use your unique psychic abilities to uncover its deeply disturbing secrets, solve dual-reality puzzles, survive encounters with sinister spirits, and explore two realities at the same time.

Bzzzt.description: Stop evil scientist Badbert from taking over the world in the '80s pixel extravaganza platformer! Become ZX8000, the tiny cunning robot and master your skills in an everchanging world filled with crafty traps and robotic enemies.

Hunt Planet Bug.description: FPS game, with 2 levels of difficulty, and with four scenes. you will have to hunt animals from another planet and prevent them from hunting you ati. in the final scene you will have to arrive An enemy ship to destroy it.

Blackjack Hands.description: An addictive puzzle game inspired in BlackJack. Merge neighboring cards in the correct order to beat the Dealer.

Late Stage Inferno.description: Hunt down those responsible for destroying your home. Sneak through ships and kill everyone on board. Climb the ranks until you find reach the top, then take it out. Play out the short story of this alien stuck in a capitalist hell as they take on 8 unique ships.

Solar Sails: Space Pirates.description: Solar Sails is a satirical space adventure game with action-RPG elements. Control a pirate ship, plunder the royal navy, launch a scout duck to search for treasures, upgrade your ship with alien technologies, and sail onwards to unveil the darkest secrets of the universe that ought to seal its fate.

soundStrider Demo.description: Enter a synthesized reality. Explore endless worlds. Play an instrument. Save bookmarks. A psychedelic audio exploration game, walking simulator, music generator, and relaxation tool best experienced with headphones.

Ato Demo.description: A world of Beauty and Mystery, Emotive Animations, Atmospheric Environments, Visually Driven Story, Metroidvania Exploration and Memorable Sword Duels.

LAZR - A Clothformer Demo.description: A new era of physics based platforming is about to begin. Play as fusion powered killer android Lazr, facing off against rogue AI and mega-corporations in Alpha City One.

Thief's Roulette Demo.description: Lady Luck has chosen 15 'Thieves' to compete in Thief's Roulette. A game of puzzles and deception with their lives on the line.

Golden Fall 2.description: Golden Fall 2 is a single character dungeon crawl RPG focused on exploration of an engaging and diverse world. Combat follows a simultaneous turn-based system inspired by roguelikes.

Night and Day.description: Night and Day is a BL dating sim Visual Novel about art, coming of age and jazz music.

Tower of Samsara - Hidden Treasures.description: Summon the forces of the Sun to face tough enemies in this hard souls-like puzzle platform 2D when a long dead Plutonian is ressurected by the primordial light of the Sun seeking for a champion to avoid its impending doom.

Bad Run - Turbo Edition Demo.description: Bad Run is a spin-off of Bad Pad, featuring a casual action packed, runner metroidvania platformer.

Echo's Esker.description: You are lost in the catacombs and finding your way out won’t be easy, but upon reaching the surface you will find you are not the only one who is lost. The mysterious spirit hound Echo is far from home, but with her by your side, exploration is as simple as a game of fetch.

Harvest Island.description: Harvest Island is a story driven farming simulator where you farm stuff for the gods. You can discover lots of hidden places like a cave behind a water fall or befriending wild animals hiding in the forest or finding a randomly placed vending machine in a dark underground hidden room along the beach

Crimson Spires.description: This otome-style visual novel blends eeriness and romance into a compelling drama. A ring of deadly towers traps you in the small mining town of Bataille, Missouri with extreme conspiracy theorists, a serial killer, and wealthy vampires. Choose your partner wisely.

Crimson Spires Demo.description: This otome-style visual novel blends eeriness and romance into a compelling drama. A ring of deadly towers traps you in the small mining town of Bataille, Missouri with extreme conspiracy theorists, a serial killer, and wealthy vampires. Choose your partner wisely.

Escape: The Brother's Saloon.description: Trapped by your brother Joseph in a mysterious room, filled with the faint ticking of a clock and the crackles of a fire...it's up to you to explore, find clues, and solve the puzzles. Will you escape The Brother's Saloon?

Lockdown.description: Your City Has Been Placed on Lockdown.. You're a survivor of the AME-3 Virus that has taken over causing your city to go on Lockdown, trapping anyone who was left behind inside. There's one way out, an airlock located at the edge of town. Find the key and escape, or die trying.

Bikini Alert.description: In the distant future, after a tough war against machines and artificial intelligence, humanity is forced to create a fortress underground. Unfortunately, the Supply Collector Team has been kidnapped and the future of mankind lies on one man, Cyne Rizerous.

Kernmantle Demo.description: Kernmantle is a twin-stick climbing game with exploration, platforming, and light puzzle elements. Control a physics-driven character and scale a 2000-meter vertical canyon filled with challenges, characters, and secrets.

Angle Wars.description: Angle Wars is a tactical top-down war game for one to four players, requiring quick reflexes and a keen eye for angles. Play through the co-op campaign, or go head-to-head in local play to destroy your enemies in a variety of game types.

Kings Of Streets.description: Starting from a homeless person who wakes up at a bus station. All you have is a penny in your pocket and some cash in your bank account. Go out into the city and work hard to earn your first money. The streets will be your home.

Rough Justice: '84.description: Do what it takes to make your fledgling security agency thrive in this 80s noir crime bustin', dirty crossing, vengeance-seeking board game inspired strategy game with dice and cards.

SpinZap Demo.description: SpinZap is a challenging game in classic arcade style. Use your reflexes, dexterity and boss skills to conquer 81 levels of circle zapping madness.

Mythic Dungeons.description: Mythic Dungeons is a simple 2.5D Platformer Game. This game emphasizes replayability and can be easily played over and over again. It also supports online cooperative play, with up to 10 players.

Magic Forms.description: A casual game about forms and colors. Solve the forms puzzles with colors. A new and modern approach gameplay inspired on Rubrik's Cube.

Infernal Radiation Demo.description: Smash demons and deflect bullets in a hardcore arcade clicker with the RPG elements.

Missile Command: Recharged.description: Fire missiles to protect your bases! A classic arcade game's back and recharged!

Armoured Commander II.description: Take command of a tank and its crew in the Second World War, fighting through one of over 50 campaigns across Europe, North Africa, Southeast Asia, and the Pacific. Each day of the campaign brings new challenges, and just surviving is itself a hard-won victory.

Pure Soul: The Journey of the Witch Emil.description: In Pure Soul: The Journey of the Witch is a racing combat game and you control the Witch Emily who has just discovered her powers and needs to explore a fantasy world, the game has a simple gameplay to dodge, jump obstacles, collect potions and defeat monsters.

Mall Master.description: Mall Master - now you can design, build and manage shopping mall. Create your own successful business and make your customers happy. Mall Master gives you the opportunity to create a happy, stress-free work environment... of course, if you can do it.

SubDivide.description: Divide the world in this puzzle-platformer to venture into the unknown.

TraptionBakery.description: A huge and detailed, fully functional mad contraption. Fathom how on Earth you can bake some bread with it, or marvel at it's madness. Upcyclepunk at its best.

Hunt: Primal Reptiles.description: The most realistic prehistoric hunt-survival game ever! Huge Jurassic habitat inhabited by many prehistoric carnivorous reptiles!

Grim Tales: The Generous Gift Collector'.description: A mysterious birthday gift uncovers a sinister kidnapping plot!

Launch Break.description: Launch Break is a fast-paced 4-player local party game, where you must fight over a single chance to escape a crash-imminent spaceship!Challenge your friends with all your arsenal, perks and the ability to shape the battleground to your advantage.

Krush Kill 'N Destroy Xtreme.description: Welcome to Hell, soldier, and mind the radioactive dust. Join one of two groups battling tooth, claw, tentacle, and any other appendage for survival in this post-nuclear real-time strategy game.

Krush Kill ‘N Destroy 2: Krossfire.description: Krush Kill 'N Destroy 2: Krossfire is a fast and furious post-apocalyptic real-time strategy game where you have to be quick or be dead. Play as one of three unique factions in the struggle to seek out and conquer oil fields to fuel your army.

Sound of Windshift sound track vol.001.description: 7 songs of Sound of Windshift 15 game music of WINDSHIFT and ONE SPECIAL SONG in this album. songs are pops and dance musics. hear it,and Let's dance.

The Chess Variants Club.description: Play and discover 12 popular chess variants, improve your chess skills with hundreds of chess puzzles, or simply play regular chess with your friends - all in one package. This diverse collection includes several chess games and puzzles. All in a minimalist, beautifully designed virtual chess club.

Robot Paradise VR.description: Enjoy a Sci-Fi RPG-Action-Adventure with head controls for walking and voice recognition actions.

Kill It With Fire: IGNITION.description: Kill It With Fire: IGNITION is a free sampler of a first-person action game about hunting spiders and causing collateral damage. The full game is OUT NOW!

Arena.description: Fight for your freedom to exist as a magical freak!

Cartridge Defense.description: Cartridge Defense is a tower defense game with 287 distinct collectible cards that you will use to create your own decks to defend against robots in the cyberpunk inspired future. Play cards (cartridges) to spawn towers, upgrades, special abilities and more.

Hope Demo.description: Alone you wake up amnesiac, trying to uncover your past by exploring the world.

MEND Arcade Battle.description: MEND Arcade Battle is a turn-based RPG inspired by Fighting Game core mechanics. Players must tackle the Fighting Game staple challenge known as Arcade Mode with a Turn-based RPG twist!
