Choose your character and follow their path to defeating the final boss awaiting them at the end.

Space Trains.description: A light strategy-puzzle game about building an interplanetary industrial rail network. Discover new planets, assign them planet-wide projects, and watch as trains miraculously ferry the fruits of their labor around... through space!

Stress explosion.description: It's time to explode the massive amount of stress that has accumulated in you! By destroying them, messing them up and blasting them, This is a 2D action game with a refreshing feeling of destruction in various everyday situations. Save this world from stress! !

Fly Fly Tank Demo.description: Fly Fly Tank is Chaotic Tank-Based Third Person Shooter Action Game! The purpose is to move around 3D Stage and defeat certain number of Enemies. By accumulating Scores, you can Level Up Weapons and By defeating Boss, you can use Boss's Weapon. Super easy operation with only arrow keys and mouse!

Deeply Dark.description: Take on the challenge of the Legendary gauntlet. Look for a way to overcome the corruption that is in it. Face anyone who wants to stop you and become a guardian once and for all.

Apocalypse: 2.0 Edition.description: Apocalypse: 2.0 Edition is an extremely fast paced shooter, which mixes several modern mechanics into the classic zombie survival experience. This includes an economy; item looting; item management; quests; stats; and much more! Completely free with Steam.

Neon Beat Rider.description: Ride the beats with Neon Beat Rider, a neon-fueled rhythm game with a multi-path story and procedurally generated tracks!

Vertical Runner.description: Dodge the walls by moving up and down as the game speeds up and get the highest score! The longer you survive the more points you get, but beware as obstacles speed up too!

DEANSWAR GAME.description: The chaotic race war ended with million of exhausted body and mind, a peace treaty was signed, the world entered an era of peace.With the cooperation of all races, the world flourish again, a game called DEANSWAR GAME comes into view.

Outlaws: Corwin's Treasure.description: Unlock the mystery behind the famed Corwin’s treasure in this thrilling hidden object adventure! A unique story with realistic atmosphere in a rustic wild west setting.

Warpips.description: Warpips is the ultimate quick to learn but amazingly deep tug-of-war strategy game. Deploy the right composition of soldiers, tanks, helicopters and planes in this tight, streamlined strategy-focused war game. Compose the best army, research the right tech; overwhelm your enemy!

Replicated.description: Replicated is a simple but challenging puzzle game about separating shapes.

Pilots Of Darsalon.description: Your job is to locate and transport the containers to your base avoiding enemies on your way. Your ship is equipped with a hook to carry the containers. This is a physics based arcade game, inspired on the very early classics and with a strong Commodore 64 feel on it.

Epicure.description: Embark on this new culinary journey as the new chef in a burger restaurant! Learn how to serve customers, improve your kitchen, and impress food critics! It's time to get cooking!

Stozle - Solve the Mystery.description: Find out the mysteries of the short stories by solving puzzles. Are you smart enough do it?

Poly Party.description: Welcome to Poly Party! A combination of Action, Adventure, Strategy, RPG, and Racing. Play some boardgames, minigames, missions, and races in the game modes provided!

Rebirth.description: 由一人獨立製作，有著龐大劇情和豐富內容的RPG遊戲。

Taskforce.description: Taskforce is a tactical, turn based game in which you control a small group of elite soldiers in a series of sci-fi themed missions. Mission objectives might include rescuing hostages, blowing up targets, stealing documents or other military activities.

Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends.description: Terrordrome Reign Of The Legends is an indie fighting game set in a world where characters from horror literature, urban legends, cryptids, mythology exist within our modern world. This spiritual successor to Terrordrome Rise of the Boogeymen will be the perfect fighting game for all fans of horror.

Crash the Core.description: A sci-fantasy roguelike deckbuilder with RPG elements such as building your own starting deck, equipping gadgets, summoning allies, and salvaging cards for different effects. Discover strange events, go fishing and gather Intel to uncover a conspiracy to take over the galaxy!

Heaven vs Hell.description: Play as Heaven or Hell in this semi-turn-based action strategy game. Gather your army, Challenge evil monsters, use magic and collect keys on your way to Victory!

Zamboni Simulator 2019.description: Zamboni Simulator 2019 is a game about existential nihilism, depression, family, love, and ice resurfacing. It is an almost all original game including original art and music, but with recycled junk philosophy.

故鄉戰爭 HOMETOWN WAR.description: HOMETOWN WAR :The Battle for Sihang Warehouse held out against numerous waves of Imperial Japanese Army and covered National Revolutionary Army retreating west during the Battle of Shanghai.

PXL-SHIP.description: PXL-SHIP Is a high score game! Survive the asteroid field as long as possible and try to defeat the destroyer! upgrade your ship and unlock different styles!

Ambardia.description: Ambardia is a third-person MMORPG set in an ancient fantasy realm with evolving complex lore and quest-driven gameplay. Class-free character development allows players to craft their own destiny as they choose a path between Order and Creativity or Chaos and Destruction!

Freedom! Do or Die.description: When terrorism threatens the world there is no need to send a bunch of iconic movie heroes back from the '80s. One under-funded over-powered mercenary is all that's needed to save the world in this epic run 'n' gun destruction-fest of a homage to Broforce!

SnowFighters.description: Make snowball and Throw to the rivals!! Snowball fight e-sports action game !!

Shiro.description: Shiro is an adventure platformer in which you have to find your missing sister

Transfinite Dungeon.description: Crawl Tactics is a unique hybrid of tactical RPG and roguelike. Manage a party of adventurers and use the environment to your advantage to conquer the dungeon.

The Gecko Gods.description: Explore a mysterious island as a tiny lizard. Complete ancient puzzles, effortlessly climb cliffs, and eat bugs as you make your way across an island civilization lost to time.

Mushroom Savior.description: The evil tree kidnapped the mushroom folk and imprisoned them in the dungeon. Help the mushroom king to rescue his people. Make your way through the dangerous dungeon, save the mushrooms and defeat the evil tree!

Residual.description: Explore a forgotten galaxy full of different planets, venture deeper into the planet to mine for rare resources, craft items to fix your ship, and discover ancient secrets and life forms. An exploration (survival) game like no other.. Adventure awaits!

Sokpop S08: Yardlings.description: Yardlings is a local multiplayer battle arena about vegetables in a garden! Build an adorable army, place yourself strategically on the battlefield, using special abilities, capturing potted plants (outposts) and big seed-shooting flowers while you try to gain control over the yard!

他人世界末 Demo.description: 这是属于不怎么开朗的我们，充满逃避、畏缩、胆怯、不切实际的单恋故事。 属于你的故事结局将会如何，由你的选择而定。

Projet Océara.description: Projet océara is a hardcore platform game, all stage are timed and the difficulty is croissant .

逃出图书馆(Escape from Library).description: Ming is a normal college student, one day he comes to the library to study , but only to found that the library has become a hell. Fear, trap, death ... The weird factors are everywhere in this library, Can he find the only exit?

Kingdom of Corrupts.description: Kingdom of Corrupts is a 2d side scroller adventure game. The game tells the story of a kingdom ruined by the invasive efforts of bandits and civil war. Henry, our hero, embarks on an adventure to save the queen and to set her up back on the throne.

Roll Control.description: Inspired by games like Super Monkey Ball and Marble Madness, Roll Control is a 3D balance based platformer, built to be played with your body. Using the Roll Controller App on your mobile device, players can transform their balance board into a human game controller.

Strange Aeons.description: Chat with an AI through the microphone. Escape a cyber-hell.

DOUDY.description: Dare you play this game? Doudy and disturbing, dark and horrible. A realistic puzzle simulator with photorealistic graphics

Titan Chaser.description: Car. Foggy night. Mystical landscapes. And if you want to work - titans. Titan Chaser is a surreal driving and walking experience, where your job is to scout giant creatures and use the light to drive them off without fighting or killing.

In Plain Sight.description: An emotional and impactful story set in modern America among residents of a trailer park who struggle not only with their economic situation but also with a net of mysteries and secrets.

Beautycopter.description: A Beautycopter is an ultralight aircraft used in the hospitality industry. And YOU will get to fly it! Come spend a day at earth's coldest spa in this wintery flight adventure.

Elasto Mania.description: The original cult classic returns. A blast from the past, better than ever. Are you ready?

Dark Roll: Free Kick Challenge.description: A ball rolling game, where you take football free kicks. Single player challenges, Steam Leaderboards and ranked multiplayer. Free to play.

Vampire: The Masquerade — Night Road.description: The elders have entrusted you, an elite vampire courier, to deliver their secrets. Can you outrun the hunters, the other drivers, and the rising sun?

Vampire: The Masquerade — Night Road Dem.description: The elders have entrusted you, an elite vampire courier, to deliver their secrets. Can you outrun the hunters, the other drivers, and the rising sun?

BORE DOME Sample Pack.description: In the near future, human life is perfect. BORE DOME is a magical pill solution from the future that lets you experience moments of human imperfection and mediocrity. Equip your senses and get ready to confront all kinds of situations and unhinged characters.

Vampire: The Masquerade — Out for Blood.description: Gather your allies to hunt the vampires that terrorize your town! Study their ways and exploit their rivalries, or you'll become a vampire yourself.
Gather your allies to hunt the vampires that terrorize your town! Study their ways and exploit their rivalries, or you'll become a vampire yourself.

PT+.description: Use virtual reality to learn how to stretch and exercise your neck

Light Years Apart.description: A rollicking adventure with pirates, spies, and snarky computers. Trade, sneak, and talk your way past a planetary blockade before it’s too late!

Light Years Apart Demo.description: A rollicking adventure with pirates, spies, and snarky computers. Trade, sneak, and talk your way past a planetary blockade before it’s too late!

KaveXplorer.description: KaveXplorer is a top-down bullet hell dungeon crawler following a group of Xplorers seeking for the universe crystal.

UNBEATABLE [white label].description: A young girl learns a song. An exclusive side-story set in the world of D-CELL GAMES' upcoming rhythm-adventure.

Your Human is Sick.description: Your Human is Sick and it’s up to you, a Naive T Cell, to solve puzzles, fight off Bacteria and Viruses, and learn about the Immune System. Make your human healthy again in this dungeon crawler adventure!

Curing Covid.description: Eliminate all viruses by dropping colored vitamins in this 20 level block puzzle game with a Covid-19 theme.

Ring of Fire: Search for a Killer Demo.description: Scour police records. Antagonize your suspects. Comb through a disturbing crime scene. You'll stop at nothing to expose the truth. Ring of Fire is a search-based detective noir puzzler with a mature narrative set in the hyper-stylized streets of New London.

The Confession.description: Ever wondered how much of a kinky pervert you are? Ever wanted to know what your fate entails for being such a kinky pervert? Answer a series of disgustingly hilarious, immoral questions to reveal ridiculous scenarios & unlock the answers you seek...

Midsummer Night.description: Join orphan Klim in his journey through the dense, enchanted forest in search for his missing sister in the wonderfully atmospheric indie game "Midsummer Night".

Operation Zeta.description: The great battle codenamed 'Operation Zeta' has been lost. Your ship is in shambles and you have to act quickly to collect all of the parts and repair your ship before the warzone is completely destroyed by the enemies death laser in this space rougelike.

Robot Builder War.description: Lead your robot team to liberate the world from the evil CCP. Customize your robots by different parts and traits.

Not Our Home: Platinum Edition.description: Save your brother Rodger by finding all seven keys along with a special potion. You have until 4am.

Siralim Ultimate.description: Siralim Ultimate is a monster catching, dungeon crawling RPG with a ridiculous amount of depth. Summon over 1200 different creatures and travel through randomly generated dungeons to acquire resources, new creatures, and loot.

迅风的米斯特汀 Windy Mystletainn.description: The king asked you to take an artifact to kill the monster and save the princess, but you think it's not too late to kill the king first and then save the princess!?

Astrozombies.description: Astrozombies is a modern take on the classic action & platforming games we grew up with, presented with a unique 2D aesthetic. Jump right into the action with simple controls, and make your way through challenging levels with some kick-ass music. Always remember: run right, kill everything!

VR长征.description: The Long March is a great miracle in human history. The Central Red Army fought more than 380 battles. During this period, it passed 14 provinces, crossed 18 mountains, crossed 24 rivers, and traveled about 25,000 miles.

NoWaitHero.description: Deck building card battle "NoWaitHero" There is no need to wait during a duel. Seize the victory ahead of the choice.

Core Awaken ~Jilelen and LittleSnow~.description: Cool and cute 2D Scroll action game!

Spacefighter Rukia.description: Jump into the cockpit with Rukia, a space pilot mercenary, and follow her story to save the galaxy in this top-down 2d Space shooter

SCAR Demo.description: Created by Savage Studios, S.C.A.R is a retro-like monster killing game, where the enemies have one goal, to see your demise. Difficulty is not forgiving, your survival is almost impossible...

Intemporel.description: Players control a Guardian who takes the decision to leave the monastry to try to understand what is happening to this collapsing world and why not, try to invert the trend and preserve the world from the evil that is corroding it. Among all the possbilities, will you succeed to find your way ?

D.E.E.P. Battle of Jove.description: Take fast, campaign-based arcade gameplay with next-gen graphics for an experience known since Star Fox: Barrel-roll, maneuver and fight your way thru deep space and Rogue Squadron-like planet-based missions as the leader of the rebellion

The Wicked Days.description: The Wicked Days is an action-packed shooter set in a godforsaken wilderness in a small town of Beavercity. Inexplicable events will be echoes of the difficult past. Why is everyone against you? Arm yourself to the teeth, jump in a car and move out to explore a dangerous world in search of answers.

Draginsanity.description: Welcome to the magical realm Draginsanity. It is full of dragons! And it is totally insane! Enjoy some old school 2D platformer action.

Sokpop S08: Ginseng Hero.description: A challenging action-adventure game about bugs with blades. Play as a beetle in a miniature world, find a weapon, and beat other insects in melee combat!

The Ancient Lands.description: The Ancient Lands is a top-down survival strategy game featuring you as a Watcher with the task to look over your village people. Guide your people with what to build and gather. At nightfall, enemies will attack your town and you can use your powers to aid in your people's survival.

EasySave Backup Demo.description: EasySave Backup performs an automatic backup of your savegames every time you play, allowing you to create an history of the savegames under your full control.

就这消消乐.description: This is an emoji elimination game that can bring you more fun when you are bored and unhappy.

Just A Flu.description: Just A Flu is a strategy simulation game about fighting the deadly fast spreading disease. Decide how to deal with infected people, when to close transport hubs, declare quarantine, or lockdown. Can you not only stop pandemic but avoid panic and not destroy the economy, causing more harm?

Bubble With Djealy.description: Bubble With Djealy Its a bubble game Shoot the bubbles and by 3 bubbels or more they wil remove and you get points

Angry Bunny 3: Virus.description: Third part of Angry bunny series. Deathly viruses and their army has conquered world. Find magic crystal and beat evil Viruses and save bunny world..

Tastemaker.description: TasteMaker is a restaurant tycoon game. Build a restaurant from the ground up, decorate, hire staff, keep your facilities clean, serve delicious food, and keep your customers happy.

Sheltered 2.description: A brutal survival management simulator set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Keep your faction of survivors alive, maintain your shelter and scavenge the ravaged world for resources. Befriend and trade with the factions you meet or conquer them by force.

The Hero with a Thousand Arms.description: This game challenge you to play many mini games in one screen at the same time.

Dungeon Solver.description: DUNGEON SOLVER is a minimalist puzzle game based on tabletop RPG universe where you need to lead all the hero pieces alive to the exit. can you guide them safe through the dungeon?

BattleParty.description: BattleParty is a survival topdown game in an apocalypse world.

Shuffled Nightmares.description: The aim of this game is to rotate pieces of a shuffled puzzle, to reveal a Nightmare. Each level is more challenging than the previous one, with more parts of the puzzle shuffled, and introducing new behavior.

SHMUP Creator.description: SHMUP Creator allows you to make the Shoot 'em up of your dreams! As fun as a game, it is very simple but powerful enough to make professional Shmups. Place your enemies with the mouse, create your bullet patterns, press a button to play, then share your games with your friends!

Shuffled Nightmares Demo.description: The aim of this game is to rotate pieces of a shuffled puzzle, to reveal a Nightmare. Each level is more challenging than the previous one, with more parts of the puzzle shuffled, and introducing new behavior.

Synth War Tactics.description: A cyber punk turn-based tactics game, customize your team of elite soldiers and lead them to victory across endless battlefields.

Traumatic Syndrome.description: Try to discover the identity of this unusual killer who has been unpunished for over a year in this unique investigative horror game!

ARCHiTECTUS.description: ARCHiTECTUS is a sandbox game about planning, building, furnishing and exploring of constructions.

驱逐之剑.description: Art film style, Action role playing, Arcade game, Open level, Soul like.

A.I-記憶女神.description: A.I-記憶女神為小品的視覺遊戲，主旨關於愛與探討存在的意義。 故事以一個普通的人(我)，和明星女友繆妮的日常作為起點。 人類對於各方面的科技研究到了巔峰，卻也因為過度的開發與研究，埋下了危機的種子......

Defenders of the West.description: Defenders of the West is a tower defense game set in the wild west that adds a few unique twists to the classic genre. Defend the west against a large group of bandits! Enjoy the unique setting, beautiful, hand crafted environments, dynamic levels and a cool story with a pinch of humor!

Nanook.description: Trail of Nanook is a co-op game that takes you on an arctic survival adventure. Team up with your Inuit twin and build igloos, raise your huskies to sled over ice plains, fish, hunt and craft your tools to survive the harsh environment.

Extreme Social Distancing.description: Avoid, infect, or seriously inconvenience your friends with this twin stick, topically relevant, local multiplayer party game. Each stick controls a poor soul who just wants to be left alone, to get away from the possibly infected, and to completely and utterly avoid those with obvious symptoms.

My Dear Prince.description: A sweet and light yuri story about an airheaded daydreamer and a tomboy set on a quaint Japanese island filled with cute bunnies.

Vivid Surf.description: Vivid Surf is my dream project for the movement mechanic glitch coined 'surf'. Now with a lower barrier to entry (while retaining its depth) using optional surf assists. Play at your own pace in a singleplayer focused campaign that rewards you as your skill improves.

TWELVE CONTAINERS.description: TWELVE CONTAINERS - Containers auction simulator, take a risk betting on units, clean up containers get things and sell them!

Pon Para and the Unconquerable Scorpion.description: Reunite with old allies and find new ones to raise an army that can end the Stormraider War…and stop a mad god from destroying the World That Remains.
Reunite with old allies and find new ones to raise an army that can end the Stormraider War…and stop a mad god from destroying the World That Remains.

Antidote.description: Doctor Mabbb, biological terrorist, is developing a bacteriological weapon and is kidnapping human guinea pigs to inoculate them with a virus and test its effectiveness.

Dude, Where Is My Beer?.description: An old school point and click adventure game about finding a pilsner in the confusing world of unnecessary craft beers and snobby hipsters.

OUTTA GAS Demo.description: OUTTA GAS is a post-apocalyptic RPG featuring a turn-based SHOOTING GALLERY combat mechanic where blasting away body tiles damages monster health and decreases their combat stats. Explore four unique acts to find gas and get back on the road to the Party at the End of the World!

Hargrave.description: Hargrave finds himself inside the walls of a mysterious labyrinth filled with strange robots. Find the way out, or find what's hidden deep inside.

Eternal Starshine.description: You're the only survivor who can decide his fate and get out of a terrible castle. Be careful! Going through zombie hordes is not that easy. You will encounter valuable objects and weapons that you can use on the way. Discover the dark secrets of this castle place!

BoxxyQuest: The Gathering Storm.description: An epic and satirical throwback to the internet of yesteryear, made with the help of actress and legendary meme queen Catie "Boxxy" Wayne.

LightBall.description: Can you see in the dark? Set in a 2D universe, Light Ball brings with it a concept of "Dark Puzzle", a legitimate platform game where you have to cross dark levels with different obstacles using LightBall, a sphere with its own light and capable of firing light.

Wire.description: Wire is in charge of maintaining a telecommunications center. Ready to take his well-deserved holidays, the entire network goes offline. Help Wire restart the repeater present in each sector. Be careful though! These sectors are a bit strange. Good luck!

Super Robin.description: It's a new crazy game again from Teen Super Titans Go Adventure.

TP Royale.description: The outbreak has started! Panic ensues. The world is collapsing and you need supplies, but first you need toilet paper. And so does everyone else. You have to fight for what's left or you will never wipe again!

Red Planet Farming.description: Become the first Agricultural Director of Mars in Red Planet Farming! This casual strategy game tasks players with producing enough food to feed a growing population of settlers on the red planet.

AdaptaTank.description: A small tank needs to evolve to survive on the battlefield. Follow Hada and Suru on their journey and fight for evolution!

Desert attack.description: It's a first-person shooter, and you're in a military base full of enemies,Players are free to explore the surrounding area,Players can kill enemies or evade enemy attacks,Survive as long as possible.

Two Bit Hero.description: A classic retro metroidvania - retroidvania if you will - with (mostly) black and white graphics. Handcrafted, fast-paced action with multiple endings.

Memory Lane.description: A game that you'll never forget! Memory Lane is a turned based RPG about taking names. Literally.

Tale Of A Wolf.description: Tale Of A Wolf is a story driven, open world wolf adventure, that puts the fate of Sylvanna in your hands.Join forces with nature and expel man!

Outshine.description: Unleash your powers against your oppressors in this arcade, fast-paced typing game. Avoid traps, destroy enemies, defeat bosses to seek your revenge, and rush to the top of the leaderboards.

TinShift.description: Delve into the world of the future, where everyone is out for himself in the humans vs robots stand-off. Pick a traceur, loot an awesome gun, and beat damn machines. Or choose a robot and use his unique skills to get back at those humans for your Boston brothers.

Plunder Pack.description: A rag-tag group of animals makes it their mission to steal from the rich to give to the poor - and it's up to you to plan the heist! Choose your pack of thieves, plunder evil corporations and help the people take back their city.

Jupiter Moons: Mecha.description: Choose your mech, customize your loadout, and build your perfect deck. Experiment with cards to find powerful combinations as you enjoy the tactical combat and deckbuilding in this roguelike adventure!

Tour de France 2020.description: Compete against the peloton in all 21 stages of the Tour de France in the official game! To wear the yellow jersey, you will need to take risks, attack, sprint and perfect your race tactics. Challenge your friends in Downhill or Sprint Challenge mode!

CAGE-FACE | Case 1: The Mine.description: Escape from the mine tunnels while hunted by an unstoppable beast and slowly being affected by a mysterious illness.

Astro Pirates.description: Space pirate co-op hack-and-slash roguelike flight shooter game-description-salad!

Rary.description: Rary - is a casual game in which you play as a bird and the main task is to eat fruits that fall on the playing field and earn points with this. Do not eat mushrooms, monitor the amount of fruit. And how many points can you earn?

RC Flight Simulator 2020 VR.description: Virtual reality and RC airplanes together in this amazing RC Flight Simulator! This is the most epic and realistic radio & remote control simulator in the world! And it is pretty cool, especially in VR!

PhaseWorm.description: PhaseWorm is a fast-paced 2D timing and reflex game built with a speedrunning focus. Players will be challenged to think and act quickly as they push for faster times and more difficult paths through each of the game's 30 unique thematic stages.

Shattered Hourglass.description: A mix between Chrono Trigger, Dragon Quest and Breath of Fire! Shattered Hourglass is a massive Turn-based JRPG filled with challenging bosses, puzzles, secrets, multiple choices, endings and of course, time travel!

Forbidden Pleasure.description: SEXy goddesses, sin and debauchery, desolate lands, magic ...

Guilded.description: Guilded is a procedurally-generated guild management game. Complete quests, make gold, and lead your adventurers as they battle their biggest threat yet - interpersonal conflict!

The Harrowed.description: In a dying land torn asunder by magic, six adventurers find themselves embroiled in the endless dance of order and chaos. A story-driven RPG from Salmon Raws, LLC.

In The Search For : Revenge.description: In The Search For: Revenge is a very short, intentionally unpolished, abstract and odd game with no dialogue and little to no music.

DragonClash Demo.description: In DragonClash, you control a mighty beast of legend, raising a dragon from hatchling to elder wyrm. Become the dragon and conquer all that oppose you in this exciting, single-player card game of strategic dragon combat.

Brass: Birmingham.description: Welcome to the Industrial Revolution! Lead your fast-growing business enterprise, build and develop new industries, multiply your income and don’t get distracted by your rivals. Show everyone you are the real deal!

Silent Santicado.description: Explore a silent, crumbling world in Silent Santicado! A retro journey through a fallen kingdom tainted by lost magic. Explore overgrown ruins, encounter a cast of peculiar characters, and defeat a menagerie of twisted enemies as you search for the source of Santicado's curse.

Blaze.description: Blaze is a 3rd person over the shoulder action adventure game where you a budding fire elemental seek to cleanse your fellow elementals from the corruption of humanity.

Centauri Dominion.description: Centauri Dominion is a top down space shooter set in the Centauri sector where a new colony is being established. There are others arriving seeking to dominate the sector for themselves and will not take no for an answer.

Sonia and the Hypnotic City.description: After receiving reports of a group of criminals using some sort of power to rob an entire city, the church dispatches a Holy Knight named Sonia to investigate the incident.

PulseBall.description: Merging sports with first-person shooters, Pulseball is a fast-paced, competitive multiplayer game. Now with better netcode than Halo Master Chief Collection!

Thief's Roulette.description: Lady Luck has chosen 15 'Thieves' to compete in Thief's Roulette. A game of puzzles and deception with their lives on the line.

Squares.description: Squares is a relaxed multi player game with out any combat and can be played by anyone of any age... meant for 2 or more players

While (You) World.Create().description: Solve puzzles by building different things for your automata! In the end, you will find that it is not just a video game...

Doomsday Hero.description: This is a zombie shooting game, shooting zombies can help you relieve pressure, bring happiness.

悟梦图 Dreaming Atlas.description: 本游戏为roguelike回合制游戏，背景取材于中国古典神话，玩家扮演一位取经人，在完全随机的大地图中冒险，寻求机遇完成任务，提升自己，并管理寺庙，最终取得真经

Siebenstreich's Nerdventure.description: RPG group looking for hero to save Mirrormore realm. Benefits of the job include reasonable work hours, your own towel and a moderate chance of resurrection in the event of your untimely demise. Sign up in this totally awesome indie adventure made with retro-love & free-range pixels.

Wild Russia.description: «Wild Russia» is an open-world horror adventure game. Its action takes place in a striking provincial Russia, and any of your actions or inaction can lead to serious consequences.

BarnFinders: The Pilot.description: Search for valuables stashed in abandoned barns. Take part in storage auctions, bid high and buy yourself a chance to find exclusive items hidden in the past.

Fly You Fly.description: Fly You Fly is a retro-styled v-scroller. Your mission is to find new homes for the Hugo family. They will have to travel far so make sure to keep your flies from starving while also avoiding all the obstacles and dangers ahead.

Juiced!.description: Embark on an epic journey through exotic worlds to uncover the mystery of the magic crystals! An exciting retro platform adventure in the nostalgic style of the 90's DOS platformers

Colorful Snake.description: This is an alternative game. The protagonist has unlimited interest in five colors from the beginning of nothingness, thus starting an incredible magical journey.what else can you find? What are you waiting for? Hurry to start the mysterious adventure!

Party Crasher Simulator.description: Join the wildest party of the year! If crashing parties is your greatest passion, then this game is definitely for you. Step into the shoes of a young man who has no mercy for party people and become famous as the King of Party Crashing!

PiLKO.description: Pilko is a simple and fun platform game starring a skilled ball in search of gems.

Ultimate Chess.description: Play chess against yourself or a friend

Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout.description: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout is a mix of every game you love from the SNES, GENESIS and PS1 eras, with a carefully built narrative and art style. It is a charming JRPG about friendship and courage in a dystopian context with new varied mechanics.

Business Shark.description: You will have to develop your city, watch over expenses, strive for higher tax revenues, meet the needs of your residents by producing the right products for them

Box Voyage.description: Looking for a break in the monotony from the comfort of your desk? Box Voyage is a casual adventure experience where you get to explore a state of the art cruise ship and take advantage of its amenities. Find hidden trophies and wrap up your mandatory vacation since you won't get overtime!

String Tyrant.description: String Tyrant is a survival horror game where you must look, think, hide, and if necessary, fight your way out of a mysterious mansion filled with monsters and traps.

CONSCRIPT.description: During the First World War, a lone French soldier must navigate twisted trenches, scavenge for limited supplies and solve complex puzzles - all whilst fighting for survival in the midst of mankind’s most brutal and horrifying conflict. CONSCRIPT is a new take on classic survival horror.

COVID: The Outbreak.description: COVID: The Outbreak is a real-time strategy game in which you play the role of a global organization that has to deal with a global pandemic. Issue decrees, manage resources, develop projects, and construct buildings. A race for the vaccine begins!

qubo.description: qubo is a minimalist puzzle game that challenges you to reimagine space and perspective

Ready? Set. Haiya!.description: Ready? Set. Haiya! is a fighting-styled rhythm game, where players follow on-screen commands and try to time them as perfectly as they can, to try and beat their opponents to the beat in this epic groovy showdown.

BROTHER!!! - Hardcore Platformer.description: The legendary game is now on Steam! Can you prove that you are a good player, go through a difficult path and save your brother? This challenge is not for wimps!

Ultimate Fluid.description: Ultimate Fluid is an interactive 3D live wallpaper. You can control and interact Stunning Fluid Effects with your mouse on your desktop. Smooth and realistic fluid effects can let you relax.

CodeWalker.description: CodeWalker™ is a developer’s tool that allows users to view Source Code as graphical trees in a color-coded logic hierarchy. It features 2D and 3D graphical interfaces that allow a programmer to quickly understand unfamiliar code, debug, and optimize software.

Suli Fallen Harmony.description: Welcome on Harmony ! Here, on this island, birds and humans live together in peace. One stormy night, Suli discovers a prophecy that will change his life forever. Explore the island various places, interact with colorful characters, solve many puzzles and bring back peace on Harmony !

Face on Fire.description: Face on Fire is a retro action platformer with 12 playable characters and 100+ levels.

Spooky Chase.description: Get the flags and run from the enemies you create with your previous path!

Jupiter Moons: Mecha - Prologue.description: Prequel to the events of the full game. Choose your mech, customize your loadout, and build your perfect deck. Experiment with cards to find powerful combinations as you enjoy the tactical combat and deckbuilding in this roguelike adventure!

Hylics 2.description: A surreal RPG with a unique graphical style and droll scenario.

Epicinium.description: Epicinium is a strategy game where nature is a finite resource. No need to wait for your move, thanks to fast, simultaneous turns. Your economy and troops are influenced by the environment and increasingly severe weather effects. Is it worth winning a war when you end up conquering dirt and ash?

Neither Day nor Night Demo.description: Neither Day nor Night is a challenging, precision platformer. The Adventure of a girl trying to find her younger sister in a mysterious and bloody world. Use your skills to avoid obstacles, enemies, traps. Make your way through by thinking and doing - exactly in that order!

Internet Court.description: A live-action comedic courtroom thriller, where YOU are the prosecution, defense and the judge!

Mission Biotech.description: Stop the spread of deadly viruses using real biotechnology concepts, procedures and tools.

Fraggin Halls VR.description: A Fast Pace Virtual Reality shooter developed on HTC Vive. The Game is inspired by the ever present close quarters hallway shootouts that exist in virtually every Sci-Fi movie and TV series.

Nevertales: Hearthbridge Cabinet Collect.description: Can you live up to your family’s legacy in time?

The Broston Saga.description: Battle rival gang members, uncover dark government secrets, befriend a talking cat, fight advanced humanoid androids, and go toe to toe against literal gods. Take the role of Tyrone Broston as you attempt to save a crumbling world filled with memes and chaos.

Art of the Rail.description: Spiritual remake of the classic transport tycoon games. Build a profitable transport network and grow your worlds economy, either on your own in singleplayer or in multiplayer whether cooperatively or competitively.

The Battle of Angels.description: The game where you play as an Angel. After watching an event taking place. The Angel will then announce his idea for that event's ending. The demon angel, in contrast, will answer his idea for that same events ending. The winner of the boxing fight will determine the actual ending. Save your people!

Sea Power.description: From the lead designer of Cold Waters, Sea Power lets you control NATO and Warsaw Pact forces in modern naval conflict campaigns. Use your advanced naval weaponry and sensors to respect rules of engagement and defeat the enemy forces in a tense fight for initiative and air/naval supremacy.

Pronty.description: Guide Pronty and its Javelin partner Bront as it defends the once great city of Royla. Explore the deep sea, fight mutant sea creatures, and discover the secrets behind this new Atlantis in this beautiful action-packed adventure.

WhiteLily 2：梦醒少女.description: This is a story-based stealth puzzle game: During the summer, Marie helped her friend Emma manage the store. One day, when a customer left the store, she accidentally left a red book. And behind this red book, there is a distant story and a huge conspiracy...

Daily Wife.description: This is a computer desktop girlfriend, Can be placed on the computer desktop, The character's chest has a physical soft effect, Unlock more game content by improving character attributes !

Let's Learn Korean! Vocabulary.description: Learn over 200 Korean words by completing fun challenges. Unlock mini-games, art and music.

Best Day Ever.description: Play 4 characters, live their unique stories and manage their daily lives to create their best day ever. In this narrative game, your decisions have consequences and change the outcome of the stories.

Borneo: A Jungle Nightmare.description: Borneo: A Jungle Nightmare is an interactive horror graphic adventure, with the direction and script of Ruggero Deodato.Take control of different characters in a desperate expedition to the virgin jungles of Borneo.

Train Station Renovation Demo.description: Welcome to an old, ruined train station. A place that will give you a lot of fun! In Train Station Renovation you play as a renovation company specialized in restoring old and damaged railway stations.

Post Void.description: Post Void is a hypnotic scramble of early first-person shooter design that values speed above all else. Keep your head full and reach the end; Kill what you can to see it mend; Get the high score or try again.

Adrorium.description: Build your ship, defend against drone waves and explore hundreds of sectors filled with stations, asteroids and planets with lots of POIs. The ship systems can be controlled via consoles with several hundred buttons. Craft equipment and blocks, loot the POIs and disabled drones.

Mobocratic.description: Mobocratic – Play as the president of the distant Bear Island where the lives of the citizens are yours to be improved – or destroyed. Lead the nation to prosperity – or witness its downfall!

Active Neurons 2 Demo.description: Active Neurons 2 is a puzzle game in which you have to discover 12 greatest inventions of humanity and reflect on the power of human thought

The Worlds Most Impossible Game.description: The Worlds Most Impossible Game is a third person action game, where you as the player will have to maneuver throughout the course full of obstacles and manage to make it to the end without hitting anything.

World of FUNDO.description: World of FUNDO is a game of learning, adventure and fun where players travel around the globe as a famous scientist or personality visiting landmarks and historic sites such as the White House, Roman Colosseum or Taj Mahal in search of five magical letters, F U N D O.

Virus Kombat.description: A deadly virus is decimating the world's population and you are the only one who can stop this threat. Run around the scene collecting the necessary ingredients to produce the vaccine, after that, eliminate the virus and save the population, can you do it?

Please Hold Me.description: Meet Olivier, your new virtual friend with a lot of issues. He really needs you.

Jericho's Prophecies.description: Jericho's Prophecy is a short kinetic novel about humanity's destiny

TYPICAL RUSSIAN QUARANTINE.description: TYPICAL RUSSIAN QUARANTINE is the story of an ordinary guy named Petya. When the holidays were announced in Russia, he honestly stayed at home, but one day he had to go out for buckwheat and he met people on his way who were frying kebabs...

Briefcase Inc..description: A hardcore precision platformer where you switch between three differently skilled characters to collect briefcases and make your way through levels.

The Ancient Art of Staying Alive.description: An arcade game in which the only goal is to stay alive by making your enemies crash into each other rather than you... which gets difficult as you can have hundreds of enemies homing in on you simultaneously!!

Dwarf Slayer.description: A difficult game about tight movement and strategic play

Godless Tactics.description: Lead an elite strike team through the wars of a reborn civilisation, and decide the fate of humanity through your achievements and choices. Traverse a dynamic war-map, engage in fast, turn-based battles, and explore the world of 2952.

Mad Bulldozer.description: In the game, all kinds of bulldozers can spray flame, avoid or use varieties of props, and run crazily on the floating island of the mines. The player can control the bulldozer and knock the opponent down the floating island through collision. The game supports 1-8 players.

Dingletopia: Nation Under Siege (by Orcs.description: It's a nice sunny day in Dingletopia and Prince Dingle Dorfen and his wise adviser Forlorn Gumpel are slurping up the gorpulsen and planning their next conquest. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when Orcs burst into the lands with rattling sabers.

Operation of North Kingdom.description: Operation of North Kingdom is a retro game style game. This is a combination of arcade and 8 bit game. Player has to fight against N.K army and destroy nuclear weapons facility.

Mosquitoes and zombies.description: You will play as a knight who rides his horse to meet the enemies, and destroys them on his way, using his sharp sword!

Easy puzzle: Landscape.description: This is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture.

I-Exist: Consciousness VR.description: Every song is a world. Every lyric has a life. The worlds first VR concept album.

Advanced creator of labyrinths Demo.description: This game creates several types of 3D mazes. They are random and never repeat.

Way of Boy: Another Way.description: Another Brother, Another Destiny, Another Side, Another Way! Pass the “Other Way of the Boy” playing for the elder brother of the protagonist with completely different outlooks on life and his own way of the opposite person!

血潭江湖百里荣.description: Everyone has a world in mind,and I will tell you mine.

A Day Without Me.description: You just woke up and without knowing it, you were the only person left in the city

Plant Revenge.description: Take revenge for what scientists made with your girlfriend.

Aldroy - Chapter 1.description: Explore mysterious forests full of monsters and spells. Increase your powers in battles. Find new spells and combine them into stronger ones. Use your talent in dealing with the elements and defeat powerful opponents.

Chronac Demo.description: CHRONAC! The roguelike action game where you shoot, slash, blast your way out the facility that created you. Gain powerful upgrades, face unforgiving enemies. Together.

Queens Garden: Sakura Season.description: It's Sakura Season in Japan and the Queen decided to celebrate! Help Queen Ayame and the loyal minister Haruo decorate this exotic Japanese garden in this unique match-3 game!

Daiichi Dash.description: Following the destruction of her hometown by a tsunami and the ensuing nuclear fallout, twelve-year-old Aiko travels to Tokyo to punish those allegedly responsible for her home's destruction.

Awe.description: Your feelings and logic are very important in this game. Feel like a detective in a strange and extremely dangerous place. Investigate the loss of people, simultaneously solving puzzles and trying not to fall into the trap.

Alone Journey.description: Alone Journey is simple casual platformer. Jump to the sky, kill the skeletons, and try not to die

One Try, One Kill.description: One try, one kill - a gory TDS game, in which you must clean the areas of ruthless mercenary. The game is a top-down so you could view the battle situation as it's best.

Watch&Run.description: Learn speedrun mechanics such as moves, glitchs and bugs and exploit them to make the best time possible.

Dreamgate Demo.description: Dreamgate is a unique hardcore mix of deck building card battler, roguelite adventure and RPG. Build your deck, explore the Dreamgate world and defeat fearsome foes!

Witcheye.description: Set off on an adventure as a mild-mannered witch who transforms into a flying eyeball of vengeance after a smarmy knight and wizard steal her spell ingredients.

Home Life Simulator.description: The game will teach you how to stay at home, make trips to the store, use masks and various antiseptics. Buckwheat, toilet paper, masks, city pass..

Cyber Protocol.description: Want to feel like a cyberpunk hacker? Save your friend by beating 100 levels of security system in this hardcore arcade puzzle game.

Flipon.description: Join Kat and her crew in an epic quest in Flipon, a juicy, fun and fast-paced arcade puzzle game!

D-Corp.description: D-Corp is a couch co-op game for up to 4 players. Work together on tasks such as turret maintenance and harvesting natural resources while being under continuous attack by alien cacti!

Noah's Ark.description: Welcome to Noah's Ark, a realistic simulator game inspired by stories from Genesis of the Bible. Now it is time for you to be like Noah and build famous vessel, save (hunt) animals and survive during the biggest flood ever. Are you ready for this challenge?

Bad Run - Turbo Edition.description: Bad Run is a spin-off of Bad Pad, featuring a casual action packed, runner metroidvania platformer.

Gordian Rooms 1: A curious heritage.description: Gordian Rooms: A Curious Heritage is a Victorian escape game, where you solve various puzzles in your late uncle’s mansion in the hope of obtaining his legacy.

Faking to Dance.description: Faking to Dance is a VR music video featuring music from Breaking Forms. Enjoy intense guitar riffs and powerful vocals in a visual feast that is out of this world.

Milk and Cookies.description: An adorable physics puzzle game about reuniting Milk and Cookies!

Depanneur Nocturne.description: A short exploration game about poking around a convenience store and finding a gift with the help of its owner. But sometimes the perfect gift finds you.

Wide Ocean Big Jacket Demo.description: A Camping Story starring: Uncle Brad, Aunt Cloanne, Mord (and Ben)

Bip!.description: Take to the skies with up to three friends for non-stop dogfighting action. Bip! is an original work inspired by the Amiga classic Biplane Duel, designed for the big screen. Fight against each other, singly or in teams, or band together to take on the bot pilots.

Ultimate Racing 2D 2.description: The ultimate top-down racing game is back! Ultimate Racing 2D 2 includes new cars, new tracks, car/track editor, time-trial mode, damage, multi-class racing and more.

Farm Your Friends.description: A fast-paced competitive farming game for up to 8 players online! Sabotage and steal while defending your crops and animals to become the best farmer! Team up with others or play on your own!

Journey to the Place of Tomorrow.description: In JTTPOT, users will experience a series of dreams in virtual reality. There are ten scenes, each of which features an original musical composition supported by simple, surreal imagery and limited casual gameplay. This creates a rich and exciting experience for the user, ideally suited for VR.

In a search of a new home.description: Are you ready to enjoy the adventure of the fox and help him find a home? A lot of different locations, obstacles, enemies, nice music and other bonuses are waiting for you in this platform game!

Geometric Feel the Beats.description: Have fun destroying your enemies in a reinterpretation of games from the 80s! To the sound of a mixture of unique musical genres, complete missions, improve your ship, be precise in your shots. All of this without worrying about GAME OVER! Show the world your score! Competition is what counts here!

Pipe Dream Demo.description: A visual novel dating simulator following Robin as she discovers herself and escapes her mother's shadow. Set in college this otome game features six romanceable characters, but be careful: not everyone has Robin's best interests at heart.

送小鸡回家Send chicken home.description: This is a 3D sketch style game. Players need to find chickens and send them home. In the middle of the game, they encounter some obstacles and enemies. Players need to resolve them through props or operation skills.

ロストカラーズ／再装版 / LOSTCOLORS.description: A world without color "Lost Colors". In order to get rid of the evil that has befallen him, Real travels back and forth between worlds of color, solving the mysteries of the world.

不思議の鎮守府.description: [/h2] The world's first Azululene derivative game! [/h2]Easy roguelike RPGNovel part with serious and conversational drama

Desktop Kanojo.description: This is a desktop mascot that can be placed anywhere on your desktop to bring more fun to your desktop

Batu Ta Batu.description: Batu Ta Batu is a colorful tile puzzle game from one up to four players. Slide, combine and match the tiles of the same color through hundreds of levels and several game modes!

ER Pandemic Simulator.description: See what it's like to work at a Hospital Emergency Ward when a pandemic attacks the whole world. Become a doctor: help patients, diagnose them and save their lives. At the same time, try to keep your own.

Ultreïa.description: A little robot becomes a pilgrim and crosses a wild post-apocalyptic world to find the meaning of life.

东方幻灵录~Touhou Hakanai Cards.description: Touhou Hakanai Cards is an autochess-like leisure game, includes different styles and distinct characteristics roles, you can use these distinctive characters to organize your own team. Structure you battle economics and use the varied and graceful character cards to fight!

YoloMouse.description: Use YoloMouse to change those obscure game cursors. Never lose your cursor in a heated battle again!

Retro Ride.description: A musically interwoven driving arcade game. Fast paced Audio visualization YouTube integration Beat songs to compete on leaderboards and earn credit to buy new cars.

Awaken The Time.description: One entity different bodies, different time zones, one storyline but different background stories in different time periods.

Dissection.description: I don’t remember how I got into this house. I only know that I need to quickly find a way out. Something terrible is walking around the house and looking for me.

Legion Gold.description: Well-received by gamers and critics alike, Legion Gold is the expanded and improved version of its predecessor, Legion, and includes not only the original Legion game but a hefty expansion pack too.

HookShotVR.description: In the "HookShotVR", let's fly around 3D space with fictional movement item "HookShot". Challenge that how fast you can clear the stages.

Amy's Greenmart.description: Diving into the story of Amy’s Greenmart, you are to open the network of eco-friendly shops! Amy’s Greenmart is a time management game that gives you a chance to feel the atmosphere of eco-friendly shops network. Become a part of the story of Amy and Napoleon The Cat.

Sclash.description: Sclash is a plug’n play 2D samurai fighting game full of tension where one hit is enough to kill. Play as a hand-drawn samurai in beautiful painted settings and fight your opponent in epic solemn duels where each move matters. Manage well your stamina, breath and take your time to land a deadly hit.

Dangerous Plane.description: The stalactites you do not crash will earn you points. Each score you earn will prove how good your reflexes are. You have to go through the space between the stalactites.

Danger Zombies.description: Put down all the zombies coming towards you! Collect points. A zombie game that won't tire you on quarantine days.

The Planet Crafter.description: A space survival open world terraforming crafting game. Transform the ecosystem of a hostile planet to make it livable for humans. Survive, collect, build your base then create oxygen, heat and pressure to make a brand new biosphere.

Puzzle Dungeon.description: Test your mental arithmetic, language and cognitive abilities while you adventure through Puzzle Dungeon in an attempt to retrieve the fabled Hypercube.

Sclash Demo.description: Sclash is a plug’n play 2D samurai fighting game full of tension where one hit is enough to kill. Play as a hand-drawn samurai in beautiful painted settings and fight your opponent in epic solemn duels where each move matters. Manage well your stamina, breath and take your time to land a deadly hit.

Movie World.description: In Movie World you can build your own movie studio. Produce entertaining and glamorous movies. Research new technologies to keep up with the industry. Expand into series, compete with other studios, receive the awards, create franchises and prevail in the movie business.

Black Book: Prologue.description: Take a peek into the haunting and mysterious world of Slavic mythos in Black Book: Prologue - a vital chapter in the story of Vasilisa, a young sorceress. Travel across the rural countryside as you aid commonfolk and battle evil forces, using a card-based combat system.

Apprentice Knight-Iona.description: Take up the mantle of an Apprentice Knight Iona in this Action-RPG game on her quest to be part of the Brave Hero’s Party. Failing the knighthood examination, you must now train with your master to prove yourself worthy.

Ball of Doom.description: Roll, bounce, and destroy your way through an expansive world packed with over 27,000 destructible objects. Unlock hidden skins, set a new highscore, and crush everything standing in your way. With one life per run, each rampage could end at any moment.

King of Spies.description: “King of Spies” is a political spy-thriller visual novel and yuri dating sim. You play as Kelly Bond, a former USAF Intelligence Officer turned political espionage specialist.

漏气宝大冒险 Balloon Man Adventure.description: 《Balloon Man Adventure》 is a parkour game

Alien Harvest Leader.description: Build and defend your base using your flying saucer to gather resources. Utilize your workers, research new technology, and rare equipment to improve your capabilities and keep your base stocked with treasures.

Pipe Dream.description: A visual novel dating simulator following Robin as she discovers herself and escapes her mother's shadow. Set in college this otome game features six romanceable characters, but be careful: not everyone has Robin's best interests at heart.

Nazi Labs.description: Nazi Labs is a twin-stick top-down action rogue-like game with a random level generator and cumulative power- ups, art and sprites based on the golden age of arcade games with many references to all sci- fi / nerd-universe, classic arcade games with dark theme focused on Nazi secrets and legends.

VBOX Sim.description: Analyze race data and video from your favourite racing game using Circuit Tools - the tool of choice for professional racing drivers in the real world!

soundStrider.description: Enter a synthesized reality. Explore endless worlds. Play an instrument. Save bookmarks. A psychedelic audio exploration game, walking simulator, music generator, and relaxation tool best experienced with headphones.

Euphoria: Supreme Mechanics.description: The ability to discern hidden connections is both a gift and a curse. The covert mechanisms of reality do not reveal themselves to any and all, and there is a price to pay for this knowledge…

The Odd Neon Void.description: The Odd Neon Void is an experimental Adventure/RPG game where you become Jack, a man stuck in a strange and unfamiliar place called the neon void. Don't be too sad.

Seconds in Space Demo.description: Use ships to attack and destroy enemy space stations in real time.  Navigate through different randomly setup star maps to get to the exit and win.  It's a 2D single player space game that's massively replayable.

Minimalist Space War.description: A minimalist retro space shooter. Challenging, fast, and fun game play

Azure.description: A final project of my college freshman year. Just jump and dash and have fun.

Run!!!.description: This game is cool! You can parkour while you run from enemy, and if you escape, you win.

Frog Bath.description: Bathe your Frog King by jumping, hopping and tonguing yourself around maps in Frog Bath with the goal of beating your friends at giving His Cleanliness a bath! Spit and steal bath items from your friends to give the best bath possible to the Frog King.

Legends of the Brawl.description: Beat up some baddies, grab loot and occasionally punch your buddies in quick co-op mission games with classic action platforming gameplay. Complete quests to collect rewards and materials, upgrade your legends, and create new strategies to battle nightmares all over the world.

Game-Kun: Input Challenge.description: Game-Kun: Input Challenge is a reaction-based hiscore mini game. Test your reflexes and input skills with your gamepad. Unlock skins and other characters to enhance the fun! Can you reach the final level and compete for the ultimate hiscore?

Color Crush Demo.description: Color Crush is a match 3 game. Swap and match the shapes. Solve the levels making smart moves.

Captive.description: You wake up in a bright, but mysterious room. You don't know what is happening or how you got there.

Music_is_the_Language.description: Music is The Language is a VR music video featuring a new song by DJ Dani Magnani. Explore a mystical planet, following the surround beat of trumpets, voice, and guitars, in this surreal experience.

Cube Miners.description: Kill enemies while trying to earn cash!

Dangerous Lands 2 - Evil Ascension.description: In this action game, you join the dark side to bring prosperity in the evil ascension.

COVID-19 (CORONA VIRUS).description: Do you have what it takes to perform everyday tasks and curve balls life gives you to survive this quarantine? If you do you will get out this quarantine successfully and life will go back to normal.

Grey Skies: A War of the Worlds Story.description: Based on the great work of H.G. Wells, explore the English countryside and encounter iconic concepts such as Black Smoke, Red Weed and of course the almighty Fighting Machine and it's Heat Ray!

The Employee.description: You are the employee. You applied for a job offer as a web developer in a big company. What could go wrong? Do you think you would make a good employee? Not ready to work and show motivation? Then you can stay unemployed, punk!

The Legend of Cesar.description: A super fun game made by just one person, your goal is to kill as many zombies as you can and try to survive in the forest that surrounds you.

Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh.description: Embark on a perilous journey to find your missing friends while battling multiple unknown threats as Thedo, as well as enroll in an elitist school dedicated to Raiken slaying as you try and find your way back home as Aionis.

Epic Dumpster Bear 2.description: His forest was destroyed by corporate greed, now it's Dumpster Bear's turn for vengeance. Epic Dumpster Bear 2 is an action packed platformer with gameplay that harkens back to the glory days of 16-bit platformers.

Impact.description: Venture through a visually striking world filled with darkness, danger, and surprises around every corner. You take on the role of a loader robot in a long abandoned factory who is awakened by chance. Make your way through series of puzzles and platforms in a world now covered in darkness.

MaryPark St..description: MaryPark St. is a short story telling indie game, set in a black and white dream-like world. Featuring two interpretations of the same story, The Dream & The Nightmare.

Super Bounce Ball.description: Bounce balls and collect star on the platform, easy in early levels, but gets harder. There will be rotating saws that move which you must avoid. Shooting turrets that fire bullets that you need to dodge.

Ash of Legends Demo.description: Grapple around, build towers, place traps, and use weapons, to defend objectives from hordes of the evil empire. Includes native Oculus and Steam VR support. Story coming soon.

pilapa BOOM.description: Pilapa BOOM is an extremely lightweight mini game. Players can shoot bullets to detonate the bombs and trigger a chain of explosions to open the path to the end. There is almost no learning cost, and you can play it right away.

Suspicious Spaceroads.description: Partake in a platforming romp through a series of increasingly suspicious space roads, engage in futile questions like why are these roads hanging in space? Who built them? Why am I platforming here?

Second Star.description: Embark on an interstellar role-playing adventure 200 years in the future as you follow the footsteps of a missing ship and her crew.

Advanced creator of labyrinths.description: This game creates several types of 3D mazes. They are random and never repeat.

Half-Life: Restored.description: Previously known as Restore-Life, Half-Life: Restored is a fan made modification for Half-Life. This modification will stretch your Half-Life experience with unused, cut and retail version content from original game.

Furry Shakespeare: Emperor Penguin Lear.description: Rewrite Shakespeare's King Lear. But with animals and dinosaurs and stuff.

3D Jigsaw Puzzle Simulator.description: A demo game about assembling puzzles in 3D space. You can load any picture for assembly from your computer and select any level from the pause menu.

LowPolis.description: Build, advance, reshape! For all those who have missed relaxing strategy classics. LowPolis is a friendly-paced city builder game where you become the ruler of a rising community. Begin with a handful of resources and pave your way to a truly majestic kingdom!

Start! Heart Thief！.description: Our heroine ruby is an orphan, Every morning, she goes out to explore the secret island of God Every night, she put on her nightdress

Micro Platformer.description: A minimalistic platformer with a 1x1 tileset. No enemies, no bullets, no lasers. Just sheer platforming.

Burn Me Twice.description: A narrative adventure that combines the exploration and investigation of the enigmatic town of Düstenburg and its people, with trials that test your knowledge about the case.

ROBALL.description: Space shooter on your own drone. Various types of weapons. Every man for himself.

Neighbours back From Hell.description: There goes the neighborhood! Play the star of a cheeky TV Show who taking revenge on his horrible neighbor by constantly pranking him at home and around the world in the most creative and ludicrous ways.

Team up with A Magician.description: The orc magician who came down from the sky ended my lonely life. However, my peaceful daily life was also disturbed.

Devolverland Expo.description: Devolverland Expo is a first-person 'marketing simulator' set within an abandoned convention center after the annual Devolver Digital game expo was mysteriously canceled.

Autopsy Simulator.description: Autopsy Simulator is a first-person horror-sim hybrid where players take on the role of a practice pathologist and study case files, created in collaboration with real-world forensic doctors, to help guide their dissection of anatomically accurate bodies to determine each subject’s cause of death.

Center2048.description: The game needs to be rebuilt and will be temporarily removed. It will be relaunched in about a year. Thank you for your attention.

Audio Party Pack.description: A party game designed around sound. Includes 3 mini-games featuring "sound" focused gameplay!This party game is designed with visual impairments in mind as it relies strongly on sound. There are three mini-games, each focusing on a different challenge.

Coof Attack.description: Defend your toilet paper from an ever-growing angry mob! Even the odds by teaming up with friends in up to 4-player co-op. Customise your character's appearance and skills to fit your play-style. Discover more as you progress and unlock even cooler stuff.

Coward.description: A man desperate for life, choose to jump to end his life. The soul of suicide is imprisoned in the dark house. He has to escape from the devil and save the souls of other suicides in order to survive for 5 days.

My Sail And My Sea.description: Half sandbox navigation game, including construction, exploration, trade, operation and other elements, combined with instant combat and round game.In addition, the game also has a built-in blueprint editor, which can use cubes to stack everything and share with each other.

BE-A Walker Demo.description: Take control of a huge mech on an alien planet! Shoot and trample the natives, avenge your brother, or forgive his killers? Join the rebels to restore peace on the exotic planet of Eldorado.

我是熊孩子.description: 今天天气好晴朗~~ 熊孩子又出门玩啦~~ 前面有个人~~ 捉弄一下他~~ 哈哈哈哈来追我呀~~

A Painter's Tale : Curon, 1950.description: “A Painter's Tale” is an adventure game that tells the story of the tiny Südtirol village of Curon Venosta by mixing reality and fiction. The old Curon was flooded by the waters of Lake Reschen in 1950 due to the construction of a dam. What lies beneath the bell tower still emerging from the lake?

SpinZap.description: SpinZap is a challenging game in classic arcade style. Use your reflexes, dexterity and boss skills to conquer 81 levels of circle zapping madness.

Fighting Fiends.description: Fighting Fiends is a top-down fighting game. Play it 1 on 1 for intense matches or with up to 4 players for chaotic fun, both locally and online.

Tales of Kongfu.description: 游戏题材来源于中国武侠，采用类似杀戮尖塔的卡组构建玩法，并从格斗游戏当中获取灵感，游戏每张卡牌都代表一个招式，每个招式又分解为多个动作，这部分我是基于现实格斗当中，游戏采用一个动作一结算的方式，只有当你的招式完全行动完成后才会拥有使用下一张牌的机会。招式的动作分为四种攻击防御破绽警惕。游戏采用灵活的连招系统，只要两个招式间首尾有重叠，则可以省略前一个招式的重叠部分。玩家需要利用这项设定让自己的破绽尽量小，并且尽量利用对手的破绽。

Hunter of the Disowned.description: Hunter Of The Disowned is a procedural dungeon adventure video game in which you embody a tragic hero who must fight against destiny in a world ruled by Gods of nature an slaved animals.

BitBattle.description: BitBattle is a 2D multiplayer action shooter. Zero Aim, 100% Bullet Hell! Collect Weapons and Items and fight against friends or other players. You also can race in our FunRun Mode. But be carefull, its not easy!

YouCanDoIt?.description: Try to clear the game How to play is simple. You can move the chicken to the target point. Drag with the mouse to jump the chicken. Feel the annoyance starting from scratch Sometimes you can get angry while playing this game.

Red Ronin Demo.description: Red Ronin is a Turn-based but fast paced dash 'n slash game where a bloodthirsty ronin and her companion bot search for revenge.

180 Files: The Aegis Project.description: Uncover a web of evil as a superspy! Break rules, break hearts–don't break cover.

180 Files: The Aegis Project Demo.description: Uncover a web of evil as a superspy! Break rules, break hearts–don't break cover.

Woodsalt.description: "Woodsalt" is an adventure game set on the planet of Nu-Terra, 1000 years after Earth was evacuated during chaotic natural disasters and an attack by giant creatures.

Swords of Time.description: A colorful fantasy world threatened by dark forces is in danger. Help defeat the threat with your allies and companions who join you on the way. This game allows deep character development that progresses with classes, skills, permanent huntings stats, equipment and more.

Loop Hero.description: The Lich has thrown the world into a timeless loop and plunged its inhabitants into never ending chaos. Wield an expanding deck of mystical cards to place enemies, buildings, and terrain along each unique expedition loop for the brave hero.

CNDL.description: CNDL is an IES lighting creation toolset. Create custom IES files for your renders and video games in minutes.

Virtual Presenter Pro.description: Virtual Presenter Pro is a VR game designed to make you a better public speaker without leaving your home. Hone your speaking skills by using our in-depth analysis to incrementally improve your presentations.

Battle for the Kingdom.description: Top down card based medieval strategy game about map control.

Haunted by Evil.description: Creepy nightmares becoming a reality and making Patrick’s life (a usual IT-developer) full of trials. What’s that: creepy horror or usual schizophrenia? You have to solve the mystery and make a move to unravel the mysterious events and issues surrounding Patrick’s life.

PUZZL.description: PUZZL is a puzzle game with simple gameplay and increasing difficulty. With a minimalist and pleasant look, have fun solving it's 50 levels.

Space Mouse 2.description: In 1981, Geimu Kyoujin's masterpiece "Space Mouse" was released. 39 years later, a sequel has arrived. In "Space Mouse 2", you'll enter a perilous underground labyrinth. This is a roguelike dot-eater designed to appeal to players of all skill levels.

The Roaring Empire.description: How about entering an epic and fantastic medieval world than you've ever seen before. In the legendary world of The Roaring Empire, you can talk to dragons, charm and guide your adventure with countless characters. Add a new color of RPG with this game.

Hi-Score Boi.description: This is a clicking journey where you, the gamer set out to achieve the highest score and become the ultimate gamer!

Tree Simulator 2021.description: Wood you like marginally improved graphics? Do you like leafing it all behind and taking root in some random field? If so, you are a tree, be the best tree you can be. Prepare for a deeper and more detailed understanding of what it is to be a tree. A true work of art.

Escape Initiative.description: Run, jump, and shoot lasers in this difficult and aesthetic action precision platformer. Built for fast play but not required, you will enjoy hand built levels with an immense variety of challenges. Customize your colors and realize your initiative. ESCAPE.

A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog.description: "A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog" is a virtual reality adventure in which you go on a search for the inhabitants of the valley, who have disappeared since a mysterious fog appeared in their homeland. Help the little rabbit by completing the story around the charismatic characters of the valley.

Fires At Midnight.description: In a world where making love without being in love makes you spontaneously combust, the person you love most may be the one who burns you in Fires at Midnight – a cinematic and interactive visual novel about a couple who struggles to stay together.

Drawing Machine.description: Drawing Machine is an implementation of Durer's drawing machine that helps a non-artist draw pictures. In turn, these pictures can be used to create any type of graphic, web, video, or gaming application. "Divide and Conquer" applied to drawing.

The Test: Hypothesis Rising.description: The second chapter in The Test trilogy. Answer a series of in-depth questions to reveal hidden truths about yourself and unlock secrets to discover how your life can change drastically with just a few, slight modifications. ...But are you sure you want the answers you seek?

DEEMO -Reborn-.description: DEEMO -Reborn- is Rayark's classic game DEEMO, reborn in a whole new way on Steam. The fully 3D immersive journey will intoxicate you with the elegant sounds produced by you on the piano, as well as with the adventures you discover in this fairytale world.

Scooty Shooty.description: Retro 3D hover tank maze combat with friends and bots

泡泡三国.description: 《泡泡三国》是一款基于三国题材的2D消除类游戏，游戏包含多个关卡。卡通的游戏画面设计，动态的视觉效果和丰富的技能选择，让玩家体验一种不一样的消除游戏。

节奏快打/Rhythm Fighter Demo.description: This is a Roguelike Horizontal Action game that players need to follow the beat to defeat opponents. Beat to follow, fist to the bone. Face the foe, and dance to kill!

Stilstand.description: A dark, whimsical, and absurd interactive comic by artist Ida Hartmann, exploring the despair and loneliness of a young woman living alone through a long summer in Copenhagen.

GraFi Easter.description: GraFi Easter - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, easter eggs and changing gravity.

3ZENTREE - 3D NODE BASED INFORMATION SYS.description: 3ZENTREE is a 3d interactive node based information system. It could help you collect ideas, build a global map between information, trigger more creatives.

Prisme 7.description: The first video game on modern and contemporary art. Produced by Centre Pompidou.

Cards & Crystals.description: Match3 meets Trading Card Game! Collect cards, level up your heroes, and build decks to defeat your foes in this fast-paced puzzle/strategy game.

Woody Chopper.description: In Woody Chopper you help Woody chop down the endless tree on his way to becoming a lumberjack millionaire. Whether in spring, summer, autumn or winter, it's the perfect casual game for in-between. Now with Achievements! Play Woody Chopper today and help Woody get the legendary axe.

House of Fear.description: Night. An abandoned dilapidated cabin in the woods. Cobwebs in the corners, dust on the floor, dilapidated furniture and... not a single living soul. Are you ready to conquer your fears and delve into the secrets of this murky place?

Dead of Winter.description: Build, gather and defend against relentless hordes of undead as you lead your villagers to safety and battle for survival in a world plunged into a seemingly endless winter

Sheepo.description: Explore a strange planet, collect the creatures you find, and then shape-shift into them to expand your world. Build your own path, chat with the locals, and discover the planets sprawling secrets in this quirky metroidvania platformer.

Samsara Room.description: You woke up in a mysterious room you have never seen before. Can you find another way out? Samsara Room is a remake of the praised predecessor of the Rusty Lake & Cube Escape series.

Reflections of Life: Utopia Collector's.description: Can you escape a utopian toy world before it’s too late?

Project Canopy.description: Project Canopy is a first person sci-fi survival adventure set on an alien jungle planet. Harvest, Build, Craft and Explore the different biomes among massive trees, plants, and hostile creatures to survive and unlock the mysteries of the jungle.

Frogsong.description: A heartfelt adventure where it's okay to be small.

Iron Reckoning.description: Become a warrior in this sci-fi/fantasy adventure! Iron Reckoning showcases a unique movement mechanic that will test your skill in preserving airborne momentum. Wield a variety of powers and master the combat to defeat your enemies, as you uncover the mystery behind a deadly machine threat!

Catovania.description: This is a game about a cat who fights with enemies. 2D platformer is made in a retro style.

CoronaFighter.description: A coronavirus-themed shoot-em-up in the classic arcade tradition.

Saint Lary's Hospital - Ay Corona!.description: Play as saint Lary as you battle an outbreak at St. Lary's hospital. Be careful though as patients are always trying to get your attention by coughing at you. The more unruly patients have also been hiding toilet paper around the hospital.

Apocalypse Survivor.description: Apocalypse Survivor is a challenging first-person shooter (FPS), set after a nuclear war.

Rust Raiders.description: Become a robot pirate captain in this roguelike deckbuilding game and defeat the evil Captain LeCrank. Forge cards to improve their power, augment your ship with gadgets and build your own Deck! Experience the unique card system crafted exclusively for Rust Raiders.

Good Knight.description: You run around in circles and start yelling like an idiot due to rage, fun, BUTTCLENCH, and triumph in this rhythm game-influenced game. One-Button Rage-Puzzle Hell made for everyone! Journey to hell in this dark love letter to Filipino horror, culture, and history. It's also the PHVTUBERS fav game!

DØM RUSALOK.description: Russia in the ‘90s. A provincial town at the edge of the crumbling Soviet Empire. A group of kids faces the disturbing horror they are unable to comprehend – the DØM RUSALOK. This is a place where the worst nightmares come true.

Fire for Effect Demo.description: Fight off a seemingly endless rain of bombardment and cover an evacuation effort with the meager defenses of the besieged cities and your surprisingly potent gun

Krystopia: Nova´s Journey Demo.description: In the role of space explorer Nova Dune, the player needs to observe the environment and navigate in a typical point and click-fashion to solve puzzles and progress through the game and figure out the mystery on the mesmerizing planet of Krystopia.

Chesscake.description: Classic board game in a computer version. A variant of English drafts. The goal of the game is to collect all enemy checkers.

The Night is Grey.description: Graham is alone in a forest filled with strange wolves. While he’s fleeing for his life he finds a lost girl in an abandoned lodge that won’t survive without his help. Try to find their way to safety in this game filled with puzzles, engaging dialogue and innovative storyline.

Kirakira stars project Nagisa.description: "You're the idol you used to sing to on stage?
