" After their first live performance, Nobuyuki and Ai have a fateful encounter with the top idol, Nagisa Yukihiro. While getting involved with Nagisa through joint lessons, it is decided that an idol festival - DivaFes - will be held, but...

God-Machine.description: Prepare for a mix of endurance-combat and arcade shooting game. Play against dangerous robots, cyborgs, and mutants, in rogue-like arenas that evolves as you fight. Are you brave and skilled enough to endure?

Bird Missions.description: Live the life of your bird reigning in the air! Find one by one all the hidden pieces on each map and unlock new territories!

Beyond Solar.description: Beyond Solar is a bullet hell / SHMUP pixel art game. You play the protagonist “Gravity” a space ship pilot who grew up in the space colony “ARD”, humanity last hope and shelter as planet Earth was on the brink of extinction.

Oh Frog.description: Oh Frog is a loopy 2D action adventure game set in the mysterious, fairy tale-esque lands of the Frog Kingdom. Play as Lif, the Frog Kingdom’s bravest frog, as you travel through gorgeous, lovingly hand-drawn landscapes and animated worlds, on your quest to recover the stolen Crowns of Power!

The Dark Pictures Anthology: House of As.description: At the close of the Iraq War, Special Forces hunting for weapons of mass destruction unearth something far deadlier – a buried Sumerian temple containing a nest of unearthly creatures. To survive the night below, they must forge a brotherhood with their enemies from the world above.

Zen Universe.description: Explore а bundle of 4 real-life and legendary locations - shot, scanned, and hand-polished into realistic interactive environments. Early Access includes 2 experiences and 2 more will be updated for free.

HEX Hacking Simulator.description: Use your communication skills to bypass internet security measures,and successfully hack into the most secure banks. Choose to take on the role as Hacker, taking direction to disarm each protocol; or Control, and relay instructions to your partner.

Medic: Pacific War.description: Become a Medic - a true war hero. Survive the horror of the Pacific Front where bombs fall from the sky and rifle bullets cut the air. You are the last hope of your wounded companions. Your decisions will change the course of the battle, but not all of them will be easy to make!

Unreal Paris.description: Unreal Paris is an update of the interactive experience working with VR Headsets & Desktop computer. This scene is an architectural visualization using Unreal Engine 4.

80S escape.description: This is a first person shooting game,The player is a pathfinder soldier, who is free to explore the surrounding area to collect intelligence,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, so as to ensure that the health value can survive for as long as possible.

Hard Vacuum.description: Hard Vacuum is a single-player space combat game developed from the ground up for virtual reality. Be the pilot of a starfighter with a fully interactive cockpit.

Interstate Drifter 2000.description: Drift through the interstates and sideroads of this open game world, win street races and try to avoid traffic and police.

Pay Me In Colors.description: Pay Me In Colors is a 2D platformer game with multiple mechanics, six different worlds and over 40 challenging levels. Face meteors, gravity changing, spikes falling and missiles coming in your direction while you try to recover the colors back to your world. A game inspired by the classics of the past.

Polarities.description: Want to battle your friends and family in a high paced, action packed local multiplayer brawler? Then get ready to duke it out using magnetic powers in Polarities!

Finding Brenda.description: Finding Brenda - Episode 1 is the first part of the episodic 3D point-and-click adventure. You slip into the role of Harold! One day he finds out that his wife Brenda wasn't just going to the supermarket - she was kidnapped! The human rebels are on the rise!

Train Station Renovation - First Job.description: Welcome to the prologue to Train Station Renovation. This is where you will learn and teach how to renovate these small and the largest train stations in the world.

Murk.description: Your goal is to escape from this strange, hostile and really dark place. Don't be afraid of the dark, kill your enemies without mercy, cautiously avoid death traps, discover quirky secret places, and much more!

Thrice in a row.description: Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses. There are 28 different levels available.

My Sweet Confession.description: The hapless, love-struck Ichika made a big mistake, and she might have ruined her friendship with Hana forever. With the help of her classmate Ayumi, can she work her own feelings out in time to show Hana how she really feels? A soft, comedic romance with big personalities and a tinge of melodrama.

Modiverse.description: An open multiplayer sandbox game; includes tools, props, levels, NPCs, character models, game-modes and much more! Make your own using our mod kit!

Pro Strategy Football 2021.description: [NOT THE LATEST VERSION!! See Pro Strategy Football 2022]

Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and Adults - Eur.description: Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and Adults - Europe Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and Adults - Europe is designed for adults and for kids.

The Shadow Government Simulator.description: A turn-based strategy game where you lead a secret society towards world domination. Investigate the influential and convert them to your faction via bribery, seduction and intimidation. Reshape society's power structures to fend off rival societies and the world's nations in your quest for power.

The Walking Fish 2: Final Frontier.description: The Walking Fish returns, this time in space, in an all-new fish comedy horror experience. Stuck on a space station, you have to solve the mystery of the Walking Fish, and escape its terror.

Task Force Admiral.description: Experience the thrill of leading American aircraft carriers to victory in this innovative full 3D command simulation wargame set in the Pacific in 1942. First-person or God’s eye, you lead your fleet and planes right from the center of the battle.

Lammana.description: Journey to Lammana, through the historic 'found footage' of William H Boston. Explore the cursed island off Cornwall's coast. Retrace the steps of a young man who disappeared in 1924. 'Play through' surviving footage to discover a dark mystery involving treasure, exploration and sea monsters.

Fatum Betula.description: Placed in a world without change, you must create fate by watering an ancient plant. Determine a future and live with it.

Therapy Sheep.description: Roam free through a mountainside meadow modeled after the Swiss Alps. Rolling hills and tall grass rustle with the wind as you walk alongside friendly grazing sheep, who are happy to have your company. Escape reality to meditate, work on your mindfulness, or just lie down and look at the stars.

Lucky Heroes.description: Find A SINGLE CARD which leads you to the victory. Lucky Heroes is a very simple and easy card game. Explore and manipulate decks with 20 unique characters.

Pandemic Crisis.description: In the event of a global pandemic, would your first priority be preserving lives or saving the economy?

New Yankee 8: Journey of Odysseus.description: Once again, Mary shatters the boundaries of time and space as she's practicing magic and sends herself and her husband, John, reeling back in time. They land on the outskirts of Troy, where they help the Greek hero Odysseus triumph in the legendary battle.

PLOID SAGA.description: Ploid is a new platform adventure game for old or modern hardware, play and explore the lost temples, gain sacred disc files and become the ultimate Ploid X of the galaxy! + V.O.I.D. Definitive Edition

INVASION.description: INVASION is a game about heroes who are fighting an invasion of wild animals that has hit their village.

Moolii's Dreamland.description: Help Moolii on her nightmare of the forest! Use claws and bullets and dodge in the roguelite bullet-hell where all Moolii's cuttie friends become Mobs and Bosses! Collect and upgrade bullets to help Moolii!

Infernal Radiation (Demo).description: The reactor of a power plant generating energy from hellfire breaks out. Devilish radiation causes numerous possessions among nearby residents. An exorcist comes to the rescue.

Color Crush.description: Color Crush is a match 3 game. Swap and match the shapes. Solve the levels making smart moves.

Defense high.description: In the peaceful land invaded by an unknown enemy, the hordes monster cities are being stormed. Only You can stop the aggressor!

Toasty: Ashes of Dusk.description: Learn who you truly are! Stop the cataclysm and save your friends in the Action RPG Toasty Ashes of Dusk!

Through the Nightmares Demo.description: The atmospheric hardcore action platformer about the Sandman wandering the world of children's nightmares. You will have to find and rescue the children from the trap of the almighty Morpheus, by overcoming all their fears.

Race Project.description: Win or loose, it's easy! The rules are simple, be the first who crosses the finish line or survive. Believe me, don't trust anyone!

Rollercoaster Mechanic.description: In Rollercoaster Mechanic, you save destroyed and broken funfairs. A small company, two brothers Leo and Noah, each with different skills and a great challenge: starting up broken rollercoasters and other attractions. Diagnose damage, repair, clean, test.

Cyber Quest 2077.description: Earth has fallen to COVID-2077. Your mission: Rescue your fellow survivors throughout the universe.

Little Robot Stories.description: Little robots have stories. Follow a little robot as it explores the city, makes friends, and has fun... and pizza. Little robots like pizza.

Mariachi Undead Demo.description: Mariachi Undead is a hand drawn, rhythm, cover based shoot-em-up, action side scrolling platformer where you can even play with a guitar and controller at the same time.

Drekirokr - Dusk of the Dragon.description: A classic-inspired RPG set in a post-apocaliptic world.

Lovely Goddess.description: Super easy to really hard to solve puzzles. It's your choice.

Buddy Simulator 1984 Demo.description: Thanks to next generation AI technology, BUDDY SIMULATOR 1984 simulates the experience of hanging out with a best buddy! Your buddy learns from you, constantly adapting to your interests and personality. But most importantly, your buddy can play games with you!

Redmatch 2.description: A free fast-paced online multiplayer FPS where you upgrade your stats with kills!

Historica Fantasia.description: As an unnamed Dishonored Prince, you rescued your wrongfully convicted sister from the crime of assassinating her Father, the late Emperor. As a Commander of your retinue, you'll lead your sister across the continent to reclaim her place on the Imperial Throne.

Swing Striker.description: Intergalactic grappling hook soccer like you've never seen it before!

Hoverflow.description: Hoverflow is a first-person platformer in a mysterious world, featuring a relaxing soundtrack, secrets to uncover and time trials. Jump, slide, and most of all keep your flow going in order to finish handcrafted levels.

Ballad of The Masked Bandits.description: Ballad of The Masked Bandits is a puzzle-packed stealth game where you play as three raccoons in a trench coat pulling off wild west heists.

Faeland.description: Take on the role of skilled hunter, Sam, in Faeland, an adventure RPG set in a beautiful world inspired by 8-bit classics.

Discreet.description: Are you a thief? Then your mission will be to steal the most objects without the owner seeing you. You are the owner ? You will do everything to protect your house, go for a stop thieves!

Element Battle Royale.description: Element Battle Royal takes BR to the next level with realistic mechanics, small games of only 24, and a large map to explore with others. Your main goal is to survive and thrive until you're the last man standing.

PHOGS! Demo.description: In PHOGS! you play as a duo of dogs on a captivating, puzzle-filled adventure. Linked by a stretchy belly, you’ll need to bark, bite and bounce your way through obstacles set across the themed worlds of Food, Sleep and Play, in co-op or single-player.

MagiKart: Retro Kart Racing.description: MagiKart: Retro Kart Racing is a retro inspired racing game that heavily borrows from some of the best (and worst) late 90s kart racers.

Get Over Here!.description: It's a krazy fusion of Mortal Kombat + Flappy Bird. Impale enemies while dodging deadly flying saws. Disintegrate the queued up enemies with the flying saws, but doing so requires great precision and courage. Absorb enough blood to engage Fatal Drive mode and destroy everything.

VOID: Arena (alpha).description: Void Arena is a Fantasy FPS which features an elegant ARPG combat system in the place of gunplay. Skills and classes traditionally played from the isometric perspective are thrilling to experience in first person.

Floor 100.description: Floor 100 is a Free-to-play Topdown 2D Multiplayer Online RPG with many common MMO features and a competitive tower with 100 floors of epic bosses.

Craftsman story.description: Craftsman story This game is an RPG open type role-playing game. There are many professions to play, such as swordsman, mage, hero, businessman, bandit, craftsman, etc. Each profession has its own main plot, as well as rich branch tasks and hidden tasks.

Axizon Labs: Zombies.description: Axizon Labs: Zombies is a 2D Sci-Fi themed Platform Zombie Shooter Game based on the story of the sudden outbreak of ZMB Virus which affected 30% of the population around the world.

Heavenworld.description: Heavenworld is an open world adventure game mixing role playing, survival and management with NPC survivors. Each game is unique and managed by a game master who influences events. A powerful map editor is also available.

八般武艺 MAVR3D.description: Martial Arts VR 3D (Immersive Duel, Cultural Treasure Demonstration) MAJOR UPGRADE Boss TacticalSim. Inch-longer the stronger! Inch-shorter the deadlier! Duel your Foe (or friend), Arena players, or Boss femme fatales using different pairings of Eight Martial Arts. Real-Time Strategy Action Slasher

FortressV2.description: Fortress V2 is an artillery shooting game where you can team up with up to 4 friends on various maps and play using tanks of various abilities.

Fritz Chess 17 Steam Edition.description: At the turn of the century, Fritz fascinated the chess world with victories over Garry Kasparov and then-reigning World Champion Vladimir Kramnik. The "most popular chess program" offers you everything you will need as a dedicated chess enthusiast.

Songs of Syx Demo.description: Songs of Syx is a fantasy city-builder where you start off as an insignificant colony and build, scheme, and fight your way towards a metropolis and empire. The mechanics are complex and true to life, where small events can spiral into the collapse of kingdoms. Try the unlimited demo first!

PrprLive.description: PrPrive is a Live2D live broadcast assistant software developed by us. The software can achieve a high frame rate, multi-expression switching, targetless auto-drop frame at a lower CPU occupancy.

Gem Master.description: A colorful strategic game with simple rules, quick sessions, and increasingly challenging computer opponents. Beware of the Merciless!

Vampire: The Masquerade - Shadows of New.description: Your old life is dead and buried. You have no afterlife to look forward to, and your vampiric unlife is about to fall apart unless you solve an unsolvable crime. Welcome to New York City... and welcome to the Lasombra clan, where failure is not an option.

Midnight Scenes: The Highway.description: Claire Barnes is about to discover what kind of horrors lurk in the darkness of a deserted road. Welcome to a dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.

Zeph.description: Zeph is a puzzle game where you play as a sun entity, Zeph, who has been sent from a dying sun to the planet below to collect mosaic pieces that give her the power to restore life back to the sun. Zeph must use her sun powers of fire, light, and gravity in order to utilize parts of the world to solve puzzles and collect the mosaic pieces.

Swoosh.description: Simple 2D physics platformer where you try to progress through levels by interacting with different types of surfaces and objects in it.

I Can't Believe It's Not Music!.description: Have you ever wanted to write a song like a pro? Well, you're one button click away from writing tunes! And best of all, you own all the copyrights to your creations.

Net King's Call.description: Net King’s Call is a fusion of both Turn-Based Strategy and Real Time Battles, set in a future where the internet has become a world parallel to our own. Create a virtual army and stake your claim! With a combination of both diplomatic talent and combat prowess, you may just be the next Net King.

Police Shootout.description: Police Shootout is a new turn-based FPS game. Put on your uniform and get ready to respond the most surprising calls in your policeman’s career. Solve cases and gain experience, but also find out why a good young policeman gave up his career in a big city and moved to a small town of San Adrino.

Welcome to the Adventurer Inn!.description: Having just opened an inn, you set out to create a comfortable environment to bring in tired adventurers looking for respite after their questing. Earn money, upgrade your inn, and befriend a diverse cast of characters!

迷失 赛博之城.description: This is a world abandoned by the gods! In the polluted wasteland, there is only one technological city controlled by the super company. In the city, the high-level people are drunk. Outside the exiled jobless wanderers struggle to survive in the fierce environment and the mouth of wild animals.

Under Lock.description: Under Lock is a multiplayer asymmetrical PvP horror game for 5 players (4 survivors versus 1 monster). Take the role of a survivor with the goal to outsmart the monster and escape from lockdown. Or choose one from several unique monsters to hunt down and devour the victims.

TENGAI.description: Miko-san and ninja girl blast away! The best of eccentric Japanese-style shooter is here! With online rankings!

STRIKERS 1945 II.description: Easy to play, hard to master. This is one of the most iconic arcade shooter of the 90s, released by Psikyo. It comes back with many customizable options and online rankings!

Samurai Aces III: Sengoku Cannon.description: Fire the Cannon Shot! It's the evolution of eccentric Japanese-style shooter! With online rankings!

STRIKERS 1945 III.description: Here's a challenge from 90's arcades! The ultimate Psikyo shooter! With online rankings.

GUNBIRD 2.description: Let's go on the treasure hunt through the skies of the world! The ultimate "Psikyo Shooter" with online rankings!

Dragon Blaze.description: The shooter of riding the dragon's back. Master the techniques of the dragon and magic shot! And with online rankings.

Realm of Heroes.description: Realm of Heroes is a strategy game in which players build castles to defend their lands and recruit heroes to fight for their cause.

SOL DIVIDE -SWORD OF DARKNESS-.description: Enter the world of sword and sorcery. This is the spell and slash action shooter. With online rankings!

Thomas Scott.description: ThomasScott will allow players to explore the world through rotation, parkour and puzzle solving.

Nine Chronicles.description: Utilising groundbreaking technology, Nine Chronicles is a fantasy MMORPG powered by the players, set in a world that can never be shut down. Infinitely moddable and owned by the community, Nine Chronicles invites you to aid the goddess Freya in her eternal struggle against an evil ravaging the land.

Di[c]E.description: Di[c]E is a 3D survival game where your only weapons are dice. Manage to craft equipments to gain power and defeat hostile forces. Discover the secrets of a mysterious island and how to escape.

DeLight:The Journey Home.description: DeLight tells the story of a blind girl, a stray dog, and their unexpected journey during wartime.

Math Puzzle Alpha Challenge.description: A logic game for all ages. Fit the blocks in the pyramid following the logic to complete the challenge. The Math Puzzle Alpha Challenge game was designed to stimulate logical thinking.

Glare fall.description: This is a Glare shooting game distributed as an April Fools' Day project. In the near future robots dominate the world. Maid robot Glare gains flying capabilities and a disc shooter to fight against enemy robots on Earth.. Everything is for the user's dream of a peaceful everyday life.

Sky Seeker.description: SkySeeker is a game that aims to drop the enemy at the target location. You can feel very exhilarating when you can blow away your enemies, so please play.

Jumping Mellow Demo.description: A marshmallow's adventure to discover the secrets of the endangered dessert world and regain peace.

Dungeons and Undead.description: INDIE FANTASY LOCAL MULTIPLAYER GAME FOR FRIENDS AND FAMILY, SET UP ON THE WORLD OF ETERNALIA Two games in one; Classic Arcade mode and First Person Medieval Shooter. Gather your party and venture forth, or play solo and venture forth too!

Magic Twins Demo.description: Magic Twins is a cooperative arcade puzzler game in which Abra and Cadabra must use their chromagic powers to defeat hordes of color elementals and stop the Colormageddon.

Underwater Wars Demo.description: Underwater Wars is a tactical turn-based strategy game that takes place in the depths of the ocean. Two powerful factions of people are fighting a war for territory and resources, but everything changes when mysterious "Aliens" enter the conflict.

Mindframe Arena.description: Lead your Tec team on an epic journey through the worlds of Mindframe Arena

Firefighters - Airport Heroes.description: In Firefighters - Airport Heroes, players become everyday heroes in the very place where we feel most vulnerable: the world's airports.

FPS Robot Attack Minigame.description: Minigame where you have to destroy robots to save the world

Escape from Durka.description: The game will tell you about a person who mistakenly got into a mental hospital, from which he needs to get out. But what awaits him there ... Who will meet him on his way? What obstacles will he have to overcome in the time he spends there?

Lost At Sea.description: What are the most important moments in your life? Lost At Sea is a game about life and death, about coming to terms with your past and about family. Set on a beautiful island, this game will force you to face your fears and take stock of your life through imaginative puzzles and a relatable story.

TinyShot.description: TinyShot is a 2D arcade shooting game where you play as this little creature who signed a deal with the devil to get him his lost horn and earn love and fame in return.

Storynth.description: Join a ragtag group of adventurers, uncover the secrets of an ancient and enigmatic fortress, and alter the fate of two worlds.

Collection Quest.description: A classic collectathon meets a true story-driven RPG experience. Venture forth and unravel the mysteries that Adavici holds by engaging with its people and immersing yourself in the world.

Stabby Cats.description: Fighting your fellow kitties with your incredible agility and arsenal of sharp weaponry in this 2D action game! Toss knives, climb around mansions, and stab your friends to see who will be rewarded the coveted golden yarn!

Death Taxi 3000.description: Retro arcade racer inspired by the MS-DOS era

Delirium.description: A psychological game about hardships of depression, life, being stuck, enraged and unable to fight. Unable to find the reason to continue and touches the dark side: The rage, hate, denial and definitely the wish for it to stop and for you to give up... But that's the easy way that leads nowhere...

Nayati River.description: A single-player game of adventure and survival, set in a vast region infested with the dead. Build an autonomous camp, manage a community of survivors, look for the many who are missing, fight ferocious hordes, and unravel the mysteries of the legend of Nayati River!

Big Rumble Boxing: Creed Champions.description: Do you have what it takes to be a champion? Train, fight, and win like Adonis Creed, Rocky Balboa, and more boxing legends in this knockout boxing game!

Jumpala.description: Jumpala is a fast-paced action puzzler with heavy fighting game vibes. While the core mechanics are simple, each game is a test of skill and strategy as you try to outscore and outplay your opponents. Features both local and online play.

Space Raiders in Space.description: Space Raiders in Space is a wave defense roguelike mixing squad management and tower defence mechanics. Command your almost competent crew to loot weapons and supplies, build defenses, and fight their way through the Bugpocalypse.

DENIAL.description: Denial takes place inside your own dark mind, true or false, illusion or reality... It doesn't matter. It all feels the same and the stains on the walls still remain, maybe now it is time to clean them.

Fire Rescue Simulator.description: Fire Rescue Simulator let's you experience the day in the life of a firefighter in the United States. From fires over hazmat and technical rescues to medical calls and normal daily station chores.

xDasher.description: A couch coop game where 1-4 players set off into a dim dungeon. Your quest is to eliminate all monsters lurking within by dashing through the monsters with the proper color. Eventually, you will be haunted by a ghoulish, four-headed beast and must face it in a thrilling boss fight.

Jelly Brawl.description: Jelly Brawl is a sticky and destructive multiplayer party game where you gotta jiggle, flop, and pop your way to the top! Fight alone or against friends with unique jelly based combat across tons of stages, mini games, and modes as you struggle to be the last jelly standing!

Clam Man 2 - Open Mic.description: OPEN MIC is the free prologue to the upcoming Clam Man 2: Headliner - a combatless stand-up comedy RPG adventure where jokes are loot and the boss fights are comedy shows!

Lost Circus VR.description: Meet a mysterious Clown and his abandoned circus. Will You dare to start a thrilling night excursion? If You dare to get into a barrel on the old, rusty cart, pushed by a strange Clown - get ready for an extreme experience.

Clam Man 2 - Headliner.description: A stand-up comedy RPG where jokes are loot and comedy shows are boss fights! Play the prologue for free!

Succumate.description: From the creator of Summer Memories comes a new game where you must look after a demon named Lilim! Now you must juggle your time to keep her happy... or else!

Warehouse attack.description: This is a first person shooter game, the player ACTS as a special forces soldier.Control keys:Surrounded by enemies, the player has a variety of weapon technologies to use, and is free to explore the surrounding area or kill enemies.Players need to keep their health alive for as long as possible.

Deadsigns.description: DeadSigns is a first person action game with survival and tower defense features. Go through many nights and beat a lot of monsters with style and get the best score ! This game is under active development and early access on Steam. Bugs, missing and unbalanced features are to expect !

RoboDo.description: RoboDo is a singleplayer/multiplayer VR puzzle game with plenty exciting features. Bunch of levels for you to complete, some are fast, reaction based and others will make you concentrate and think. Beat levels alone or join your friend for some Co-Op action!

Aeon of Sands - The Trail Demo.description: Aeon of Sands – The Trail is a roleplaying game set in a post-apocalyptic desert world. It combines real-time exploration gameplay with classic gamebooks where you create your very own non-linear story adventure.

Dustoff Z.description: Get those blades spinning and load up on guns and ammo, the time has come to rebuild humanity! Dustoff Z is a game about maneuvering combat-helicopters in one of the harshest weather conditions possible – A Zombie Apocalypse.

SUPER UFO FIGHTER.description: UFO vs UFO! UFO Action Game!

Archer VR.description: Have you ever wanted to try yourself at archery? Have you ever dreamt of becoming a hero of the Middle Ages? Hurry!

Ethyrial, Echoes of Yore.description: Ethyrial: Echoes Of Yore is inspired by the old-school MMORPG, set on the lands of Irumesa, uncover secrets, explore new lands, fight fearful monsters, build your home and craft your own equipment.

Riddle Joker.description: For decades, superpowers and psychic abilities were thought to be mere science fiction, but the discovery of a certain particle called the "Astron" at the end of the 20th century proved to the world that these wondrous phenomena were real.

Heart's Medicine - Season One.description: Can you be counted on in an emergency? 🚑

I'mitation The Eight Suicide Note.description: A first-person search-type horror game developed for developers. Use the night vision, rean, slide and other actions to find eight items in the facility. Content that can be gameplayed in a short time.

HistoryMaker VR.description: Perform as a U.S. historical character in an immersive, virtual reality environment. Create your scene, pick your props, read your script, and export your performance in this VR content creation tool.

Underwater Wars.description: Underwater Wars is a tactical turn-based strategy game that takes place in the depths of the ocean. Two powerful factions of people are fighting a war for territory and resources, but everything changes when mysterious "Aliens" enter the conflict.

Aquarium Life.description: Nurture a small aquarium. A place you can return to for a moment of peace and quiet whenever you need it.

How To Make A Killing.description: An indie action RPG about assassins, necromancers, and mysterious rabbits. In an open world where your choices have permanent consequences, do you do the job or do you forge your own path as you meet new characters, battle a slew of enemies, and explore expansive dungeons and locations?

NecroWorm Demo.description: It's MIDNIGHT, you're DEAD, and got a bad case of THE MUNCHIES. Chew your way through 120 levels of addictive puzzle gameplay, where your only goal is to devour everything but your own wormy self. It's quick, tasty, and hard to resist. Just like a late-night snack.

美足小屋.description: The player plays a masseuse in the game and runs a beautiful foot cabin. Receive all kinds of city beauties every day, massage their feet and legs. Relieve pressure for her and satisfy self little hobbies at the same time.

Cryptic Rooms.description: A series of 3 VR escape rooms, Eye Eaters Basement, Dungeon of Demise, and Inescapable Hypercube. You must navigate through and solve puzzles, each room with its own unique theme and hidden relics that can be found and collected.

Saving You From Yourself.description: You are a transgender therapist. The patients you encounter might regret transitioning. Your job is to protect them from that.

FirstQueen1 NEXT.description: Battlefield with Many Enemies and Allies. Your soldiers will fight or retreat in battle using their own discretion. You watch over the actions of your troops and can either move characters that are in danger to safety or send a strong character to help defeat enemies and lead your army to victory.

Sunset fighter.description: 这是一款竞速逃生类飞行游戏，有多种道具可供拾取，游戏节奏非常紧张，玩家的目标就是生存尽可能多的时间。

Death World.description: After a long night you wake up alone in the bunker as a bunker security guard. Hunt, kill, gather. Do anything to survive.

Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin.description: A new adventure awaits you in this second installment of the turn-based RPG series set in the world of Monster Hunter! Become a Rider and form bonds with friendly monsters known as Monsties to fight alongside them as you take part in an epic story.

The Shepherd.description: After finding an old picture of your grandfather on a camel, you decide to leave the city and set off into the serenity of the desert. In order to become a great rider, just like he was. Train your herd, befriend desert-folk, fight predators, and navigate the mysteries of the desert.

Traffic Storm.description: Became the master of traffic. Control cars and avoid accidents. Get ready to fight the Traffic Storm!

Move with AI.description: This is a motion sensing game made with artificial intelligence (AI) technology. It doesn't need any sense of body equipment, just turn on the camera of the computer, and you can play happily.

Space Lint.description: Inventory management game set in space. Loot items, craft and repair to survive!

An Interesting Journey of Monsieur PAF.description: An Interesting Journey of Monsieur PAF is a platform / isometric puzzle game. Sharing similar mechanics with the Sokoban, Monsieur PAF attempts to revisit the genre using 3D verticality in magnificent homemade, two-dimensional environments.

Persian Nights 2: The Moonlight Veil.description: Travel to the magical land of Persian Nights and save your sister from a dire fate. Feel the taste of orient in this sumptuous and beguiling hidden object adventure.

Faefever.description: Faefever tells the story of a troubled journalist trying to uncover the mystery of a missing brother and sister in the small town of Glenroch, where not all things are as they seem.

Oddest Sea.description: Traverse an ominous ocean while evading monsters to reach the refuge of a distant lighthouse.

The Chronicles of Robin Hood - The King.description: Join forces with Robin Hood in this thrilling match3 game...! Help Robin Hood and the Merry Men in their quest to take down the Sheriff of Nottingham!

Kira and the Life Stone.description: This the journey of Kira a lost soul in the state of limbo trying to get back to life and find out why is he dead. Follow him in his journey of getting back to life and get new powers, fight different enemies and find hidden secrets.

Cosmotic Blast.description: Cosmotic Blast is an asteroid game in an immersive experience. Stand amongst a swirling cluster of asteroids in space as you pilot a ship. Blast and destroy wave after wave of asteroids and collect the Cosmotic energy to enhance your ship, making it faster, stronger and more resilient.

Witching Tower: Heroes.description: Fight the undead with four sets of weapons. Beat the bosses to save the kingdom from enemies. Relentless arcade action suitable even for people new to VR! Breathtaking visuals and dark fantasy environments are waiting for you!

Protodroid: DeLTA.description: Reach your potential in a fast and fluid 3D action-platformer set in a beautiful and hopeful Solarpunk world. Take on challenging bosses, upgrade your systems, and show humanity the promise of AI.

Negative Nancy.description: Negative Nancy is a choose your “no” adventure for people who have had enough. An interactive sitcom where you can only say “no” (or nothing at all). Your choices control the story.

The Outbound Ghost.description: The Outbound Ghost is an adventure RPG about helping ghosts ascend to the afterlife. Battle the past using figments of your personality. Craft badges to earn abilities. Explore a town of troubled spooks and discover life can be tough, even when you're dead.

Space War Machine.description: In Space War Machine you warp to a new star for each battle, in a never-ending fight for dominance. Pause and slow time at will, control a vast armada of ships with powers! Explore and Terra-form planets. Warp to your far off opponents. Unleash your Ultimate units for total destruction! And more!!!

Kane's Shadow.description: Kane's Shadow is an alternative rhythm game inspired by trauma release exercises. Guide Kane through his re-discovery of a traumatic memory and assist him in releasing his inner demons once and for all. =

Mushroom Cats 2 Demo.description: Mushroom Cats 2 - is a cute point-and-click game about Mushroom Cats that live on magical islands. Any girl will melt from tenderness, and the kids will be delighted with the funny Mushroom Cats! This fairy tale will fill any heart with good!

Toilet Paper Crisis Simulator 2020.description: Take control of the typical toilet paper panic buyer. Help us to understand this strange phenomenon by gathering as much Toilet Paper as you can.

Dungeon & Derision.description: Dungeon & Derision is a tactical turn-based game with some gameplay elements taken from the rogue-like genre ! Create your team to explore a mysterious island run by a powerful king !

CreatorAdventureLegend.description: This is a fantasy world, and you are a creator who will be punished into the reincarnation because of misplacement and experience the punishment of the 99th century,So you plan to build a village to protect you for every life

Clay Game.description: Explore a world handcrafted from clay. Make dumb jokes with your Foxcat friend. Use magic to solve puzzles. Can you solve the mystery at the Wizard Tower?

Crumbling World Demo.description: Bridging the gap between old-school dungeon crawlers (Diablo I), arcade RPGs (Ghouls’n’Ghosts) and combo-driven fighters, Crumbling World is a casual dive into dark fantasy.

核能步枪.description: 《NuclearRifle》 is an FPS shooting game. The protagonist wakes up from a small town house, only to find that the doors are locked. From time to time, strange sounds of biting came from nearby houses, and the exit of the town were sealed. What happened to the town? Can the protagonist escape?

Pandemic Panic!.description: We're in lockdown and you're our only hope! Grab your blaster, ready the cure and prepare to face the virus head on in this frantic, wacky and wild hospital. Don't be fooled, this is a task for only the best out there. Think you have what it takes?

Inside Explorer.description: This is Inside Explorer – The software where you can digitally explore the inside of things. It is loaded with real-time rendered 3D visualizations based on unique scientific data.

PST VR (Primary Surgical Treatment).description: “Primary surgical treatment” is a virtual simulator, designed for education purposes. By immersing yourself with your pair of Oculus VR Headsets, you can experience the task of treating a wound with many available surgical instruments and help the patient to begin the recovery.

Naught.description: Test your skills, take control of the environment, and guide Naught through a dark underground world full of mystery. A platform videogame with a unique control that will immerse you in deep labyrinths in search of the light.

Flying Soldiers.description: Get ready to command an odd squad of fun birds and devise a plan to bring them safe and sound to the end of the battlefield. An outlandish puzzle game that will challenge your mind to make these greenhorn recruits into brave soldiers.

evolution for beginners.description: Evolution For Beginners is an evolution simulation where you can create and cultivate your own species by only using evolutionary mechanics. Watch your creatures multiply like microorganisms in a primeval ocean while only the fittest survive.

Elva the Eco Dragon.description: "Elva, the Eco Dragon" is a 3D game in third view where you must control Elva, a small dragon whose mission is to cleanse the planet: land, sea and even space. Help Elva and you will help humanity to create a better world for everyone.

Monster Prom Demo.description: You have 3 weeks to get a date for Monster Prom! Go through absurd and funny situations, raise your stats and seduce one of your classmates. Beautiful art, bold, unapologetic dialogue and hard choices make up this Multiplayer (1-4 players) Dating Sim. Be your worst self.

MEGALAN 11.description: This is a exploration-puzzle game. Explore the science station and help the bad luck rescuers get out from the forgotten planet in 11 days.

Monster surprised you-ki chan Demo.description: This is a simple execute and jump action with two buttons, jump and shot. Recover the human world from a corps of monsters with a variety of weapons and techniques while freely grabbing the ceiling and walls!

Modest Hero.description: The violent clashes in the suburbs ended as a result of the military's harsh interventions. During the clashes, a general was killed brutally by a group of rebels. Seven people suspected of killing the general were arrested in next morning.

Arctic Anxiety.description: Survival simulator in extreme conditions. The game takes place in the Arctic ocean. The pilot of a cargo plane makes a hard landing on the water. To survive, the player will have to search for a cargo washed up on the shore.

Cascading Failure.description: Lead your troops into battle first hand in an intense Sci-Fi world. Construct bases, build defences, construct bigger bases, build way too many defences and take the map with overwhelming amounts of infantry, mechs and firepower.

Human Farm.description: Welcome to Human Farm🐽 – an alternate, Orwellian world where Pigs became the dominant species. Humans are degraded to farmed meat. Create and develop your own slaughterhouse. Your goal: conquer and dominate the human meat industry. Millions of hungry snouts are waiting to be fed!

Grappling Hook Ball.description: Grappling Hook Ball Tournament is a shooting game, players against players. Play with friends, up to 8 players. Welcome to the arena!

Sanity of Morris.description: Sanity of Morris: a psychological horror adventure game. Your flashlight reveals the clues you need to stay sane in the search for your father. Discover the truth. Could aliens be real?

Outcore.description: All you wanted was a nice game. But now you find yourself opening Windows apps like Paint & Notepad to solve puzzles, and searching for files on your computers that you didn't put there... Who is she? Why did she appear on your desktop? Let's dive into her memories and find out.

Street Power Football.description: Sick style and high-energy action come together in this arcade-style football experience. Face off against street football legends or friends in a variety of over-the-top game modes and playgrounds, unleashing tricks and crushing Super Powers as you grow your status to become Street King.

The Narrator is a DICK : Longer, Harder,.description: In this narrated unfair platformer there's one man who's always out to get you... The Narrator. He's a real jerk, but with determination and a lot of skill MAYBE you can make it through this crazy adventure. Remastered with new Online Co-Op and Extended gameplay!

Space Otter Charlie.description: Adorable characters? Check! Makeshift weapons? Check! Otter dressed in a foam shark suit. Umm. Check? Join Charlie and his ragtag team of sea mammals as they jump, float, and rocket through Otter Space in this Zero-G Puzzle Platformer!

Stan Lee's Verticus.description: You are Verticus, a superhero equipped with a high tech, heat-resistant jump suit who must prevent the Earth’s destruction at the hands of an evil alien race known as The Obliterators!

Frog Space.description: Frog Space is a game about the adventures of frog 'Froxy' that avoids obstacles such as animals, vehicles, and terrain. Since only the skills and senses of the player are the only ways to clear this game, it requires a high level of concentration, equanimity, and a challenging spirit.

Kick the VIRUS.description: Kick the VIRUS It's a game that helps when your anger reaches its maximum.

Happy Birthday, Adolf!.description: Spring of 1945. The Third Reich is on the verge of defeat, the regime of the Fuhrer at death. Scientists from Anenerbe freeze Adolf Hitler in a secret cryolaboratory. After 75 years, on his birthday, he awakens and goes to the past to save the world from disaster ...

Baldi's Basics Plus.description: Baldi's Basics Plus is like the original game, but PLUS! The same cruddy edutainment horror type parody theme is back, but with hugely expanded gameplay features, including procedurally generated levels, field trip minigames, crazy random events, PLUS more characters, more items, and more chaos!

Blured Angel.description: Blured Angel is a kind of somatosensory game that uses a camera on a Windows host to capture and interact with each other. It weaves a heaven I see from the spiritual world of the Bible from the perspective of a not so smart but persistent angel "Mehoo".

Digital Dungeon Tiles.description: An extremely quick to use dungeon tile-based mapping tool to build battle maps for “Screen In Table” and "Print" (or Online) based play! Fully orthographic so you can play as if your Miniatures are in the map.

Probe.description: A challenging 2D block breaker featuring arcade elements and a modern spin on the popular retro games. Destroy data blocks and galactic enemies using only your probe, bullets and power ups but don't lose your ball to the void. Do you have what it takes to reach the end of the universe?

Mini Words: Top Movies.description: The Top 100 Movies. You know them and you love them. Test your knowledge about the highest-grossing films of all time in “Mini Words: Top Movies”, a unique mix of logic puzzle, word search and trivia.

Fingertips mountain sea- paradise isla.description: Fingertips mountain sea: everyone's heart longing for the peach garden

Manufactoria 2022.description: Manufactoria 2022 is a constructive puzzle game about pushing robots around. (It's okay, they don't complain.) Use simple parts to engineer solutions to open-ended problems, then rebuild 'em better! Take a company from your backyard to the soaring heights of success! How hard could it be?

Princess Castle Quest Demo.description: 2D Puzzle Game with Full Level Editor and Local Coop

Aquadine.description: "Welcome to Aquadine! My name is Ciel, and I'll be your tour guide for today!" A young gondolier works part-time to save money for his mother's hospital bills, but he has a secret. Follow Ciel as he tours people around the beautiful town of Aquadine, where his family and friends bond with him.

Aquadine Demo.description: "Welcome to Aquadine! My name is Ciel, and I'll be your tour guide for today!" A young gondolier works part-time to save money for his mother's hospital bills, but he has a secret. Follow Ciel as he tours people around the beautiful town of Aquadine, where his family and friends bond with him.

Hunter X - Begin.description: Stylish action game using the sword

Inside The Mirror.description: Yumi was just another normal girl living happily together with her family. Now, her family has fallen apart, and Yumi finds it difficult to stay motivated in her day-to-day life, crushed by a growing well of darkness, slowly consuming her from the inside out.

Straylight Demo.description: Fly, swing and soar through a beautiful and deadly universe in a new kind of VR platforming experience. Using the Fling Engine - a propulsion mechanic designed for totally comfortable movement in VR - you will soar too high, fly too fast, and die way too much. Can you master the STRAYLIGHT?

Cross Soul.description: A girl who is "one person in two bodies" challenging a mystery dungeon. Items that can be transmigrated to change their form as well as spirit weapons. The story of a soul that spans the ages. And... tasty bananas.

Strato's Sylph Asterism.description: Strato's Sylph is an air battle action STG based on the motif of fighter planes and beautiful girls. Set on the earth-like planet "Strange Sphere", the girls who wear weapons and run in the sky "Sylph" and The game depicts a battle with MARXII, a monster in the shape of a bee.

Pandoria.description: Adventure, creation, and joy in this wonderful world of Pandora

Trump and Virus.description: At the beginning of a disaster, those seemingly unimportant warnings will always be felt that this is not serious, such as the invasion of viruses.

This will not go well.description: You are a spaceship surrounded by missiles. Survive as much as you can.

Dream Catcher.description: A lonely guy meets a lot of strange girls in his dream. Let's solve the puzzle to see the girls more clearly.

炽焰帝国:十字军东征.description: 《炽焰帝国：十字军东征》Kingdom Under Fire The Crusaders是一款结合了动作与策略的经典游戏，以中古幻想为背景，玩家将展开颇具震撼的大规模战斗，现在官方中文高清版正式登陆PC平台。

Be Coronavirus.description: A viral strategy game: You take the role of Coronavirus. With no interference from you, it will spread around the world, infect new places, evolve, mutate, and reshape the landscape of humanity… that is, it would, if it weren’t for other viruses, and medical interference, waiting to stop it.

Viking Heroes.description: Scale new heights of adventure as brothers Everand and Boromere and sisters Helga and Brunnhilde band together for the first time to pursue an evil sorcerer who has unleashed a flurry of devastating storms on Midgard!

Ninja Kiwi Archive.description: Enjoy some of the best loved Flash games of the past in this awesome time capsule of over 60 Ninja Kiwi classics. Experience a piece of history and play the original Flash games that spawned the worldwide phenomenon of Bloons TD.

City Destructor.description: Welcome to City Destructor, the demolition puzzle game! Sit back and relax while at the same time you demolish cities, unlock bombs and create a whole bunch of chaos!

Only One Rectangle.description: Platformer with a variety of disorienting gameplay for an interesting gaming experience. A lot of colors, invisible painted platforms, traps, various puzzles.

A letter to you.description: A psychological horror game where fear and paranoia merge into a terrifying story!

Choco Pixel 4.description: Choco Pixel 4 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

Go Kart Run!.description: Aim for 1st place! Collect and customize 20 drivers, race to increase your rank, make a comeback with food items and go insanely fast with 5 engine options!

Arctic Awakening.description: A first-person narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your AI drone for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the dark mysteries buried beneath the ice.

Escape from GULAG.description: "Escape from GULAG" is the maze game that increases difficulty as you progress through the levels.

The Sickle Upon Sekigahara.description: The Sickle Upon Sekigahara is a short Visual Novel that puts the player in the role of Kobayakawa Hideaki in the most tumultuous period of his life.

Active Neurons 2.description: Active Neurons 2 is a puzzle game in which you have to discover 12 greatest inventions of humanity and reflect on the power of human thought

Planet 2000.description: Experience futuristic vehicular combat in this fast paced strategy game. Assemble your team from a crew of fully realized AI companions as you take part in epic land battles.

ZEROED.description: Soar across vast landscapes and battle opponents with a unique take on flight combat racing. Get ready to break the sound barrier in this deceptively simple game that will always be a challenge, so buckle up and get ZEROED!

Rogue Party 2.description: Explore dungeons, defeat bosses and earn epic rewards with up to three other friends (and occasionally hit them with potions) in this playful Rogue-Like adventure.

The King's Magic.description: Take control of the tiny yet tenacious King's magical button as he avoids the castle's enemies and traps on his journey back to the King. Using only the ability to move, you must time your movements correctly and think quickly in order to make it through all 20 levels of ever increasing difficulty.

Farm Builder.description: Farm Builder is strategy puzzle board game in which you build farms, roads and surround windmills and water-towers in order to score points. The game is online multiplayer and in each room can play between 2 and 5 people together.

Blue Flame Demo.description: Blue Flame is a fast paced top-down action game set in a medieval fantasy world. Take the role of the last pyromancer and restore order to a kingdom in which fires only emit cold.

ColorsInvaders.description: This game is a modern version like Space Invaders, with 12 levels and coloured invaders. The last level will never be the same twice !

Etheldia Pepper.description: Etheldia Pepper is a monster taming RPG inspired by titles such as Pokemon and Final Fantasy. With sixty species of characters to recruit and open ended progression letting you choose which elder to fight and when, Etheldia is a short and sweet game with almost infinite replayability.

Bud Masters.description: Bud Masters is an indie weed lifestyle deck building card game. The goal: smoke all your opponent's buds out of their bud bowl while defending your bud bowl. Play vs a Stoned AI or with others online. No micro-transactions.

Human Origin.description: The most important to play this game is to wear a headphone !The built-in videos is not only a game play tutorial, but also an interesting story. which is an hour long .and full of suspense,laughs,pains in it

Jack Walker: Ethereal.description: Jack Walker: Ethereal is a Sci-Fi/Action/RPG game for advanced VR players, with unique movement and combat mechanics. You play as an intergalactic bounty hunter who can fly and shoot laser beams out of his wrist as well as slow down the time. The fate of the universe is in your hands...

Heim.description: Heim is an indie puzzle adventure game inspired by Norse mythology. Delve into this story-driven adventure, solve varied, unique puzzles along the way and explore the secrets of the Nine Realms. Use platforming mechanics, Ashyr's Runic Abilities and Alban's Flute to make your way through the world.

Green Project.description: Post apocalyptic survival farming, green the world to survive !

Sacrifice Your Friends Demo.description: Succumb to madness and come Sacrifice Your Friends! Dangerous arenas, eldritch weapons, lovecraftian creatures, and a lot of fun await you.

Tomatenquark.description: Tomatenquark is a multiplayer & singleplayer first person shooter, a community homage to Cube 2: Sauerbraten.

Dragon Storm.description: Explore the island. Solve puzzles. Try to survive until you understand how to get out of here.

Matergari: Below Valesia.description: Matergari is a single player RPG set in a dangerous fantasy world. In this first chapter you will be able to explore the depths of the city of Valesia and help its inhabitants. Defeat your opponents and equip increasingly powerful weapons and armor to progress in this fantastic adventure.

DEVOUR.description: DEVOUR is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Stop possessed cultists before they drag you to hell. Run. Scream. Hide. Just don't get caught.

Squishy Sports.description: Compete against your friends and family in this infinitely replayable 2d, physics-driven, local multiplayer sports collection where the characters are shapes and everything is squishy!

The Last Faith.description: An unholy alliance of metroidvania and soulslike. The Last Faith thrives on merciless and precise combat, with a huge range of custom executions to perform. The wicked and the blessed will be judged the same; let nothing stand in your way.

LesLove.Club: Emily and Sarah.description: A relaxing puzzle game for lesbians. Love is Love!

So May It Be: A Witch Dating Simulator.description: Play as a witch hanging out with your witchy friends, ditch school, contact the dead and fall in love.

Nightvision.description: Experience the first ever road-lite... an intense highway night-driving simulation with randomly generated infinite levels, a rollercoaster story that unfolds through perilous racing, and a fresh world and road to master each time you get behind the wheel. Can you see the night through?

DYB.description: An exploration 3D game with a non-linear history in an island full of mystery. Play with different characters along the game and tried keep them alive.

Sayonara Electric.description: This is an Interactive Adventure and Visual Novel Game depicting life on a lunar base. All texts are performed by Japanese Voice Actors. On a wall-mounted electronic calendar"IMPORTANT!" is flickering. (what's my plan today?) "Today is Christmas Eve." The date shown on the calendar is December 24.

SOULBOUND.description: In a place of reality, a soul longs for an escape and is not alone; dark things are lurking but energy is your friend. Soulbound is an atmospheric metroidvania platformer packed with action where the past is your future.

Pistol Dancer.description: Twos hands two guns! Shoot'em up style rhythmic FPS. Press the trigger alongside music beats to unleash devastating power to the enemies Your enemies are little virus bits trying to reach the heart, and you are the last line of defence!

Pancake Sailor.description: Relaxing sailing experience. Discover Akalana Islands.

Armageddon Onslaught.description: In 2060 the end of the world has arrived, and humanity is on the brink of extinction. In a desperate struggle against the army of hell, some humans discover to be Demi-Angels gifted with unimaginable powers. They will have to face horrors of all kinds and fulfill the darkest of the prophecies.

Bastard Little Zombie.description: This Little Zombie woke up from the dead and now wants to find his family. Will you be good enough to help him?

Dark Romance: Ashville Collector's Editi.description: Can you save a town from turning to ash in time?

Hard Rock Pinball.description: Have fun, challenge yourself, defeat the bosses and test your luck in this pinball game to the sound of drums, guitars and synthesizers. What's up? liked? So ... Let's Rock!

Fight with love.description: We combined card games, dating sim and roguelikes to create the most unique game about love and sex. Date your lover in turn based card combat, have sex in rhythm game boss battles and Fight with love!

HeatWave.description: HeatWave is a sandbox, non-linear guerrilla group simulator set in Alaska affected by climate change. It combines mechanics of strategy, manager and adventure games. As leader of a guerilla group, you start a fight for freedom and the shape of a liberated country.

Castle Fight.description: Castle Fight is a strategic building game. In this game, players will use a combination of blocks to build the most structurally-complete and powerful castle. When building is complete, players will see who is the last castle standing!

The Ball Adventure.description: Dive into this wonderful cartoon world and learn to use the characteristics of each material to overcome challenges. You will need balls to pass this game.

Hotfix.description: Hotfix is a chromosome enriched solo indie game inspired by Minecraft and Enter the Gungeon. Create your own - near infinite - world full of randomly generated structures filled with guns and loot. Explore, build, and gather resources during the day and avoid robotic "dogs" powering up at night.

Light: A Maze Game.description: In this frenetic adventure you will have to run against time and enemies with or without ligths. Go faster each time and break yours and your friends' records by a matter of milliseconds.

Daybringer Demo.description: Enter a Urban Fantasy Epic which follows the journey of a boy in a hip-hop purgatory.

HYPERCHARGE: Unboxed Demo.description: We made your childhood dream game! Grab a friend and protect the Hypercore. Hypercharge is a solo and co-op wave-based first/third-person shooter with a small twist: you're an action figure! Explore. Defend. Survive.

One Dreamer: Prologue.description: Modify the world around you with pseudocode as you journey through blended realities and discover why Frank became a game developer in the first place.

Shoot Covid-19.description: Let's try our covid-19 shooting game. In the game, you need to clear all kinds of monsters infected by pneumonia virus in the infirmary, and finally eliminate all the viruses to reach the destination.

Tower Ships.description: Tower Ships is a tower defense game where the towers are spaceships, this leads to significantly different mechanics to classic tower defence games

南十字作战队.description: This is a horizontal retro arcade-style STG shooting game. Players need to control fighters to defeat the ultimate villain FightFox and rescue EAU and the Southern Cross Union headquarters.

Enamored Risks.description: Upon finding a mysterious social media account, Alex sets out to find the origins of the photos and meets three urban explorers, each of them unearthing something new and unfamiliar in her heart.

The Song of the Fae.description: A deckbuilding chess-like where you step into the shoes of an egomaniacal bard to master WizardChess and scribble your name into every history book. The Song of The Fae is equal parts Chess, Deckbuilding and Tactics RPG blended into the perfect balance of strategy and luck.

The Song of the Fae Demo.description: A deckbuilding chess-like where you step into the shoes of an egomaniacal bard to master WizardChess and scribble your name into every history book. The Song of The Fae is equal parts Chess, Deckbuilding and Tactics RPG blended into the perfect balance of strategy and luck.

Legend of Kendor.description: Legend of Kendor is a Fantasy Free-Roaming Action Adventure Roguelike game. This is about people in Kendor trying to save their loved ones. You make your own path and adventure with consequences.

Fire for Effect.description: Fight off a seemingly endless rain of bombardment and cover an evacuation effort with the meager defenses of the besieged cities and your surprisingly potent gun

Blue Flame.description: Blue Flame is a fast paced top-down action game set in a medieval fantasy world. Take the role of the last pyromancer and restore order to a kingdom in which fires only emit cold.

Kidnapped Girl.description: The main character, named Clive, considers himself a psychopath. He has long wanted to hurt someone. So Clive kidnapped a girl on his seventeenth birthday. But the victim was more complicated than he'd thought.

Cyber Agent.description: Welcome to the world of Cyber Agent! This is an easy to play, hotly fought 3D tower defense game, please use your mouse to aim at the enemy, auto shoot and make sure not to get hurt by the enemy! And pretty ladies to fight with you!

东方鬼神玉.description: This is a well-designed barrage labyrinth game. Incorporates the setting of the unlimited challenge of the I wanna series. You will be teleported to the nearest archive point when hit by the barrage. And you can reborn for unlimited times.

Weapons Genius VR.description: You act as a weapon genius and create ever new types of weapon with better performances.

iota.description: are you ready for a challenge? iota is a hardcore, precision platformer with one important difference: there is no jump button. instead, you will bounce up and down, left and right as you struggle over and over again to reach the next trial. do you have what it takes? can you beat iota?

Selfless Heroes.description: Solve puzzles by designing an AI for a team of selfless heroes. Test your algorithm, optimize it, and emerge victorious from the dungeon!

Mysterious World.description: "Mysterious World" is a platform jumping game independently developed by individual developers.

The Last Day Defense VR.description: Unleash your strategy and get ready to defend your land – feel the responsibility for the fragile future of mankind and stand up for it with The Last Day Defense - VR tower defense game.

Endless Savagery.description: Crowds of enemies, explosions and blood - this is what awaits you in Endless Savagery! Survive, collect new weapons and shoot waves of enemies growing with every minute, try to survive as long as possible.

Mail Mole.description: Mail Mole is a charming 3D platformer featuring Molty, the fastest delivery mole, in his quest to save Carrotland from disaster! Explore magical worlds, make new friends, race against Mecha-Moles, find collectibles, solve puzzles and deliver awesomeness to the end of the world!

Fred The Rubber Ducky.description: Help Fred navigate through the world in his search for destiny, where danger lies around the corner in each of the 8 unique handcrafted and challenging levels.

Four Rendezvous.description: Hero meets a mysterious girl in the park. Who is that girl? What is a mystery surrounding her? And what about the world they met in? There's definitely something wrong with it. So many questions! So the hero has to deal with all of it to find his love.

燎刃.description: 100 ways to die to conquer a man. A man who can't be attacked-catch him and lock him up, then conquer him! Jianmang is the main attack, and the scabbard is the main guard. The strong is the supreme. The swordmand is above the scabbard, and the scabbard can only live as a tool.

Jumping Joe.description: Jump right into the action in this jolly pick ‘n play platformer. An Indie action game perfect for intense playtimes with your friends and family. Help Joe and his fellas on their upwards journey. Be quick as a flash and dodge roaring cannonballs, vicious bats and other traps.

SPACE TOW TRUCK.description: After a painful car crash on the Moon, MASTER PHYSICS to get out of trouble! While solving REAL physics puzzles that Isaac Newton would have loved, you will also discover the Moon, its craters, its seas, and the space landers that dot its surface!

Dialogue Designer.description: A branching dialogue and storylines editor for game developers. Designed for non-programmers (no coding experience required). Can be used with any game engine / framework supporting JSON files​.

Bring You Home.description: BRING YOU HOME unravels the story of Polo, a humble alien hero who will traverse all kinds of worlds in a frenzied chase to rescue his kidnapped alien pet.

Ashwalkers.description: A survival journey through a harsh world without rules or judgement. Only your choices matters in the face of moral dilemmas. Manage your party, food & equipment in this non-linear narrative survival sim with 34 possible endings.

King of Crabs.description: Battle Royale with crabs, and no shrinking arena! Intense massive multiplayer fun, battle with up to 100 real players per game! Scrap, scavenge and slaughter your way to becoming the King of Crabs!

SBX 5K.description: PVP turn-based strategy sci-fi arena shooter

As Aventuras do Cueca Listrada.description: The story of the game was inspired by the imagination we have during childhood, where small challenges become great achievements, using a character based on a real-life child. Grab fruits and candies to save time, watch out for enemies and go through maps

Button City.description: Button City is a narrative adventure game about a fox and his friends banding together to save their local arcade! Explore a diorama world, play exciting arcade games, complete quirky quests and meet cute animal friends.

Peekaboo Collection - 3 Tales of Horror.description: Three horror games. Three different stories exerting you into dark twist, forcing you confront face to face with the creatures that lurk there.

Empires and Tribes.description: Empires and Tribes is a unique hybrid of a medieval city builder and a role-playing game. You will undertake the duties of a mayor in the 13th century and manage the expansion of your city, ensure the production of resources and raise a powerful army to protect yourself from rival principalities.

Vaccine.description: Heal the sick, save the world! You will master simple levels in an addicting and challenging missions to save the world!

MicroMan.description: It is not easy to be equal in height to an ant, isn’t it? The world of yours changes drastically after you accidentally fall into the reduction capsule. Fight for your life against scary spiders, frogs or rats! Try to survive in the urban jungle. Find a way to return to your original height!

Deity.description: A journey into the unknown, the meditative, the ethereal, the magical, the surreal... the enchanting, the entrancing, the mesmerizing...The Land of the Gods...

Hero of the Kingdom: The Lost Tales 1 De.description: You come to a city that lives in fear of a terrible dragon. The desire for justice brings you to a dangerous quest with your new friend Brent. You have to find the dragon and fight the greatest struggle of your life. Your heroic courage will save the city from evil.

Easy puzzle: Streets.description: Is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture

Nyanco Card.description: Nyanco Card ~ 東方夢猫 幻想遊戯 is a fan-made game based on the Touhou Project worldview. Enjoy reliving Nyanco's memories while also making new ones with her and the Touhou characters in the Gensokyo world!

ASTRALODE Freeminers.description: Take to the stars and harvest precious ore from wild asteroids! ASTRALODE Freeminers is asteroid mining puzzle action with an interstellar support crew of colorful misfits.

Dark Side.description: psychological thriller / horror game in first person, you wake up in a strange and unfamiliar place, apparently wearing special clothes, you need to find out where you are as soon as possible because your oxygen level is running low!

Aliens Love Beefs.description: Aliens are hungry and they would LOVE to have a bite of some tasty Beef. Abduct the Beefs on each planet avoiding ammo, explosions and lasers. Casual indie Virtual Reality game using cool spherical gravity game mechanics.

Infinite Abyss.description: Infinite Abyss is a combination of a dynamic game of action with strategic elements in a stylized 2D world. You will play the role of the last living astronaut to survive on a lonely planet.

Raptor Boyfriend.description: Raptor Boyfriend: A High School Romance is a dating sim about a teen girl who moves to a small secret community of cryptids. Romance a magical Fairy, a sensitive Sasquatch and a bold Velociraptor. A satirical 90's teen drama about trying to find love in your last year of high school.

Builders of Greece.description: Immerse yourself in the beautifully recreated golden age of Hellenic city-states. Builders of Greece is a city management game which lets you display your strategic and economic mastery.

Eira: Echoes of Adventure.description: Eira: Echoes of Adventure is a casual adventure game where you play as Eira and trace your grandfather’s footsteps to journey through an icy world filled with curious alien wildlife, spatial puzzles, and hoards of treasure.

Dry Grass.description: Build bases, build your own car, co-operate, kill intruders, hunt animals, find secret easter eggs, explore or just chicken out and be scared for your life while hiding in dark cave, the life of your character is in your hands!

Fall Of The Mafia.description: *** NEW GUNS, NEW MAPS WILL COME SOON.

Glory Horse Racing.description: Discover the equestrian world through horse races and challenge yourself to win the Glory Horse Racing trophies!

Sphere: Flying Cities.description: Sphere – Flying Cities is a sci-fi citybuilder which combines strategy, simulation, and survival elements in an extraordinary and immersive scenario. Rebuild and protect a society in a unique and hostile environment. Pay the price for your decisions and be prepared to lose everything.

Breakpoint.description: Breakpoint is a twin-stick slasher where your weapons explode. Break through the swarm to claim your spot on the online leaderboard.

Corpse Party (2021).description: Explore the haunted halls of Heavenly Host Elementary in Corpse Party (2021), the horror cult classic now updated for the next generation.

BlindBlade II.description: BlindBlade II is a sequel to the first-generation product. In this generation, the game has 21 extremely difficult levels. Players can only pass all the challenges if they stay focused and brave and persevering like a real samurai.

Strings Demo.description: Experience fast-paced VR combat without sacrificing comfort. Battle enemies using unique items scattered throughout each level. Move quickly by throwing teleport orbs. Store items in your inventory and equip them instantly. Confront fearsome bosses with challenging fight mechanics.

A Night In Kyosaka.description: A young 10-year-old who wanders into a world ruled by dogs, cats, warlocks, and spirits in search of their missing puppy.

A Night In Kyosaka Demo.description: A young 10-year-old who wanders into a world ruled by dogs, cats, warlocks, and spirits in search of their missing puppy.

Gan'S Matchstick Men：Deadly Rhythm.description: Matchstick Men：Deadly rhythm is a local multiplayer fighting game. Use strange mechanics to blow your opponents.(Temporary multiplayer is not supported)

Umihara Kawase Fresh!.description: Umihara Kawase become open world? Clear the quests with rubbering action!

Car Crush Racing Simulator.description: A unique mix of racing, dancing and survival games in one. Extremely dangerous car crusher machines are in action. Compete with your rivals while dodging the car crushing engines.

The Core Message.description: Combining retro puzzles and a arcade space shooter. You and your crew found strange materials in the galaxy core to upgrade your ship to the most powerful. While collecting core materials you came across something unbelievable ... The Core Message. The Core Message changes everything.

Super Worm 3D.description: Super Worm 3D is a 3D platformer game. Player navigates Super Worm through levels by collecting the key and reaching the gate. Player faces many kind of entitites in each level such as trolls, mosquitos, spiders, frogs etc. Player can collect and use dynamites for them.

Cube Projection.description: This is a game that tests the imagination of three-dimensional space. Just find the projection of the cube in the front view and left view direction, and then clicks the corresponding grid above to pass the game.

Dordogne.description: Dordogne is a narrative adventure game in which you play as Mimi, a young woman visiting the house of her recently deceased grandmother who left her letters and puzzles to solve. To do so, Mimi will revisit her childhood memories and reconnect with the little girl who marveled at everything.

Absolute Alchemical Potion.description: Behold: the great scientist-alchemist Celsia. Help the protagonist recover her power and brew the potion that’ll change the world, or find true and eternal love.

【救世计划】红衣.description: 《Salvation Plan-Spirit Evil 》是一款无限流解谜为主的第三人称国风3D恐怖游戏。人间世游戏系统，是由一股神秘力量创造出来的，一个名为人间世的能连通无数不同类型世界的游戏空间。而你，作为被世界意志选中的天选之子，将会进入到人间世游戏系统构拟的多维空间世界中进行探索。多维空间世界的神秘百变，现世的诡异白雾，所谓的人间世究竟是什么？玩家朱砂第一世，荒野温泉主题度假村。通关线索：爱。

Darkanoid.description: The Black Zone is a place where Arkanoid fans will truly be tested. Here you will find pain, heartache, and merciless Bosses.

Close Combat: The Longest Day.description: Close Combat is a pausable real-time wargame series, heavily focused on historical accuracy and realistic soldier psychological profiles. In Close Combat: The Longest Day take command of either the Allied Expeditionary Force or Germany’s Wehrmacht.

Floor is...What!?.description: Floor is...What!? doesn't just mean floor is lava! Experience 4 player mini game mayhem with 50+ games set in a snow filled frozen tundra, hungry shark infested waters, low gravity moon base, and more while customizing your characters with over 100 unlockable costumes!

Sol-Hel.description: Lead a team of Dead Slayers – Mythril wielding defenders of humanity, against armies of the Dead. In this turn-based tactics you'll fight hordes of enemies, both dead and otherwise.

The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante.description: A narrative-driven hardcore RPG set in a gritty world ruled by real but unrelenting gods. Set out on a challenging lifetime journey, where every choice has a price and entails consequences. Will you become an inquisitor, a judge, or conspire against the old order? Dare to decide!

The Informant Chronicles- Chronicle 1: R.description: Informant Red is assigned to a ten year old settlement on a river that is fearful in light of a massacre that left over half the village dead on a forest expedition. As she spends more time getting to know the locals, she discovers clues that suggest this incident was no accident.

Down2Die.description: Down2Die is an advanced zombie survival game that offers many ways of replayability and customization. The game features many ways to counteract your enemies with traps and upgrades. Work together with a team up to 4 survivors and level through the waves to be at your best when the "unknown" occurs.

Space Chef.description: Hunt down strange alien creatures and plants, then cook 'em! Deliver your tasty creations to the galaxy's most unsafe places on your homemade star scooter. In a quirky mix of exploration, cooking and action, you’ll expand your home from a measly kitchen to a five star food factory using mostly junk.

Zombusters.description: A classic twin-stick shooter with a twist, you will have to face lots of Zombies and other creatures with everything you got. Beware!

Disaster Report 4: Summer Memories Demo.description: In the shadow of a massive earthquake, you must brave a destroyed city where your choices will determine who survives.

Easy puzzle: Bridges.description: Is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture

Escape to Sidious.description: After Earth's downfall, a new planet must now be colonized and defended against attackers. Explore new technologies and revive trade. Settlers, the future lies ahead. Follow me to a better world. May Iridium be with us!

The Last Day of Adolf.description: Play as Adolf on his last day in the bunker, the Nazies have lost the war and you get to play out the events that follow with a humorous and dark twist.

Mahjong Deluxe.description: Mahjong Deluxe is a solitaire game based on the classic Chinese game where you are challenged to eliminate all the tiles from the board. It includes 12 lovely backgrounds and 1,008 different puzzle layouts along with relaxing background music.

人狼の仔.description: Deck build x dark fantasy. The princess cursed by a werewolf follows the witch's traces to unravel her own curse-whether the creatures of the devoured monsters are used as shields or prey to survive hunger. Tactical hanger control RPG where "reason" is questioned.

Alien:Chip.description: Cleanvirus is a survival game that supports stand-alone. Players can use weapons to break through the doomsday survival of mutated viruses.

Paraiso Island.description: Travel to Paraiso Island, make new friends and build your own paradise.

PuzzleKid.description: Puzzle Kid is a 2D platform puzzle game with unique mechanic. Move and rotate the world to solve the puzzle.

Looking Glass.description: Don’t stand still—and don’t trust your eyes. Step into Looking Glass, a PC horror VR game set in the darkness of a hedge labyrinth. Use a hand mirror to peer through the blackness in this haunting horror maze.

Unferat.description: Unferat is a warlock simulator, giving the player the opportunity to go from a village boy to a powerful dark sorcerer.
