Minoes.description: Minoes is a Tetris-like stack-em-up with a Rubik's Cube thrown in. It builds on the core gameplay of Tetris-likes and Match-3s and brings an innovative twist; you can only place as many minoes as you can catch.

Jaw Breakers & The Confection Connection.description: A comedy mystery visual novel about a group of kids on Summer vacation with way too much free time on their hands. Spending a summer in a small, quiet and peaceful suburb like Lemon Grove should be a piece of cake, right?

Sophie's Cubes.description: Create, scramble, and solve puzzle/magic cubes.

The Jungle.description: You wake up on a mysterious island. In this fearful island, you must fight native and other mutant creatures and also solve the mystery.

Aethyr.description: Aethyr is an open-world 2D action adventure game inspired by the golden age of RPGs. Choose from a variety of skills, collect or craft unique weapons and armor, and prepare yourself to uncover the secrets of the Aethyr.

Zango's Shark Adventure.description: Play an epic adventure game as Zango to help him save his family!! Four Chapters to play with 32 unique levels.

Shielta: Veil of Stars.description: Shielta: Veil of Stars is a deeply challenging co-op action-adventure set in a ruthless fantasy world. It challenges you and your friend on a journey filled with danger and schemes. Fight together, survive together.

Premier Manager 10.description: With improved playability from previous versions, and ease of use, Premier Manager ‘10 is the ideal game for those who love the high-pressure world of topflight football management. PLEASE NOTE: You will start from the 2009/10 season.

Premier Manager 09.description: Highlighting playability and ease of use, Premier Manager® 09 is the ideal game for younger gamers or players looking for a casual introduction to the high pressure, high stakes world of football management. PLEASE NOTE: You will start from the 2008/09 season.

Premier Manager 08.description: Premier Manager 08 is the definitive pick up and play football management experience. Whether you want to start at the top with one of the big boys and go for instant glory, or whether you want to guide a minnow to the top flight, Premier Manager will put you in the management hotseat.

Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter.description: Destroyer: the U-Boat Hunter is an interactive war thriller which seamlessly blends realistic WW2 anti-submarine warfare simulation with immersive tactical gameplay. Take command of a Fletcher-class destroyer and lead your escort group against German U-boats in the Battle of the Atlantic!

Premier Manager 06/07.description: Playability is central to the ethos of Premier Manager and 06/07 offers all football fans, young and old, the most accessible entry point to the management genre.

Premier Manager 05/06.description: Premier Manager returns for another season, with overhauled presentation and an enhanced interface that makes the world of football management even more accessible.

Premier Manager 04/05.description: You’ll experience all the emotions of football management in Premier Manager 2004-2005. Find out if you’ve got what it takes…

Premier Manager 03/04.description: Indulge in pan-European fantasy football by taking control of any club from the four English divisions, or simultaneously from the top two divisions of the continent’s premier leagues (Spain, Italy, France and Germany).

Premier Manager 02/03.description: Indulge in pan-European fantasy football by taking control of any club from the four English divisions, or simultaneously from the top two divisions of the continent’s premier leagues (Spain, Italy, France and Germany).

Silicon Dreams.description: It’s 2065, and you are an interrogator-model android tasked with rooting out deviants among your own kind. You must probe for lies, monitor and exploit emotional spikes, earn the trust of your subjects, and make the final call: release, or destroy?

Close Combat: Wacht am Rhein.description: Close Combat is a pausable real-time wargame series, heavily focused on historical accuracy and realistic soldier psychological profiles. Team management is crucial as every man in your team matter.

Methods: The Detective Competition.description: One hundred detectives compete against each other in a crime-solving competition.

The Forest Cathedral.description: The Forest Cathedral is a first-person psychological thriller set on a remote island. Playing as scientist Rachel Carson, players will slowly uncover the effects of DDT by using advanced environmental technology to solve 2D/3D connected puzzles in this dramatic retelling of Silent Spring.

Cat President 2: Purrlitical Revolution.description: The cats are back to win your heart—and your vote!

HOLMGANG: Memories of the Forgotten Demo.description: Dracorum was a land of peace and prosperity, but King Haziel's death caused darkness and wickedness over the kingdom. Everything seems lost, but three heroes will rise against injustice... It is time to know their stories.

Street Cleaner: The Video Game.description: From the dark streets of San Diego to the deepest depths of the criminal underworld, control the Street Cleaner as he takes down outlaw scum in search of justice.

Desohunter.description: "Desonia", the land of wealth and mystery, has been ravaged by invading monster armies. Years after the kingdom collapse, it is now a challenging destination sought by treasure hunters from around the world.

Chronicles of Honor.description: What is won when HONOR is lost? 3rd-Person RPG Roguelike Shooter. Scavenge weapons and items. Defeat your enemies. You will not survive. Super Humans. Distant Future.

Legend of Orion: Adventure.description: Legend of Orion: Adventure is a dungeon-building adventure and hack 'n slash game.

Remnants of the Dawn.description: 40 years in the future, after AI destroyed the world, a post-apocalyptic society lives hidden in the shadows knowing little of what came before. Venture down into a dark laboratory, fight your way past killer creatures, a maze of sinister traps, and evil AI to save the human race.

SpeedFighter.description: Speed and fighting, survive or death? just now, shooting at the outer space in the future. This is an exquisite high difficulty shooting game. good luck and do the best.

Night Jackal.description: Night Jackal is an irreverent shoot 'em up style retro racing game in the spirit of the challenging arcade games of the 80s.

Panzer Crew VR.description: A multiplayer tank deathmatch game where each tank is manned by three players: the commander, the driver and the gunner. Up to four tanks can battle for a total of 12 players. Can your crew work as a unit or will you devolve into chaos and be annihilated?

海腹川背 BaZooKa!.description: Umihara Kawase become esports?Rubbering battle action in fixed area.

Brothers in Blood: WW2 Co-op.description: Wage war across some of the most iconic battles in WWII. Featuring exciting cooperative action with up to eight players and a feeling of large scale combat.

New King.description: New King is a strategy game with the theme of medieval management and adventure. Players will play as a newly enthroned king to protect his land and people from the invasion of the orcs.

Karma City Police.description: Be the new dispatcher at the Karma City Police Station in this pixel adventure. Talk to the victims to discover their needs and fight in a unique pinball based battle system, as you follow a captivating story with lots of humor and a great soundtrack.

Gray platformer.description: It's beautiful and not difficult to pass the game

Whone.description: Collect the Hidden Gems, Survive the Treacherous Levels, and Upgrade Your Abilities as You Jump Your Way to Victory! But WATCH-OUT, if You Touch the Ground, You DIE!

VirtualCop.description: Step into the shoes of a New Zealand Police officer. Search for forensic evidence, connect with the community, and catch offenders in this immersive 3D experience. Do you care enough to be a cop?

Burst Planet.description: This is a distant alien world. As a member of Gamma planet, you need to investigate the truth of the explosion of the main star and fight against the monsters in the space to maintain the operation of star station 0.

三国志天下布武 Rise of Three Kingdoms.description: Rise Of Kingdoms is a game with features that connected with strategies and turn-based system. It is also mixed with real historical events and monarchs that appeared in the history.

Rainbows, toilets & unicorns.description: Rainbows, Toilets and Unicorns is a fast-paced shoot 'em up / bullet hell where the only option to avoid pooping yourself is to face your greatest fears in a fight to the last splash.

Shrine.description: Shrine is a retro FPS game about a skinless dude killing eldritch monstrosities with his nightmarish arsenal.

Sokpop S08: Clickbox.description: A tamagotchi-like growing game 🌱 Take care of a little box on your computer while doing something else!

Car Dealer.description: Buy and sell, manage the world's most popular auto gallery.

Let's Cook Together.description: Let's Cook Together is a cooperative, family-friendly game for 2 - play with your spouse, kid, (grand)parent or friend.

Healing Spree.description: Healing Spree is a tongue-in-cheek hospital simulator featuring co-op for up to 4 players. Play as doctors on call to diagnose, help, and treat as many patients as humanly possible while maintaining your sanity AND friendships!

The Wizard and The Slug.description: Jump, dash, and shoot your way through this story-rich action 2D platformer. Together with your magical wizard companion, play as the world's cutest, fastest, most agile slug as you explore a world full of charm, humor, and endearing characters.

Land of Screens.description: When Holland’s social media is lit ablaze by a recent breakup, she embarks on a new mission to ditch the social media saturation and discover some real-world relationships among a Land of Screens.

Rift Wizard.description: Rift Wizard is a tough as nails fantasy roguelike featuring challenging turn based combat and deep open ended character building. Craft your spellbook from over 100 unique spells and abilities and fight your way through a series of procedurally generated challenges to defeat your nemesis.

MushrooMonster.description: MushrooMonster is a first-person survival horror game. You arrived at the forest island tonight to fight the evil mushroom monster. There is only one way to kill the monster - that is to collect 12 mushrooms and burn them in a bonfire.

Bat of Dead.description: You are waiting for adventure and emotion. 2 for the price of one.

ALIVE Demo.description: Learn about humanity’s sin of greed in an escape room game where you play as Chris, a poor young man who looks for easy ways to get money but ends up in a virtual reality he can’t escape. Help Chris escape the rooms while uncovering the story behind them, and the man who created them.

Going Under Demo.description: Going Under is a satirical dungeon crawler about exploring the cursed ruins of failed tech startups. As an unpaid intern in the dystopian city of Neo-Cascadia, you’ll wield office junk as weaponry as you make your way through the offbeat procedural dungeons beneath your company campus.

Box Nation [ ].description: Box Nation [] is a sandbox kind of game. In this box world, you can become a leader of your own nation. Your main goal in the game is to create and develop your nation of boxes.

MUSCLE POWER.description: 3D action shooter that protects the world with muscles

TOSS!🍌.description: A bananas VR action platformer where you play as an acrobatic ape with the strength to swing and toss yourself freely between obstacles in challenging playgrounds 🍌

Snow Apocalypse.description: Hunt and kill as much zombies as you can. How long can you stay alive in the Snow Apocalypse?

Warehouse Tycoon.description: Warehouse Tycoon is a business management game in which you control all parts of your warehouse: Buying/selling products, designing your warehouse, and most importantly making a profit.

破阵图(Grids of World) Demo.description: Grids of World is an indie game developed by individual based on Tic-Tac-Toe principle.There are 9 strongholds in game,winning rules require players to occupy three consecutive strongholds forming a line.You can play with computer or online players to experience Team strategy and individual battle.

All Over.description: An indie Action RPG/adventure/puzzle Complete story-based quests, solve puzzles, use your sword and spells to fight and gain loot from monsters. Gather resources to build and craft potions and items. Fight legendary bosses.

Strobophagia | Rave Horror Demo.description: An occult forest rave ⸸ Strange rituals ⸸ Enigmatic organisers ⸸ An ancient evil ⸸ Pure Psychedelic Horror

Project Chemistry.description: Interact with elements and molecules in a way that you have never before! Observe them and make them react with each other in the sandbox mode. Synthesize every molecule in the quest mode. Discover countless macromolecules and the elegancy of chemistry.

Aeolis Tournament Demo.description: Use the power of the wind to compete in the various games of the Storm Championship in this charmingly chaotic 8-player action party game. Aeolis Tournament features physics-based gameplay, a tournament mode and local and online multiplayer play.

The Casebook of Arkady Smith (Demo).description: An open world investigation game set in a futuristic city. Take on the role of Arkady Smith, the famous investigator in this third person adventure game.

Defend the village from goblins.description: Survive against hordes of goblins in this casual survival rpg.

WHALIEN.description: Push and Pull your way through this heartfelt adventure! Fin, the mechanical whale you call home, is plagued by mischievous Squiddies. As Ernest Hemingwhale you set out on a puzzling journey to help your friend with these unexpected guests.

Iridium Demo.description: A frantic new 2d shoot 'em up with huge levels and truly massive enemy ships. Mixing game styles from Uridium, Xenon 2, Nemesis and R-Type.

Elemental Defenders.description: A Tower Defense where the Towers are moving around the enemies. With over 200 towers and endless mode. There is almost infinite strategies.

Kozue's Strange Journey.description: Having barely escaped with her life after being attacked by shadowy monsters, Kozue, and the woman who helped save her decide to team up to investigate the creatures and their connection to reports of mysterious disappearances around town.

KnotBot.description: From collecting buttons to solving tangled mazes, automate KnotBot on a quest of handcrafted puzzles. Solve the problems your own way, it's simple to understand but still deep and challenging.

Mazed and Bemused.description: A series of amazing puzzles and puzzling mazes. Maneuver an avatar through mazes, find clues, and solve puzzles.

Mazed and Bemused Demo.description: A series of amazing puzzles and puzzling mazes. Maneuver an avatar through mazes, find clues, and solve puzzles.

Virus Popper.description: Greetings Space Traveler, we need you to save the universe again! New virus variants threaten our galaxy. Level up with a new arsenal of weapons to combat them!

snake::reloaded.description: Immerse yourself in the exciting world of snake warfare, use special abilities, and follow an epic story!

Aria Disconnect.description: Aria Disconnect is an action-adventure. You are going to follow Heris journey to recover from the digital nightmare he has become stuck inside. The year is 2082, you are hooked to a machine, and there is only one way out, to disconnect.

Frag Grounds.description: Immerse yourself in the classic military shooter experience or obliterate your foes with state-of-the-art, prototype equipment such as plasma rifles, remotely controlled mechs or with some good ol' tanks and attack helicopters in this dynamic FPS.

Dawn at my Neighbourhood.description: Dawn at my Neighborhood is a tribute to classic 90s games, reworked with new mechanics and graphics inspired by N64 and PlayStation.

Inferno Wizards.description: Fight other players for control of wizard towers. A multiplayer action RPG with permadeath. Going for that sweet, sweet classic MMO feel.

Wishy Washy.description: In Calamityville, every day comes with a new disaster… and someone (you) has got to clean it up come rain, sleet, or…spaghetti sauce.

PowerBots Retro.description: PowerBots Retro is a pixel art styled metroidvania full of challenging levels and secret passages. Battle robots to level up, team up with friends to beat bosses, or fight against players to get ahead!

XRacer 2: Evolution.description: XRacer 2: Evolution is a fast car racing game with a completely physics-based driving experience!

Tales of War.description: A medieval pvp game where you have to capture all the flags to win.

Lord Winklebottom Investigates Demo.description: It’s the 1920s and the world’s foremost detective is about to embark on his most challenging case yet. Thankfully, in this world that’s not quite like our own, there’s nobody better to crack the case than the great detective and gentleman giraffe, Lord Winklebottom.

Gunslingers of the Wasteland vs. The Zom.description: Do battle across the American Southwest in this This Third-Person Shooter as you contend with the evil Dr. Arcturis and his legion of undead.

Magic Twins.description: Magic Twins is a cooperative arcade puzzler game in which Abra and Cadabra must use their chromagic powers to defeat hordes of color elementals and stop the Colormageddon.

Bingfa：Warring States.description: A tactical strategy game with a background set in the Warring States Period.

Planetation.description: On the harmstead you sow crops by day, plough hordes of alien pests by night, and spelunk the “Very Dark” depths whenever you damn well please. This bloodthirsty alien planet doesn’t want you here, but you’re a robot in a tractormech so what do you care?

UnFound.description: UnFound is a story-driven nonlinear real-time tactical stealth game set in a beautiful world. Take control of a deactivated robot who wakes up accidentally and goes on a journey to find out his identity and sparks an uprising of the clones against the system in a gorgeous handcrafted world.

Pharao Reloaded.description: In Pharao Reloaded you find yourself in the maze of an Egyptian pyramid full of treasures, monsters and potions. Each pyramid is more difficult than the previous one. Can you find the exit in time before the pyramid kills you? How far will you come? And can you survive your friends?

Carving Fate to Valhalla.description: Flee from the frozen winds by leading your Vikings to Valhalla in this survival strategic turn-based game. Explore and plan your trip in this world of fjords, care for your Vikings and the damned souls of Helheim. Don't forget, there are no wrong choices, just ones harder to take responsibility for.

Dark Fracture Demo.description: Dark Fracture is a psychological horror experience in which you explore an ever-changing world where reality and nightmares collide. Walk on the edge of madness in the shoes of a tormented soul as you descend into the darkest depths of the human psyche, and question everything you see.

Crowalt: Traces of the Lost Colony.description: A young adventurer Hugh Radcliff is in pursuit of one of the greatest mysteries of history: The Lost Colony. Deal with pirates, dive into native rituals, reveal conspiracies, and make tough choices on your difficult journey for unveiling this mystery!

UNDERZONE.description: SEARCH - RESCUE - SURVIVE - Smash walls, shoot enemies, rescue survivors, upgrade your Mole Mech, and uncover a dark conspiracy within a 22nd century disaster zone. Underzone is a new twist on the 'roguelite' genre, featuring procedural enemies built out of unique combinations of components.

Slash Roll.description: After slaying some spire, the taverns of Slash Roll are the ideal place to rest and play this dice pouch-building rogue-like with original mechanics.

KillSteel.description: Kill as many cars as you can in this action-packed free student game!

Square Fast.description: Square Fast is a fast-paced hardcore rhythm arcade with chiptune soundtrack by Balloonbear, where you have to defeat different enemies using only 2 buttons.It focuses on putting player into "flow state", where you don't think and only rely on your reflexes to do the job.

Get-A-Grip Chip.description: Get-A-Grip Chip is a charming and satisfyingly challenging grappling hook 2D platformer. Master the hook and fling through the increasingly intense floors of Roboco Mfg. Chuck Chip over chainsaws, launch over lasers, and even escape chases with Scan-It Janet.

Adventure Field™ 3 Definitive Edition.description: You are a young student living in Sarook. The perfect young student, but you feel something is not right. In dream you see a sword with a powerful aura. This sword is sent to the future from the past and you get teleported. You have to fight your way home with no real promises of success...

Puzzle - STONE BLOCKS.description: Free version of the Games for meditation and relaxation. Has 5 paid add-ons.

Western Sigil.description: Western Sigil is a tower defense & resource management game with a dose of strategy, where you control units of unlikely allies. Shoot your way through the hordes of creatures and save Weird West from the spreading plague!

Amendium.description: Join Axel and Lance in a full-scale quest to discover what happened to the planet they find themselves on. Journey through 3 seas and into many dungeons in search of answers as both Axel and Lance.

Quench Demo.description: Quench is a story-driven puzzle game set in a colourful, lo-fi world. Become shepherd, an avatar of nature, and guide herds of animals on their difficult journey. Help Shaman, the young Elephant leader, convince the other animal tribes to join her.

Attack on Toys.description: Relive Your Childhood Toys comes to life! Build your Army Toys, make battle scenario, watch the Toys battling each other, and customize your play with Attack on Toys Toy Box. Command your Army Toys to fight againts another toys strategically and keep them alive during battle!

4 Minutes to the Apocalypse.description: How hard is it to press the button that activates weapon capable of ending our entire civilization? How to control the arsenal of "The Last Day Weapons"?

Kainga.description: Kainga is an ancient village-builder set in an unusual land where your environment, technology and choices affect how your culture and and people develop. Adapt to the pressures of the weather, tame and build on massive beasts and defend against other tribes while trying to complete challenges.

Legacies.description: 4-player cooperative stealth / investigation roguelite game where players each pilot submarines and together search for trouble in international waters. But beware as dangers lurk above and deep below. Stealth is encouraged!

The Curse of Kubel.description: An earthquake swallows up the city of Kaldesta and splits it into two. Now many adventurers travel there in search of treasure. However, a curse suddenly appears and starts infecting the adventurers...

Amber Time.description: Amber world, let's feel the desire for money! Are you willing to accept this challenge and become a billionaire?

Operencia: The Stolen Sun Demo.description: Operencia: The Stolen Sun embraces everything you love about classic first-person dungeon-crawlers, enhancing the old-school turn-based RPG experience with modern sensibilities. Guide a team of memorable characters through a world inspired by Central European mythology.

告死天使的审判-Death Angel Trial.description: This is a game about online violence, all of which are based on the personal experience of the producer and shared with netizens. As far as possible to reduce the reality of one after another bloody cruel phenomenon. Today's victims may only be a little-known person, and the next It could be you.

勇者的十日人生.description: RpgMakerMV制作的传统日式开放式角色扮演游戏。勇者在游戏中的10天时间里，努力奋斗的故事。

Fly Punch Boom: First Impact!.description: The DEMO for the WILDEST ANIME FIGHT, Fly Punch Boom! Fly super fast, smash your friends through skyscrapers and break the planet with one punch! Up to 4 players local & online. Now with workshop for INFINITE CHARACTERS!

Hazel Sky Demo.description: Hazel Sky is a heartfelt adventure about a young engineer facing his destiny and his desires. Fix ramshackle flying machines and jump, climb, swing, and slide through a beautiful, mysterious world.

Fatal Evidence: The Missing Collector's.description: Can you clear an innocent man’s name in time?

Arko.description: Relax with this minimalist puzzle game.

Liberated Demo.description: Lock, load, and get ready for a new kind of action adventure! Immerse yourself in a noir rain-soaked city inside a paperback comic. Uncover a cyberpunk conspiracy against human rights. THIS is the revolution.

Dodo Adventures.description: Your holiday destination this year: Hamari Island. This non-violent VR adventure will give you a much-needed break from the reality. You can choose to explore a tropical island or fill tasks to further the story.

Damn Dolls.description: You are Suzi and your best friend Ana is missing.The only evidence you have is: That Ana was seen near an abandoned house in the forest and the former owner of the property was killed by local residents for being accused of kidnapping and killing a girl.Enter the house and solve this mystery!

War Smith.description: Team up with a friend as a skilled woodland critter in this horde based tower-defense indie game.

MasterPlan.description: Masterplan is a very well-received visual project planning tool made by a single indie dev for indie developers and creatives.

Batbarian Demo.description: Batbarian: Testament of the Primordials is a snarky action-adventure puzzle game with a good dose of humor. Explore hundreds of secret-filled rooms, fight big bosses, gather companions for your party and use the powers of Pip—your bat buddy—to solve puzzles and escape the eldritch abyss!

Floody Demo.description: Let's Have Fun in a HARDCORE Party Game! Be the last one standing on platforms. Build the stage with friends. (And block them!) There are more rules waiting for you to discover!

Divisadero Demo.description: Divisadero is a cli-fi, true crime narrative adventure that makes use of investigation and choice. It's a story driven game with adult themes and cinematic pixel art.

The 100-Player Twitch Chat Party Pack.description: A unique experience for streamers with a large audience - This pack of simple-to-learn minigames and upgraded arcade classics allows you to play with up to 100 people in your Twitch chat, in real-time.Need to step away? Turn on AFK mode to give your chat a way to stay engaged.

Duster Demo.description: Traveling west is dangerous, and you will die hilariously! Your choices of gear change your gameplay, and unlocking new equipment allows for new strategies! Scavenge for supplies, avoid wolves, and fend off outlaws. You could die of dysentery or bear attack, so be prepared for anything!

Goofy Golf Remastered Steam Edition.description: Goofy Golf Remastered is a 5 reel, 25 pay-line slot machine (pokie) with a Zany Golfing theme, oriented from left to right.

Outside The Grid.description: Imagine that you are in prison. Not everyone can escape from the hands of justice, you need to have an IQ above average. Blow up, destroy, hide, kill, evolve - all this can be done in the game Outside the Grid. But do not forget about Kerbalai, help him finally find peace!

Dungeon Of Dark.description: Dungeon of Dark - is a turn-based game about the dungeon with all sorts of enemies, objects and items. Choose a hero and explore the dungeon. Fight many enemies on the 3x3 battlefield and defeat bosses. Use items wisely.

Tuneria.description: Tuneria is a music-focused RPG inspired by games such as Golden Sun, Ocarina of Time, Chrono Trigger, and To the Moon. Bring your guitar and join the other Songsmiths. Use your guitar in battle by playing powerful Tunes, or use those same tunes in the environment to discover hidden secrets!

Skitt.description: Skitt is a first person hero shooter. Choose your character, upgrade your shelter and protect it from a devastating parasite.

EleMetals: Death Metal Death Match! Demo.description: Chuck metal shards and HEADBANG FOR AMMO! Don't let your SOUL escape! Fast-paced Arcade action - SHRED YOUR FRIENDS!

Impulse Control.description: Realistic building destruction meets personality quiz! Squash the meanies using skill and wits to unlock your unique personality profile. The levels feature challenging structures that won't fall down easily.

Dark Fracture.description: Dark Fracture is a psychological horror experience in which you explore an ever-changing world where reality and nightmares collide. Walk on the edge of madness in the shoes of a tormented soul as you descend into the darkest depths of the human psyche, and question everything you see.

Divisadero.description: Divisadero is a cli-fi, true crime narrative adventure that makes use of investigation and choice. It's a story driven game with adult themes and cinematic pixel art.

Doors of Insanity.description: Cards and Chaos await you in Doors of Insanity, a Deck Building RPG roguelike with a focus on character creation and incredible loot!

Flappy Hypership Out of Control.description: Space is a dangerous placed for even the most seasoned and flappy starship pilot when you your accelerator is stuck to the floor and your brakes are out. Can you survive long enough to get that elusive high score or are you destined to add a new crater to the face of an unsuspecting wall?

Project Toon Tanks.description: Welcome to Project Toon Tanks! Epic battle arenas where two players (or one player and an AI if you are ... taking a break) fight to the death. Nothing is historically accurate here and that is AWESOME!

Raindrops.description: Raindrops is a stereo rhythm game, played with your mouse. Notes will be poured from both sides, and the sound will wave towards the direction of succesful hits. Move your mouse, click with both buttons, even scroll to take care of these notes.

方圈 Square Circle.description: Here used to be a world full of color and vitality! One day, the colorful origin stones that make up the world were exploded into seven pieces, scattered around the world! The world has become dull and monotonous ever since...

Mystic Pillars Demo.description: Mystic Pillars is an original blend of intriguing puzzles and an immersive storyline set in Ancient India, providing you with a unique gameplay experience.

Fluid Engine PC Live Wallpaper.description: Beautiful interactive simulation of liquid on your screen as live wallpaper. Many options will allow you to adapt it to your requirements.

Ultimate Dinos World.description: Ultimate Dinos World is a clean and stylish interactive 3D live wallpaper that display cool low-poly dinos on the desktop with animated backgrounds. You can control and interact with dinos with your mouse.

When The Past Was Around Demo.description: When the Past was Around is an adventure point-and-click puzzle game about love, moving on, letting go, and the joy and pain of everything in between.

A Space For The Unbound Demo.description: A slice-of-life adventure game with beautiful pixelart set in the late 90s rural Indonesia that tells a story about overcoming anxiety, depression, and the relationship between a boy and a girl with supernatural powers

War Islands.description: Embark on a magical journey with 3 adventurers. Overcome fearsome beasts and challenging puzzles in an online third-person co-op game with your friends.

Lairland Story.description: 這是一款戀愛養成遊戲的復刻版本，支援720P。遊戲中玩家與來自異世界的神秘少女奇莉婭展開四年的共同生活，直到故事最後，她會選擇屬於自己的未來。

Low Poly Forces.description: LOW POLY FORCES is made with COMMUNITY FEEDBACK as the ULTIMATE LOW POLY SHOOTER Players can master their skills like our unique Movement and show off their strategies in a wide range of maps and modes. Customize your Arsenal with New Attachments and Weapons to unlock as you progress in the game.

Seven Horns From Tilt.description: Help Libby tilt through various obstacles in order for him to meet his parents on the other side.

Curious Expedition 2 Demo.description: Curious Expedition 2 is a turn-based narrative roguelike set in a reimagined version of the late 19th century that uses procedural gameplay and story elements to create completely unique and epic adventures every time you play.

Rising Hell Demo.description: Rising Hell is a vertical platformer rogue-lite filled with adrenaline-pumping action and tons of heavy gothic metal shreds. Climb out from the ever-changing hell while you fight hordes of blood-lusting demons.

Knockdown the Ball Twice.description: Meet the most annoying ball rolling game!

Fantasy World Online Tycoon.description: Ready to manage your Massive Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game? This is your chance! Fantasy World Online Tycoon will let you build and control any aspect of a MMORPG. Build spawns of Monsters, Quests and Dungeons. Be the CEO of your company, hire specialists and evolve your game!

ENHANCE.description: ENHANCE VR offers a daily brain training workout of short and fun games designed by neuroscientists to test and train your cognitive skills.

A Game of Humans.description: A sandbox village simulation fundamentally about people, their thoughts and their needs. Luckily they are not alone in their burden, for you possess divine powers. And you would surely never add to the plight of the common man... Right?

Trashed.description: Take over a disfunctional Waste Management Facility on a distant planet. Build incinerators, recyclers, robots, turrets, and more. Battle vicious creatures on the planet's surface with powerful weapons!

holedown.description: A delightful spectacle of bouncing. Dig deep underground by shooting balls and breaking blocks, traversing your way to the planet cores.

Endless RPG: Random Dungeon Map Generato.description: Endless RPG is a random dungeon map generator for 5th Edition Dungeons and Dragons that features a fog-of-war that allows players to explore the dungeon without the need for a dedicated dungeon master.

Pinball Lockdown.description: The classic retro arcade game! Discover thrilling tables with challenges and missions, including dragons, space, casinos and our Classic Wonderland table complete with original illustrations.

Pushy and Pully in Blockland Demo.description: Pushy and Pully in Blockland is an endearing co-op arcade game that will take you and a friend through ever-challenging levels. Kill monsters, match blocks, defeats bosses. Recover your spaceship and escape Blockland.

WRC 9 FIA World Rally Championship.description: WRC is the leading off-road simulation franchise. It returns with even more realistic gameplay and more content than ever: 3 new rallies, 35 new special stages, creation of your own custom championships and completely redesigned engine sounds.

Vectronom Demo.description: Welcome to the psychedelic world of Vectronom: experience waves of color and a pulsing geometric path that changes with the beat! All set to a hypnotic electronic soundtrack. There’s only one thing to do: turn up the volume and go with the flow.

Classic Sport Driving.description: A retro racer for racing lines lovers! 🌴|🚘|🚘|🌵 ▶️Unlimited tracks / simple code based generation. ▶️Get back to 1990 and chase the checkpoints! ▶️Challenge your friends for the best driving skills! Difficulty ranging from casual curves to hairpins! ⛐

Birth ME Code Demo.description: The second entry of the Abime Series. Play as the mastermind in a death game where you must find the traitor while concealing your identity. Six hours, one school, six deaths. Nine participants fight for survival: it's kill or be killed, trust or deceive, escape or die.

Heartless reseller is Roguelike.description: Roguelike action unfolds in supermarkets! We aim at the back of the dungeon while collecting various "resale items" in the supermarket. If you have some "resale items", the enemy "resale rogue" will attack the player and try to steal the "resale items". Timing is also important.

Episode 1: Mission KT.description: Just before a meteor crash triggers the ultimate demise of dinosaurs you have a chance to play MissionKT and explore their world. Discover how much stardust you have inherited from T-Rex. Find the hidden treasure. Interact with dinosaurs. Escape from Earth before the meteor seals your fate.

Intergalactic Transfer Station.description: Build & manage your Intergalactic Transfer Hub. Receive travellers and dock ships. Help passengers transfer, but also control them. Expand hub, build shops, take care of everyone's needs. Increase profits, change taxes. But beware: dangerous diseases and asteroids may alter your plans!

Linda & Joan Prologue: “Four Months Earl.description: Linda & Joan is a narrative game about a British family. You play as Russell, Linda, and Joan — son, mother, and grandmother — switching between them to help the family cope with a series of traumatic events. Based on a true story. “Four Months Earlier” is part one of the Linda & Joan story.

Gutwhale.description: Gutwhale is a roguelite about managing the space between you and your ammo, while fighting your way through a digestive system!

Smartphone Tycoon - Lite.description: «Smartphone Tycoon - Lite» — unique business simulator. Create your own company for the production of smartphones! Your main goal will be to achieve worldwide recognition and take the company to the temple of fame of the global market.

Hinterhalt 3.description: Join the battlefield in this chaotic warfare and dominate your opponents in this whimsical and unique setting! Immerse yourself in an indispensable quirky conflict between nations of toy soldiers and lead your army to victory at all costs.

Xenogunner.description: Blast your way past a large variety of bosses, from an imposing robot dragon to a fierce mercenary in a flying car, and save the universe from the evil Xenogunner in this intense boss-focused run-and-gun platformer!

Melvor Idle.description: Inspired by RuneScape, Melvor Idle takes the core of what makes an adventure game so addictive and strips it down to its purest form! This is a feature-rich, idle/incremental game combining a distinctly familiar feel with a fresh gameplay experience. Maxing 20+ skills has never been more zen.

Stealth Master.description: This is a game that allows players to make their favorite stealth game scene. Before players start making custom scenes, there will be 30 various missions to help players understand the rules of the game, including different masks, weapons and enemies.

Deadly Dozen: Pacific Theater.description: Penetrate the island strongholds of Japanese Imperial forces with your squad of commandos in this tactical World War II first person shooter. Stealth, a cool head and your M1 may buy you one more day. Can you survive the hard-edged intensity of the Pacific theater?

Hunting Unlimited 1.description: Spot your prey quickly then get into position for the ultimate in hunting action! Packed with over 220 missions – including the bonus Master Campaigns – pursuing 5 species of game in 5 rich environments, Hunting Unlimited is the innovative original hit that started a long running series!

Cosmic Flow: A Relaxing VR Experience.description: Cosmic Flow is a relaxing visual experience, an audio-visual massage for the mind, a kaleidoscopic meditation.

FotoMuseo 3D.description: Discover all the hidden secrets in this little 3D Interactive Exploration Adventure. You must cross the Earthgate Portal to visit the Photographic EXPO at the FotoMuseo. On your journey you will find clues and objects with which to unlock secrets and new areas.

Mystic Isles.description: Mystic Isles is an online multiplayer strategy board game with 2-6 friends.

Onryo | 怨霊.description: Onryo | 怨霊 is a survival action horror game set in Japan. Your mission is to lift the curse of a haunted house using your exorcistic camera. As you explore the house and uncover its secrets, you will face enemies and puzzles.

Group Project Simulator.description: In a group project with a colorful cast of characters, Yu must try to get that A. Fail at scheduling group meetings, stop group members from procrastinating, and maybe adopt a cat.

Blind Spot.description: Blind Spot is a story-driven puzzle adventure game. Solve various puzzles all over the room to proceed, and explore every detail of surroundings to find what really happened.

Test Of Courage.description: Test of Courage is a horror game where you have to explore an abandoned school in search of your two friends. The only hint you have is the "Courage Test" in which you have to find 10 objects around the academy while maintaining your sanity.

Kurogane of the sky.description: A game where you control a fleet-scale airship and fight enemy flying battleships. I think it's more like a simulation or a strategy than an action.

あの日見た夕陽 Demo.description: This is a completely original, full-color visual novel. More than 700 stills for the full version (more than 400 for the demo version). ※This work contains very extreme and grotesque language. There is no sexual content.

Sunrise 7 Demo.description: You are a shadow. Run to escape the Sunrise!

Warriors of the Nile.description: Choose skill tablets to build your unique squad. Show your tactics in fast-paced battles. Lead the warriors blessed by the Egyptian gods to challenge random levels and powerful bosses. Defeat the Serpent Apophis and bring back the sun.

Broll - Demo.description: Broll is a 3D ragdoll-based platformer, explore open levels, use the ragdoll to interact with the world, and solve awesome challenges!

SUPERHERO-X [Alpha Edition].description: SUPERHERO-X [Alpha Edition]: is the only create your own fighter fighting game of its kind. With an all NEW Costume build engine/formula that lets players mix and match different fighting styles with different "POWER-UPs" to create FIGHTING VARIATIONS.

Sapper.description: In Sapper, you play a small anti-pirate. mine-sapper unit. Cleanse local home vessels and exotic alien craft of enemies, mines, and watch vast ships ride to safety as you collect your bounty.

Axe Girl.description: Axe Girl! The only video game starring a female lumberjack. (As far as we know) Slash your way through fierce foes in this awesome action platformer! Chop to it and kick some axe!

Carestia.description: Explore the underground, solve the puzzles, get new skills and fight against robots in a 2d pixelart game.

Hectic Demo.description: Hectic Void is an arcade First Person Shooter that throws the player back into the roots of the classic FPS genre, featuring a huge arsenal of weapons and many enemies to destroy.

Together in Battle.description: An SRPG roguelite with vibrant procedurally generated characters and emergent relationship-building. Uncover a sinister conspiracy; fight deep turn-based tactical battles; handle random events; watch your characters grow together.

Labyrinth: The Exit Is Closer.description: You are in a Maze. Rescue yourself.

Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.description: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals is a multiplayer horror party game with multiple modes where players take on the role of monsters or mortals from Dark Deception's universe (and other universes) and fight for soul shards in nightmarish mazes!

Ultimate ADOM - Caverns of Chaos.description: Experience the sequel of the traditional roguelike dungeon-crawling classic. Enjoy unlimited replayability through endless procedurally generated dungeons, countless monsters, grafting, crafting and a vast amount of skill trees. Journey into the ever changing depths of the Caverns of Chaos.

The Last Stand: Aftermath.description: From the creators of The Last Stand: Union City and Dead Zone comes an all-new singleplayer rogue-lite action adventure. After you become infected by the zombie virus, you set out to explore the post-apocalypse and find hope for your fellow survivors. You can still make a difference. Don't give up.

Tactical Troops: Anthracite Shift.description: Top-down, turn-based game that mixes tactical skills and the feeling of 80's sci-fi movies. Command a troop of soldiers in a singleplayer campaign or fight on one of 24 multiplayer maps. Explore the planet Anthracite, using advanced teleportation technology and gridless movement.

Operation DogFight.description: Operation DogFight is a free local multiplayer airplane combat game where all the pilots are Dogs. Make use of dog-themed weapons to take down your friends across multiple maps.

Death end re;Quest 2.description: In collaboration with Corpse Party scenario writer Makoto Kedouin, this horror RPG follows Mai Toyama’s search for her sister in a quiet lakeside town. She’ll unravel clues to the town’s past by day, and battle Shadow Matter by night. Can you uncover the truth before reality is consumed by darkness?

Tribble Troubles.description: For the first time ever, play as a Tribble from everyone's favorite episode by David Gerrold: “The Trouble with Tribbles!” Jump, climb and squish your way through 16 challenging levels in four different environments. Boldly go where no Tribble has gone before!

Real Life Plus Ver. Kaname Komatsuzaki.description: Real Life Plus Ver. Kaname Komatsuzaki is a game that lets you enjoy life interacting and growing up with Kaname Komatsuzaki, a childhood friend of protagonist, Kouichi.

Super No Crying in Baseball.description: An endless baseball rogue-like where you play baseball and manage your emotions at the same time.

HookSharks.description: Hooksharks is a local multiplayer game about glory, and most of all, battling sharks with giant hooks attached to them.

Climb.description: Climb is a relatively simple obstacle course game, in which you control a ball. However, the physics have been tweaked to make it more interesting. Most likely falling under the category of simple but aggravating, this game will have you repeatedly clicking restart in an attempt to score better.

Paper Ghost Stories: 7PM.description: Follow the shared experience of three children for a day during ghost-month and the arrival of a mysterious new neighbor. Things quickly take a dark turn as what was supposed to be an offer of friendship triggers a series of strange events.

Lost In Fantaland.description: Lost In Fantaland is a retro pixel-style roguelite game that blends deck building and turn-based strategies on a checkerboard.

Disarmed.description: A satirical fantasy puzzle game about healthcare.

Match Number Panels.description: A simple matching game. Please take a break-based game.

MiNNaDe Counter Fight.description: "MiNNaDe Counter Fight" is a ramen cooking game based on the VR Ramen Shop Simulator "Counter Fight" that allows up to four players to enjoy local multiplayer. Familiar customers and robbers also appear. Find a playable character full of personality that suits you and head to the kitchen right now.

鋼鉄戦記C21.description: C21 Steel Battle Chronicles is an Action MMORPG in which you can customize your very own robot to determine how it fights in battle. Become a member of the Neo Angel Force and defeat the nefarious Demon Force to restore peace to the Cosmic Renaissance!

亦春秋 Power Of Seasons.description: 《亦春秋》是由上海丹橘游戏工作室研发的一款仙侠题材ARPG单机游戏，以中国春秋时代为原型的架空设定，讲述了淮国与闽国争霸，闽国战败之将灵姑浮满门被屠，遗子灵姑从在乱世中成长历险，为报国仇家恨的故事。

ZOE.description: Hand-drawn bullet-hell! A frenetic shooter combining the run-and-gun mechanics of Metal Slug with the infinite loops and shmup-ing of Resogun, wrapped up with old-fashioned drawn-on-film style animation. Fight your own creator as the artist bears down on you with pen and paintbrush!

ZOE Demo.description: Hand-drawn bullet-hell! A frenetic shooter combining the run-and-gun mechanics of Metal Slug with the infinite loops and shmup-ing of Resogun, wrapped up with old-fashioned drawn-on-film style animation. Fight your own creator as the artist bears down on you with pen and paintbrush!

SGS Afrika Korps.description: The game recreates the campaigns and battles of Erwin ‘Desert Fox’ Rommel’s legendary Afrika Korps, in Libya between 1941 and 1942. Play the Axis forces to conquer the most valuable prize of all: the Suez Canal. Or command the 8th Army soldiers, the famous Desert Rats, to repel the invaders.

Cyber Driver VR.description: This is the VR version of my other popular game "Cyber Driver". It integrates all the optimizations of the latter and is completely re-created for VR control. In the game you will drive a hover taxi to avoid obstacles and pick up passengers, and continuously accumulate higher scores.

Strobophagia | Rave Horror.description: An occult forest rave ⸸ Strange rituals ⸸ Enigmatic organisers ⸸ An ancient evil ⸸ Pure Psychedelic Horror

Sokpop S07: Chatventures.description: chatventures is a text-adventure MMORPG. you travel through a fantasy world where you interact with every thing through text commands such as "punch" and "check". each area is a different chatroom!

NASCAR Heat 5.description: NASCAR Heat 5 challenges you to become the 2020 NASCAR Cup Series champion. Features all the official teams, drivers and cars from the three NASCAR National Series as well as the Xtreme Dirt Tour, racing on 39 authentic tracks.

Cave Digger PC.description: Cave Digger PC is a mining game in an alternative western setting. Gear up with numerous unique tools and explore the town and the depths of the mountain. Discover secrets, easter eggs and multiple endings.

Wunderling Demo.description: Dash, jump, and fly at full speed through Wunderling DX: a non-stop puzzle platformer and the world's first "goomba simulator"! Race against the clock, beat tricky puzzles to uncover shiny secrets, and stomp the odds to please your evil overlord!

Kongfusion.description: Kongfusion is an action packed kung fu rhythm experience where the player takes on a horde of space kung fu masters. Slam into your opponents on the beat and show everyone who's boss with a variety of weapons.

Dark City: Dublin Collector's Edition.description: Can you catch a magical culprit behind a string of strange robberies?

QUIZ PRO! - General Knowledge.description: Train your brain and improve your IQ today being playing this fun general knowledge quiz! How smart are you? Learn some new facts today! No matter if you’re alone or playing with friends or family, you’ll will have a lot of fun with this QUIZ game!

Pixel Fixer.description: Restore 100 pictures, which were accidentally shredded. Click and drag the rows, and the will be glued when you release them so that they fit together. You can zoom the pixels to see how they fit, and you can choose 7 difficulty levels to find the best amusing challenge.

Lethal Honor Essence.description: Brutal, obscure, and punishing action-adventure roguelite with a dark atmosphere and gothic hand-drawn graphic novel art.

Smashing Healthy VR.description: Smashing Healthy VR is a fitness game for those people who are willing to be healthy. Smash the box if you want to be healthy!

Vampire: The Masquerade — Parliament of.description: Dominate undead politics through cunning and violence! Will a missing Prince give you the opening to betray your sire and seize power?
Dominate undead politics through cunning and violence! Will a missing Prince give you the opening to betray your sire and seize power?

Unoccupied.description: Unoccupied is a first-person action game with procedurally generated environment, challenging gameplay and intelligent bots.

Through the Nightmares.description: The atmospheric hardcore action platformer about the Sandman wandering the world of children's nightmares. You will have to find and rescue the children from the trap of the almighty Morpheus, by overcoming all their fears.

The Unexpected Quest Demo.description: Adventure game with strategy and management elements in a medieval fantasy setting - drawing inspiration from classics such as Warcraft 3 and The Settlers. Embark on quests, hunt down treasures and manage your resources as you build, battle, cast magic and brew potions to bring order to the world.

Disturbing Forest: Demon's Path.description: Disturbing Forest is a first-person adventure game set in a picturesque fantasy world filled with danger. Fight monsters, solve original puzzles, and get carried away by the rapid flow of the story that you co-create through numerous in-game choices.

Mr. Prepper Demo.description: Mr. Prepper is about being prepared. You know something is wrong. The risk of a nuclear war is in the air and you need to get ready for what's coming.

Tiara the Deceiving Crown Demo.description: Play as a brave knight on his journey to the Cursed island to rescue a Princess. Tiara the Deceiving Crown will take you back to the era of classic RP titles, with freedom of exploration, secrets and beautiful pixel art!

The Wild Case Demo.description: The Wild Case is a 2D first-person point-and-click adventure. In this story-focused adventure, players meet a cast of colorful characters, experience mysterious encounters, and solve puzzles to progress through the game.

Toolboy Demo.description: Help our Hero in this difficult mission, discover new powers, solve puzzles, climb, jump, swim and face the opponents.

Bonfire Peaks Demo.description: Set your belongings on fire on a beautiful voxel art puzzle island.

Space Court.description: As a newly appointed Judge, you will rule over Space Court and its denizens to keep the universe safe. Or possibly blow it all up. Either way, you’re tenured.

Crypterion Demo.description: Crypterion is a business Sim / Tycoon with the story depth of a Visual Novel: Recruit an interesting cast of characters as your crew, purchase planetary goods, pay taxes, and go on T.V. to become famous! Crypterion is about your story, choices, and becoming rich through markets & investments.

Charge Blade Hero Demo.description: A fast paced 2D hack and slash, adventure game. Attack, Dodge, and Charge Up to maintain your weapon's durability as you take on waves of enemies.

Wild Planet.description: Unwind and enjoy the life in Wild planet ; a relaxing adventure full of discoveries and quests! You're shipwrecked on a mysterious planet with your crew. Build your own camp, hunt, craft and discover the story behind those mysterious lands. All while the environment changes around you.

Colour Flux.description: Combine colours! Unleash combos! Earn points! Become a colour master!

Wild Planet Demo.description: Unwind and enjoy the life in Wild planet ; a relaxing adventure full of discoveries and quests! You're shipwrecked on a mysterious planet with your crew. Build your own camp, hunt, craft and discover the story behind those mysterious lands. All while the environment changes around you.

Ninja Simulator.description: Ninja Simulator is an action-adventure stealth game, which takes place in feudal Japan. You will play as a mercenary hired for missions of infiltration, espionage and elimination. Your actions will strenghten or overthrow rival clans and change the course of history.

Oirbo Demo.description: Explore a labyrinthian spacecraft and discover its mysteries and purpose. Help Oirbo navigate a metroidvania inspired, hand-drawn, 2D action-platformer full of secrets to uncover, areas to explore and enemies to dismantle. The choices are yours to make, how will you unravel the twisted story?

Fantasy Story Demo.description: Fantasy Story is a tight, punchy platformer with more than 80 rooms across four distinct zones, all employing unique mechanics to make for new challenges. Enemies are varied, tough and there are plenty of secrets to uncover. The world is deep, rich, and ready to explore.

Wrestledunk Sports Demo.description: Wrestledunk is an explosive, colorful collection of super competitive multiplayer sports games! Face off online or locally with up to 8 players. Get into it!

Sbeve.description: A game of immense adventure and fun excavation potential.

Hurry Up!.description: Hurry UP! is a casual game where you can play with your friends and other people. Be ready for a game that will charm you in with entertaining mechanics and atmospheric views.

Hoops Madness.description: SQUARE OFF against other players in Hoops Madness to see who is the best shot through several fun challenges that ultimately determine who will take MVP honors for the match.

Duel on Board Demo.description: Duel on Board is a 1 vs 1 local multiplayer competitive / party game where pirates fight for the precious beer while sailing the dangerous high seas. Just like old school games, you can play with your friend on the same keyboard!

The Door Of Redemption.description: When you wake up in a dungeon full of peculiar smell, someone tells you: you must find a way to escape from this dungeon, and be careful, you are not alone……

The lost Labyrinth.description: After waking up, Sophie finds herself in an eerie place and sets out to free tormented creatures and, discover if this is real or just a nightmare! Dive into a breathtaking match-3 adventure as you find your path through the cursed labyrinth and fight the dark forces that appose all who enter.

Fear the Dark Unknown: James.description: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

Pizza Bike Rider.description: Only someone who can take his ride to its extremes can deliver the pizza on time. Be aware the road is full of fast moving vehicles.Come Take the pizza Bike challenge if you Dare.Your goal is to deliver pizzas to the client as fast and as hot as you can without letting the time run out.

The Bonfire 2: Uncharted Shores Demo.description: Build, survive, explore. Design your city, manage resource chains and workers, Send ships on expedition, trade with cities, discover mysterious dungeons and uncover secrets of ancients.

RITE.description: RITE is a high-speed, precision platformer where you must conquer a series of challenging trials, a rite of passage for every Nim.

Spitlings Demo.description: Frantic Gameplay, Juicy Visuals, Hypnotic Beats: SPITLINGS is a cute but unforgiving Hardcore Arcade Game for 1 - 4 players in which you waggle through a gauntlet of bouncy bubbles.

Endless Battle: Return of Hero +1.description: Help Hero rebuild the entire universe, and beyond! An idle incremental adventure.

VR-NISSAGE 3 - John Wentz Art Exhibition.description: VR-NISSAGE 3 - A room scale virtual reality art exhibition of paintings by artist John Wentz

Overseer Demo.description: Overseer is a top-down roguelike game, heavily inspired by Dungeon Souls. Play with friends and enjoy the intense splashy combat together. The Overseer system allows you to take control of the dungeon, keep spawning monsters, place traps, and change the layout of the dungeon to spice things up.

Automata Break.description: Stop the escape of the infected automata in this Local Co-op Tower Defense First Person Shooter game for VR. Choose between playing solo or collaborating with a friend to build defensive structures and fight the Automata to avoid their escape.

Marshall Mellow.description: Marshall Mellow is a game about jumping up blocks as they fall.

Taken Away.description: Taken Away is a non-linear strategic horror game. Following a car "accident", you have been abducted. Explore your surroundings, don't get caught, and figure out a way to escape if you don't want to perish in a gruesome death.

Tower of Samsara: Hidden Treasures - Dem.description: Summon the forces of the Sun to face tough enemies in this hard souls-like puzzle platform 2D when a long dead Plutonian is ressurected by the primordial light of the Sun seeking for a champion to avoid its impending doom.

Puzzle Party Demo.description: Puzzle Party is a simple, damaged pixel style block pushing puzzle game with a few twists! Jump into the perpetual void as you immerse yourself in the odd tale of Amid, his old partner, and the strange phenomena that surrounds their abandoned passion project.

Undercat Demo.description: Undercat is a 2D action platformer where you play as a rebellious dog who is tired of catkind’s tyranny. Catch cats and shake out all their coins and use them to buy items. Throw stuff at your enemies and be shot from a cannon. Solve puzzles and end the cat tyranny once and for all.

Pluviophile.description: Pluviophile is a very short experience about the mood of rain in the woods.

Santa Monica Paradise.description: “Santa Monica Paradise” is a romantic comedy visual novel and dating sim set in sunny Santa Monica. Play as a famous chef visiting California and meeting new people.

HARTS ISLAND.description: Northeast Bronx, New York City. The remains of more than one million people are buried on Harts Island.

Time Of Special Team(T.O.S.T).description: In 2035, Cauldron-City with only disorder and chaos remain. Assigned as a sniper of the confidential special team, you must remove the enemies covertly and accurately.

The Case Book of Arne.description: A vampire and a girl... who are they?　The two of them have a secret and solve a strange case... In a world where paranormal activity takes place, "Player" solves a case in which a non-human becomes a suspect. Such a "detective adventure" is coming to STEAM.

Tsugunohi.description: One of the most terrifying J-horror games of all time is coming to Steam at long last. What's more, all you have to do is make the player walk to the left!? This collection includes the seven initial works of the popular Tsugunohi series, as well as an entirely new episode.

Uphold The Realm.description: Uphold The Realm is a VR Tower Defense game that lets you take command of your wargames style campaign map to interact with levels and manage towers. When your ready - Shrink down onto the table and use your archery skills to defend against the oncoming hordes.

Monstaal.description: Demolish enemies as a Monstaal, a creature transformed from another realm, as you try to escape the world in story mode or defend it from the horde. Become a champion by taking down bosses and collecting spheres from perished enemies to cleanse the world!

Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Bells.description: An author has vanished, and someone’s enacting the terrible events of his latest novel!

Super Ubie Island 2.description: Ubie has escaped the clutches of the Evil Dr. Terrestrial! But now he's going back to rescue his friends! Jump, roll, and balloon glide your way back through Climate Island to defeat Dr. Terrestrial once and for all!

Rocket Ghost Aidan 2.description: Scared to play cause most(understating word) free games suck? Well this game was made with IMMENSE just passion. If you end up hating or loving and or nothing; you will like at the least like what you feel, cause what you feel is what's real; and feeling real is so important.

Hello Neighbor 2.description: Hello Neighbor 2 is a stealth horror game about digging up your creepy neighbor’s secrets. But there’s a twist: the Neighbor is controlled by an AI that learns from the players! As time passes, his behavior will change and surprise you! Can you outsmart the Neighbor and find out what he’s hiding?

Corona Find Us.description: A party game about cleaning virus. Shared/Split Screen Co-op gameplay for no limitation of player numbers.

Horribunnies Demo.description: In Horribunnies, you get to pet, raise, and genetically engineer cute bwunnies~~ Will your bunny business become the sweetest or the most profitable?

Sword and Spirit.description: Play as an adventurer who is trying to escape an ancient labyrinth with a magical sword! Fight enemies, power up your sword, and talk to spirits to successfully make it out of the labyrinth!

Flow Space Demo.description: Flow Space is a new type of VR rhythm game combining dance, art, and music, allowing you to trace featured Flow Tracks and record your own signature Flow.

Banana Slug Beach.description: Banana Slug Beach is an open world voxel game where everything can be sculpted, even players. Your world evolves over time, reacting to player & bot actions. Play alone, or with friends-- build a world together and try to prevent its collapse!

Gravitators.description: Gravitators is a twin stick shooter game where you pilot ships and complete mission objectives to secure the future of humankind. Defend the Earth and travel through the galaxy to repel a relentless alien invasion.

Horror Adventure VR.description: Horror Adventure VR is a interactive experience set in a procedurally generated haunted house. You're a paranormal investigator and you find yourself exploring what appears to be a old abandoned manor.

Horror Adventure VR Demo.description: Horror Adventure VR is a interactive experience set in a procedurally generated haunted house. You're a paranormal investigator and you find yourself exploring what appears to be a old abandoned manor.

Labyrinth Legend.description: Labyrinth Legend is an action RPG with hack and slash elements. Explore the automatically-generated dungeons, collect powerful equipment, and battle against unknown, formidable enemies!

No one lives in heaven.description: What happens to the inhabitants of a game world after you have finished it? In the story-driven, 40-hour role-playing game No one lives in heaven, you will encounter over 200 unique NPCs with over 300 quests that can be solved in various ways. Philosophical and crazy.

Memory note.description: Memory note is a slice-of-life visual novel with meaningful player choices, several endings to explore, and a story that will touch your heart.

Death Come True.description: "A new wave interactive movie game" where your actions, and the ending of the story, are determined by your choices. A completely new science fiction mystery, in full-length live-action movie format, from genius creator of the "Danganronpa" series, Kazutaka Kodaka.

Slams City. Hitler's Escape..description: Slams City is a platform game in which our hero, with the help of a veteran who remembers World War II, comes across the trail of a suspicious operation gathering pace in the city's underground.

MonsterTerritory.description: MonsterTerritory is a click adventure game. Explore this world. Collect resources and loots.. Eat food to restore attributes. Build equipment to enhance capabilities. Fight different kinds of monsters and kill bosses！

末路调色板.description: 这一款黑白风格的文字冒险游戏，简单的色调营造出恐怖氛围，玩家被困画中世界，需要和奇怪的女孩一起生活七天，只有7个夜晚的时候，让你去寻找各种线索，自救解决当前的困境，如果没有规定时间内找到诡异事件的真相，就会被诅咒而死。

Wuppo: Breft Festival (Forever).description: A wacky 2D Splatoon-inspired 3v3 multiplayer platformer. Ride fluffy beasts, dirty someone's restaurant, or make clean reign supreme! Mess up or clean the bizarre world of Wuppo: Breft Festival (Forever)

Metamorphosis Demo.description: Play as Gregor, turned into a tiny bug, and set out on an extraordinary journey to unravel the mystery of your transformation. Metamorphosis is a first person adventure set in a surrealist world where your newfound abilities are your last and only hope for redemption.

Real Farm – Gold Edition.description: Grow your way to success in Real Farm. Work your way up from nothing in career mode or start with an established farm in free mode. Complete jobs and manage land, crops, animals and staff as you strive to become a respected farmer in the community.

Angels of Death Episode.Eddie.description: "The boy made up his mind to face a cruel world." The new special edition of the psychological horror-adventure game "Angels of Death", which has also been made into an anime. The past of B4 floor master Eddie is revealed...

Model Builder Demo.description: Join the latest trend in simulation games, bring out your creativity and make awesome looking models. Assemble, customize and display your creations, whether you’re a veteran or a novice. Get building, and get creative!

Show for Lovers Demo.description: Interactive visual novel, the ending of which depends on you. Immerse yourself in a romantic story about life in a private school.

Duck Life: Adventure.description: Duck Life is back and bigger than ever! Design your own duck and embark on a epic adventure. Explore an enormous new area to find training dojos, shops and ducks to race and battle. Play 16 new training games to level up your duck in 8 skills and become the greatest duck adventurer ever!

Timeless Adventure: A Journey to Begin D.description: Time stands still in this fantasy puzzle adventure game. Venture as a ghostly wraith through an idle world, in search of answers for Death herself. The only help is your ability to possess living or once-living beings.

EXPOSURE, a game of camouflage Demo.description: A game of camouflage where you can’t see yourself. Change colors to hide, dodge predators, and survive intense bosses in the abstract wilderness of stealth non-bullet hell. Lose the ability to see where you are, and learn to feel and know where you’re going.

Free Agency Demo.description: Free Agency is the life simulation where the agents gradually become self-aware and try to find meaning in their lives. Meanwhile, you have to keep them too busy to think about it.

LV99: Final Fortress.description: LV99: Final Fortress is a JRPG that skips the boring stuff and starts with the epic late game.

Cairn: Mathair's Curse Demo.description: One family, a group of good friends and a journey into the heart of an ancient curse that threatens it all. Do you have what it takes to protect the ones you love?

Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp Demo.description: "Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp" brings you more of the world's best (and maybe only?) multiplayer dating sim; but in a way you've never expected!

Kosmokrats Demo.description: Experience life in space using cutting edge drone simulation technology. You can never fail — build ships, make friends, live forever.

Lauras Tierklinik.description: Laura loves animals more than anything else and wants to help animals in need. Slip into the role of Laura and help out at the animal hospital!

Rider's World: I Want To Ride!.description: In "RIDER'S WORLD - I WANT TO RIDE!" you can take care of your own horse and ride out with your own horse. The game offers fun for young and old.

Grand horse attraction.description: Enjoy the fantastic 3D graphics even in endless play mode! No other horse game gives you so many options and total freedom! Experience it yourself with "Grand Horse Attraction". You will love this game!

The Call of Karen.description: The Call of Karen is a PC simulation comedy game about a 1950s suburban housewife whose home is being invaded by Cthulhu. Keep up appearances in the face of an unhappy marriage, ungrateful child, and eldritch madness!

Liar Trick -Psychological Crime Mystery-.description: Are all your expressions "real"? The content of a person's words can be both truthful or false. In this new psychological crime mystery game you will unveil "lies" through emotions! You can play Visual Novel Stories, Facial Expression Analysis Mode, Liar mode, and Deduction Mode.

Echo's Esker Demo.description: You are lost in the catacombs and finding your way out won’t be easy, but upon reaching the surface you will find you are not the only one who is lost. The mysterious spirit hound Echo is far from home, but with her by your side, exploration is as simple as a game of fetch.

Patrick's Parabox Demo.description: A mind-bending recursive puzzle game about boxes within boxes within boxes within boxes. Learn to use infinity to your advantage as you explore a deep and elegant system.

Rebirth Demo.description: 由一人獨立製作，有著龐大劇情和豐富內容的RPG遊戲。

Polter Pals Demo.description: Make ghost friends by steering the living into deadly hazards to release their souls. Puzzle through diorama-style levels and make as many friends as possible using comically fatal accidents. Keep up with the latest memes by getting popular on the afterlife's hottest social media app, LiveBurial.

Blueplanet VR Demo.description: Blueplanet VR is a new way to experience strong presence in some of the world's most remarkable locations.

Externus: Path of the Solari.description: Externus: Path of the Solari is a character-driven tactical roleplaying game (RPG) adapted from an original tabletop game. The game features turn-based tactical combat, full 3D battlefields, character-driven story, choose your own adventure sequences, permadeath that changes the story, and more.

Электричка.description: Короткая кинетическая новелла, рассказывающая о поездке Максима на утренней заснеженной электричке.

Exit: A Biodelic Adventure Demo.description: In the world of excessive biotechnologies, an epidemic is ravaging the human race, infecting people's neuronet implants and enslaving them to the mysterious Worm. Who are you: a fighter of the infection, or a hunter of new prey?

The Disappearance of the Mitchells.description: A short horror game about the sudden disappearance of a husband and wife, leaving their house and all of their belongings.

The Swine.description: Say goodbye to southern hospitality in the backwoods of rural America.The Swine is a short horror experience that explores isolation, witchcraft, and unforeseen consequences in your rural homestead.

Punishment Darkness Online.description: Punishment Darkness Online, un jeu solo post apocalyptique Zombie et autres créatures, vous commencer dans une base faites des missions améliorée votre équipements. Une dimension propre au jeu. tour par tour stratégies histoire prenante

Punishment Darkness Demo.description: Punishment Darkness Online, un jeu solo post apocalyptique Zombie et autres créatures, vous commencer dans une base faites des missions améliorée votre équipements. Une dimension propre au jeu. tour par tour stratégies histoire prenante

Oneteam Soccer.description: Let's play ONETEAM SOCCER. All players move together since they're "ONETEAM".

Space Farmers 2 Demo.description: Multiplayer madness returns in this anarchic platforming gadget-vania sequel. The Great Leek aims to conquer the Galaxy in Space Farmers 2; The Space Time Leek.

The Adventurer - Episode 2: New Dreams.description: Imagine every time you fall asleep new adventure awaits you...

Bot Gaiden Demo.description: Bot Gaiden is a vibrant 2D platformer built for speed. Take control of ninjabots Robyu and Bytron as they seek to recover the golden skulls from the hands of the mysterious Giorqio and his band of hench-bots. Race to the finish, because bosses get stronger with time.

Small Saga.description: Beneath the streets of London, an angry mouse seeks revenge against the god who stole his tail. An epic RPG of miniature proportions!

Lifeguard Simulator.description: Keep the bay safe and protect sunbathers. You will have a whole range of rescue equipment at your disposal: quads, scooters, motorboats, drones... and even a helicopter. Watch the beach, patrol the area, help and keep safety, but also solve the criminal intrigue.

A pirate quartermaster Demo.description: Did you think you'd win with a snap of your fingers? Did you think you'd see a crew as a number? Did you think you'd gorge without fear of judgements? But, sir, you're not in the Royal Navy. The pirate's life is a life of dreams. And it's precisely because we have a shitty life that we have dreams.

The Final Earth 2 Demo.description: The Final Earth 2 is a vertical sci-fi city builder. Earth is unlivable, so you decide to create a space colony. Gather resources, then build and research your way to a better future! Grow your city from an exploration ship to a huge metropolis, full of advanced technology. What will you build?

Curved Space.description: Curved Space is an intense arcade-style twin-stick shooter that takes the classic formula and plunges it into the weirdest reaches of space. Battle cosmic space-invading spiders across curved landscapes where bullets hug the terrain while the horizon drops sharply out of sight.

続そのひぐらしVS東方UNIVERSE2.description: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. The shocking work that appeared in 2016 finally appears on Steam! * This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project.

Stratside Demo.description: Stratside is a Puzzle Defense game where you save planets from a gravity-changing enemy! Place gadgets to attack the intruder! Combine your resources strategically to defeat the enemy before he reaches his goal! DON'T let him press the red button! This game is like the opposite of Lemmings!

The Cubedex of Brass and Wood Demo.description: The Cubedex of Brass and Wood contains six puzzling machines. For some, the goal is obvious but the solution is not; for others, figuring out the goal is part of the puzzle.

Lawless Lands Demo.description: Lawless Lands is a dark medieval role-playing game featuring a grim setting and innovative mechanics that allow players to delve into a low-fantasy, apocalyptic world of epic proportions. Defy and destroy the darkness that has taken hold over these Lawless Lands.

School of Magic Demo.description: School of Magic is a Hack and Slay Roguelike game with a deckbuilding leveling system. Combine spells, face reckless creatures and make wise choices on the way to passing the entrance exam of the School of Magic.

Phaser.description: Phaser presents a unique take on the 2D-platformer formula by allowing you to take control of each level. By learning the power of color-switching, you will be able to phase in and out challenging obstacles from your path, find new and creative ways to victory, and avoid otherwise certain death.

Lost In Space.description: Join Will Robinson, Dr. Smith and Robot in an all new adventure based on the classic 60's television series, Lost in Space.

World of Towers.description: World of Towers combines puzzles with tower defense. Design your base in order to collect all of the puzzle pieces and destroy your enemies. Create and share your own worlds on the Steam Workshop using the World of Towers World Builder

Space Simulation Toolkit - DEMO.description: Physics sandbox game that uses a graphics card as a supercomputer. Change the laws of physics, design mechanisms, create A-Life worlds and inhabit them with living beings, experiment with evolution and AI.

Heroes Must Diee Demo.description: Tired of quest going, monster killing "Heroes" who keep raiding your house for household items. You build traps and hire minions to fight them off. Stop these Heroes from taking what is yours. TLDR: build a dungeon & be a dungeon master !

Power of Ten.description: Your starfighter against a dreadful armada. Gather weapons, resources and upgrades to help you hold back the relentless tide and protect the galaxies civilians. If you don't succeed try again with a whole new galaxy!

Power of Ten Demo.description: Your starfighter against a dreadful armada. Gather weapons, resources and upgrades to help you hold back the relentless tide and protect the galaxies civilians. If you don't succeed try again with a whole new galaxy!

LIMINALPHOBIA.description: Travel through dark dingy apartments and cold stone basements. Stay away from the many creatures following you around every corner. Find collectibles and outlast the demons. walk this first-person horror experience through twisting mazes and search for keys. Outlast the demons and find any way out.
