Space Probes.description: Space Probes is a Shoot Em Up (SHMUP) inspired by productions from the 90s released on SNES, MEGADRIVE, NEO-GEO, PC-ENGINE etc.

Creature Lab.description: Become a mad scientist! Conduct crazy experiments, mix mutagens, breed abominable creatures, and attach monstrous body parts to them. Manage your inventory, expand your lab, and make sure your hideout is safe. Send your creations into the city to obtain the necessary salvage and test subjects!

Way of Heroes.description: You have to choose a hero and go through the dungeon levels of the city of Vorms. Collect the unworthy pages of the Book of the Dead and destroy it. Level up the hero and get new magic abilities. Play with other guys on two joysticks and have fun.

3D Math - Ultra.description: Math Ultra - is both simple and complex challenges!

The Testing Floor Demo.description: Welcome to The Testing Floor. Begin the preliminary testing phase for a prototype tool known as the C.U.B.E.R. Master the projectile-based teleportation system and Power Cube abilities all while solving puzzle-filled floors that push you and the C.U.B.E.R to its utmost limits.

Shadow of Valhalla.description: Visceral physics-based VR combat set within an ancient realm of Viking lore and mystic powers! Discover magical runes and unlock spells while battling evil forces throughout eternity!

The Hilltop Mansion.description: Can you escape from this cursed mansion? Rely on the clues left by the ancestors to break the curse of the mansion and survive through it!

Dungeon of Trials.description: Looking for a good, balanced and challenging dungeon crawler? Your quest is over! Dungeon of Trials is the adventure you were looking for! Take the role of the Adventurer's Guild Master and lead a group of four heroes to glory! Face the dangers of the 5 levels of the Labyrinth of Fulerus!

Sweet House Love.description: Sweet House Love is a dating game. Do you like dating game ? Try this.

Blow it up.description: Physics sandbox game where you setup bombs, vehicles and aircrafts to destroy structures made out of voxels. Create your own worlds and blow them apart.

团长别生气.description: "Yes, Sir" is a mix of battle chess strategy and roguelike. As a leader, you need to recruit members with distinctive personalities and lead your members to fight powerful enemies in a secret world. A new journey is waiting for you.

西游之琉璃盏.description: This is a plot type interactive game, interspersed with action adventure scenes, with the three worlds of human, demon, ghost and God as the background, telling the story before laosha's journey to the West

Far Eastern Federal University Virtual E.description: Take a look around and get to know the Far Eastern Federal University, campus life and medical research facilities in this virtual reality experience!

Consternation II.description: After an unfortunate accident at Sorley Paper Mill, the facility was abandoned and left to rot. Multiple urban explorers venture into the facility, never to be heard from again. Police eventually walled off the mill in order to keep trespassers out... Or to keep something in...

CyberOps Prologue.description: Become a military hacker and help your black ops team reach their goal in this noir cyberpunk tactical game. Scan, hack, overtake, control and manage high tech devices, vehicles and even enemy cyborgs with cutting-edge implants.

FORECLOSED.description: FORECLOSED is a narrative-driven action-adventure set in a Cyberpunk world filled with action, suspense, and experimental augmentations. Follow the story of Evan Kapnos in this sleek comic book styled game as he unravels the conspiracy behind his identity foreclosure. Who is responsible and why?

Bomb Fight Demo.description: Bomb Fight is a local-multiplayer action party game. Destroy your friends or cooperate with them in a frenzy of bombs without destroying your self.

Nightmare Simulator 2 Rebirth.description: You have lost your memories. You wake up in an unknown town... Try to survive and find the answers you seek on WHO YOU ARE!

Misc..description: Join Buddy and Bag Boy, two adorable robots made of miscellaneous items, on a heartfelt 3D platforming adventure. Explore a familiar world from a new perspective, lend a hand to robots around you, make a difference by cleaning up mess, and unfold the story of an exciting journey.

Bhop PRO.description: BhopPRO is an amazing game mode where players have to jump on blocks

Rooster Rampage.description: Rooster Rampage is a chicken based zombie shooter. Engage your inner chicken in the single player campaign to fend off hordes of zombies across amazing chicken inspired worlds, or locate a nearby Rampage in action!!

Dungeon Throne.description: Explore procedurally generated dungeons. Retrieve artifacts and use your magic to fight your way through the dungeon. Rescue prisoners and destroy the dungeons.

Paper Beast Demo.description: An exploration and adventure game about wildlife sprung from the depths of the internet. An unknown power seems to upset its balance. Join forces with exotic creatures to unravel the mysteries of this universe.

Infinite Guitars.description: Fight mechs with metal-crushing rock in Infinite Guitars, a genre-melting Rhythm RPG featuring vibrant anime-inspired art and a blazing original soundtrack. Battle against war machines with electrifying Guitar Solos, and save the planet!

Lucky and a life worth living.description: A dog’s life nowadays. Discover happy moments from the daily life of the dog Lucky with his parents. A new minimalist jigsaw puzzle game, with 6 scenes illustrated by @Katia Numakura with her cute art style.

Space Battle.description: It's a frenetic space action game. You must survive the enemies and the dangerous environment. Prepare your arsenal before battle and try to eliminate as many enemies as you can before they do. Trade, explore and survive this challenge!

Deer Hunter xTreme Focal Plane.description: It's open season! The deer are overpopulating as we speak. Sgt. O'doyle must thin the herd!

Super Bomberman R Online.description: Drop bombs and collect power-ups to blast your way through SUPER BOMBERMAN R ONLINE! You can compete against up to 64 players from around the world in this explosive survival battle.

Rolling Cube.description: Can you help the red cube to sprint toward the end while crowding out another pile of obstacles? By only moving from left to right, the excitement of gameplay can reach beyond your wildest imagination.

Halloween Horrors Deluxe Steam Edition.description: Halloween Horrors Deluxe is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Scary theme oriented from left to right.

Journey to the Centre of the Cell.description: The Journey to the Centre of the cell takes users on a journey to the microscopic world. Explore the surface and interior of a cancer cell, exploring and learning about cellular anatomy and processes.

Kalidazkoph.description: Cleaning up in your attic you find strange VHS tapes on which are recorded some experiments. Understand the secrets surrounding these tapes and understand the purpose of the dimension machine.

Corona Runner.description: As part of a government experiment, your rover has been shrunk down to microscopic size to find a cure for the evil Covid-19. Unfortunately, while you are exploring the inner surface of your patient's lungs, the Novel Coronavirus strikes! Dodge angry virus balls for as long as you can!

The Legend of HyperStar.description: The Legend of HyperStar is a roguelike,Darksoul like indiegame.Play a well-trained, beautiful and powerful brave girl, challenge various levels. Get more powerful props, strengthen runes and skills, and get better weapons and equipment in random events.

Costa's Classic Cosmic Pizzas.description: A wacky 2D platformer about delivering pizza in space and saving the galaxy! Journey throughout the Omnicluster Space Station to deliver within the time guarantee and on a limited oxygen supply.

Gun Master.description: Gun Master is an independent game of strategic shooting type.There are many game levels, and it has a wealth of firearms.

Ruth's Journey.description: Embark on a journey with Ruth, an adventurous hobbyist photographer, as she escapes her boring office job to chase down the rare Golden Finch.

Mesmer.description: A unique revolution simulator where every encounter matters. Mesmer! The pearl of the old world. At least it used to be. But this city has failed its people. Unite the people, spark a revolution and storm the castle. Build a better Mesmer.

West Legends.description: Wild West Theme, MOBA Shooter, Various Modes, Battle Anytime, Anywhere.

The Medic.description: The Medic: the first Coronavirus-themed topdown/platformer game published on Steam. Can you beat the anti-vaxxers and the virus to save the Earth?

时间卡牌 TimelineCard.description: In time card, what you have to do is to keep moving forward, explore and use all kinds of combats to attack the enemy's weakness. This game allows players to experience the fun of cards from the perspective of martial arts.It is strategic and easy to operate, but the game is difficult.

Rift Runner.description: Rift Runner is a fast-paced precision platformer built for speedrunning! Shave valuable milliseconds off your time by discovering hidden paths as you deal with falling spikes, icy platforms, crumbling towers and more! Activate the Chrono Echo for the ultimate timed challenge!

Cyber Hook Demo.description: Speed through a gorgeous retrowave world using parkour skills and a grappling hook to scale and ride walls in this fast-paced, 3D platformer. Blast enemies, manipulate time and abuse physics to avoid falling to your death.

Agence.description: Agence places the fate of artificially intelligent creatures in your hands. Will you help to maintain their peaceful existence, or throw them into a state of chaos? A dynamic film that merges cinematic storytelling, artificial intelligence, and user interactivity, Agence is never the same twice.

Craft city.description: Sandbox game. Build, destroy, have fun. Create huge buildings. Create huge worlds. Several types of blocks are available: 1.brick 2.concrete 3.tree 4.metal

Drive & Drift.description: Fasten your seatbelts and here we go! Drive & Drift is a simulation game that will allow you to drive one of many available vehicles!

Orb Overload.description: Go on a adventure through outer space in Orb Overload. Play, make and discover planets in this journey to get back to your ship while not dying from oxygen by connecting to Orbs!

Possession 1881.description: Demon sigils. Talking dolls. Delve into the dark world of Possession 1881, a point and click puzzle adventure. A game about intellect, art, and the occult in the Victorian Era. Science, history, and art all inspired numerous unique puzzles that will dare your mind to find new connections.

Orbals.description: Orbals is a fast-paced, rolling adventure puzzle game with wonderful graphics and sound. Quickly solve puzzles to master the Mojometer, find new Orbals characters and unlock special abilities.

Out of Shapes.description: A derpy, dialogue-heavy RPG with multiple endings and choices with consequences, set in a factory run by robots.

Knight Bewitched 2.description: Knight Bewitched 2 is a jRPG featuring the story of a group of heroes and mercenaries as they work together to restore a lost kingdom and face a new threat in the world of Ambrose.

In-Home Streaming.description: In-Home Streaming allows the user to view videos on the device to other devices in the network allowing for easy streaming with no other login or downloads on devices except for an internet search page.

Empire of the Wicked.description: A magical challenging indie top-down RPG where you have to dismantle the Empire of the Wicked by leveling up, completing quests, training skills, slaying bosses and collecting items/equipment. Compete online with other players in the gladiator arena to claim exclusive rewards!

THE KNIGHT OF QUEEN.description: Dive into the world of old-school RPG in VR !! Become the Hero of her majesty the Queen, and travel to defeat the evil Devil King, bringing peace to the world !!

Sniper Shooting Alpha Strike.description: You are the last commando left in the combat in which you need to kill all the enemies who are trying to surmount your country. Be a brave army commando, ambush and kill the enemies before they kill you .Step into the arena and get ready for an all out battle.

Street Sniper.description: Give it your best shot with Street Sniper First Person Shooter (FPS Shooting) game and take contract to shoot all the unjust dishonest and make the world a better place to live.

Not My President - Level 1.description: This is a 3D-action-shooter. You were sent to a foreign planet to free the kidnapped Earth people. Find all the rocket parts. Assemble the rocket. Free all captives and put them in the rocket. Start the countdown and try not to die during this time.

The Innsmouth Case Demo.description: The Innsmouth Case is a text adventure game inspired by H.P. Lovecraft and the very first text-based adventure to combine horror and comedy in a fit and proper way.

Infection Maze.description: ‘Infected Maze’ is a zombie FPS game set in a hospital in Japan. The player heads down the randomly generated, maze-like hospital to help his sister, who is in the basement asking for help. The inside of the hospital is filled with zombies. Take down zombies with a gun and sometimes hide from them.

烟火 / Firework Demo.description: An accidental fire at a funeral forces the police to re-investigate a closed case of massacre. Lin Lixun participates the re-investigation by chances. As the investigation goes deeper, the past of the victims gradually emerges. However, the case becomes more bewildering.

TOEM.description: Set off on a delightful expedition and use your photographic eye to uncover the mysteries of the magical TOEM in this hand-drawn adventure game. Chat with quirky characters, solve their problems by snapping neat photos, and make your way through a relaxing landscape!

魂石.description: This is a casual adventure game, players can freely choose to go through the gate, hang up, automatic combat, etc., but continue to develop pets and upgrade equipment to make themselves more powerful.By matching pets with different attributes, activate different spirit stones!

Choco Pixel 5.description: Choco Pixel 5 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

The Unexpected Quest.description: Adventure game with strategy and management elements in a medieval fantasy setting - drawing inspiration from classics such as Warcraft 3 and The Settlers. Embark on quests, hunt down treasures and manage your resources as you build, battle, cast magic and brew potions to bring order to the world.

Rogue Robots.description: A roguelite twin-stick shooter. Your mission is to defeat the cops gone mad in this action-packed game. Beware, their mission is to destroy humanity. The fate of the whole mankind is in your hands. Are you brave enough to take on the mission?

一星的我与最强地下城.description: Level 1 Me & The Final Dungeon is a light-hearted, comedy rogue-like game that is easy to play but rich in depth. Take control of the protagonists and use your wits to explore and fight in the dungeon, go on a relaxing and thought-provoking journey, and gradually uncover the secrets of the world.

Fisherman Classic.description: Welcome to Fishy Archipelago! Go fishing, catalog your most rare fishes and sea creatures, buy and find skins, hats, boats and properties. Build your fishy empire. The retro world is yours!

Kinda Heroes.description: Side-View & Scroll RPG made with love!

Say No! More Demo.description: SAY NO! MORE is the world’s first NPG (NO!-Playing Game). Play as an intern with a burning desire to say NO! to everything and everyone. Customize your character, say NO! in different styles and languages, clap back at mean colleagues and change the world!

Simple Machines.description: Simple Machines is a minimalist physics puzzle game.

Queerskins: a love story.description: Take an emotional journey down a country road in rural Missouri along with Ed and Mary-Helen, Sebastian’s parents. Uncover Sebastian’s life as you interact with his belongings found in the box next to you. Was he a “disgrace” like his father says or a “good man” as his mother believes?

Sensorium.description: Sensorium is a small open-world puzzle game about the 5 senses: touch, taste, sight, smell, and hearing.

Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match.description: A new game concept inspired by the classic Tower of Hanoi. Assemble towers stacking pieces of the same color on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

Kingdoms Reborn.description: A city builder with simulated citizens, set in a procedurally-generated world map. Grow your kingdom through the eras from a tiny medieval hamlet into a prosperous global empire! Cooperate or compete in real-time with your friends in multiplayer mode.

Dark Sales.description: Dark Sales is a 2D action RPG that takes place in a modern office setting.

Sue's Story.description: Sue's Story is a classic sci-fi adventure game in the spirit and tradition of a classic space alien thriller. Awakening on a cryo ship hurtling towards destruction, Sue is thrust into a terrifying game of hide and seek to fix the ship, and dock successfully at the orbital platform.

DodgeBall VR.description: The Year is 3020 & Earths way of life has changed forever from the way we know it. Individuals are competing for freedom through your favorite childhood game, Dodgeball...

Penguin Slide.description: Penguin Slide is a fast paced, physics based, singleplayer obstacle course game with a focus on being fun.

Call of Coronga.description: Have you ever thought about facing hordes of people with the flu with your friends? "Call of Coronga" is Perfect for you. In the game you are given the noble mission of saving the world from the new deadly "corona virus" created in the laboratory. Are you prepared for that?

BorderCollie Game.description: BorderCollies are great dogs. Here you can play FETCH! with your virtual friend. Walk your dog - see your dog jump over benches, running through rivers and try 5 different dog toys. This FMV (FullMotionVideo) game is the real BorderCollie experience!

Demon Keeper 2+.description: This is a turn-based strategy game. You need to command your various monsters and chiefs to fight against humans, grabbing territories and gold resources will allow you to summon more demons to win the battle.

Pizza Heroes (Closed Beta).description: Pizza Heroes is an action multiplayer team arena game. Hone your skills and clutch up for your team in a variety of fun game modes. Play for FREE now! Choose from a variety of classes to reflect your gamestyle.

ArrowBall.description: ArrowBall is a fast-paced Arrow-Sports game where you use explosive arrows and acrobatics to outmaneuver your opponents and control THE BALL. Engage in 1v1 or 2v2 local multiplayer battles across a variety of unique Stages. Run, jump, slow time, build up your Super Bar, and unleash your Super Arrow!

Frop.description: Join Frop as he adventures through mountains, dungeons, and many other places. What's happening in the Kingdom? What's this dark essence? This game will have you solving puzzles, learning spells, battling in a turn based manner, and crafting.

Cyber Manhunt Demo.description: Cyber Manhunt is a story-oriented puzzle game focusing on big data, hacking, citizen privacy, and social workers. It focuses on social issues such as cyber violence and privacy breaches.

ロストカラーズ／再装版 / LOSTCOLORS Demo.description: A world without color "Lost Colors". In order to get rid of the evil that has befallen him, Real travels back and forth between worlds of color, solving the mysteries of the world.

ISOLAND: The Amusement Park.description: ISOLAND: The Amusement Park is the latest installment of Isoland series from CottonGame, featuring the classic and unique art style, and intriguing puzzles. As always, Isoland: The Amusement Park has a second-run mode, which presents puzzles and paths different from the first play-through.

黑色花与红山羊 / Black Datura & Red Goat.description: 苏醒之时，他正处于昏暗的木屋之中。自己的身份、过去的经历，全都无法想起。很快，他发觉自己正处于一个异常的空间，到处都是谜题和陷阱，还有一些古怪的居民。在前行的途中，也不断与同样被困在此处的人成为了同伴。道路的前方，是救赎，还是绝望？这是一个围绕着“诅咒”与“救赎”的故事。

Time Agent.description: Use your time power and avoid bullets successfully.

Revival: Recolonization.description: Set in a post-apoc version of Earth, Revival is a 4x strategy game where the world and its rules can change at key moments, creating a deep and highly replayable experience.

Ancient World War.description: This is a Sandbox + Moba Third-Person Game, Players 2 vs 2 compete with each other; Players can create flame towers , city walls and soldiers on the map and You can kill enemy merchants so that enemy players can't buy items.

Sea War.description: Sink all the ships that fire at you! Collect points. A ship game that will not tire you on quarantine days.

Cemetery War.description: Put down all the monsters coming towards you! Collect points. A monster hunt game that won't tire you on quarantine days.

BadBee.description: Race against the clock to the levels exit by crossing the vacant honeycomb sections and avoiding scatter guards. BadBee is an escape game that is full of surprises and extremely addictive.

DICHOTOMY.description: Team online game for 4-10 players, about the fight against traitors among the crew.

Fireside Hero.description: Can you find and defeat five legendary monsters in twenty days? Plan your moves carefully – the lair may be right in those woods! Buy rumours, hire adventurers, explore the map, and win tactical combats. A compact strategy with an old-school look and a puzzle twist!

Diluvian Ultra.description: Diluvian Ultra is a single-player, first-person shooter focusing on a retro aesthetic and fast-paced, strategic combat. The game is set in its own expansive fictive universe. Rather than gritty or dark, Diluvian Ultra is colorful and fantastical, like the cover of pulp sci-fi novels of the past.

Tales From Off-Peak City Vol. 1 Demo.description: On the corner of July Avenue and Yam Street, all is not what it seems. What role will you play in a city's fate?

Wanderlust: Bangkok Prelude.description: Take your first step toward a great adventure. Play the introduction to the Wanderlust: Travel Stories anthology. See the many faces of Bangkok in a narrative game from the makers of The Witcher, co-created with real-life adventurers.

Now it's my turn Demo.description: In this Classic Turn RPG game. You will seek revenge for those that destroyed your homeland.

Vetrix.description: This ain't your Grandma's Tetris! Vetrix is a puzzle game inspired by Tetris, but with its own original mechanics built for virtual reality.

Impulsow Demo.description: Challenge your ability and your mind in this action puzzle with a unique gameplay where you use the impulse to move and overcome challenges ranging from thorns to missile launchers.

Boston AInamics.description: HARDCORE!!! The goal of the game it to reach the finish by getting through different obstacles. To do this, teach your robot particular movements - place the icons onto the appropriate place and watch the robot's progress.

Freelance Trucker: Insurance Fraud Editi.description: Driving a big rig in a rigged economy has its risks, but that's why you have insurance.

Light and Embers.description: Relax. Listen to the crackle of the fire and the chirping of the birds. Add a log or two if the fire starts to burn out. Enjoy a calm and stress-free campfire.

Linked Mask Demo.description: Six towers, each hiding a mask that grants the power of a natural element. Obtain them all by navigating through a set of increasingly difficult twists and turns in Linked Mask - a captivating call-back to the golden days of the Game Boy era.

Left on Read.description: It’s March of 2020; you were just sent home from college because of the coronavirus, you have a few small regrets, mainly not telling someone how you really feel.

Missing Children | 行方不明.description: Missing Children | 行方不明 is a Japanese horror-themed adventure game about a bully detective searching for reported missing children.

Yuldigard's Fate Demo.description: The capital of his native Yuldigard Alzia is torn apart by a civil war, in order to avoid death, the prince has to flee the city, pretending to be a wanderer. He has to find refuge in the provincial town of Torchbergen, but this visit is destined to drag on for a long time ...

迷雾之夏 Demo.description: The Vigilant Villa is a plots-oriented, texts-based AVG adventure game inheriting the classic “A locked room mystery" story mode. Where the game heads towards is completely decided by player’s own deductions and choices.

ピンボルアの勇者 Demo.description: The world has been changed into pinball by the Demon King? A unique RPG-style pinball game has appeared!

Battle Barn: Tactics.description: The galaxy's most EPIC farm animal fight club! Kill, capture, and cup-grade your barn army in the ultimate conquest for CUPCAKES!

Apparitions: Kotsmine Hills.description: Team up with the Peter Wren Agency to find hidden clues and investigate paranormal activity in the town of Kotsmine Hills.

Ambush: Convoy Strike.description: Deploy unique and powerful unmanned military turrets and stop the advancing enemy convoys!

武林桃源乡 The Arcadia Of Wulin.description: 《武林桃源乡》是一款轻松休闲的建造经营主题的个人独立游戏。在游戏中您将从一无所有开始打造一座美丽繁华的世外桃源。精心规划每一座建筑，使建筑产生天地灵犀，让生活在这里的居民领悟绝世武功。这里有世外的高人，这里有归隐的侠客，正所谓良辰美景真乃人间仙境，赏心乐事恍如化外洞天。

不二臣.description: “你应该吝啬你每一次说‘爱’这个字的机会。而不是对着我这种老男人练习。” 现代恋爱耽美游戏——《不二臣》，以王寅视角代入，触发狗血盖顶事情真相 ，又或是遍地暴雷的恩怨情仇...

Random Raiders Demo.description: Random Raiders puts you in charge of a newly-started raiding guild in the fictional MMORPG 'World of Guild Quest'. Recruit the best players you can find - balance their classes, volatile personalities and overcome the inevitable drama in order to become the best guild on the server.

elphame.description: Elphame is a story-driven RPG with a "programming puzzle" battle system. Join four heroes as they conquer Elphame by using the hostile beasties' attack patterns against them.

BADA S.S..description: Hack, slash and pulverize hordes of creatures in this 1-4 player co-op third-person action game. Choose characters with vastly different gameplay, unlock skills, gather loot, experience alien capitalism and listen to hilarious commentary written by Warren Graff.

The Hostage.description: Would you dare to be the voice of reason, when somebody's life is on the line? The Hostage is a text-based companion-simulation game, that tells the story of medical assistant, who becomes a hostage of a group of ruthless rebels in the jungles of Africa.

Angkor: Celebrations.description: Angkor: Celebrations is a family friendly Match-3 with engaging gameplay. It tells the story of the player’s quests for the ancient heirloom, the ceremonial Kīla.

Get Over Blood.description: In this game your main aim is to climb up to the top of a tower. To do this, you should use a blood rope.

CrocApoca!! Crocodile maiden at the End.description: Take care of a cute crocodile girl and make it through the Apocalypse while your bossy step-sister and some mysterious organizations are getting in your way!

Retrocycles.description: Race. Do not crash. Trap your enemies. Enter the maze. Dominate the zone. DO NOT CRASH.

DepowerBall Demo.description: DepowerBall is a dragon feeding, skill eliminating, revenge seeking party platformer. Be the first to feed the Dragon Queen and score points to win rounds. As you win rounds, the other players will even the odds by taking away your powers, forcing you to adapt your strategy...or get left behind.

Grand Theft Rome.description: Lead roman, greek, chinese, egyptian, or knights into battle against other factions. Win by giving specific commands like box, circle lined formations and fighting alongside your troops in this ancient battle simulator.

SteamDolls - Order Of Chaos.description: SteamDolls is a steampunk inspired metroidvania with a grimy touch of brutality, featuring AAA talent like David Hayter. Lose yourself in a labyrinthine city, full of secrets and madness, and reveal the truth lurking in the shadows. You know but four words: Action, Exploration, Stealth, and Blood.

My Train World.description: Take playing with toy trains into the virtual world with ‘My Train World’! Master a variety of puzzles at different difficulty levels in Puzzle Mode. Let your imagination flow in the Sandbox Mode and build the train-set of your dreams. (Note: Saving layouts is disabled in demo)

Love Love School Days.description: The protagonist is trapped in the world of a love game. Can you return to the real world again...? Try to escape while running away from the gal game heroine A love simulation-style survival horror game!

Drox Operative 2.description: Drox Operative 2 is a starship action RPG with warring alien races, fierce space battles, a dynamic, evolving galaxy, and co-op multiplayer for Windows and Linux.

Belongings.description: Belongings is a Point & Click adventure game. Dispose of the belongings of Jennifers late spouse Marion. Jennifer must contend with her own memories, and have to face hard truths she might not want to know. Do you wish to step into the bitter future, or stay in the sweet past?

C-4.description: Waiting for a match? C-4. Improve your gaming skills while you wait. Mini-games used by professional players to improve the brain response. Your spare time will never be the same with C-4! Runs on top of anything. Explode your PC.

Pandemia: Virus Outbreak.description: 2 in 1, Swipe cards to face the deadly virus threat in this story driven strategy game. Step into the world in which you will face the decisions that world leaders make in the event of a deadly virus threat. Every decision have consequences. Create Vaccine in special Arcade mode.

VR Immersive Fitness Gym (Cycling, marat.description: VR Immersive Fitness Gym: 6 New VR Exercises You Never Experienced.Bored with exercise? Virtual reality, immersive fitness might help you.1) VR Football Battle; 2) VR Immersive Cycling; 3) VR Immersive Running & Marathon; 4) VR Apple Games; 5) VR Immersive Shooting; 6) VR Yoga (Coming)

軟体轟輪ゲルタンク.description: Casual but profound! Simple, authentic 16-bit 2D style that will satisfy everyone from beginners to experts The action shooter is here! Dive into the soft and hard world of the ultimate 16-bit world, down to the resolution! Ugh!

Bunker Defense Demo.description: Bunker Defense is a tower defense game for 1-4 players. Waves of enemies attack your base, and you must defend it by building different kinds of defenses.

Agrou.description: Your new favorite Werewolf game! Seat around the fire with friends, play a villager, a werewolf or another type of character and use strategy to win!

Crystal Valley.description: In Crystal Valley they explore alien landscapes mine raw materials and build new tools and fight against a large number of enemies.

Death Tales.description: Play as a new reaper, completing quests, collecting spells, and gathering equipment to fight through hordes of enemies in this grim but whimsical 2D adventure!

16bit vs Reality.description: Retro-style platformer inspired by the 16bit classics. Jump and shoot your way through challenging levels. Watch two distinct visual styles collide. Enjoy the awesome rocking music. In the name of all that is childhood!

TOWER.description: The Tower continues to stifle the darkness at the world end. Waiting for the rapture time that has erased all the darkness. Collect pastel colored cubes, Defeat enemies more faster and more accurately, And protect your TOWER.

Up until the end.description: This was supposed to be an ordinary day, in an ordinary life. But it isn't. You were in the town library, reading a good book when…You don't really remember. You know you passed out. When you wake up, you are surrounded by flames !

Captain Disaster in: The Dark Side of th.description: A comedy scif-fi point & click adventure game with several odd characters (all voiced by the same person) and multiple strange inventory objects to try out! References to classic sci-fi and point & clicks abound.

Rusty gun.description: Nothing could ruin a sunny day, but the universe had its own plans. The invasion of Earth by hordes of mutants and robots, capturing the mind of living creatures, could not leave aside our hero.

Rockin' Road Demo.description: Rockin' Road is our love letter to Road Rash, FlatOut and other cool arcade racing games.

ピンボルアの勇者.description: The world has been changed into pinball by the Demon King? A unique RPG-style pinball game has appeared!

Wibbly Witches.description: Wibbly Witches is a fast and frantic couch competition for 2-4 players. Navigate evolving arenas and use magic spells to outsmart your opponents in a wyrd and wobbly battle to the death! Only one witch can claim the tiny crown...

Cosmodome.description: Cosmodome: a wrestling inspired, intergalactic, arena-based, ship combat game where the audience decides who wins or loses. Fight with 4 different characters each wielding their own unique ships and weapons.

Remedy.description: Remedy is a first person puzzle adventure game where the player awakens in a world of darkness. Solve puzzles to unlock new abilities, areas of the map and guide the orb back to paradise. Use the power of dissolve to transform the plagued world of darkness back to beauty.

アルティメットダンジョン「紅」.description: Form a party with your favorite Touhou characters and challenge the dungeon! Characters from "紅魔郷" to "輝針城" are lined up! Are there anyone who will walk through the ultimate dungeon of all 51 areas !?

Curse of Eternity Demo.description: A hardcore Action RPG with diverse combat and feats-based multiclassing. Start as one of three hero builds and either continue to specialize, or branch out and make your build your own. Slice, shoot, and zap your way through a dystopian world and fulfill your own deific journey.

Robot Island Demo.description: Play as a robot flight attendant in this 20-30 minute visual novella with 3D exploration. Explore the ship, talk to plants, clean up, and most importantly: empathize with the captain as he tries to figure out some personal stuff during your lonely journey. Oh, and make sure you get his coffee right!

Delores: A Thimbleweed Park Mini-Adventu.description: Delores is back home and working as a photographer for the Nickel News. Thimbleweed Park hasn’t changed at all in the year she’s been away… or has it? Sample Ron Gilbert’s new adventure game engine in this free prototype that uses “found art” from the award-winning Thimbleweed Park.

Way To Yaatra.description: Get aboard on a thrilling voyage in search of the truth after the desolation of your village, using spears to climb a huge mountain while you walk the way to Yaatra.

The Magister.description: The Magister is a murder-mystery card-battler RPG. Build and customise your deck to fight in battles, or use ‘Tactical Diplomacy’ to pacify those who stand in your way. Gather clues and discover motives as you investigate the death of your predecessor and unmask the guilty culprit.

Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition.description: Nongunz is a roguelite action-platformer. Battle grotesque creatures, kill quickly to maintain your combo meter, and rescue worshipers to become part of your idle army to buy upgrades.

罗马之链.description: This is a text adventure game, your identity is a general Cicero from the Roman Empire, through the choice of words, you will walk into several battles experienced by the three giants of Rome, see the glory and achievements of ancient Rome, and realize the true meaning of life and freedom.

FOREST OF THE DEAD.description: In FOREST OF THE DEAD you must survive huge waves of undead. You are stranded in the middle of the forest. No help, no hope. Your only chance is to defend yourself with the available weapons against the approaching find and stay alive as long as possible.

HANI.description: HANI is a Roguelike game that explores dungeons by combining various skills and artifacts.

Motel Murder.description: Your sister calls you for help. You go to the Motel where she's staying at only to find horror, Mannequins have come to life and are killing! Using the knife you find, you search for answers to find your sister before it's too late. Welcome to Motel Murder.

My hidden things.description: In the beginning there was nothing, only a chaos of dreams, out of which came Xary. He tried to understand people's nature and help them. Yet he is too young. And here you are. Together, you need to figure this all out…

Fobia - St. Dinfna Hotel Demo.description: Explore a decadent hotel across different timelines and uncover the dark history of a fanatical cult and your role in their plans.

Lightless: The 21st Sacrifice (Episode 1.description: Lightless: The 21st Sacrifice is the first episode of an atmospheric horror game series set in 2018 Iran, Saqqez that tells the story of Navid, a writer who finally comes home, only to find himself strangled by a dark past that will not let go.

Virus Blast.description: What if you could use yourself as a bullet? Virus Blast is Fast paced Shooter where YOU are the bullet, try to steal as much data as you can while climbing an endless procedural generated matrix! All of this while the firewall is stepping on your toes trying to stop you!

The Lost Legends of Redwall: The Scout A.description: As troops rally to fend of the invading pirates, our young scout finds their betrothed poisoned by Scumsnout's venomous bite. As the vermin push inland, its a race against time and vicious searats to seek an antidote. Help Liam and Sophia survive in this adventure based on the Redwall™ books.

A narrative puzzle-adventure game based on Brian Jacques' Redwall™️ book series. Play as Liam or Sophia as they conclude their adventure to Redwall Abbey joined by a family of mysterious stoats, a kindly - if cowardly - mole, and ever pursued by the egotistical Pirate Captain Cheesethief.

UniDuni.description: Inspired by the classics, UniDuni is a lighthearted puzzle platformer adventure which celebrates the bonds of friendship. Invite a friend to work together across hand-crafted levels or challenge yourself and prove your skills!

Game Director Story.description: Game Director Story is an unflinching and satirical look behind-the-scenes at how big-budget AAA games are made. Based on first-hand accounts by industry veterans, Players experience the emotional roller coaster of guiding a team through the agonizing decisions and compromises needed to ship a game.

Aria: Dragon Eater.description: "Aria: Dragon Eater" is a fantasy action top-down shooter game set in a magical era. Begin your journey to unravel the mystery surrounding the death of the dragon!

Zomcade.description: Zomcade is a challenging action-horror arcade style game for Steam VR. Immerse yourself in over 15 different ways to play.

Die Again.description: Die Again is an innovative shooter where you kill enemies shooting and dying. If, when dying, there is an enemy nearby, you can possess their body and keep playing. But be careful, the enemies can do the same to you. Shoot to kill, die to survive, kill yourself to overcome!

Worlds Builder: Farm&Craft.description: WORLDS Builder is game about alchemy, controlling forces of nature, creating worlds, building, researching and trading! Create new lands, mountains and forests, build houses, farms and workshops, discover new technologies. Start with a small mining village and grow it into a rich city!

SCP: Nine-Tailed Fox.description: You are a leader of Foxtrot Unit 1 "Nine-Tailed Fox", a highly trained force tasked with re-containing a multitude of terrifying anomalous monsters that have broken loose inside of a top-secret research facility.

Phogbound.description: The story about hungry creatures, who are living in the Fog.

Progressbar95.description: Progressbar95 is a unique indie game with a strong nostalgic vibe. It turns vintage GUI elements like panels, buttons and icons into game elements! Simple and addictive gameplay based on dozens of mini-games and puzzles. The game will make you smile!

Stolen Recovery.description: Locate lost cars, smash groups of criminals and explore thieves hideouts in a realistic simulator of a stolen vehicle hunter.

Outcore Demo.description: All you wanted was a nice game. But now you find yourself opening Windows apps like Paint & Notepad to solve puzzles, and searching for files on your computers that you didn't put there... Who is she? Why did she appear on your desktop? Let's dive into her memories and find out.

Lab Rat.description: A metrics-obsessed AI will monitor, profile, and entertain you as you progress through over a hundred genre-bending puzzles in this delightfully satirical adventure.

THE INSIDER.description: The Insider is an interactive film where a viewer’s choices decide how the story goes. It has five different endings and her fate depends entirely on your choice.

Related.description: Waking up from a nightmare, Jessica finds confirmation to her suspicions. To figure out her past, she goes to an orphanage, where she hopes to find answers to questions that she tried so hard to forget.

Vagrus - The Riven Realms: Prologue.description: Embark on a perilous journey across a realm forsaken by the gods and devastated by an arcane cataclysm. Accompanied by a hardy crew, you must trade, fight, and explore your way to success as the leader of a traveling company in Vagrus, an award-winning turn-based post-apocalyptic fantasy RPG.

Push Your Family.description: Push Your Family is a physics-based party game with wacky family members and slapstick humor. Push each other in one of the interactive battlegrounds and be the last to survive or work together as only a family can!

ARISEN Demo.description: ARISEN is a narrative card game where you use your emotions to create your own story in a dark fantasy universe.

ReRoad.description: ReRoad is a Tower Defense game with a brand new concept where the players dig their own paths. You need to consider the locations of the randomly placed towers of the stages as well as the towers you will build and strategically create a path. Stop the enemy through a path you have created!

Drifter King Online.description: Precision drift racing solo or against friends.

Bake 'n Switch Demo.description: Bake ‘n Switch is a cute, yet tough couch co-op and PvP party game for 1-4 players. Embark on a 'Bun Solo' single-player adventure or team up with other Bakers to catch, throw, and bake a'dough'rable living bread creatures!

The End of Labyronia: Nerubis.description: Travel through time and the four seasons to avert the apocalypse in the last part of the popular Labyronia saga.

Call of Corona: Micro Warfare.description: A dangerous mission to travel into the human body and meet the Corona virus face to face and send it back to microscopic hell.

Fantasy Mosaics 34: Zen Garden.description: The penguin family discovered a "Zen" way to play multi-color mosaic puzzles also known as picross,nonogram,griddlers hanjie!

Ace of Space.description: You and your spaceship versus thousands of aliens! Blast through waves of aliens with upgradable spaceships in this sci-fi shoot ’em up game and become the Ace of Space!

重装无限·Metal Infinite.description: 或许在某个时空里他已经战败了 但是在这里或许可以改写一切，传说最强的赏金猎人！ 那段未完的故事 将如何开始又如何结束...

Monster Energy Supercross - The Official.description: Cross is Super Again! The official videogame of the Monster Energy AMA Supercross Championship is back with its fourth edition, the most extreme ever!

Urge.description: You wake up in a mysterious town after a car crash. Feeling a strong urge to take a leak, battling to stay alive against overgrown insects and other uncanny creatures. Build, explore, survive in this horrifying first person survival horror.

Dumb Roguelike-like RPG.description: Venture into a forbidden cursed city in the hopes of rescuing your sister!

Covid Tale: Ignorance.description: Discover the truths about COVID19... according to the internet. And the internet never lies, right? Play a witty story of how it all may or may not happened.

The End of Dyeus.description: Go in a quest for Dyeus in a primitive and cryptic open world ! Face mysterious assailants in intense and fast paced sword fights, and survive against a carnivorous fauna. Will you uncover the truth about Dyeus?

Super Cable Boy.description: Super Cable Boy is a retro inspired platformer, where you are playing a living handheld gaming system with a power cord. Collect game cartridges to become more powerful and take on your quest to defeat "the Glitch", an entity that 1▧01☠01௹1‱☣∰0␢⌀▧ ..

Charge Blade Hero.description: A fast paced 2D hack and slash, adventure game. Attack, Dodge, and Charge Up to maintain your weapon's durability as you take on waves of enemies.

Love n Dream.description: 《Love n Dream》 is a puzzle game with many kawaii girls. You will be transformed into multiple roles to approach all of our girls. Your job is to unlock their desired, characteristic, favorite, hate by using your skill to solve all the puzzles and understand more about them.

Launch Break Demo.description: Launch Break is a fast-paced 4-player local party game, where you must fight over a single chance to escape a crash-imminent spaceship!Challenge your friends with all your arsenal, perks and the ability to shape the battleground to your advantage.

Knife Quest.description: Knife Quest is a platform videogame where the character will have to find 3 coins that will allow him to open a new portal to go to the next level.

Beware of the Blob.description: Eat people and craft limbs in this third-person puzzle exploration game. You'll need brains, arms, lungs, and more to escape from Black Hawk Industries HQ in one piece.

Aim Master H.description: Aim Master H is the first 2D Aim Game on Steam, designed to warmup and boost your aim quickly and easily.

HelixVision Demo.description: Epic stereoscopic gaming, HelixMod in virtual 3D TV brings your full length 2D games into the 3rd dimension. Try our Free slideshow Demo in VR.

Polter Pals.description: Make ghost friends by steering the living into deadly hazards to release their souls. Puzzle through diorama-style levels and make as many friends as possible using comically fatal accidents. Keep up with the latest memes by getting popular on the afterlife's hottest social media app, LiveBurial.

Mischance.description: Mischance is a game about surviving as long as possible with a curse that guarantees an imminent death. Everything in your day-to-day life is now much more likely to kill you. Your objective is to make smart choices and hope that the most simplest of activities don't end up taking your life.

Super Blood Warriors Demo.description: Super Blood Warriors is a highly stylized multiplayer shooter taking place in a fictional Vietnam War. Choose from several different classes, with various Blood Abilities and special equipment, to defeat the alien horde.

SkunkHunter 101.description: 2020 port of the 2009 title. Grow and sell weed.

Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai.description: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai is a fantasy survival strategy game set in Feudal Japan.Build your town, gather resources, explore new lands, trade with other cities and defend your town against the risen Yokai threat!

Toodee and Topdee.description: A cosmic turbulence caused the 2D Platformer and the Top-Down Puzzler dimensions to merge! Switch between Toodee and Topdee and their unique perspectives to overcome hard-as-nails challenges, solve mind-melting puzzles and defeat huge bosses.

Mini Motor Racing X.description: Welcome to the world of Mini Motor Racing X! Strap yourself in, or strap on your VR headset, and jump into a nitro fueled world where little cars mean BIG fun!

Do Not Buy This Game Demo.description: Are you really reading this to find out more? ...FINE! If you DO buy this game, expect me to narrate in your ear for around 2 hours about your poor life choices, all while I'll try to create something resembling a game for you to walk around in.

Training Lab.description: A laboratory simulator to do virtual experiments in a simulated laboratory for training

Extra Terrestrial Nation.description: In the year 2045 scientists discover a new planet that has extraterrestrial life on it, which they brought back to Earth to study. It wasn't long before they mutated and escaped into the city. The only safe place left is on the outskirts of town, can Nicole and Rocky make it safely out of town?

The Adventures of Fatman: Intergalactic.description: Emerge from the Fat-cave once more and help Fatman defeat the Intergalactic Indigestion! A cheap and cheerful continuation to The Adventures of Fatman series, by Mike Doak.

Color Game.description: Color Game is a puzzle game about getting to the end. Change your color, unlock the path to the exit and avoid enemies along the way.

Ungeon.description: Fight your way through a cursed dungeon filled to the brim with undead enemies in hopes of finding your lost father, or at least your way out. Ungeon is a randomly generated dungeon crawler with a large focus on combat and exploration.

Dirt Bike Motocross Stunts.description: Go ahead and live out your bike stunt racing dreams with Dirt Bike MotoCross Stunts.

Hotel R'n'R Demo.description: Hotel R’n’R, the gonzo VR rockstar simulator! Sell your soul to The Devil, smash up hotels and become Infamous. Pressure from hotel staff and your own limp wrists are against you, but with over 36 weapons, and a World Tour ahead of you, it’s time to get creative.

Abacus Finch Demo.description: Play as Abacus Finch or Abbie Finch to track down and find out what has happened to the dreaded Pterofractal egg taken by Pigeonacci.

Cork The Volcano Demo.description: Join Rus the Dinosaur, Hippo the Hedgehog, and Syd the Sloth, to put a stop to whoever's causing the volcano of Pear Island to erupt!

Swatch Out! Demo.description: Discover all the colors in the Art Zone by surrounding creatures the same color as you! Make yourself red, blue, or yellow, and discover how to become orange, green, and purple in this action title.

Rocky Mayhem.description: Rocky Mayhem is a hardcore space shooter where you play as a pilot, receiving distress calls outside of Neptune from a fellow co-worker. Your mission is to retrieve him but it’s not as easy as it seems...

A Lot of Universes.description: Jump from world to world searching for an interdimensional fugitive. Collect items and use them to resolve tricky situations that threaten to delay your progress.

CAMEO: CCTV Detective.description: Play as CCTV Detective Lopez as he solves crimes through the ever faithful lens of a security camera. The crime rate in the small City of ChurchView is rising, and it is up to Lopez to lower it.

Noise Hunters.description: Noise Hunters is an action stealth video game where noise is your tool, but also your enemy. Don't let them hear you, HUNT or be HUNTED.

The Arcane Tower.description: Immerse yourself into a hidden underworld where state of the art mechanics meets ingeniously crafted puzzles. Use the handcar to go through the mine and get face to face with the arcane tower.

LeftWay 2.description: Nampung encounters the nightmare again and this time also includes her relative people.

Radio Viscera.description: Radio Viscera is a fast-paced top down shooter without bullets. Hurl enemies into brutal traps and blast your way through walls with your air cannon, in this bloody, arcade action game.

Project Downfall Demo.description: An overdose of reality can have dire consequences... Tumble down the rabbit hole and embrace your downfall with 12 endings, non linear day by day progression, sanity system and more...

runflexio.description: This is a narrative runner about the fate of a little jackal, who decided to leave his home and go to another place more pleasant for him. During his trip, the hero of the game reflects on the past, reflects on actions and emotions, as well as whether he made the right decision.

Mars Horizon Demo.description: Lead a major space agency as you guide humanity to Mars in this strategy simulation game. Construct a base, design and build rockets, conduct missions throughout the Solar System, and write your own history of Space exploration. Created with support from the European Space Agency.

Dura Vita Online.description: Dura Vita Online is a multiplayer RPG in a medieval fantasy setting. You are an ordinary citizen living your life when The Occurrence happens. Now evil has started to spread across the land and you have no choice but to take up arms and destroy it!

Creep.description: Experimental dark platform game that takes place inside a struggled man's inner world represented as the worm world. You control the worm form of this man as he shows why this world exists and how it's like to live there. You also visit past memories/analogies and gain new abilities.

Rachael Savage.description: Play as a fearsome bounty hunter in this adventure game about hunting down an unbeatable threat! Turn invisible to sneak past enemies, slash with your sword, and use other unique items you find along the way to help acquire new bounties across the land.

Parabolus Two.description: Shoot your way across the galaxy in this thrilling adventure! It’s the sci-fi shooter which blends old school game mechanics with modern story driven cinematic experiences. Unlock the mystery of strange events all over the Milky Way and find out who (or what) is behind them.

Geometric Sniper.description: Immerse yourself in Andrew's story and feel the pressure of being a sniper. Find and eliminate the target in the crowd before he runs away.In living environments, designed exclusively for this fantastic game, you will not have a second chance, precision is everything!

Alien Egg: Ascent.description: Jump your way into outer space to help a lost alien egg find its way back to its homeworld!

Tanky Panky.description: Fun, chaotic, cut-throat multiplayer vehicular mayhem. Let theft, carnage and cunning be your motto. Support your teammates, outwit and back-stab your enemies. Snatch flags, grab power-ups, but don't forget to protect your base.

MARDEK.description: MARDEK is a fantasy/sci-fi/retro Flash RPG from 2007-2010, which blends parody with a deeper story. It offers solid turn-based RPG combat and dozens of hours of gameplay.

Proxy Air Force.description: Proxy Air Force is a 2D Arcade Shoot Them Up game based on the story of the world war which broke out between the US and CES countries in 2020.

Esothe Demo.description: A journey of a lonely wanderer through a forgotten land, located on a plateau separated from the rest of the world by a high wall...

You're the Doctor.description: If you have ever thought of becoming a doctor – here is your chance! Arm yourself in a stethoscope and do a ward round to keep up to date with your patients’ condition. They may complain and question your authority but remember – you’re the doctor!

Briefcase Inc. Demo.description: A hardcore precision platformer where you switch between three differently skilled characters to collect briefcases and make your way through levels.

Escape Game Fort Boyard.description: Beat all the trials to escape the Fort with the treasure!

Dig Bombers.description: It's a real time multiplayer with fast-paced battles. Dig, blast and become the sole owner of a dungeon full of treasures. Everything needed to win is buried in the mine. Dig up weapons and get rid of your opponents.

MelDEV Power Boat Racing.description: Real ocean physics. Power Boat Racing at its edge for PC.

Small Ball.description: This is a casual game,control small ball arrive at the destination,include 4 mini games

Drift Racing Rally.description: Grip the wheel, pull the handbrake and drift like a maniac, Making donuts drifts like a champion.

Turbo Shot.description: Turbo Shot combines a puzzle-filled top-down adventure with exciting gun-based combat that plays out in regular seasons of free-to-play single player and PvP content.

Saiku's Endless Labyrinth.description: Follow Saiku's journey through the world as they battle monsters, encounter great bosses and traverse strange lands. With the help of PEROS, an operator from S.A.V.E. Corp., Saiku must seek out the meaning to their life and attempt to recover their memories...

Slurkum.description: Fantasy themed multiplayer, survival styled RPG. Build your character with unique stats, skills, karma, and reputation as you quest, explore, and conquer. Adventure awaits!

Fractured Atmosphere.description: Fractured Atmosphere is an atmospheric VR exploration game. Scour abandoned spaceships and avoid hazards in your search for valuable items. Send crew to dangerous environments where each ship you explore will help to paint a picture of this universe and the people who live here.

Vaporwave Road VR.description: Drive a car on an endless road, listen to music, and watch the scenery. This is a relaxing game, you can import local music, in the game you can only listen to music and enjoy the scenery. This game is completely made for the VR experience and contains 7 music.

Diamond Giza.description: Run through the pyramids and grab everything shiny! Explore the mazes and rob the pharoahs and your friends in massive couch co-op mayhem!

Tanklike.description: Tanklike is a cooperative 2D shooter for 1 - 4 players. Improve your stats, upgrade your arsenal, and ricochet your way to victory!

Roses Of Love Demo.description: In this visual novel you will be immersed in the story of Akane, a girl who wanted to fulfill her dream of studying in the great city of Tokyo. Here Akane will find love and new friendships, support her in her search for romance and discover a side of her that never expected.

Swords and Sandals Crusader Redux.description: The world of Swords and Sandals is at war! Join the Crusade against Emperor Antares! For the first time since 2007, the beloved Swords and Sandals Crusader returns, reforged from the ground up. Fast paced, addictive tactical warfare is back and better than ever!

Show for Lovers.description: Interactive visual novel, the ending of which depends on you. Immerse yourself in a romantic story about life in a private school.

Venge Demo.description: In an effort to win some money, you decide to explore a once magnificent movie studio that vanished into thin air a few years back. After a terrible fall, you find yourself trapped in the abandoned world of Rotnic Entertainment. Suddenly, you wake the spirits and get transported to THEIR world...

Realm of the hero.description: Everything in this game like JRPG is random. Choose one in many classes to destroy enemies. You are a hero. Strengthen yourself before fighting very strong bosses. Try to learn skills and equip weapons in the adventure.

Diving City.description: Diving City is an action RPG with strategy elements, featuring Karl, who has been trapped in Luvania, an underground megacity built by a mysterious civilisation, for reasons unknown. Karl will have to collect elemental cubes from the surroundings and create makeshift traps to unlock the way forward when facing the indescribable...

Nebula Within.description: Nebula Within is a contemplative yet challenging twin-stick shooter about exploring your emotions and finding self-acceptance. Plunge into a colorful consciousness and reveal a mysterious diary alone or with up to 8 of your friends.

DaMing.description: In 1789, the Ming Dynasty had survived for a hundred years. At this time, just before the Great Revolution, what will the Ming Dynasty look like under the influence of players?

Hero.EXE.description: Hero.EXE is a card collecting action RPG. With visual novel cutscenes and grid based action combat; modeled off of the classic Battle Network series. Choose your Ava wisely, as you both become a central part of the story!

Zombo Buster Advance.description: Zombo Buster Advance is a tower defense game taking place inside buildings with interchangeable elevators. Deploy, swap and shoot like a boss!

Chair F*cking Simulator.description: Use our innovative patented funky fresh ChairF*cker simulation tech to meet the chair of your wildest dreams.

KOORING VR Coding Adventure.description: Let’s ride the Blockstar and go on a journey to the Coding World. Help Kooring catch the troubled Tooring in the beautiful Block World! Having fun playing block coding fosters logical thinking and creativity. The Highest Level of Immersion Brings The Highest Learning Effect!

Tails Of Trainspot.description: "Tails of Trainspot" is a relaxing puzzle game that lets you explore the diverse landscape of the Packan Islands, by laying tracks to build a variety of stations and interacting with the characterful residents.

Assembly Planter.description: A farming / automation game, that allows you to progress from a poor hard-working farmer with just a few old tools to a lazy rich guy that watches his machines do the work for him while he tries to optimize production.

Tails Of Trainspot Demo.description: "Tails of Trainspot" is a relaxing puzzle game that lets you explore the diverse landscape of the Packan Islands, by laying tracks to build a variety of stations and interacting with the characterful residents.

Yuldigard's Fate.description: The capital of his native Yuldigard Alzia is torn apart by a civil war, in order to avoid death, the prince has to flee the city, pretending to be a wanderer. He has to find refuge in the provincial town of Torchbergen, but this visit is destined to drag on for a long time ...

Iteration Factor.description: Use time travel and other tools to solve mind bending puzzles in VR. When you travel back you will find that you and every action you took is happening again. If you use the right tools you can control any paradoxes you create with smart planning.

Electro Ride Prologue.description: Racing neon cars from the former Eastern Bloc. Start at the Berlin Wall. The first routes and quick race mode will give you a taste of the Electro Ride competition. Neon lights, superfast, unique, classic, iconic cars. Get crazy about colorful streets!

Infectious.description: Play as a lethal virus infecting various organs in your host's body while trying to outsmart the immune cells that seek to eliminate you and your kind.

Village Fest: Digging.description: Up to 4 player gold digging competition. Dig gold as much as you can and protect it from others... or be the one who is gonna steal, its up to you.

The Zone.description: Dimitri has a mission: go to an island and disable all the electrical installations to avoid that strange creatures have multiplies and go out.

Milky Way Prince – The Vampire Star Demo.description: A visual novel about an abusive relationship, idealization, and intimacy. Live a summer of dysfunctional love through branching storylines, twists, sudden changes, and an innovative mechanic where you choose which senses to use with your boyfriend.

Inertial Drift Sunset Prologue.description: Set in a 90's retro future, Inertial Drift offers a driving experience genuinely unlike anything you've played before – boasting twin stick drifting mechanics that need to be felt to be believed.

Seed of Life Demo.description: Seed of Life is an epic adventure game about the persistence of life. You're Cora, the last known survivor of Lumia, a dying planet. Your only hope to save your homeworld is to activate the Seed of Life and rekindle the sun once again. Will you be the light that conquers the darkness?

Ultimate Wall Defense Force.description: Ultimate Wall Defense Force is a single-player, action game made for VR. Fly into a superhero fantasy inspired by outrageous anime fights. Defend The Wall and destroy an onslaught of enemy Geodites by yielding ultimate abilities in the palms of your hands.

Racing Juke.description: Compete against cunning and tough rivals racers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!

Pirates: Mystery of the Skeletons Island.description: Atmospheric role-playing pirate adventure. You shall fight with unique cursed skeletons; discovery diverse flora and fauna through thunderstorms rain and sand; search treasures and sail on ship and boats!

End of Panduora.description: "End of Panduora" is a fast-paced fantasy-style strategy management game. In a randomly generated corner of the abyss, by consuming sanity in exchange for strength that does not belong to you. In the endless sea, create a new paradise to welcome the remnants of the old gods.

Dead Containment.description: Dead Containment is an on-rails shooter inspired by classic arcade games. Players fend off the undead as they race through a city under siege, blasting away the horrors that roam the streets using a variety of weapons. Playable solo or online co-op.

F29 Retaliator.description: The skies are your hunting ground in this high speed, high action Cold War flight sim, featuring 100 missions of dogfights and strategic bombings across three geopolitical theaters.

Elkabo: Selina's Dark Spirit.description: When your sister stumbled upon a dark secret you start on a quest of rescue that could just rewrite history.

My Very Own Lair.description: True artificial intelligence is at hand, time to build your very own lair! Start from an old mansion in the UK and pick a place to move. But careful, the World will try to stop you. Will you make it to Mars?

Pursuit of the Bookkeeper.description: Venture dark dungeons in a pursuit of the Bookkeeper. Beware, your only defence are spells, and to cast them you need to look into your spellbook.

Dead Containment Demo.description: Dead Containment is an on-rails shooter inspired by classic arcade games. Players fend off the undead as they race through a city under siege, blasting away the horrors that roam the streets using a variety of weapons. Playable solo or online co-op.

Breakout Planet.description: It is the future; aliens came to earth and won the war in a matter of minutes. Unable to stand up to the alien technology, humanity has become enslaved. A ship transporting prisoners has crashed landed, fortunately you are the only survivor and have a chance of escape. Will you be able to break out?

The Director's Cut.description: The Director's Cut is a story-driven psychological horror game set in a 1984, USA. Redefine your meaning of horror. Using © DREAMu.

Close Encounter VR.description: Experience the thrill of a UFO sighting and the terror of an alien abduction as you come face to face with extraterrestrial beings! Don't worry, everything will be fine in the end, I promise!

Quarry Simulator 2021.description: Quarry Simulator - innovation simulator and economical strategy about creation of the quarries. You beginner magnat and you need earn some money for his bussiness. INOVATION AND ORIGINAL IDEA.

Wrestledunk Sports.description: Wrestledunk is an explosive, colorful collection of super competitive multiplayer sports games! Face off online or locally with up to 8 players. Get into it!

Space Roaming.description: Space roaming is a casual level game and parkour game, accompanied by laid-back music, constantly running forward. Faced with various obstacles, you need to consider the way to pass the game skillfully or flexibly. Of course, smooth levels are the fun of this game.

Qube Qross.description: Qube Qross is a challenging logical puzzle game, like Nonogram in 3D, solving the cute voxel puzzles with chill music and neon graphic style.

Cross Princess.description: Single route visual novel. Belle is actually a boy, an accident lets him and a bright girl named Bambi begin to live together, a warm and healing friendship + love story.

Knight's Destiny.description: Knight's Destiny is a puzzle game where you need to find a way to escape, and solve a mystery about disappearing of your best friend by solving puzzles and escaping the unknown.

羊教授：归来.description: This is a 2D action game with roguelike elements. Players need to use the map reasonably to move and attack. In addition, there are plenty of random props in the game that can help players to take risks.

Decks and Dungeons.description: A Turn based deck building Monster Collecting Roguelite RPG!

Escape Room - The Sick Colleague.description: You only wanted to make a visit to your sick colleague, but what you encounter is beyond your imagination. Discover the secrets of your colleague and find a way to escape the trap.

Raid on the Zone.description: Fight in a furious battle against “The Zone”, a mysterious terrorist group hell-bent on destroying the world. Cripple their defenses with your dual-prop helicopter and massive arsenal of weaponry in this retro-inspired homage to arcade games of the 80’s.

Machizzle.description: Physics bending VR puzzle game - get your ball to the goal, by obeying the laws of physics. Or bending them to your will.

Anomaly Hunter.description: Hidden object puzzler about time-traveling detective. Somebody really messed up with time-travel machine..

Shatris: Infinite Puzzles.description: Insert mysterious runes back into their sockets! Identify correct shape combinations and solve hundreds of puzzles in this world of pure relaxation!

Meditation VR.description: Birds high up in the sky, waves rolling in on the shore, the wind blowing through palm trees and plants that grow on your private secluded island all contribute both visually and in sound to a surreal experience that practically makes you feel the ocean breeze.

Farlight Commanders.description: Drive a spaceship where each player has an unique role. Play Solo or Coop with friends, up to 4. A perfect mix of space shoot em up and sci-fi action platformer. Fight in space or ground.

Traffic Jams.description: In this wacky VR game, control traffic your way in the face of outrageous events and flagrant road rage. Easy? Think again! Traffic Jams throws in monsters, (un)natural disasters, and up to 4 non-VR friends in party mode!

Time Loader.description: Time Loader is a story-driven puzzle-platformer with tiny robots, alternate realities, nostalgic music, and primitive tech from the 90s!

CoronaWhomp!.description: If you hate the virus as much as we do, now is your chance...to whomp it!

Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game.description: Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game is a family friendly memory game where all can improve their memory, speed of thinking. With 3 game modes and 3 difficulties its the perfect way to train your brain.

ASTROVITY.description: Help find Astra's parents on a mission throughout the galaxy! Traverse hundreds of handcrafted levels to save your family somewhere in the vast expanse of space!

MYSTERY of the Missing Brigantine.description: An exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game which takes you on the amazing journey of treasure hunters who need your help to find the missing person. Enjoy hours of fun in this mystic, storydriven game!

Forking Hell.description: Forking Hell is a casual arcade-simulation game where the player guides a forklift vehicle around a virtual warehouse and completing customer orders over the working days.

Astrodogs.description: Astrodogs is an on-rails arcade action game featuring a cast of space dogs that have to save the galaxy of WOOFER, a company that controls everything. Also run by dogs.

My Personal World.description: If you bored at stay at home and you want to create your own Personal World you can do it with this game. Random objects spawn from up and every 15 minutes world gravity activates, you have to finish the your personal world before big time over.

Think_ Demo.description: A normal rhythm-combat RPG in which nobody can die.Maybe.]

Gems of Fate: the Charmed King.description: Save the kingdom from dark magic by solving riddles in match-3 game!

Super Blood Warriors.description: Super Blood Warriors is a highly stylized multiplayer shooter taking place in a fictional Vietnam War. Choose from several different classes, with various Blood Abilities and special equipment, to defeat the alien horde.

Pyro Fighters.description: Pyro Fighters is a scrolling space shooter with platforming physics. Use your flame gun to propel yourself in the air and fight through an alien army with up to four players.

Rogue Planet.description: Rogue Planet is about speed, precision, and smooth motion. Use your momentum paired with the force of gravity to propel yourself from star to star, draining their power and fueling your ship as you go.

No Umbrellas Allowed.description: Reveal the true value of the items coming into the shop. Each item has their own history. Dig deep to see what is behind them and become an expert appraiser. Begin a tug of war with customers. With their own expectations and knowledge, they never give up on money.

Solar Rogue.description: A space exploration adventure in the purest tradition of roguelike. Featuring procedurally generated solar systems, perma-death and tactical turned-based gameplay!

Groove Catcher Demo.description: Groove Catcher is a rhythm-and-dance game that grooves and flows. We've got smooth moves, tight rhythms and beauty. Feeling chill? Feeling energized? We've got all moods covered, or load your own songs. Build your own levels right in the game just by dancing and share them with the world!

Bishoujo Battle Hanafuda Koi-Koi.description: The Bishoujo girls from "Rick G Earth" mobile military turn-based strategy game from Japan are here! And they want to play Koi-Koi, the most famous Japanese flower card game with you. Battle the girls in a tour around Japan. Or hop on multiplayer and compete against Koi-Koi masters around the world.

Bishoujo Battle Mahjong Solitaire.description: The Bishoujo girls from "Rick G Earth" mobile military turn-based strategy game from Japan are here! And they want to go head to head in a battle of Mahjong Solitaire. Delete all tiles before time runs out to clear rounds. Every 3rd round girls will change costumes and more will be revealed.

Shooty Skies Overdrive.description: Escape the arcade in Shooty Skies Overdrive, an action-packed VR shoot ‘em up. Dodge and weave your way through dynamically generated enemy waves and blast them at point-blank range. An incredible journey through colorful retro worlds and ridiculous alien invaders.

Rift Frigate Demo.description: Rift Frigate is a dynamic space shooter that combines vehicular combat with a good old FPS arsenal, unfolding a gripping story with surreal cosmic visuals.

Mars Power Industries: First Job.description: Is that your first job here at Mars Power Industries? Okay... Let's learn how to supply your tiny colony. Think of this like a puzzle. Sparkly crystals make power and your buildings need that sweet, sweet blue jazz. Black goo? Right, umm... Best to ign#-$!ore it. We do&!@ ONE #%& OF &#@ US %!&

Apollo Lunar Mission.description: Apollo Lunar Misson VR Simulator is a first-person experience on the surface of the Moon, as a member of the Apollo mission crew. Have fun while completing the tasks and exploring the Moon surface. Drive the Lunar Rover first hand.

Battle Baseball.description: Enjoy idle and fast-paced baseball game. Hit the baseball as hard as you can and sink enemy ships.

Taiga.description: Taiga is a harsh survival simulator in the Taiga forests of Russia. There is constant cold, wild nature, clean air and time go slower. There are no zombies and geomagnetic disasters, only the nature of our vast planet. You'll have to make your own decisions.

Blind Drive.description: An audio-based black comedy action arcade game - Blind Drive is a video game you can play with your eyes closed! 1st person hyper-realistic audio adventure meets fast paced arcade gameplay, driven by an insane B-movie plot.

Rodent & Plank: Secret Origin.description: Rodent and Plank is a run 'n gun action platformer that borrows heavily from genre classics such as Gunstar Heroes, Earthworm Jim, and Metal Slug. It's tough as nails and the constantly shifting gameplay styles ensures that there's a surprise around every corner.

Dinosaur Fossil Hunter Demo 2020.description: Become a real paleontologist, explore various environments and search for dinosaur fossils. Dig for and study the remnants of these majestic creatures to learn about their evolution. Build your own museum and experience an immersive background story.

ヤドカリサバイブ.description: 「ヤドカリサバイブ」は、主人公のヤドカリがカラを投げて 敵のタコと戦う ステージクリア型の横スクロールアクションゲームです。

Snowtopia Demo.description: Build your ideal ski resort. Keep skiers smiling with fresh pistes and fine facilities. Ski, build and chill in the wintry world of Snowtopia where everyone is welcome!

Black Noir.description: A point-and-click adventure game, in the style of a noir mystery set in the early 1900's.

DRAG Demo.description: DRAG is an offroad racing game introducing 4CPT vehicle physics (4-way contact patch traction technology). A soft-body tyre model allows for competitive time attack and multiplayer wheel to wheel racing.

Dayscream.description: Dig deep down in a world of darkness. Uncover the secrets of your dreams and try to find out what is really going on. Are they just daydreams or your deepest nightmares?

SpaceCrooks.description: SpaceCrooks is a hybrid rail-shooter/flight-sim (Starfox-clone) that combines roguelite gameplay with an unlocking comedic sci-fi visual novel. Follow kAla, ♩♩B₄♯♩C♭♩E♭, and [Rigb'g] as they carve a path of mayhem in this genre soup.

Strawberry Chocolate Miner 8AD 4SS.description: The Strawberry Chocolate is your ship. You are a top asteroid miner. Is a hostile ecosystem of predator slugs a concern? Of course not. In this action RPG, get out there and hunt for all the different minerals you need and destroy any predators that get in your way. You are a Miner Badass.

Glitchphobia.description: Immerse yourself into unstable reality. In order to get out you must exploit glitch in a world around you. You can be sure of one thing, any rules you known no longer exist!! Do you have a courage to dip in it?

Tap-A-Zombie.description: Train your brain with "Tap-A-Zombie", the memory game for the not yet fully brain dead.

Snowballer Demo.description: Reminisce your youthful days, or just be actively malicious in this bloody serious, fast-paced First-Person Snowball Fight / Sled Racing Simulation. Sandbox elements: Build your own snow forts, simulate NPC battles, Survival challenges and Time Attack Downhill Racing

Unwalkable.description: Unwalkable is a silly physics based open-ended puzzle platformer where you control a wobbly character. Without just one way to solve puzzles, you must use your imagination and ingenuity to create solutions to unthinkable problems.

Ricochet Bounce.description: Challenging puzzle game with hand crafted levels. Easy to learn but hard to complete!

CursorFX.description: Create stunning animated Windows mouse cursors for your PC with CursorFX! Easily apply skins, shadows, motion trails, and sounds, customize your own, or choose from one of several unique cursors already installed.

Whateverland: Prologue.description: A Prologue to Whateverland, an upcoming point-n-click adventure set in a bizarrely beautiful hand-drawn world, where everyone gets what they truly deserve. Experience the beginning of the journey of Vincent, an unfortunate thief, who can either find a way out or stay trapped there forever.

Mystery Tales: Til Death Collector's Edi.description: Can you traverse the Underworld and make it out alive?
