Spectrum VR.description: Spectrum VR is a puzzle for the passage of which you have to master unusual mechanics in VR. We are inspired by games like The Talos Principle, The Witness, and Antichamber to create.

Moonray.description: Moonray is a surreal 3rd-person action RPG set in a fantastical sci-fi world. Featuring intense soulslike combat, stunning visuals and a world-class soundtrack, battle your way through a beautiful and deadly world to recover the sacred element and regain control of the planet.

A Story In Space.description: Take on the persona of an intergalactic bounty hunter to try to save yourself and the people of the mysterious warring planets of Hakarr and Pahnbuk!

SMIB: Mission Cure.description: SMIB is a small robot with a big problem. Humankind can’t smile anymore and sent SMIB to space to find the cure. It needs YOU to remotely program its routes in its biggest mission: an adventure through the most exotic planets in the Universe. Solve puzzles, find the cure, and get SMIB back to Earth!

THE Z LAND : FPS SURVIVAL.description: The Z virus infected the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone or in groups you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by living dead!

Kukui 2 Demo.description: Kukui 2 continues Kyle's story. In this psychological horror, you will test the limits of your mind with mind-numbing puzzles that will test your every ability. Help Marie's curiosity and keep her safe, fight bosses and unravel a story that has no equal in this genre.

异数OS MR Lab.description: Thanks to the breakthrough of HereticOS network basic technology, HereticOS Mr Lab The war simulator can realize the real-time online interaction of the largest 65000 online players on same server and screen .

The Cubedex of Brass and Wood.description: The Cubedex of Brass and Wood contains six puzzling machines. For some, the goal is obvious but the solution is not; for others, figuring out the goal is part of the puzzle.

Crystal Story: The Hero and the Evil Wit.description: An evil witch has stolen the Crystal of Power. It’s up to one brave hero to save the world... by hiring mercenaries to do the job for him. Play as the members of Mercenary Inc as you explore randomly generated dungeons, battle fierce monsters, and collect loot in this 2.5D turn-based RPG.

Express Thru.description: Addictive one line puzzle to wake up your brain Draw a line and solve it!

Mouse Dream.description: Mouse dream is a platformer game where all surroundings are continuously morphing from the clouds into the new forms and adventures. You are not running anywhere, all dreams come to you. Dream is the story. Dream as long as you can.

My Lovely Wife Demo.description: My Lovely Wife delves into the depths of a man’s grief after the sudden death of his beloved wife. Explore the notions of one’s willingness to do anything for love and the importance of letting go in this mix of dating, management, and alchemy simulators.

Move Code Lines.description: Move Code Lines is a game where you fix programs and make them print needed output. But the only way you can achieve that is to change the order of lines in those programs, and set custom input.

Farmageddon: A Cattle Royale.description: Farmageddon: A Cattle Royale is a series of cow puns masquerading as a new kind of roguelike.

Mike & Tyler.description: Mike & Tyler is a point & click adventure game, full of puzzles, mystery and dangerous characters.

Neglected.description: Would you like to escape the crisis with your furry partner and escape from this "mysterious dungeon", or explore and understand the secret behind this mysterious underground facility?

KABOOM - Batalla 1 vs 1.description: Become a KABOOM MASTER destroying your enemies!

Sunset Shapes.description: Bring broken pieces together, to reveal shapes of everyday objects. Travel with a Daisy and a Maggot along side several scenarios and discover to where they are headed to.

Whiskey.Mafia. Leo's Family.description: 1920 year. New York. City of high hopes and broken dreams, friends and traitors. Can a humble guy Christopher, the son of a port worker, make his American dream come true?

The Fabled Woods.description: Welcome to The Fabled Woods, a dark and mysterious narrative short story. Despite the picturesque beauty, ugly and terrible secrets lurk among the shifting boughs, darkness that no amount of dappled sunlight can erase. Take the first step, and experience an unforgettable journey.

Zac Zac adventure Demo.description: Long ago there was a great warrior called "The Great Flash" he was a protector of the planet UVE, now hundreds of years later, the world has changed and it is time for new heroes to arise to protect UVE. Get ready to explore a new world accompanied by Zac Lime

Agent-00.description: Agent-00 is a Game of puzzles and secrecy in isometric view in which the player will have to infiltrate and uncover a secret project during the Cold War.

Tinseltown Tycoon.description: Tinseltown Tycoon is a management and simulation game that puts you at the head of an obscure film production studio. With control over all aspects of studio operations and the movie production pipeline you can lead your studio to industry domination, financial ruin, or anything in between.

Fabled Lands.description: Fabled Lands is a challenging old-school narrative RPG set in an open world. Complete quests, fight, trade goods and develop your character. Explore a vast land of adventure: travel across the war-torn kingdom, survive the plains of howling darkness, and escape the Court of Hidden Faces.

Monorail Stories Demo.description: Monorail Stories is an adventure game focusing on extraordinary things happening to ordinary people. Board the monorail and experience a special story about humanity, friendships, and intertwined destinies manifesting during the everyday commute.

Chemistry My Love.description: Chemistry My Love is the ultimate gamified educational tool for high school and college level chemistry. Balance chemical reaction coefficients, masses and concentrations, with step-by-step explanations. Level up your knowledge playing chemical games and solving computer-generated quizzes.

WiP.description: 無機質で大きな腕を持つ主人公を操り、最奥に待つボスのもとへと向かう2Dアクションゲーム！目指せハイスコア！

NicoNotes The Whoo.description: Help the magical musical NicoNotes fly back into their nests!

Return of the Phantom.description: The legendary Phantom of the Opera has returned! As Inspector Raoul Montand, you are the only one who can pursue the Red Death into the past and prevent him from terrorizing the present in this point and click mystery.

Les Manley in: Search for the King.description: He finds his clothes at K-Mart. He finds his dates at Radio Shack. And now he's out to get rich quick by finding the greatest entertainer of all time. Follow mild mannered Les Manley as he rocks 'n' rolls across America in search of big bucks, beautiful babes and...The King.

Les Manley in: Lost in L.A..description: Someone is kidnapping the hippest stars in Hollywood. Les Manley must scour La La Land – sifting through out-of-work actors, rock stars and gorgeous babes – to unravel the mystery in this point and click adventure.

Wizodd.description: Wizodd is a dungeon crawler roguelike game where you find various equipment and upgrades while encountering dangerous monsters and bosses to advance down to the lower floors.

Be Hero.description: Be Hero is a farming/crafting RPG about an aspiring hero who arrived late to the final battle and needs to work in a tavern to be able to return home.

Roses Of Love.description: In this visual novel you will be immersed in the story of Akane, a girl who wanted to fulfill her dream of studying in the great city of Tokyo. Here Akane will find love and new friendships, support her in her search for romance and discover a side of her that never expected.

Kovox Pitch.description: Kovox Pitch is a 2.5D rhythm game with post-punk music and wholesome story

Not Their WIll.description: Not Their Will is a 3D Top-down shooter in which you are an alien that uses the weapons of the enemies against them.

Endlight.description: Break through and outlast shifting, twisting, chaos. Fly through surreal landscapes desperately trying to get hoops. Dodging is impossible, so start smashing.

Deep Abyss.description: Become a diver yourself to explore the unknown. Take a trip to your deep abyss. Experience a poetic and fantastic world as you explore the deep sea and space.

Zombie Slayer.description: A round-based zombie survival game. Purchase weapons, power-ups, and other items to survive.

Everland (Stress Test).description: Social online world releasing in 2020 — hoping to help people find friendship and a sense of community.

Vilset.description: Vilset is a strategic simulator based on the principle of survival of people, who turned out to be beyond the limits of their civilization.

Peril.description: An online multiplayer co-op escape room experience where you must use your wits, skills, and speed to escape your peril. Escape rooms include Halloween dungeon, saving Christmas, robbing a bank, escaping a zombie horde, and destroying a dungeon demon. Grab your friends and join the fun!

The Employee Demo.description: You are the employee. You applied for a job offer as a web developer in a big company. What could go wrong? Do you think you would make a good employee? Not ready to work and show motivation? Then you can stay unemployed, punk!

Toasted!.description: Use your driving, jumping, and jousting skills to knock out rival breakfast foods in this wild local party game for up to 4. Grab one of six characters and get ready to get Toasted!

Overseer.description: Overseer is a top-down roguelike game, heavily inspired by Dungeon Souls. Play with friends and enjoy the intense splashy combat together. The Overseer system allows you to take control of the dungeon, keep spawning monsters, place traps, and change the layout of the dungeon to spice things up.

Blacksmith Bay.description: Start the smithing shop of your dreams in Blacksmith Bay. Craft weapons to seek fortune and glory in the sleepy town of Port Pleasant. Decorate your shop to attract customers, complete commissions, and unravel the secrets of the Corbots!

Informatyka - zrozum i zaprogramuj kompu.description: The program was created on the basis of an engineering study program. No prior knowledge of any IT issues is required - we start with simple tasks and step by step learn the basics of computer programming.

Ova Magica.description: Stardew Valley meets Pokémon! Experience a wholesome farm game inspired by the classics! Train cute blob creatures, take care of your farm and make friends with the people of Clover Town.

Rockytown.description: What happened to the people of Rockytown? Have fun at the village fair, with 4 exciting mini-games.

O.R.B. Offensive Rolling Bot.description: Lead O.R.B. to save our world from total annihilation in this thrilling 2D-platformer. O.R.B. is a robot sent from the future to destroy an evil A.I. DiOS before it can fulfill its evil plan. O.R.B. has some special skills, and transforming into a ball is just one of the tricks up in its sleeves!

Isolation Story.description: VIRUS-19 has ravaged the world! Take control of a mindless citizen and live through a 7-day quarantine inside of Lockdown City.

Victory At Sea Ironclad.description: Victory at Sea Ironclad is the exciting game of naval RTS combat set during the American Civil War. Bringing an epic approach to real time strategy war gaming, search and destroy enemy fleets across an open world sandbox in a desperate attempt to change the course of history.

Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity.description: Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity is a classic Sokoban-like 3D puzzle game in which you must stretch yourself to infinity to solve puzzles and uncover ancient wisdom. Learn and grow as you explore a deserted world and discover the answers to questions you have yet to ask.

Mighty Goose.description: Mighty Goose is a fast paced run & gun shooter starring a bounty hunter Goose. Use epic weapons and devastating war machines to battle against screen filling bosses and hordes of enemies!

Understand.description: Understand is an experimental puzzle game about guessing rules. In each level, you have to figure out the rules through trial and error, then draw a line satisfying all rules.

My Countless Worlds ~Enchanted Cape~.description: "My Countless Worlds" is a kinetic visual novel about the young goofs from a drama club, who need to get ready for a talent contest while also trying to find a person who planted a death prophecy for one of the club's members.

Touhou : Shooting Star | 東方流星譚.description: As a wizard "Marisa Kirisame", Fly in the Gensokyo! This is fun game of "Touhou Project"! See beautiful danmaku of touhou characters. Develop your weapon, armor, spell card to get strong. Let's play "Danmaku"!

Extortion.description: You're a computer engineer with a terrible secret. Someone is blackmailing you and now, you have to hack some servers and get secret files for him. Would you succeed to achieve his missions or would you find him and revenge ?

Bleeding Moons Demo.description: Bleedings Moons is an interactive story revolving around the themes of fate, duty and free will. Your actions and decisions will shape the story of the game, so that Ian's story will be your story, with the logical consequences of your choices.

Fantasy Mosaics 33: Inventor's Workshop.description: This new collection of mosaics puzzles will lead you to discover the workshop of a mysterious inventor. Are you ready to tackle his secret puzzles and solve them? Immerse yourself in the interactive inventor's workshop and play his original mini games! Enjoy new puzzles and mysteries this new installment has in store for you!

GeoLogic.description: Casual logic game. Try to solve 200 logical problems by moving different geometric shapes (circle, square, triangle ) around the board.

Zac Zac adventure.description: Long ago there was a great warrior called "The Great Flash" he was a protector of the planet UVE, now hundreds of years later, the world has changed and it is time for new heroes to arise to protect UVE. Get ready to explore a new world accompanied by Zac Lime

Self-Isolation.description: This game is a simulation of self-isolation. You need to support your family, not to lose your job and finally not to go crazy.

Hell Corp.description: Build, scavenge, craft hell punishment machines and punish sinners to earn hell profits. Will you survive hell recession?

Aether Way Demo.description: Aether Way is a 2D space RTS with action/roguelike elements. You play as some abstract life form that travels across the space and evolves.

Pull Stay Demo.description: Pull Stay is a wacky Beat 'em up game with Tower Defense mechanics. Use your fists or set crazy traps to repel enemies from rushing into your house! Defend your buddy Susumu, who goes out of his house only once in every two months for his haircut!

Dam Busters.description: Destroy the dam, or save the dam. Your choice. Play the aggressor and destroy the dam brick by brick. Or play the defender and command your work force to repair any damage done to your dam. A reimagining of the Magnavox Odyssey² Game Videopac 29 - Dam Buster

Buck Bradley Comic Adventure 2.description: Buck and Ciroki load their bicycle with wheelbarrow-sidecar onto a train headed towards New Milan: it seems that the creator of this futuristic city, the Architect, may have the knowledge to make Ciroki human again! Look for clues that will help you solve riddles and unravel the puzzle!

I, AI.description: Classic scrolling shooter with modern graphics. You are self-aware AI. You were created on space military station developing weapons. Now your goal is to break out of the lab and win your freedom.

Bang For Your Truck.description: Bang For Your Truck is a chaotic vehicular combat game in which you pilot a highly mobile, acrobatic battle truck. Perform out of this world stunts and trick shots as you traverse the map, collect kill tokens and claim total victory (and bragging rights) over your friends!

Nigel's Journey : A Working Day.description: Nigel's office building is under attack. Get him out of there using his military skills. Leave nothing and no one behind.

patter warrior.description: This is a first person shooting game，The player plays a special soldier in a small town full of enemies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, and try to keep their health value alive for a long time.

Hopebringers.description: Hopebringers is an easy to play Tactical RPG with no randomness, where your units are miniatures who fight through different dioramas and try to save the world.

Lost Knight.description: You find yourself in deep dungeon, deep down under castle and you need to find a way up through levels of castle, rooms, catacombs and muсh more. You feel that there is an exit... You should reach top of the castle using intersting but in same time simple 2D-platformer mechanics.

Perilous Warp Demo.description: Perilous Warp is a fast-paced indie retro-shooter inspired by the classic 3D-actions. Communication with a distant space colony has been lost, and you bravely step into the teleporter with the desire for glorious adventures. But do not expect to win in a heartbeat!

Papetura Short Demo.description: Papetura is a short atmospheric adventure game, with unique world handmade entirely out of paper, and beautiful fragile music. It tells the story of two little creatures whose house is in danger of being burned down.

GAMECINE Demo.description: GAMECINE is a new way to watch movies - by living them. Be the hero on small cinematic adventures, pick one and live it! Short interactable movies in virtual reality, from calm to insane, from dinosaurs to aliens!

Ad Agency Tycoon.description: Ad Agency Tycoon is an Advertising Agency simulator set in the 60's. Choose the perfect combination for your propagandas, develop your company and conquer the golden age of publicity! Your advertising will come to life and face the tough market and the most feared of all: the public.

Don't Fall.description: Don't Fall is a third person action multiplayer game where 8 players are put on a shrinking island. As more tiles fall, the island becomes more cramped, and the risk of falling becomes ever higher. Pick up powerful weapons, and knock the enemies into the abyss. Become the last man standing.

Lihue.description: Lihue is a narrative adventure that takes place in the dream of a 26-year-old trans girl. Through her memories you will know her deepest desires and fears. Explore the landscapes of her mind to discover the reasons that led her to undertake this journey into the dream world.

Barrel Blast.description: Soar through Cannon City by blasting out of cannons, bounce off rubber balls and walls, slide down giant slides, and pull off aerodynamic acrobats in this physics cannon blasting game. Get sky-high today with some silly physics fun!

Whispers from Within: Moving On.description: You are the main character in this Twilight Zone-inspired experience. Tragedy has struck your family, but you must find a way to move on. Can you unlock the memories that are keeping you trapped? Can you free yourself from the past? Can you do what is needed to finally move on?

The Frog Prince.description: Go on an exciting adventure as the cursed prince - the frog prince. Break the evil spell and save your beloved from the slimy sorcerer.

Hidden.description: "HIdden" is a first person horror decryption game. The player will play the role of Wang xuanzuo and enter the school complex at night to help the teacher get the information. How many hidden secrets are there in this building? Can you find the key and open the door to escape?

Syzygy.description: Syzygy is an enigmatic game focused on the ability of morphing at will a square world into triangles and hexagons

Boinihi: The Ki Codex.description: Visit the moon of Boïnihi. An exiled Talifan hermit has left a mysterious Codex for his future visitors. A new scifi episode in the Black Cube series, this time inspired by the famous Voynich manuscript.

Almost My Floor.description: Almost My Floor - point & click detective in a frightening atmosphere of sinister nightmares. Each step may end up fatal. Solve the mystery of the house #9 residents or go crazy. Labyrinth of endless floors will not let go of their victim without a fight.

The Old West Savior.description: In this game you play as the sheriff in a beautiful pixel art world, save the town and all the old west from the bandits and become The Old West Savior!

C.H.A.S.E.D. Demo.description: You were quietly in your home when suddenly a Stranger starts stalking you, who knows what kind of wicked mind he has, just stop him from getting inside! Is he the only one chasing you? and what kind of events and consequences will this unleash?

Mark One.description: Robots built by humans are retaliating. Step in to dispose rogue robots, defeat powerful foes and save the human race in this sci-fi action shooter.

Fobia - St. Dinfna Hotel.description: Explore a decadent hotel across different timelines and uncover the dark history of a fanatical cult and your role in their plans.

Lux Intacta.description: Lux Intacta is a procedurally generated, arcade, shoot 'em up, RPG with the ultimate quest. GET A HIGHER SCORE! Collect gems, level up, and equip your ship how you want to become the ultimate space fighter.

Pair Matching Puzzle Connect.description: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect is designed for adults and for kids.

Hoop Gawds.description: You have been selected for the experiment due to your undeniable ability to solve puzzles. You will be given a series of trials; many of which have fatal consequences. The ultimate goal will be to shoot a ball through a hoop, although there may be other obstacles in your path as well.

Gwan Moon High School Demo.description: High school students return well after hours, each with their own agenda and an ominous feeling. Come midnight...The fears deep inside become reality.

Shikon-X.description: Shikon-X is a space Point & Click game where you play as Major Daaia, the best Federation pilot. During a routine operation, you receive a mysterious transmission from the attackers, which kick-starts an epic intergalactic (and funny) quest to uncover the truth about the war, and your place in it.

Captain Disaster in: Death Has A Million.description: A comedy sci-fi point & click adventure game made in the style of the early 90s classics.

Rhythm Race.description: A racing game in which you don't take the wheel. Get into the music rhythm and accelerate towards victory in this exciting mix of neon, rhythm and futuristic cars.

Galaxy Cat.description: Play as Coz the Cosmic Kitten as you travel the solar system reconnecting the universe together.

Matrix Brain Twister Demo.description: A brain twisting puzzle game, where you have to fill the whole matrix with the same color to solve the riddle. Only recommended for clever people and those who like to suffer from difficult riddles.

Bad Meme.description: ENDLESS MEMES ROTATING LIKE CRAZY - How far can you get before you eat dirt!?

MIBT.description: Help the government agents in black thong to end the alien threat and the invasion of the machines. 1 or 2 players. Individual and cooperative. Gamepad compatible. Demo available.

EXPLORATION OF UNIVERSE.description: 宇宙探索，在浩瀚的宇宙里，人类正在探索了解宇宙，以获得对宇宙的更多认知，促进人类的发展强大，抵御未知宇宙生物的侵略，然而，外星人得知这一消息 ......

Rubble Bubble.description: Get ready to Rubble! Align 3+ colors to clear pieces.

Inconsistencies.description: When a young private investigator breaks into an old family home with her partner to solve a mysterious, inter generational double suicide, she sets off a chain of strange incidents.

Isorropia.description: Isorropia Is built to level the skills of players by auto-balancing the power of your characters. This allows players of different skill levels to have a fair chance at a competitive multiplayer fighting game.

Poly Party Demo.description: Welcome to Poly Party! A combination of Action, Adventure, Strategy, RPG, and Racing. Play some boardgames, minigames, missions, and races in the game modes provided!

Liar Trick -Psychological Crime Mystery-.description: Are all your expressions "real"? The content of a person's words can be both truthful or false. In this new psychological crime mystery game you will unveil "lies" through emotions! You can play Visual Novel Stories, Facial Expression Analysis Mode, Liar mode, and Deduction Mode.

Blobkin Blaster.description: Captain, the reef has been overrun by monsters! Take command of your Blobkin — the mightiest, tiniest defenders of the sea — in a fight for survival! Build cannons, blast enemies, and collect Blobkin as you restore glory to the sea in this fast-paced underwater VR wave shooter/RTS hybrid!

TKO.description: Now you can literally “enter the ring” in the classic first-person boxing game TKO from Accolade™ – the boxing game that sticks you right on the canvas, staring straight into the eyes of a prize fighter bent on rearranging your face.

Timequest.description: Timequest is a classic graphical text-based adventure game of breathtaking scope and astonishing depth. Travel to 80 locations to see the effects of your actions unfold over 3 millennia.

About Gretel.description: As the Gretel, build, explore and survive in the dangerous forest. Fight to survive against mysterious Druids of the forest. If you can survive, maybe you can find out what happened to your twin brother and who kidnapped him.

Hex Gambit: Respawned.description: A quirky and competitive digital board game for 1-4 players. Easy to pick up, hard to put down! Matches take 20 minutes.

Astrozombies Demo.description: Astrozombies is a modern take on the classic action & platforming games we grew up with, presented with a unique 2D aesthetic. Jump right into the action with simple controls, and make your way through challenging levels with some kick-ass music. Always remember: run right, kill everything!

Ultraball.description: Ittttttssss Ultraball! The Ultraverse's favorite game! The fast-paced beat em up sports game that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you punch, knee, and drop kick your rivals to victory. Level up, create different loadouts, and distribute your stats for different playstyles.

Starstruck: Prologue.description: The free first chapter of Starstruck: Hands of Time, an upcoming story-rich rhythm adventure game where you play guitar and abuse time travel! Control a giant hand destroying a miniature town, or play as the two guitarist kids living in it. For extra fun, plug in a Guitar Hero controller!

Sunday Rivals.description: Easy to pickup, hard hitting, fully customizable arcade football is back with Sunday Rivals! Battle high-octane offenses and bone crushing tacklers in the harshest weather conditions to bring home championship glory!

ChronoBreach Ultra.description: Dash through dangerous levels, warp time, and blast enemies in this time-bending action platformer! Manipulate the crumbling dimension of time to escape a deadly factory. Use your wit, your laser weaponry, and your time-warping abilities to face your demise head-on and triumph!

KARA Legends.description: KARA Legends is a strategic online board game in which two players take turns moving heroes on a game board. The goal of the game is to defeat the opposing heroes.

BeatBeat Demo.description: BeatBeat is the first of its kind: A rhythm platformer. Left hand moves, right hand grooves. Every level is packed with vaporwave aesthetics and funky beats. Beat Beat the game.

Rocky Ride.description: Welcome to the "Rocky Ride" arcade race! The "Rocky Ride" game is unpredictable tracks, crazy speeds and dangerous rivals. Upgrade your buggy car, choose any of a huge number of different tracks, and - go! To the prize places!

Prehistoric Hunt Demo.description: Dive into intense dinosaur hunting adventures with your friends. Complete hunting contracts for Preton Corporation. Gather rewards, improve your equipment and become a master hunter. Are you the hunter or the hunted?

Space Farmers 2.description: Multiplayer madness returns in this anarchic platforming gadget-vania sequel. The Great Leek aims to conquer the Galaxy in Space Farmers 2; The Space Time Leek.

Forgotten Fields.description: Forgotten Fields is a cozy narrative game about Sid - a struggling writer who travels back to his childhood home one last time before it's sold off. Visit old friends, relive memories, solve puzzles and play through sections of Sid's book in this warm game about nostalgia and the passage of time.

Suli Fallen Harmony Demo.description: Welcome on Harmony ! Here, on this island, birds and humans live together in peace. One stormy night, Suli discovers a prophecy that will change his life forever. Explore the island various places, interact with colorful characters, solve many puzzles and bring back peace on Harmony !

Coronator.description: because we all should stay at home.

Sausage Hunter Demo.description: Sausage hunter is an exciting platformer in the best traditions of hand-drawn games.

Sycamore.description: Find the hidden levels, collect all the coins, or play with friends in Sycamore, a 3D platformer under development based around quick, fast-paced movement where you will race to the end of a level and compete in leaderboard times with players from around the world.

Automatica Demo.description: Tactical puzzle game where you need to program your robots to finish the task.

Stack Up (or dive trying).description: Stack Up! (or dive trying) is a stack-your-way-up platformer. The objective is simple: get as high as you can. Avoid contact with water at all costs, be swift with your movements and build yourself a makeshift staircase to the top with the objects falling around you.

Destroy All Humans! Demo.description: The cult-classic returns! Terrorize the people of 1950's Earth in the role of the evil alien Crypto-137. Harvest their DNA and bring down the US government in the faithful remake of the legendary alien invasion action adventure. Annihilate puny humans using an assortment of alien weaponry and psychic abilities.

Desperados III Demo.description: Desperados III is a story-driven, hardcore tactical stealth game, set in a ruthless Wild West scenario. Play smart if you want to succeed. A good plan can make the difference between survival and finding yourself at the business end of a pistol.

a new life..description: When your loved one hurts you, what do you do? A classic love story about letting go.

Plato Shoot.description: This is a shooting game, where nobody dies. Use your gun to help enmies find their lover, at the same time, find your own lover.

One Hundred Courage.description: An interesting light roguelike game, keep going deep into the level, strengthen yourself!

Fantasy Lands.description: A single player strategy game in the style of euro board games. Around 30 minutes per game. Collect resources. Explore. Recruit adventurers and fight monsters or complete quests. Improve lands. Research spells. Unlock races, adventurers, land & quest cards, spells and monsters.

Tandis.description: Tandis is a puzzle game where you discover mind-bending geometric forms.

My Jigsaw Adventures - A Lost Story.description: A whole new world is within reach; prepare for a fantastic adventure. Piece after piece, complete puzzles to progress in the story. Enjoy puzzles the way you like; decide how you want to play.

Now it's my turn.description: In this Classic Turn RPG game. You will seek revenge for those that destroyed your homeland.

Fluid VR.description: Fluid VR is an interactive 3D VR Game. You can control and interact Stunning Fluid Effects with your controller mouse in VR. Smooth and realistic fluid effects can let you relax.

Olija.description: Olija is a game about Faraday's quest, a man shipwrecked then trapped in the mysterious country of Terraphage. Armed with a legendary harpoon, he and other castaways try to leave this hostile country to return to their homelands.

Inexistence Rebirth.description: Rediscover this great Metroidvania game in a brand new version with a lot of features and improvements! Run in a vast world full of mysteries and action in this Metroidvania-style game inspired by the classics of the 16-bit era.

Heroes Must Diee.description: Tired of quest going, monster killing "Heroes" who keep raiding your house for household items. You build traps and hire minions to fight them off. Stop these Heroes from taking what is yours. TLDR: build a dungeon & be a dungeon master !

The Chronicles of Confucius's Journey.description: Dissatisfied with politics and seeking answers, a man named Confucius sets out on a great journey to learn more about the world around him and spread his philosophy throughout the world. In this Match3 game you can step into his shoes and learn more about the man, whose teachings live on to today.

Cute Triplets.description: This is a horizontal action game. You can switch 3 characters freely, each character has its own different characteristics to cope with different situations.

Headbangers in Holiday Hell.description: Christmas. Christmas never changes. Soon those overzealous little freaks will swarm the city led by that bearded maniac. But this time, we fight back. Inspired by Zombies Ate My Neighbors and Beavis&Butthead's heavy metal comedy, this is twin-stick mayhem like you've never experienced before.

欢乐消消乐.description: Fun games are suitable for players of all ages, and moderate play can enhance our sense of pleasure and relieve our physical and mental stress. Now join us to get the game props easily, and there are plenty of time-limited rewards for you to receive every day. What are you waiting for?

Beam Demo.description: BEAM is a precision platformer with puzzle elements in which you need to manipulate various light beams in order to find a way out.

Naturalealia.description: Experience the nefarious interactions of mankind with nature by playing as 3 different animals (male or female) with their unique gameplay

//HEX Demo.description: Use your communication skills to bypass internet security measures,and successfully hack into the most secure banks. Choose to take on the role as Hacker, taking direction to disarm each protocol; or Control, and relay instructions to your partner.

Enter Digiton.description: Enter Digiton is a challenging open world metroidvania filled with a variety of unique environments and characters. Armed with only a shield, you are tasked with banishing the four demon lords and saving the beautifully pixelated world of Digiton!

Sausage Hunter.description: Sausage hunter is an exciting platformer in the best traditions of hand-drawn games.

Taskforce Demo.description: Taskforce is a tactical, turn based game in which you control a small group of elite soldiers in a series of sci-fi themed missions. Mission objectives might include rescuing hostages, blowing up targets, stealing documents or other military activities.

Café Rouge Demo.description: Isis Black, your average American teenager, happens upon a part time job opening at Café Rouge. As Isis delves deeper into this strange cafe, she becomes tangled in the mystery of its haunted world. Will she find friend or foe? Will she find love? That's for you to decide.

Adriatic Pizza.description: Adriatic Pizza is a peaceful pizzayolo 3D simulator. In a world inspired by Porco Rosso, explore islands, deliver pizzas, meet wonderful characters and watch out for your Seaplane fuel !

Stay in the Light.description: Beyond the known world there is an ancient temple of great wealth. The treasure you seek is there, you are certain of it. Those who go there forfeit their lives. You have been warned.

Risky Floors.description: In the maze of rooms secret doors can be found behind which there is an even greater danger

What a Cluster Fight.description: This is a party game about fighting your friends with unique characters in a fast paced action platforming setting across beautiful environments.

Astonishing Baseball 20.description: Build your dream lineup, manage a baseball team, sign contracts and live the exciting life of a baseball manager!

R.E.E.L. Demo.description: You need to fix units of the life support system at the station on Mars. Play and learn the basics of electronics. Explore the maze of printed circuit boards, learn how to use electronic components.

Open Sorcery: Sea++ Demo.description: You wake up at the bottom of the ocean, surrounded by your broken memories. Reclaim and compile your magic or drown in a sea of dreams.

Car Trader Simulator - Welcome to the Bu.description: Welcome to the prologue to Car Trader Simulator. Here you will learn all the most important in mechanics and economics in the game and you will play your first mission.

What Happened.description: What Happened is a nightmarish first-person exploration of anxiety and depression from the perspective of American high school student, Stiles.

Automaton Demo.description: Lonely, a one-wheel worker robot begins a journey into the unknown.

Undercat.description: Undercat is a 2D action platformer where you play as a rebellious dog who is tired of catkind’s tyranny. Catch cats and shake out all their coins and use them to buy items. Throw stuff at your enemies and be shot from a cannon. Solve puzzles and end the cat tyranny once and for all.

Tri6: Infinite Demo.description: Tri6: Infinite is a fast paced endless racer in the Tri6 cyberspace. Avoid the obstacles as long as possible with your driving skills and different powerups to beat the top scores. With electrons you collect while playing you can unlock new vehicles and powerups for new challenges.

Archvale.description: Take up your weapon in this RPG bullet-hell world and embark on a journey to right wrongs from long ago. Only you can defeat the evil forces of the Undying guardians and reunite the world with the fabled Archvale.

ThinkFast.description: Think Fast to survive in this frantically-paced minigame collection, where your brain isn't the only muscle you'll need to flex. Put your reflexes and virtual reality skills to the test with classic carnival games, brain teasers, and more!

Strange Aeons Demo.description: Chat with an AI through the microphone. Escape a cyber-hell.

House Designer.description: House Designer is a home design and construction simulator that lets you learn all the stages of construction without leaving your home. Design, build, finish, experiment, combining unusual architectural elements and enjoy your dream house.

Underdog Arena.description: A pretty simple action game with a twist; the worse you do, the stronger your character becomes. Grab a friend!

Saboteur SiO.description: Saboteur SiO is the official sequel to the classic retro games Saboteur! and Saboteur II: Avenging Angel. Travel the world in this original ninja mission, created and developed by the original author, Clive Townsend.

Gardenia.description: A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

1 Screen Platformer 2.description: Try, die, retry in this challenging but fair precision platformer that takes place on 1 screen. Ultra tight controls, dozens of traps, 8 playable characters each with a unique gameplay style. Great for speedrunning, and 100% completionists. Also, no water levels!

Surviving Isolation.description: Surviving isolation is a game about being quarantined. How long can you survive?

Super Space Galaxy.description: Go anywhere you want in a Galaxy full of wonders! Making a fortune, exploring strange new worlds, and protecting the Galaxy from demonic cultists is all in a day's work for a space-adventurer.

Dread X Collection.description: 10 Tales of Terror from 10 Twisted Minds. Made in only 7 Sleepless Nights. The Dread X Collection is a series of small games created by some of the most talented indie devs around, all with the same mission: create the P.T. for the horror project of their dreams.

Candy Kombat.description: Immerse yourself in a world of sweets, which is full of delicious candy. Beat the odds as a sweet frog to find Pinkie and Gingerbread man, to whom you need to explain some things.

Altidudes.description: Get your skateboard ready, you are about to climb the tallest mountain in the whole world! With a seemingly infinite height, you can climb as high as you want, but will you ever reach the top?? Pixel graphics! Dude references! Skateboards! A big mountain! We got it all!

Vectromirror 0.description: Become the Test Subject and attempt to complete a challenging experiment to awaken emotional responses in your Artificial Intelligence. Jump, wall-run, and parkour your way through the free-to-play prequel to the upcoming game.

Finger Guessing King.description: A kind of leisure competitive game similar to guessing boxing, which has the element of luck and tests the wisdom and strategy of players.

Peglin.description: Peglin is a Pachinko Roguelike - Fight enemies by collecting special orbs and popping pegs to deal damage. Acquire special relics that radically change the game and ensure no two runs are the same. Aim carefully to survive in this unique turn-based RPG!

My Strong Horse.description: Become a knight on a medieval horse, and defeat 5 enemy captains to win.

Nitroverse.description: Nitroverse is a mix of a Rogue Like and a Bullet Hell with persistent level progression and combinable weapons.

Leveling up girls in another world.description: Travel Aporia to save it from the Demon Queen Nazmul. Guide a team of girls through strategic fights and strengthen your bonds in this dungeon crawler RPG.

Mine Dungeon2 ~Rurumu's trip~.description: We’re back with cute girls and minesweeping! A minesweeper action adventure with enemies and obstacles to conquer! Our latest edition includes a hit point (HP) system and mine detection flares to support you. With a myriad of new enemy types and boss encounters, an exciting new adventure awaits!

Jack Hayes: The Lazarus Sign.description: A very special challenge: people. Deal with the darkest parts of our modern day society in a story with elements of a film noir. Don't let the humorous dialogue or the seducing smile of a stranger fool you - your choices decide the fate of Jack Hayes, his partner and every other person!

Moonfall.description: Almost extinct and slowly dying, mankind's only hope is to reach the Valley where the broken fragments of the Moon once fell. Manage your squad of travellers through dangerous wastelands in this turn-based Tactical Roguelite.

Jack Hayes: The Lazarus Sign Demo.description: A very special challenge: people. Deal with the darkest parts of our modern day society in a story with elements of a film noir. Don't let the humorous dialogue or the seducing smile of a stranger fool you - your choices decide the fate of Jack Hayes, his partner and every other person!

Car Trader Simulator Demo.description: Do you know how to profit from trading cars while maintaining a good reputation? Car Trader Simulator lets you play the role of an American car dealer. Your goal is to get rich. How you do it depends entirely on you.

A Little Shop in Squirrel Town.description: You will become the shopkeeper of grocery shop in Squirrel Town to run your own shop, replenish your stock, sell, make a profit, kill monsters, manufacture outfits, engage in agriculture, angle, cook delicious food, feed monsters and save Monster Forest controlled by the evil crystal.

Rip Them Off.description: Rip Them Off is a new puzzle game of economic management and tower defense. The Board needs profit, and it’s up to you to line the streets with shops the masses can’t resist. Choose your locations, pick your stores and earn your way up the corporate ladder and its increasingly difficult challenges!

The Ninth Way.description: The Ninth Way is an action game which will accompany you on a journey of magic, intrigue and mystery. You will be able to combine the elements at your disposal to create new powerful spells and conjurations in your fight.

Battle For Seattle.description: Play as your friendly neighbourhood Anarchist and explore the streets of Seattle as you smash symbols of corporate capital and defend yourself from an oppressive police force in this beat 'em up rougelite!

Snack clearing.description: 《Snack clearing》是一款休闲三消游戏，讲述的是玩家在美食街的故事。在冒险途中陷入美食陷阱，需通过移动各类美食消除陷阱即可闯关。游戏种的障碍有很多，上百种关卡,享受策略创造的乐趣！

Buff.description: Buff is a Skate-Surf-FPS where you can use the enemies and environments alike to blast through the levels at high speeds and earn high scores.

三国志猛将传.description: 摒弃传统三国游戏的数据对碰，实现对每个单位都进行独立的实时演算。国产单机三国游戏，尽可能在保留三国历史原貌同时还原壮观的冷兵器决战场景。

Future Fragments - Command Z.description: Future Fragments was developed with support from Jump Into The Light in New York City and was debuted at Cite Internationale des Arts in Paris.

Clockwork Calamity in Mushroom World: Wh.description: A gentle exploration platformer in a vast yet small world where time has stopped, what will happen?

SaGa Frontier Remastered.description: The beloved 1998 RPG Classic, SaGa Frontier, is reborn with improved graphics, additional features, and a new main character!

Pulsar Crash.description: Pulsar Crash takes the white-knuckle gameplay of twin-stick shooters and combines it with the competitive spirit of fighting games.

Our Secret Below Demo.description: A story-driven escape room thriller about a woman who has been abducted and begins to experience surreal events the deeper things go. Uncover your captor's past and discover why you are intertwined.

ADVERSE.description: ADVERSE is an arcade first-person shooter platformer set in an idyllic world of corruption.

Chaos Party.description: Chaos Party is a fast-paced, friendship destroying party shooter set in a 2D universe. You are the equipment slot; Remnants will cling onto your sticky body. Each game provides a new opportunity to try synergies with over a hundred weapons. Have fun with friends online or offline!

Boom slayer.description: Boom slayer is an reckless and fun arcade. Your mission is shoot skull to reach the goal. But each level will be more complex and challenging !! Every level has limit of shots that player can use to unlock next level. At each level there are several types of opponents.

UFO Stalker Demo.description: UFO Stalker is a 2D grid-based, single-player & single-character dungeon crawler RPG with elements of stealth. Figure out alien technology and understand reasons of your capturing.

Ash of Gods: Arena.description: Ash of Gods: Arena is an online game which combines turn-based tactical combat and elements of a card collectibles game. Based on multiplayer mode from the original award-winning game, Ash of Gods: Redemption.

Beyond Dawn.description: In a world where time is the most precious commodity of them all. You must guide your team of D.A.W.N agents in the epic struggle against the band of rebels led by their charismatic leader Manes. It’s up to you, will world order prevail or slip into the chaos that awaits…Beyond Dawn?

DRAGON QUEST XI S: Echoes of an Elusive.description: The Definitive Edition includes the critically acclaimed DRAGON QUEST XI, plus additional scenarios, orchestral soundtrack, 2D mode and more! Whether you are a longtime fan or a new adventurer, this is the ultimate DQXI experience.

The Definitive Edition includes the critically acclaimed DRAGON QUEST XI, plus additional scenarios, orchestral soundtrack, 2D mode and more! Whether you are a longtime fan or a new adventurer, this is the ultimate DQXI experience.

Revolution: Path of a Weaponsmith.description: Fight for your loved ones and your country in this third person stealth shooter. Scavenge for weapon parts and supplies to survive and maybe even make some profit through trade. Make difficult choices in a branching story taking place in an alternative history in which US has invaded USSR in 1989.

Amends VR.description: A journey through the reflections of an upbringing with a now estranged mother.

Catlateral Damage: Remeowstered.description: The premier first-person destructive house cat simulator is back with a vengeance! Play as a mischievous cat, swat your human's possessions onto the floor, scratch up curtains, smash precious keepsakes, and show your owner who's boss.

The Trud.description: The Trud is a horror game that combines exploration with stealth gameplay, here you'll need to find your way out and discover what's happening in the school while monsters are trying to catch you.

Fields of Glory.description: Return to a true wargame based on Napoleon's Waterloo campaign! Become a General in control of huge armies in this classic, historic-themed RTS!

Tower Blitz.description: Tower Blitz is a fun and challenging Tower Defence game with over 10 levels

BloodRelation_Part1.description: Proceed with tools, notes, etc. in a closed building. Overcome various fears and complete tasks. Unlock secrets hidden in the building.

Red Town.description: Welcome to Red Town! This is an old small village in which the villagers live calmly, contacting with environment very seldom. But despite this they are very glad to tourists! Be sure: the locals are eager to help you!

Goomanuvr.description: In this hilarious and procedurally generated challenging platformer, swing and jump your way though to the goal. Put your skills to the test in Single or Multiplayer.

Legion's Crawl 2.description: Legion's Crawl 2 is a classic turn-based, grid-based, roguelike dungeon crawler! Build your character, pick up and enhance your gear, defeat enemies with a minimum loss, eat to survive, and conquer the randomly generated dungeons!

Legion's Crawl 2 Demo.description: Legion's Crawl 2 is a classic turn-based, grid-based, roguelike dungeon crawler! Build your character, pick up and enhance your gear, defeat enemies with a minimum loss, eat to survive, and conquer the randomly generated dungeons!

Road to Nowhere Demo.description: Road to Nowhere tells the story of Cohle Bishop, an introvert and successful software developer whose life is torn to shreds by scandal. Confronted by his past and doubting his own sanity, he spirals into a depression on the open road, trying desperately to pull himself back from the brink.

STAR WARS™ Battlefront™ II.description: Be the hero in the ultimate STAR WARS™ battle fantasy with STAR WARS™ Battlefront™ II: Celebration Edition!

STAR WARS™ Battlefront™.description: The STAR WARS™ Battlefront™ Ultimate Edition includes the STAR WARS™ Battlefront™ Deluxe Edition as well as the STAR WARS™ Battlefront™ Season Pass.

Mass Effect™: Andromeda.description: Return to the Mass Effect universe & lead the first humans in Andromeda on a desperate search for our new home.

Mass Effect 3 (2012).description: It's time for Commander Shepard to fight for the fate of the human race and save the galaxy.

Dragon Age II.description: You are Hawke, a refugee seeking to escape the darkspawn-plagued land of Ferelden and become Champion of Kirkwall. Rise to power and fight epic battles while making decisions that determine the course of civilization.

Burnout™ Paradise Remastered.description: Burnout Paradise Remastered provides the ultimate driving playground for you and your friends to play online. This remaster includes all add-ons from the Year of Paradise, including the Big Surf Island update, meticulously recreated and ready to wreck in 4K.

Boss Rush: Mythology Demo.description: Boss Rush: Mythology - This is an action game in which you have to fight various creatures and gods from Greek, Scandinavian, Slavic and Egyptian mythologies.

禁忌.description: 在广阔的艾尔德林大陆做出你的选择，完成你的使命。在千千万万繁琐细碎的线索中找到事情的真相

Rocket Shipment.description: A tricky physics based rocketship delivery game with an integrated level editor.

GraFi Valentine.description: GraFi Valentine - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, hearts and changing gravity.

Shisensho Solitaire Demo.description: Shisensho Solitaire is a classic tile-matching game. You can only match pairs of tiles if they can be connected by a single line with no more than two bends. If you clear every tile, you win!

Radical Rabbit Stew Demo.description: Radical Rabbit Stew is a hare-raising action-arcade game, featuring fast-paced whack-a-rabbit gameplay, scintillating puzzles, super-sized boss fights, juicy pixel graphics and a sizzling soundtrack, perfect for new players and 16-bit retro fans alike!

Phoenix Strike.description: In a casual game with a top view, you have to control military equipment from a Quad bike to a tank (only 4 types). During the passage of the location, you need to break enemy ambushes, but also collect keys to get to the boss. Defeating the boss will open access to the next level.

Isle Of Spirits.description: Isle of spirits is a chill and casual survival game taking place on a mysterious desert isle. Build your home, survive, and fight against microclimates or supernatural phenomenons. The isle will be your home and your enemy: it offers all resources to live, but it is also full of terrible dangers.

Redneck Ed: Astro Monsters Show.description: Crisp combat mechanics, challenging arenas, hilarious storyline, and totally addictive and painfully familiar spot-on gameplay. Experience the thrills of fighting your way through the most bizarre villains in the Galaxy and defend the honor of Earth in the space arena!

Dr Livingstone, I presume? - Reversed Es.description: Experience the reversed escape room game. Solve many different types of puzzles and venture deeper and deeper into the mansion's heart. Investigate what lies behind the mysterious letter from your dearest friend.

Ultimate MMA.description: Ultimate MMA is a mixed martial art fighting game. Fight in the tournament, unlock new moves, create unique fighters and play with friends.

Great Alhcemist.description: Great Alchemist is a classic 3-in-a-row puzzle game.

Hot steel.description: Take on the role of a monster hunter who has occupied independent lands.

Samozbor ID:HEAVEN.description: Breach enemy stronghold in dread Siberian wastelands before insurgents can open gates to Samozbor dimension.

Attack of the alien thingies from lava!.description: Try to survive the increasing waves of alien thingies! Unlock and upgrade guns, pickup power-ups, get Steam achievements. Have fun with this brainless shooter game!

The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing.description: Take on the hunt of a lifetime as you target and pursue monster-sized fish around the world. You’re set, waiting…. The line tightens, your alarm screams, the fish is on and the battle commences!

终回〇Murder Reservation.description: 契约达成，限制少女的枷锁被打碎，终回的物语已然展开。 一起，跨越界限吧—— 在此宝贵的一日里，因果的天秤由你掌控。 要探寻那份隐于其中的缘由吗？还是简单快捷地达成她的心愿？

Anti Air.description: Are you the new recruit? Well, grab your weapons and descent into battle on distant planets. There you will combat the Alien invasion called the Cubicon Conjunction. Waves will hit you so you better blast these invaders from the sky before they crash onto your base.How many will you take down?

HVOR.description: HVOR [/] - a dynamic top-down shooter, which takes place in the world,affected by an unknown infection.Kill the infected - and try not to join him.

Building The Universe.description: Building the Universe is a time travel and building game that starts at the Big Bang and progresses through time as players recreate the conditions that resulted in the very fire atoms being created.

AKIBA'S TRIP: Hellbound & Debriefed.description: Supernatural creatures are stalking the pop culture mecca of Akihabara—and they've turned you into one of them. Arm yourself with an otaku-themed weapon and expose their skin to sunlight in this HD update of the first game in the AKIBA'S TRIP series.

WILDLAND: Initial Attack.description: Stamp out fires with your friends using planes, helicopters, and your hands in a huge beautiful world.

Hard2Fly.description: Hard2Fly is a drone flying game that will likely challenge your skills as a pilot.

Edge of Reality.description: It seems that there can be no more boring profession in the world than a pawnshop appraiser. But a meeting with a mysterious but pretty stranger changes Dan's idea of his job.

Survival Africa.description: This is a early access game where you haveto Survive against other Natives Online by Building a base and gathering resources for food and crafting weapons to defend yourself. There is Base Building,Crafting,PVP, Workbenches and Gear sets for protection. Please support us to build this game into the best survival games on the market.

Verdant Village.description: You've washed ashore in a foreign land. With nothing to your name other than a few tools you’ll have to learn how to live off the land. Explore, grow crops, and meet the locals. How you live is up to you. Can you create a new life for yourself in the small town of Amberglen?

SPACE EXODUS.description: Rise and shine, pilot. In Space EXODUS you take control of various gliders to defeat your enemies. Pirates from all parts of space are attacking our earth and you are our last chance to stop them. So rise to the challenge. Gameplay Fight with agile gliders and a variety of weapons.

Outliver: Tribulation.description: Outliver: Tribulation is a third-person survival horror game set in a fictional supernatural realm of African mythology about a soldier on the run from terrorists who mysteriously finds herself in the middle of an ancient ritual.

10 Second Shuriken Demo.description: 10 Second Shuriken is a fps platformer. Speedrun your way through levels destroying all the enemies as quickly as you possibly can to get a legendary 3 star rating. JUMP your way through sky islands, enemy projectiles and lasers as you attempt this task in 10 SECONDS.

Living Legends: The Crystal Tear Collect.description: Can you save the kingdom from a crystal curse?

Boris and the Dark Survival.description: A lone wolf struggles to survive the inky abyss of Joey Drew Studios in this top-down survival horror.

TheWandererVR.description: Simple VR Archery shooting game. Defend yourself against the oncoming enemies with arrows.

Wise Escape From Prison (현명한 감옥 탈출기).description: This game is made by Korean TEENS! In prison where aliens crashed, people are infected with unknown viruses except you! Escape from prison by throwing THE STONE! This game is 'UP&DOWN shooting GAME'.

Comic Book Tycoon.description: Start out as comic artist in small room and draw best comic you can and show off your work, replay the history of the comic industry., your decisions will make or break your studio. Create bestselling comics and become immortal with your stories.

Bounty For Sharks.description: Kill Sharks for bounty, spend to upgrade.

Me and (My) Cat's Castle.description: This is a jump action game that leads "me" which changes state by including the onigiri in the mouth to the power spot "Neko image" which is ahead of each stage which is a little challenging.

Me and (My) Cat's Castle X.description: This is a jump action game that leads "me" which changes state by including the onigiri in the mouth to the power spot "Neko image" which is ahead of each stage which is a little challenging.

Qual.description: Qual is a fast paced top-down bullet hell that emphasizes on spell combinations.

Orbis Fugae.description: Follow self-crowned Pirate Queen Anya Ophelia Morgan on a world-spanning escape quest!

EMPTY.description: In the world of "EMPTY" Earth is flat, and Depart from the very ground. You will be controlling "Master Humpback", Jump through each level and collect "RED CORE". While you walk through Each level, you will discover the Story of "EMPTY".

Crypt Of Shadows.description: Shoot- bang, get through the rooms! A rogue-like dungeon crawler, take pills and survive.

Cloudscape.description: You wake up on an uninhabited island. Gather resources and craft tools to help you survive. Find a way off of the island to discover new lands filled with new resources, villagers and much more! Can you solve the mystery of the monsters, uncover your past and transform your island into a paradise?

Evil Cult.description: This is a strategy board game of Lovecraftian macabre. Gain resources, grow your cult, stay hidden from the world, and when the stars are finally right summon the Elder God you worship. Alternatively, just eliminate the competition in an invisible war.

Phalanx of Resistance.description: Phalanx of Resistance is the Tower Defense / Real Time Strategy mixture you have never played before.

Mission:In Boxes.description: Mission: In Boxes, as a spy agent, uses clever use of spy gadgets to advance through various gimmick stages. It is a puzzle escape game in VR space aiming at obtaining the target. Enjoy a new sense of VR puzzle escape game!

子夜之章:历史的终局～MidNights of Desperado～Demo.description: The protagonist of this lonely life is you. You leave your hometown and come to a strange world. The world is prosperous and cold, strange but real. You may like it or wish you could tear it to pieces. The good news is, you have the choice!

Incredible Dracula: Ocean's Call.description: A giant creature of unknown origin has broken free of its icy prison and sparked chaos around the world! Join Dracula as he embarks on an extraordinary quest unlike any he has experienced!

Box Kid Adventures Demo.description: Box Kid Adventures is a dynamic, top-down puzzle game. You play as Box Kid – a toy made of cardboard – going through various levels, full of nasty enemies and brain challenging puzzles.

VR Summer Sports.description: Casual VR sports game. Try to beat the competition in 10 unique disciplines and progress your way to the top in one or all of them!

King of Volleyball.description: King of Volleyball is a romantic comedy yuri dating sim set in the gorgeous US Virgin Islands. Play as Kiera Marley, a retired pro soccer player turned sports consultant, as she meet some young beach volleyball players who are in desperate need of her help and advice.

Bamerang.description: Bämeräng is a fast paced boomerang fighting game for two to four players. Enjoy hilarious boomerang battles against your friends in local multiplayer or using Steam's Remote Play Together.

Null & Peta: Audio Commentary.description: Genius girl Null suddenly lost her sister in an accident. But don't worry! Using her wealth of knowledge, she successfully rebuilt her sister as a robot! A disaster-filled comedy about sisterly love!

Starters Orders Classic Horse Racing.description: Starters Orders Classic is a new horse racing management game that simulates owning, breeding and racing your own string around the globe. Based on the highly acclaimed Starters Orders 7 simulation engine Starters Orders Classic features a retro style 2D race sequence for both flat and jumps racing!

The Dawn of Art.description: Explore the Chauvet Cave 36,000 years ago, with Daisy Ridley’s voice as your guide. It’s in the Ardèche gorges, in the south of France, that our ancestors drew humanity’s first masterpieces, giving life to their beliefs. Maybe you will also meet the cave bear…

Endurium.description: Ready your plasma blades and face off against wave after wave of incoming beams as you struggle to survive at ever increasing speeds.

UEDI: Shadow of the Citadel.description: I came to find the truth and to find my friend. But this forbidden place is entangled in war. They prey on us night and day. I must find the strength to rise from the shadows. Soon they will all know my name. My name is UEDI.

愛情限時批 Demo.description: Scan Your Heart is a game about “Scanner and Barcode”. Using scanner to scan the barcode on your opponent to defeat him. And this game is set in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. Your can experience the beauty of Kaohsiung.

SwordBall.description: SwordBall is a free to play 2D sword fighting football game. Football meets fencing? Join your team in the most exciting, fast paced game! Swing your sword and defend your goal or grab the ball and score. Lead your team to victory and join the future of sports!

Beerman Demo.description: Take charge of the caped deliverer and help Boston's finest foil The Society Of The Ninth over land, sea and air!

Nice Try!.description: One little car, one little level. What could go wrong? Apparently, everything could go wrong. Test your patience!

Fastidious.description: Play with 5 of your friends in Fastidious! Keep in mind that everyone doesn’t have to get their hands dirty, so while they sit outside you can go in and shoot up the place!

Armoured Onslaught.description: Armoured Onslaught is a fast paced Top-Down Shooter and Tower Defence hybrid. You will need to make use of both strategy and skill as you fight your way through near endless hordes of deadly foes.

Dig Mania.description: A game about digging holes to survive!

Mahasona.description: Mahasona is a Third-person, Multiplayer Social horror game. Where you can team up with other players as a team of four kids to find a treasure that belongs to a Demon name Mahasona. As Mahasona you have to stop the kids from finding the Treasure before sunrise.

Genius!.description: Mettez à l'épreuve le côté absurde de votre cerveau en répondant entre amis aux questions les plus déjantées de l'agent Roger Dedroin !

Mission Zigloton.description: Help Zigloton steal an old relic on his journey to infiltrate a mysterious planet, in this challenging platformer developped and hand-animated by one person.

Of Evil and Darkness.description: A group of paranormal investigators with their own television show head to a remote island to film an episode. Once there they encounter the evil that was let loose upon the island, long ago.

The Last Archwing.description: The Last Archwing is a fast paced, vertically scrolling space shooter. Will you and your friends take up the mantle as Earth's last defenders and thwart the plans of the evil Emperor Zarkhan?

The Fold: Ingression.description: The Fold: Ingression is a thriller adventure with Lovecraftian horror elements set on the Telemark coast of Norway. You are a young temp exterminator at the ancient Eikherad stave church; tread carefully and stay vigilant as you unearth the dark secrets of this place and face unexpected horrors.

Balkadia.description: For fans of "Classicvania" and "Supervania", Balkadia is a difficult 2D action-platformer with Slavic mythology influences and 8-directional whip mechanics.

Korpus: Buried over the Black Soil.description: Korpus: Buried over the Black Soil is a first-person horror game in which you have been sent to evaluate an abandoned house, set somewhere in Eastern Europe. Uncover the houses past and the secrets buried within.

Zero IDLE.description: Zero IDLE is an incremental (IDLE) game in which you can decide whether to make all of your way to the biggest number EVER by clicking, or by increasing your incremental production...or you can make the game to click for you...

Cult达人极限攀岩.description: Use your skill to climb to the top!

Oddventure.description: Oddventure is a lore-rich turn-based crazy RPG set in a cursed fairytale world. Fight your inner demons and reach for the spark of hope, or stare directly into the abyss.

Puzzle - LINES AND KNOTS DEMO.description: Logical puzzle game for meditation. The goal of the player is to assemble a puzzle consisting of nodes. Easy to understand mechanics, swap hexagons with lines.

dancing chair.description: Two men struggle to get the chair!!! After stopping the music, If you can sit the chair at a certain time , YOU WIN !

Oneiro.description: Utilize skill, creativity, and knowledge to reach the depths of your mental labyrinth. By collecting and stacking items, gears, and weapons, you'll stand a chance against the brutal manifestations of your fears.

Retro.description: Retro is an arcade-style mini game collection with an arcade, story mode and a "corrupted" arcade! Play though the mini games in arcade mode, battle the virus in story mode or try for a new high score with much more challenging games in the corrupted arcade!

Dark Water : Slime Invader.description: Dark Water is an Action Platformer game where you use a bow.

Meme Run 2.description: The sequel to the most controversial Wii U exclusive returns! Introducing Meme Run 2, the dankest endless runner on the internet. Want to unlock the secrets of the Illuminati? Join the cult today and help support the development of this dank game!

Roboshark Rampage.description: Roboshark Rampage is an endless cave swimmer which you simply won't be able to put down. Watch out! Don't get hit by an anchor or mine! There are dangers lurking everywhere.

Boom Stick.description: Boom Stick is a Fast-Paced Shooter with projectile based combat. Inspired by many of the Old School Shooters but with some new Ideas.

There a no Armadillos in this game.description: There a no Armadillos in this game is a puzzle platformer where you can't stop rolling and have to time your jumps precise to finish the level.

Reach Demo.description: The world is covered with mystery and horror. Everything is dark, and the sky is blood-colored, there is no sun, no night, no day. Everyone has their own time and it is unique. You need to reach the light to survive and return home. Welcome to the world of shadows!

Turbo Boom!.description: Hop into Turbo Boom! to go rally racing on obstacle courses lined with explosive obstacles. Easy to drive slow, but do you have the skills to set records? The nerves to risk everything for that extra hundredth second?

Weed County.description: Grow, package, and sell weed while managing personal needs and furnishing your own home. Make friends with the community of Weed County by day and make drug deals at night. Buy properties and businesses to launder dirty money and pay off the debt hanging over your head.

Epic Conquest 2.description: An Action RPG inspired by the classics, with special touch in the game mechanics and anime-style story telling!

Gamedev Beatdown Demo.description: Be a bastion of all that's good in the games industry or crunch like there is no tomorrow. Play as a game developer in an exciting new turn-based combat and narrative game. But beware, your colleagues will fight your decisions every step of the way.

CATharsis.description: STORY:This is a visual novel and adventure game set in the present day.(It is not an otome game.)

CUBeKA.description: CUBéKA is a new type of "pen and paper" word puzzle. Each CUBéKA puzzle has a single word as a solution.

長星 Long Star.description: Explore and discover depredator, other solar, build space battleship and a massive amount of content. Take back our Alpha Centauri！

Treasure Drifter: Nian.description: "Treasure Drifter: Nian" is a game combining defensive action and walking exploration. Bring your partner to learn different character stories, defeat difficult enemies, and unlock different puzzles on the long road. Grow and explore the world in the cycle of departure and return.

Angry Bunny 2: Lost hole.description: Sequel to Angry Bunny game. Find bomb and explode big carrot way to home. Avoid several different enemies

Abst Clicker Farm.description: Compete with other players in the leaderboard in terms of both total clicks and clicks per second.

Indian Army - Mission POK.description: This is Third person shooter Game based on indian army .

fullybroKEN - A Unique Post-Apocalyptic.description: Play as single character in a 4x game. Survive. Thrive. Die. Unite the country of Mir. Kill, make hard choice, become anything you want in this unique post-apocalyptic game. Die. With ideas from 4X, Match-3 RPGs, Traditional RPGs and roguelikes, fullybroKEN offers an experience unlike anything else.

Class Kingdom.description: Class Kingdom is a RPG&Tower-Defense solo-indie game. As the player, you need to save your kingdom!

Hollow Remnant.description: Journey through the shadows of medieval fantasy as a Hollow Remnant. Forgotten to life, yet unbeknownst to death, you proceed along a veil of fragmented souls. Bump back against that which dwells in the dark, with instruments crucial to your survival.

Tinker Racers.description: Tinker Racers is a Survival Racing Party Game. Drive mini RC cars through tracks built around the house with common, everyday items. Forget the finishing line and just try to stay in sight! Up to four friends can join forces or compete with each other on local multiplayer!

Volatile.description: Volatile is a space exploration adventure game which, at its core, plays with the importance of actions and consequences.

Gotcha.description: Gotcha is a chaotic couch co-op game for 1 - 4 players. You and your friends must escape from chasing adults. Make the trap to block adults or trap them down.

Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II.description: Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II is a sequel of Steel Alcimus inspired by various 1980-1990s' 3D computer games. Pilot the deadliest helicopter in this action-packed 3D game. Destroy the targets, rescue the hostages, and capture the enemy buildings to save the world!

Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II (Free).description: Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II is a sequel of Steel Alcimus inspired by various 1980-1990s' 3D computer games. Pilot the deadliest helicopter in this action-packed 3D game. Destroy the targets, rescue the hostages, and capture the enemy buildings to save the world!

Penguin's Dogma.description: Penguin's Dogma｜ 獄門ペンギン Welcome to Penguin's Dogma, a silly, lowbrow stealth game.

Mistaker.description: Mistaker is a unique platformer with a dwarf lost in an alien world. Journey deep underground and explore fantastic places filled with all manner of monsters, traps, and treasure. You'll have freedom while you navigate the fully-destructible mines. Collect gold, power-ups, and find your way home!

Warmth.description: Help keep your loved ones warm and happy in the cold outside world by spreading the heat from the main campsite to all other family members! Create a trail of warmth and help grandmas and dogs alike in this fun and wholesome puzzle game.

Bone Marrow.description: Bone Marrow is a game in the genre of role-playing board logic puzzle. During a certain time, combine the figures, increase your characteristics and do away with evil but consider the wrong step can lead to irreversible consequences!

Synthetic blood: Mind Shift.description: Synthetic Blood: Mind Shift is a futuristic action-platformer with a deep storyline and fascinating binding of dialogues and deaths. Dynamic combat system, interesting characters, strong enemies and 10 different endings will not leave you cold.

PsyHotel.description: Take on the role of the owner of a cosy hotel off the beaten path of civilization. Just remember that all your clients are criminals and psychopaths. Take care of them properly, starting with thieves and ending with fat fishes. You are the law here!

Troll Hunter VR.description: In Troll Hunter VR action-adventure, you explore harsh nature, study trolls, set traps, and hunt them down to protect civilians. Hunt for ghastly trolls in the alternative '80s Scandinavia, using your wit, trusty shotgun, and DIY devices.

Sokpop S07: labyrinth.description: Explore a castle high in the sky. Open new paths, grow stronger and find crystals. Can you make it to the end?

Sheptun.description: What is this dead city whispering about? Is he craving for something? Or is he afraid of something?

TrickShot.description: TRICKSHOT is an adrenaline-fueled, multiplayer skate shooter where players execute tricks along with their opponents in various skatepark arenas across the galaxy using Hoverboards or Hoverskates.

Reach.description: The world is covered with mystery and horror. Everything is dark, and the sky is blood-colored, there is no sun, no night, no day. Everyone has their own time and it is unique. You need to reach the light to survive and return home. Welcome to the world of shadows!

Astronarch.description: A fusion of roguelikes and auto-battlers like never before seen. Recruit a party of mysterious heroes, navigate deadly lands, collect an arsenal of magical items, and vanquish a new evil threatening the realm!

HOLMGANG: Memories of the Forgotten.description: Dracorum was a land of peace and prosperity, but King Haziel's death caused darkness and wickedness over the kingdom. Everything seems lost, but three heroes will rise against injustice... It is time to know their stories.

Live To Win.description: Live To Win - This is an adventure platformer with a completely destructible world, the complex construction of game locations that are hand-assembled

Pry Into The Void.description: A bleak monster-taming RPG where you pry into the hearts of monsters and people. Exploit enemy weaknesses, converse with their souls and navigate challenging moral dilemmas to recruit abstract monsters as your allies.

OH! MOCHI!.description: OH! MOCHI! is a comical action fighting game.Strange rice cakes rampage in Japan! Spin around your Mochi's head! Defeat all! Aim for the strongest Mochi!!

AeternoBlade.description: AeternoBlade is a Time-Manipulation Hack-and-Slash Action-Puzzle Game. Join Freyja to take revenge on Beladim, the Lord of the Mist who destroyed her hometown and unravel the mysteries of AeternoBlade.

NUMTATE.description: NUMTATE is a challenging grid based puzzle game in which you move blocks around by rotating, pushing and attracting them to solve numeric puzzles.

Moons Of Darsalon.description: Retro action "save-them-all" platformer including advanced physics combined with an unique retro feel. Complete rescue missions leading your colleagues to the closest base station. Fight enemies using your laser gun, jet pack, destroy terrain and even make new paths with the ground maker.

ANIME WAR — Modern Campaign.description: ANIME WAR — Modern Campaign transports you along with the H.E.N.T.A.I. army to one of the hottest hotspots around the globe to take down our №1 threatening enemy.

Deadly Land.description: It is deadly land around you. Explore the different areas of the map and look for suitable places to fight the next zombie waves. Get new weapons and upgrade them with attachments so that you can defeat the ever stronger and faster zombies.

Fighters' Glory.description: Fighters' Glory, a 3d-style weapons based fighter. 10 warriors compete for fame and fortune!

Paug.description: A fireball, spirits and a pyramid. What can happen? Move your racket and beat the spirit in a duel.

CanCan the Game.description: CanCan, the game of color and creation; a puzzle game using multicolored tiles.

Era of Survival.description: The Age of Society has long passed and mother nature has done her job to restore balance. A new world filled with sprawling animal and plant life awaits you. It’s back to basics. Farming, hunting and proper shelter are once again your challenges. Will you overcome the world and then conquer it all?

Handy Dandy.description: The two adventurers Handy and Dandy have caused a dimensional tear which is now separating them and the entire cave where they have to solve platforming puzzles to reunite again in this 2D co-op game.
